title: A pleasant surprise and a place to return to.
content: I was looking for a place to eat on a Tuesday evening in Bulle. I had to stay overnight for my job and did not want to spend a lot of money for diner. Then I saw Indus Bar. In the entrance there was and a board saying "Burger of the week" so I stepped in and asked if I could eat. I was greeted very friendly and was proposed to sit down. Only a few evenings n the week you can get something to eat. I was lucky. The burger that came with some oven baked potatoes with big salt was delicious. In fact it has been a long time that I ate such a good one. There's a whole variety of burgers on the menu for every taste and apetite that are served at noon. The top is the Tartare at an unbeatable price. I took a glas of red Cote du Rhone, wine of the month and it matched perfectly with the burger. I'm really looking foreward to my next visit to Bule so I can eat at Indus Bar.

title: Il ne faut pas s'√©tonner que les √©tablissements font faillites quand on a un g√©rant pareil !
content:
Ce weekend il y avait la f√™te f√©d√©rale des fifres et tambours √† Bulle. Une opportunit√© sans pr√©c√©dent pour faire conna√Ætre notre ville au-del√† des fronti√®res cantonales. Arrivant de la place de f√™te avec un verre en plastique contenant moins d'un dl de bi√®re, on s'est dit qu'on allait s'asseoir √† la Potini√®re, commander des boissons et passer la soir√©e dans cet √©tablissement √† regarder les matchs. On a pas eu le temps de s'asseoir √† la terrasse que le g√©rant nous aboyait dessus en disant qu'on avait pas le droit de venir avec ce verre non fini. Je comprends parfaitement qu'on consomme dans un restaurant les boissons du m√™me restaurant. Est-ce qu'il aurait pu attendre 5 secondes qu'on prenne place et qu'une serveuse vienne prendre notre commande? Non, on a pas eu le droit de s'asseoir et outre le fait qu'il nous aboie dessus √† peine nous √©tions arriv√©s, que lui et ses amis, tranquillement assis √† la table derri√®re celle o√π nous nous sommes install√©s par la suite, se fendaient de commentaires d√©sobligeants. Non seulement on allait consommer et d√©penser de l'argent dans cet √©tablissement - argent qui, soit dit en passant PAIE SON SALAIRE - mais en plus il a le culot de faire des commentaires par la suite. Cette situation est arriv√© √† d'autres clients, venant de la place de f√™te, qui voulaient s'installer sur cette terrasse.
Les serveuses couraient dans tous les sens car c'√©tait un soir d'affluence, mais non, le g√©rant √©tait assis en terrasse, √† regarder les matchs, se fendre avec ses amis de commentaires inappropri√©s sur des clients potentiels. Quand on voit comment √ßa bosse: Il ne faut pas s'√©tonner si les √©tablissements ferment les uns apr√®s les autres quand le g√©rant du dit √©tablissement est autant imbuvable !
Ce weekend √©tait l'occasion de montrer aux 50'000 visiteurs attendus que Bulle sait recevoir du monde‚Ä¶
Visiblement la politesse et le service √† la client√®le n'ont pas la m√™me d√©finition pour tout le monde !!!

title: Giger Glory

When coming to Switzerland, I made it a priority to visit Giger‚Äôs Bar and bask in it‚Äôs immersive tactile glory firsthand. (Side Note: Giger‚Äôs designs were originally for the uncompleted film adaptation of one of my favorite book series, Dune. The chairs in the bar are the original designs for one of it‚Äôs central characters, Baron Harkonnen)

title: Woah

√Ä faire car le lieu est original.

title: An Alien Bar in a medieval town
content:
We found the Alien Bar to be in the most unlikely of places in Gruyere (yes, like the cheese), Switzerland. When you get close to Gruyere, all you will see is a medieval town; no indication of this fantastic bar.

You will need to pay for parking and walk a steep entrance path up to the town. Make your way into the direction of the castle walls. You will find the entrance to the side of the entrance to the castle wall.

The food menu is restricted and - baring in mind this is Switzerland - vegetarian is the most you can expect. Drinks, staff and the surrounding are fantastic and well worth the visit.

title: Ein Erlebnis
content: Ein Abstecher in die Giger Bar lohnt sich immer wieder. Das Lokal ist zwar etwas dunkel und weist inzwischen doch einige Abnutzungsspuren auf. Vorallem wenn draussen die Sonne scheint, ist es etwas schade in diesem schattigen Ecken von Gruy√®res zu verweilen. Ein Abstecher lohnt sich trotzdem.

title: 100% full occupancy: design definitely sells!
content:

This bar looks even more Gothic than original gothic architecture.
This atmosphere is an instant remedy against bad weather so this destination is probably an excellent counter poison to grey weather weekends.
Definitely unswiss and immensely original.
Go and share.

Cross the museum and saw his extremely impressive and allows visitors to see worth a mansion in a castle is. I was amazed and positively impressed that they let everybody take pictures.
Also go and share.

title: A must fo - especially after visiting the Giger Museum

content: Die Bar war definitive Einzigartig, allerdings fand ich schade das die Getr√§nke und Speisen nicht so beeindruckend wie die Ambiente selbst waren. Daf√ºr fand ich die Preise etwas √ºberteuert.

title: Particolare ma niente di pi√π

title: Special Bar in the Beautiful Gruyeres
content: Before going to the Chalet for your special fondue, have a drink in this peculiar bar, constructed by the famous H.R. Giger, the alien's creator. The special location of the bar and the interior design will make your experience unique!

title: un d√©cor unique au monde
content: Tout le d√©cor est "biom√©canique" et donne une impression fascinante, rien d'exceptionnel dans ce qui est servi mais le d√©cor vaut le d√©tour. le fait de ne r√©server les photos qu'aux consommateurs est toujours assez g√©nant et mercantile.

title: An "OK" coffee stop
content: The Giger Bar "wins" on its setting and d√©cor and, in that sense, is a place to visit - but the coffees were pretty standard

title: Unvergleichlich

title: Interessante e diferente
content:
Realmente fiquei curiosa nesse bar. No meio de uma cidade hist√≥rica, um bar tem√°tico e um museu contando a hist√≥ria sobre Alien.

Imaginei que seria maior do que realmente √©. Mas, em nada diminui a experi√™ncia de entrar nesse bar e curtir cum ch√°, ou um drink.
N√£o h√° muitas op√ß√µes de comida.

title: Extra ordinaire
content: Tout comme le mus√®e en face, un lieu incroyable baignant dans la science fiction au coeur... d une cit√®e medievale.. a ne pas manquer !

title: Aliens' Fans place
content: Thematic bar, very well decorated. Must visit! The chairs, the roof, the bar, everything is just perfect.

title: Bar atypique et sympathique
content: Bar en relation avec le Mus√©e Giger, fauteuils tr√®s confortable, ambiance cosy, accuei sympathique.Mus√©e de fond tr√®s agr√©able.

title: Incroyable bar Alien
content: Superbe bar de Giger au th√®me et sculpture Alien. Cadre incroyable. Petite carte de restauration. √Ä faire!

title: Wie im Film!!!
content: Wir wahren im November f√ºr 2 Tage in Greyerz. Die ‚ÄúBar‚Äú und nicht Restaurant!!!! hat alles was man braucht. Die Einrichtung ist einfach nur Atemberaubend. Man sp√ºrt HR. Gigers spezielle Ansicht der Dinge. Ich kam aus dem Staunen nicht mehr raus!!!! Probiert unbedingt den HR. Giger Absinth. Preise etwas h√∂her aber bei einem solchen Ambiente absolut vertretbar. Ein muss f√ºr jeden Alien Liebhaber.

title: Surprenant
content: Plongez dans l‚Äôunivers d‚ÄôAlien avec des d√©cors magnifiques et surprenants. Endroit touristique ce qui explique les prix. Toilettes √† l‚Äôext√©rieur du caf√©/bar.

title: Wow
content: Les d√©cors √©tait vraiment splendide, autant le mobilier que les murs ! Le seul petit b√©mol serait que c'est un peut petit.

title: The Coolest Bar!
content:
We visited the Giger Museum first and used the bar visit to top off our experience. The photos don't lie. This is a spooky but alluring place. I think it would be bad to get really drunk here, pass out, and then wake up in the belly of this beast! Crazy!

We kept it to two drinks and had nice conversation with the friendly bartenders. It was very busy, quite loud and quite small. Luckily, we only had to stand by the bar for about three minutes before two people vacated their bar-front chairs (best seats) and we could sit down.

Combining this bar with your museum visit is a great idea.

title: Un'occasione mancata
content: A parte i prezzi ingiustificati manca una vera personalizzazione del locale. Da appassionato di Giger mi sarei aspettato molto di pi√π. L'arredamento √® super,ma trascurato e rattoppato. Le ragazze che servono sono poco comunicative e cortesi. Ripeto che hanno una piccola miniera d'oro e non la sfruttano. Avrei anche pagato qualche franco in pi√π e sarei stato felice di farlo se avessi trovato un locare che trasudava Giger in ogni aspetto,non ci voleva molto;piatti,sotto bicchieri,men√π. Tutto mi √® sembrato trascurato e banale. Mi aspettavo molto di pi√π. A fronte di un museo al di sopra delle mie aspettative ho trovato il Giger Bar molto al di sotto delle sue potenzialit√†. peccato.

title: UN PEZZO DI STORIA
content: qui siamo nell'oltre..a prescindere dal fatto che sia un bar, rappresenta ben altro..sedersi in questo bar √® veramente immergersi nelle atmosfere dell'arte di Giger..veramente un'esperienza che surclassa ampiamente i prezzi di bevande e cibo...d'obbligo sostarvi dopo la visita al Giger Museum!

title: Dissolversi in un'opera d'arte
content:
Venerd√¨ 2 novembre 2018, una giornata uggiosa dunque perfetta per godersi il locale. Arriviamo un po' in ritardo rispetto a quanto programmato e purtroppo √® mezzogiorno appena passato, tuttavia √® un feriale d'autunno quindi non dovrebbe esserci una gran ressa.
Ebbene all'esterno c'√® comunque una decina di persone. Esitano, parlottano, alcune entrano e quasi tutte escono subito.
Attendiamo un attimo per non saltare eventuali file d'attesa, poi dopo esserci resi conto che alla maggior parte dei presenti interessa unicamente curiosare e scattare fotografie, entriamo. Prima di varcare la soglia lancio una fugace occhiata verso l‚Äôarco d‚Äôentrata alla piazzetta del museo e l‚Äôimmaginazione mi fa apparire P√´tr Stepanoviƒç Verchovenskij (interpretato magistralmente dal losannese Jean-Philippe √âcoffey) che attraversa furtivo la via fermandosi brevemente nel mezzo, come nel film ‚ÄúLes Possed√©s‚Äù di Wajda.
Per me √® la quarta visita, a cui vanno aggiunti anche 2 tentativi andati a vuoto causa orari d'apertura molto restrittivi. La porta non cigola come scritto da qualcuno. Avanziamo molto lentamente. A sinistra 3 finestre gotiche ciascuna con un tavolino e 2 poltroncine girevoli: tutto √® occupato. Oltre la colonnina verticale vertebrata, sempre a sinistra, il mio posto favorito con sempre 2 poltroncine girevoli (purtroppo occupate), nicchia illuminata e tavolino; poi in senso orario un tavolino ad angolo con sedute a parete fisse (occupate), una grande saletta comunicante finestrata con tavolo medio (occupato), un altro angolo come il primo (occupato) e un‚Äôalcova finale da 4 posti (libera). Al centro il monumentale tavolone illuminato dalla caratteristica lampada pendente xenobicefala (libero). Non ci si addice l'occupare spazi troppo grandi in 2, quindi torniamo lentamente all'entrata, girando attorno al bancone ad angolo e aspettiamo.
Subito si libera la prima poltroncina al bancone, vicino all'entrata, i 4 sgabelli alla sua destra lo sono sempre stati, ma sembra che non vengano mai usati. Mi ero gi√† tolto la giacca, quando una cliente seduta presso la prima finestra adiacente l'entrata si lamenta in italiano del freddo con la barista, visibilmente sua conoscente, e cambia posto puntando decisa alla poltrona resasi da poco disponibile. Appena seduta si rende conto di aver preso il posto in modo magari un pochino disinvolto, ma nel mentre noi ci stiamo gi√† accomodando presso le poltroncine da lei abbandonate. Due battute d'intesa e lo scambio di posti √® parafato.
Lo sguardo √® attratto e guidato dalle colonne vertebrali che ornano pareti e soffitti, in realt√† fusi in un unico organismo. Ventose, costole, scapole, vertebre, ossa iliache, volti fetali, qualche teschio, il tutto valorizzato da giochi di luce magistrali. Dietro al bancone, dove gli allineamenti di vertebre convergono, √® presente un ritratto fotografico incorniciato di Hans Ruedi Giger. Le due candele ai lati sono accese: √® un buon momento per immergersi nell'atmosfera, il bar funziona a giusto regime.
Passiamo in rassegna la carta. Scartati subito gli snack convenzionali scegliamo le ‚Äúpetit plat de vieux gruy√®re aoc‚Äù e la ‚Äúplanchette saucisse de la Gruy√®re‚Äù. Prima per√≤ ci facciamo servire l‚Äôirrinunciabile e scenico ‚ÄúFace hugger shot‚Äù e un ‚ÄúBambi Alien Blood‚Äù vecchia edizione. Il barman, un giovanotto di probabile origine balcanica con la barba scura, ci consiglia con gentilezza. La sua collega si aggira tra le varie postazioni dispensando le giuste dosi di alterigia, cortesia e pazienza. Non √® cosa banale. Va infatti detto che il bar √® oggetto di un continuo e fastidioso flusso di turisti che entrano, guardano, commentano rumorosamente ed escono. Alcuni si spingono addirittura a scattare furtivamente fotografie, malgrado il ben visibile divieto apposto all‚Äôesterno.
Siamo fortunati, il gruy√®re stagionato √® stato scagliato a regola d‚Äôarte e si presenta molto meglio di quanto descritto da altri utenti. Anche la salamella ripiegata a U fa il suo effetto. Il Face hugger shot lo berr√≤ dopo, √® troppo bello, anche se non si √® ripetuta l‚Äôesecuzione perfetta della visita precedente. Da fuori tanti curiosi si affacciano alla finestra per ammirare il locale e restano ipnotizzati dal decoro e anche dal Face hugger nel mio bicchiere. A noi avventori sembra ormai di far parte dell‚Äôopera d‚Äôarte, come tanti space jockey fusi biomeccanicamente con le poltroncine.
Ci tratterremmo ancora a lungo, ma abbiamo altri luoghi da visitare. Con gesto iconoclastico mi decido finalmente a bere il liquido che copre il Face hugger e poi, dopo un‚Äôultima occhiata d‚Äôammirazione, la creatura medesima. Obbligatoriamente ordiniamo ancora un ‚ÄúAlien coffee avec Grand Gruy√®re‚Äù, una composizione da dessert presentata su un vassoietto ideato da Giger in persona. Dovendo guidare devo tuttavia rinunciare all‚ÄôAbsinthe e al suo poetico rito (assenzio e non arsenico come scritto da qualcuno).
Dopo una simile immersione estetica valutare l‚Äôadeguatezza del conto √® un esercizio da provinciali.
Torner√≤ sicuramente ancora e ancora.

title: Wow!!

content: Sea con la excusa de descansar antes o despu√©s de visitar el castillo, por este lugar hay que visitarlo. De su decoraci√≥n vas a hablar siempre, conozcas o no la historia Allien. Gracias a Giger que mantiene este castillo con su fundaci√≥n y nos ofrece un lugar absolutamente distinto. La atenci√≥n es normal, pero el lugar no.

title: Sensationell!
content: Die Giger-Bar ist ein absolutes Must In Greyerz. Gleich einer Katedrale ist das Erlebnis √ºberw√§ltigend und ein w√ºrdiges Denkmal f√ºr den ber√ºhmten K√ºnstler.

title: Dr√¥le d univers
content: Si vous aimez un endroit atypique vous devez-vous arr√™ter cela vous surprendra un endroit tr√®s sympathique

title: A MUST See for HR Giger (Aliens) Fans
content: This bar is so incredibly unique it is an absolute must see. If you have seen any of the HR Giger Alien films this bar will blow you away with all the decorations. Be prepared to be immersed into the world of "Aliens" with every square inch of the bar being fully decorated with Aliens gear. The chairs, the floor, the windows, everything is fully decked out in Aliens decor. Even the legs of the tables are decorated as aliens fanfare and the whole place is just amazing. There is likely a sign on the door saying the place is only for "Paying Customers" but don't let that sway you from going in for a drink. This is a must see.

title: Strange setting great dessert
content: What a unique place to try a double cream dessert. An Alien haunt with truly decadent desserts A real treat

title: Wow
content: Ich bin schon ein Fan der Giger Bar in Chur. Jedoch ist hier in gruyere die Lokalit√§t nochmals besser. Mitten in der Altstadt, an bester Lage. Da kommen auch Leute die weniger mit dem Thema zu tun haben in Kontakt. Innen, wie gehabt 1a! Ideal f√ºr ein Bier nach dem Museums Besuch

title: H.R. would not be happy
content:
The Bar is great, Mr. Giger did an amazing Job to create something unique and worth seeing by all. Unfortunatly the staff are unfriendly and incompetent. We ordered food and drinks- pricey yes but would gladly pay for it since its a bar where you can happily stare at the ceiling...
Ordered an other drink which was served, but we were told to pay now, it kinda felt like we should leave. Pay as you order, ok, no problem, but the rude attitude is not worthy this fantastic bar.
I have a hard time Rating since i would give the bar 5 and the staff a flat zero.
I really cant stand this "sure there will be someone here tomorrow to take your place" type attitude that some places have.

title: √Ä faire
content:
√Ä faire si vous appr√©ciez l'univers d'HR Giger. La d√©co est top !

title: Impresionante

title: Da visitare
content: Se siete gia in paese vale la pena fermersi per un aperitivo o per un caff√® in questo particolarissimo bar. Gli appassionati del film a cui si ispira apprezzeranno.

title: Very unfriendly and dishonest staff
content:
I was passing by and despite being overpriced it was nicely decorated so we stopped for a tea/ coffee.

We have to wait about 15 minutes for the waitress to come to our table. She was then very rude and didn't even know which tea they had. When she brought the tea she asked us for immediate payment. We did but she forgot that our bill was 9.50 cfh but gave us the change as if it was a 10cfh bill. She basically took the extra 0.50 for her own. While I would have tipped her even more, her act was very dishonest.

As an advice for fellow customer: go, check the decoration but choose another bar!!!!!!

title: Magnifique bar, totalement atypique...

title: Great staff, otherworldly decor

title: Giger's mind
content:
Maniacalmente curato in ogni minimo particolare e al limite tra realt√† e fantasia questo Giger bar √© ci√≤ che una mente perfetta come quella dell'artista non poteva che creare a contrasto tra le incantevoli vallate e castelli della cittadina medievale di Gr√∫yere e gli incubi futuristici del pi√π oscuro pensiero umano.
Un'attrazione in s√©, naturalmente assieme al Giger Museum, che vale i 700 km percorsi dal Trentino a qui,e che ci porteremo dentro...
Un po' piccolo ma fantastico e per quel che riguarda il servizio, i prodotti ed il personale...chi ci ha fatto caso??
Due belle signorine che ti servono una Kilkenny fresca nello scheletrico stomaco della regina fattrice della Nostromo, seduti su troni ossuti girevoli,sopra ad un pavimento minuziosamente intarsiato... Che si pu√≤ volere di pi√π??
In fede
Wolf

content: une surpirse de taille: ce petit joyau de bar est un OVNI dans le millieu des bars et cafes, le plus cool que j ai jamais visite , il ne faux pas etre fan de sci fi ou de giger pour apprecier,

title: Like Something from Another World
content: The Giger Bar is amazing and a must-visit for any Giger fan. The decor is incredible. Everywhere you turn there is something otherworldly and true to Giger‚Äôs aesthetic. Even though this is a bar, they do serve food. I was told that the local sweet dish that Gruyere is known for is something called Double Cream and Meringue. It was DELICIOUS! I don‚Äôt drink alcohol, so I am not able to comment on their offerings as a bar, but I absolutely loved the Double Cream and Meringue and would highly recommend! They also played Janis Joplin the whole time were were there. Not a bad thing, just a bit surprising. Definitely support this Bar- it is a true gem!

title: Just get one beer here!!
content: It's just a normal bar but Giger's design makes a true experience to seat there. An amazing view and the service was actually nice :)

title: Giger Bar (Alien) in Gruyeres
content: Visited the Giger bar on a boiling hot day - nice escape from the sun! Quick friendly service - we had an Alien tray (interesting) and a Capuccino. Lots of interesting furniture - especially the bar stools. Really alien atmosphere. WC is across the road next to the Alien Museum. Photos are only supposed to be taken by guests. Prices reasonable. Was the highlight of the visit to Gruyeres. Try to catch the hourly (!) bus to Gruyeres Ville, otherwise you have a steep climb from the station. Walk down is easier in about 10 minutes to Maison Gruyere cheese museum

Kid (young ones) are allowed in and were running around a bit touching everything. That was kind of annoying. Paid $18 chf for an Irish coffee and one small shot of amaretto. Fairly expensive but it's a tourist attraction so I wasn't surprised. Didn't try any food and I don't think you need to. There are very good restaurants in the town so I would try them instead. Overall, it's a neat conversation piece.

title: Plein les yeux

content:

It's more than a place to get a drink to take pictures in gruyeres it's the only place that feels like a pub not a restaurant so you feel you can stay with or without eating. If eating food is snack food , literally hot dog (would recommend) , toasted sandwich (partner likes ) Gruyeres meat platter (I would not recommend literally a salami type sausage and bread not a platter ) .
Drinks are good price and food is good price. Highly recommended Giger coffee (alcohol) . The girl who served us was very friendly and remembered us which was nice .

title: Giger Bar
content:
This is a must see bar if you're ever in this town in the heart of the cheese district if you've ever wondered what it might be like to have a drink on the inside of Alien, this will satisfy your curiosity.
It's an incredible piece of work and hard to capture on an image as video shows the whole expanse of the ceiling, tables, chairs and bar stools which are all fashioned in the same skeleton nature.
The experience in this room of afternoon tea or drinks was let down by dreadful sevice and staff attitude the day I was there. perhaps better at night when the ghouls come out.

content: When we were there it was a light drizzle and we wanted a break so we stopped, after a beer we split a sandwich for a quick snack which was good and reasonable. title: most unique bar i've ever been to

HR Giger is probably one of the coolest, if not the coolest bar I've ever been to. It's a themed bar, based on the Alien films. I've never seen any of the films, nor am I a fan of sci-fi, but I was still able to appreciate the bar. All of the tables/chairs looked like some kind of alien spine, and it was really unique.

You can tell that the bar is geared towards tourists, but it didn't feel touristy. It wasn't crowded when we went, which was on a Wednesday at around noon. The drinks are pretty reasonably priced too for a bar like this. My only gripe would be that there were too many flies around. title: Unusual spot for a drink/snack

A notre d√©part, pas de reponse, √† mon double au revoir, de la part du personnel ce qui peu certainement se comprendre au regard de la difficult√© qu'ils avaient eu √† dire bonjour.

content: Went to the Giger bar to see the awesome interior and because of the high rating, we decided to have some food. This was a mistake. We ordered a cheese and meat platter and a pizza for our daughter. The meat platter was just a piece of Salami and the cheese platter was just Gruyere cheese. The pizza was like a Ciabatta with tomato and cheese on top. The food was very underwhelming and very overpriced. the only nice thing was the cream with meringue which was lovely. On reflection we should have gone in had a couple of drinks and left and had lunch elsewhere.

serveuse sympa

title: Auf einen Kaffee

title: Nightmarish, bone-heavy interior
content:
Designed and created by H.R. Giger, a Swiss artist/sculptor/set designer who worked on various Sci-Fi movies, the dystopian, nightmarish interior is bone heavy with spinal chords from the ceiling to the prominent high-back chairs. I immediately thought of Jonah trapped in the belly of whale. But perhaps this is the fossilized remains of a pre-historic beast? Wherever your imagination takes you, this bar is definitely worth stepping inside, even if you don't order a drink or food.

Photos are not allowed if you are not a customer, so memorize as much as you can. It is a most amazing place!!

Evidentemente si quieres sacar fotos en su interior prepara 6 euros para tomarte la m√°s m√≠nima consumici√≥n. A√∫n as√≠ te llevas un gran recuerdo.

We didn't set out for the bar. We were going to the castle. We found the museum along with it, and low and behold there was this bar. It's really just about the experience and ambiance, if you're into the Alien movies or HR Giger. I wouldn't go out of my way though. It's good as part of the package. It's small, unique, cool. Food was okay, nothing special. The credit card machine wasn't working so I had to walk downhill to the ATM. Although, it was a decently priced meal for the suisse.
Overall, it's a 3 star, barely worth the trip, unless you're already in the area. But, I wouldn't go just for it. The castle and the museum is really the draw.

content: Always crowded because of the fame and architecture, the bar is a cozy and chill place, sometimes disturbed by the tourists that come and go. Nice place to sip a tea or a coffee, near the museum and the Gruyere castle. Truly extraordinary.

title: ambiance chalereuse
content: Il est vraiment tr√®s agr√©able de venir boire un caf√© et une bi√®re, accompagn√© de la mythique meringue et double cr√®me, un vrai d√©lice!!!! √† consommer avec mod√©ration pour les estomacs fragiles. Lieu accueillant et enveloppant, id√©al apr√®s visite du mus√©es ou du ch√¢teau.

title: Eclectic and Extraordinary
content:
The bar is a work of art befitting a master of science fiction art. It encompasses arches on vertebrae and ribs that makes for a surreal atmosphere. While rather small, it is indeed an experience to have a drink in the bar. No visit is complete without sitting in the Harkonnen Chair and partaking in the Alien drink.

The difficult choice is whether to have the drink before or after HR Giger's museum: liquid courage for the assault on your eyes from the museum or as a sedative to calm you after the visit. Either way prepare to see the world differently.

title: Merita una volta nella vita
content: Location spettacolare, prezzi pure ma ne vale la pena. Per un aperitivo nella pancia di Alien si pu√≤ spendere anche qualcosa di pi√π

title: A must see!
content:
You can't go to HR Giger's museum and not visit the bar right next to it. It's part of the museum, since it also has lots of Giger's creations in it. From the tables and chairs to the ceiling, the place is awesome! They have cool drinks and some snacks. Nothing too expensive for swiss standards.
A definite must see in Gruy√®res!

title: Aliennnn
content: Ce bar Restaurant est excellent D√©co super jolie dans le th√®me du film alien ambiance sympa et la nourriture est super bonne les si√®ge sont magnifiques

title: Personnel malhonn√™te accueil pitoyable
content: D√©co super jolie. Le personnel est malhonn√™te, pas un sourire, pas un bonjour et quand on veux passer commande on nous fait bien comprendre que vous d√©rangez! C'est d√©plorable un tel accueil!

title: Alien, Gruyeres and coffe
content: As I was going for a bite of cheesy Gruyeres cheese, I walked in in an Alien like interior Vessel and I felt like a movie character. It was an experience that transcended me in a fantastic dimension... and have a great short expresso, as I asked.

title: D√©part imm√©diat pour l'univers de Giger !
content:
D√©coration au top, mais cela... Cette appr√©ciation ne vous l'apprendra pas, tout est d√©j√† dit. Comme c'est un lieu touristique, il est pr√©f√©rable de s'attendre √† une "note" cons√©quente mais malgr√© tout, √ßa reste raisonnable vu le lieu, le d√©vor et le service.
Super pour un petit arr√™t entre la double visite mus√©e + ch√¢teau.

title: √Ä voir pour la deco
content:
Bar d√©cor√© en mode Giger
Vo√ªte en squelette et fauteuil alien
Pour faire suite √† la visite du mus√©e juste en face

title: Hoger bar. Must to be
content:
Hoger bar een must to see.
Speciaal voor museum hier en lekker biertje in de bar

Zeer speciaal
Hoger bar een must to see.
Speciaal voor museum hier en lekker biertje in de bar

Zeer speciaal

title: Monumental
content:
Eine ausserirdische Erfahrung ;) und irgendwie ist man pl√∂tzlich so mittendrin.
Faszinierend finde ich, wie der K√ºnstler sein Werk mit praktischem / allt√§glichen verbunden hatte und eigene Still√∂sungen entwickelte.
Der Aliencaf√© ist √ºbrigens ein "nice-to-have", die Qualit√§t des Bohnengebr√§u selbst ist allerdings kein Highlight. Das gesamte Arrangement wird in Geschirr serviert, dass sich in das Tablett einf√ºgt und sowas mag ich halt :)

title: An experience
content: The environment was incredible It is an attraction that offers food rather than just a restaurant The prices are a tad high but worth it Review the menu before you choose The staff are great and the environment is incredible

title: lugar interesante pero pequeno
content: lamentablemente por el tamano no hay mucha disponibilidad debido a la cantidad de concurrentes pero es un buen lugar para tomar algo. muy diferente

title: Hay que verlo
content: No te puedes ir de Gruyere sin pasar al Giger Bar a tomar algo y hacerte unas fotos. Eso s√≠, para poder hacer fotos debes consumir tal como se indica en un cartel en la puerta. No lo veo mal porque es relativamente peque√±o y en caso contrario llenar√≠a de curiosos. El precio es el normal de la zona.

title: Molto particolare, non particolarmente economico
content:
Il bar merita senz'altro una visita. Noi abbiamo avuto la fortuna di capitarci in una giornata invernale infrasettimanale, quindi il bar era praticamente vuoto.
Merita una visita se capitate da queste parti, una bella ambientazione, unica nel suo genere che omaggia naturalmente Giger.
Cibo nella norma, noi abbiamo preso due the e un toast, prezzi non particolarmente economici ma in linea senz'altro con quelli che troverete nel resto del paese (una colazione per due circa 35 euro), per cui se dovete scegliere dove mangiare perch√© non qui?
Servizio freddino ma nella norma.

title: Une douceur mortuaire
content:
Et oui, vous pouvez prendre un caf√©, un th√© √† la cannelle ou un amaretto chantilly dans ces catacombes.
√âvitez d'obstruer l'entr√©e √† prendre des photos si vous n'√™tes pas clients, la porte ouverte (surtout l'hiver) d√©range les clients et emp√™che l'entr√©e √† ceux qui veulent consommer (j'ai du "bourrer" une famille d'espagnol pour me mettre au chaud, d√©sol√©e).

title: Coolest bar in Switzerland!
content: Tiny, little bar in a cute town. The Giger Bar is super cool. The decor is Giger approved and the food, drinks and service are wonderful. I need to go back one day. My friends were very jealous.

title: Bello ma..
content: Molto particolare e bello. Personale molto simpatico, prezzi un po' esagerati. Un toast piccolo con una fetta di prosciutto abbrustolita e formaggio (vacherin originale, da ammettere, squisito)...7.- mi sembra un pochino esagerato...

title: For 'Alien' enthusiast it is a must!
content: Have taken many guests here over the years for a different experience and everyone has appreciated the unusual setting.

title: Vite fait bien fait
content: Rien de particulier a part la d√©co. Carte des boissons banales. Ne pas s'attendre a manger quelque chose l√† bas. Le service est rapide mais les verres de vin sont mal servis.

title: Cooles Lokal im typischen HR-Giger-Stil
content: Sehr freundlicher und zuvorkommender Service. Trotz vieler Besucher sehr schnelle Bedieung. Preise absolut ok.

title: Da visitare!
content: Unico nel suo genere, questo bar √® un must per chi viene in visita a Gruy√®res! Atmosfera da brivido, architettura del bar molto particolare, quasi surreale! Unica pecca: i prezzi fin troppo svizzeri!

title: Pas accueillant du tout
content: Nous n'avons pas √©t√© re√ßus car nous √©tions 8 et avons re√ßu l'interdiction de d√©placer deux chaises. D'o√π Un accueil tr√®s limit√© et un endroit √† √©viter sit√¥t qu'on est plus que 2. Le cadre est tr√®s attrape touristes

title: Pour le d√©cor ..
content: Un d√©cor pas ordinaire, c'est le moins qu'on puisse dire (ce qu'on y mange est tr√®s ordinaire). Une halte en plein milieu d'un village √† ne pas rater.

title: Juste le d√©cor.
content: C'est juste un d√©cor pour attirer les touristes. Le bar est int√©ressant mais c'est juste pour faire des photos. Boire un verre seul au bar, bof. Car se sont des mono place. Bizarre. Un service inint√©ressant. Les cr√®mes ne sont pas de la cr√®me de gruy√®re mais des cr√®mes industrielles.

title: Meu bar tem√°tico favorito no mundo!!
content: Preciso voltar l√° em um dia menos quente, pois passei calor l√° dentro. Ainda assim, vale toda a caminhada para chegar l√°, al√©m de ficar em frente ao museu. Bebidas legais e um ambiente √∫nico.

title: Never Wanted to Leave
content: We came specifically to visit the HR Giger museum and bar as a surprise for my partner‚Äôs birthday. They are both amazing. The bar is very stunning in real life, and lived up to what I‚Äôd expected from photos. The staff here were lovely, especially Julien who indulged us when we dressed up as Giger characters and wanted to take photos next to the wonderful chairs, walls, floor...EVERYTHING! He helped take some photos of us together and really made our day. Food and drinks in here are some of the most reasonably priced in Gruyeres, the bar never seemed too busy and had a nice atmosphere.

title: Man muss mal rein aber das wars.
content:
Es lohnt sich in der Bar etwas zu trinken.
Die Atmosph√§re ist durchaus speziell.
Der Weisswein den ich geordert hatte war wohl schon etwas √§lter. Wie gesagt, die Ausstattung machts.

title: Pour boire un verre.
content:
La d√©coration est g√©niale, le serveur semblait seul et d√©bord√© mais √† garder le sourire et √©tait tr√®s agr√©able !
Bonne √©tape pour boire un verre avant de continuer la visite des environs.

title: Pleasant place
content: Good music, good service and original decoration in a bar where grab a couple of beers in good company and spent good moments.

title: Die einzige Bar schliesst auch samstags um 20:30 Uhr
content: Am Tag, als die Sonne schien, wollten wir hier nicht rein. H√∂chstens als Fantasy-Freak tauscht man die frische Luft gegen diese dunkle Bar. Als wir dann nach dem Abendessen zur√ºckkamen, standen wir an einem Samstagabend um 20:35 Uhr schon vor verschlossenen T√ºren. Offenbar lohnt sich die √ñffnung nur am Tag, wenn die Touristenbusse vorfahren - schade. Sind wir die einzigen, die nach einem K√§sefondue noch einen Schlummertrunk brauchen?

title: Locale particolare ma servizio deludente
content: Il locale in tipico stile Giger √® suggestivo, ma il servizio √® veramente scadente. Entrato per bere una birra, nonostante il locale non fosse pieno, sono stato ignorato dalle due cameriere presenti che per√≤ hanno servito persone arrivate dopo di me. Una delle due ragazze del servizio, dopo aver portato delle consumazioni ad un tavolo, se ne √® tornata dietro al bancone a parlare coi presenti senza nemmeno preoccuparsi se fossero arrivati nuovi clienti. Come me altre persone se ne sono andate senza aver consumato. Davvero deludente.

title: De cinema
content: Para os f√£s de H.R.Giger, √© quase como um sonho. A decora√ß√£o inspirada no Alien toma conta de tudo, √© como estar no filme. Uma del√≠cia do come√ßo ao fim, √ìtimas op√ß√µes de bebidas para refrescar a visita ao castelo e ao museu. Um vinho ros√© ou uma cerveja, tudo cai bem! Fant√°stico!

title: Impressionant
content: Nous nous sommes arr√™t√© en d√©but de soir√©e pour bo√Ære l'ap√©ro. La dame qui nous servait √©tait tr√®s attentionn√©e et amicale. Le d√©cor est g√©nial. Petit b√©mol pour les tables un peu collante...

title: So cool!
content: We traveled to this town just to visit this bar and museum. We loved it. The bar man was kind and welcoming. He helped us with questions about the twin and how the bar was built. The bar itself is so unique and beautiful, such a unique place. The decor and staff made the 7 hour drive with while!

title: erwarte das unerwartete...
content: In der wundersch√∂nen alten Stadt von Gruyere erwartet niemand diesen Laden... Leider macht er sehr fr√ºh zu, aber ein Besuch lohnt. Essen hat man besser vorher erledigt, aber die Atmosph√§re ist unvergleichbar. Definitv ein MUSS in der Gegend!

title: A must see if in the area!
content: A very small bar and we almost missed it as we were walking by the museum, but so glad we didn't! It is a must see! The belly of the bar is like you are inside of an alien. The seats were shaped like the alien spacecraft and you are in awe at what you are seeing. We just had drinks and the staff were very friendly. Menu boasted several drinks like "aliens blood" and "face hugger shot". Very unique place to say you have been!

title: Tres beau decor
content: Il faut y aller uniquement pour le d√©cor, pour les prix je m'attendais √† pire, au final c'est un peu plus cher que la moyenne mais pas excessif, je vous conseille la place tout au fond du bar avec le mur en t√™te de b√©b√©s !

title: Peculiar
content:
Despu√©s de visitar el museo de Giger, no pude evitar entrar al bar para complementar la experiencia.

El letrero de la entrada dice que solo te puedes tomar foto si consumes en el bar, pero yo vi a varios que entraban sin importarles nada, tomaban foto y se sal√≠an. Eso provoca algo de tumulto en la entrada, as√≠ que s√© respetuoso de las normas, por algo existen.

El personal es amable y paciente, las bebidas tienen buen sabor, aunque es algo costoso (13 Francos en promedio). Tambi√©n tienen caf√©.

title: Original
content: Estuvimos visitando el pueblo con unos amigos y nos llevaron a este bar. Original decoraci√≥n ambientado en Al√≠en. No perd√©rselo si estas por ka zona

title: Um bar de outro planeta!
content: Parada obrigat√≥ria ap√≥s a visita ao museu do H.R.Giger (que, tamb√©m, √© visita obrigat√≥ria mas n√£o √© para os fracos!). Se voc√™ pensa em entrar apenas para tirar fotos, esque√ßa: j√° na porta h√° um aviso que fotos s√≥ s√£o permitidas para clientes. Sem problemas! Entre e pe√ßa uma bebida qualquer e acomode-se, de prefer√™ncia, no balc√£o, pois as poltronas (se √© que podemos cham√°-las assim) s√£o girat√≥rias e surpreendentemente confort√°veis! O atendimento foi cort√™s e os pre√ßos n√£o assustam.

title: so cool!
content: A great place to grab a drink and enjoy the decor....it can be very crowded in here so hopefully you will find a seat.

title: Une exp√©rience
content: On y vient naturellement pour d√©couvrir la d√©co "osseuse" de Giger, on y reste pour leur petit choix de vins suisses. Ambiance tamis√©e, un bon moment pour l'ap√©ro du soir.

title: Etwas makaber, aber originell
content: Die Bar ist im Stil von HR Giger eingerichtet. Leider hat sie nur bis 20h oder 20:30 offen. Die Preise sind ok.

title: orrido arredamento
content:
l'arredamento consiste in (finte) ossa che compongono pareti, tavoli, sedie, poltrone.
Scomodo e orrendo.
Abbiamo preso un aperitivo, normale.

title: Choix du personnel
content: Le lieu est √©tonnant, jolie suite pour un verre apres le mus√©e quoi qu un peu cher... Mais le lieu amene cela. Par contre, le choix du personnel peu sympathique rend d autant plus froid les personnages d allien qui nous entourent!

title: Sympa
content: D√©cors bien gore , service sympathique malgr√© un achalandage marqu√©. C'est un peu cher mais il faut quand m√™me s'y arr√™ter !

title: Rather "Alien"in Gruyeres
content:
This is a bar attached to the Giger museum. The decor is based on Giger's Alien films. It's certainly an experience not to be missed if a fan but is strangely out of place in the pretty village. However it is not immediately obvious so doesn't spoil the ambience.
Food is basic an whilst not cheap, was actually cheaper than many of the tourist cafes. I enjoyed the"Alien" burger, which tasted more bolognese than burger and my husband assures me that the Giger coffee (laced with schnapps and topped with cream" was excellent.
Be prepared for tourists to wander in and photograph !
Overall a fun experience.

title: Not a restaurant, but totally unique alien-skeleton bar and caf√©
content: If you are going anywhere near Gruy√®res and have a faintest interest in design, go out of your way to come to this bar. Unexpectedly in the centre of the historic village, just down the road from the chateau, and across the street from the amazing Giger museum, there's this incredible bar. None of the photos do it justice. It's like a gothic cathedral merged with Giger's unclassifiable designs. It can get crowded, but it's worth the wait. I know they have some snacks, but can't vouch for their quality. However a reasonable selection of beers, and some classic and original cocktails as well as decent coffee and teas etc.

title: Absolutely a must for all Giger fans!
content: The bar was much smaller than I actually anticipated, and it was pretty full when I was there. However, if you keep checking in eventually one of the bar chairs or tables will open up. Lots of people want to get their pictures taken sitting in the Harkonnen chairs, I was no different. Signs out front advise photos are for paying customers, but its worth it to sit on one of those chairs. And for this Giger fan it was a dream come true!

title: Deco originale
content: Prix pas tr√®s abordables mais √ßa vaut la peine d'y passer pour jeter un coup d'oeil √† la deco tr√®s originale.

title: Amazing
content: You must go! Have a drink (I had "Alien blood" - a delicious combination of vodka and baileys) and take lots of photos! Such fun!

title: Coole Sache
content:
Alles in ganz speziellem Giger Touch gehalten, Logo was sonst.
Sehr Interessant gestaltet, man braucht Zeit um alles zu sehen was es zu sehen gibt. Personal ist sehr freundlich und zuvorkommend. Einziges Manko ist nach meiner Meinung die nervigen Touristen die trotz Verbot zu Fotografieren ohne Konsumation, st√§ndig rein und ras laufen und fotografieren ohne Ende und R√ºcksicht ob man auch auf ein Bild will als Kunde.

title: Bar e Museu se misturam
content:
Divertido, bem feito, super agrad√°vel apesar de tanto alien. Fica na lateral do museu, quase no fim da vila.
Vale a visita e uma bebidinha!

title: A d√©couvrir !
content: Cadre sp√©cial qui a pour th√®me la suite de films ALIEN, cette adresse vaut le d√©tour ! Bi√®res sp√©ciales, ambiance SF, tout est fait pour y passer un agr√©ablement moment.

title: Un monde magique...
content:
Nous avons juste bu un verre, assez cher (5.- la min√©rale). Mais accueil tr√®s sympa et d√©cors incroyables !

Sans avoir vu le mus√©e, nous avons quand m√™me √©t√© impr√©gn√© par Giger !

title: Piola
content: Bar original, novedoso, con una ambientaci√≥n tem√°tica excelente. Pod√©s tomar algo y tambi√©n compartir alguna picada. Ricas cervezas, copas de vinos, etc, camarar@s con onda y lindo ambiente para relajarse.

title: Un bar √∫nico
content:
No esperaba encontrarme esto, un bar totalmente decorado con cosas que recordaban la pelicula Alien, de hecho comentaban que tanto el museo que esta justo enfrente como la decoraci√≥n pretende emular el universo Alien.

Me encantaron las sillas de la barra, no se da descrito todo lo que alli te puedes encontrar en este peque√±o bar.

Precios de las cervezas... pues como en todo suiza, algo caras, pero el entorno... merece la pena

title: Spettacolare!!!
content:
In un locale del genere non ci si va tanto per la consumazione, ma per apprezzare la trasposizione delle opere di HR Giger adattate per la realizzazione di un bar/caffetteria.
Il locale √® sempre strapieno, e offre la possibilit√† di fotografare gli interni solo alla clientela, cosa apprezzabile visto che nel museo accanto non √® possibile.
Nonostante ci√≤ io sono sempre riuscita a trovare da sedermi (ci sono stata 3 volte) √® sia birra sia cocktail sono ottimi. I prezzi sono pi√π alti, ma bisogna considerare il cambio, comunque ne vale la pena!!!

title: So weirdly cool
content: It was in February and we got a coffee. The seating at the bar were the aliens bones and structure and you sat in them. It was very "alien", like the movie and the coffee came with the best piece of dark chocolate I may have had on the entire trip. We went in here after the very long and interesting walk through the museum. I highly suggest stopping in. It was VERY cool. I only wish we had more time. I believe the city of Gruyere closes early. I'd check, especially in the Winter.

title: Great Place for a Beer
content: This place is the reason we decided to visit Switzerland. Go and drink a pint in the Nostromo. The bar is sculpted on the inside to look like the Alien ship HR Giger designed for the horror film from the late 70's. It doesn't disappoint.

title: Novel... but can't help think it's out of place
content:
Saw a review that rated this place as one of the top 10 bars in the world, so the Mrs and I had to swing by on the way back from our roadtrip to Spain from Zurich.

The views from Gruyeres made the trip completely worthwhile; however, the smell of cheese and this place were a little bit disappointing.

Switzerland is not known for its customer service and this place is no exception. The bartender was clearly put-out when I asked for two (expensive) cappuccinos. I still don't understand why? Well, that's not true...there's no incentive because of the astronomical minimum wage.

Don't get me wrong, the inside of this place is seriously spectacular. We arrived in the afternoon and were the only customers at that time, so that affected the vibe (or lack thereof).

Overall, I wouldn't do the trip out of your way...unless you'll appreciate the views and quaintness of the village itself.

title: Im presionante
content: Mucho mas oscuro que como se ve en casi todas las fotos. Con dos cervezas te vas al aseo y si t tropiezas con algo de vuelta seguro que gritas.

title: Maravilhoso bar
content: Uma decora√ß√£o criada por este artista √∫nico no mundo!! Bebidas e shots de uma maravilhosa sele√ß√£o, podendo beber diversas cervejas de todo o mundo!! A seguir visitar o seu museu!!

title: Lekker weird en apart
content: Deze bar is ingericht met botachtige elementen van de Aliens in de gelijknamige film. Gewoon een must see voor een drankje.

title: Unico
content:
√à un semplice bar, adatto per uno spuntino o un aperitivo.
Per√≤ √® imperdibile, perch√© al mondo non ce n'√® un altro uguale.
Andateci e rimarrete a bocca aperta.

title: Amazing
content: What an amazing place to sit and have a glass of wine. Not expensive (we thought it would be as a bit different), glass of rose wine just about ¬£5. Worth going inside and having a look round. Sooo different

title: Dissapointing experience
content: We were travelling more than 900km to see at least the bar because the museum was closed already. We arrived 45minutes before closing time and right at the entrance we were told that they are closing. I asked the waitress if we could get at least one quick drink but she refused even when there were couple of young folks with a nearly full beer sitting at the bar (probably her friends). We left this place very frustrated and dissapointed.

title: Fan de sf
content: Famille fan de sf nous avons √©t√© immerg√© et combl√© le style des serveuse le confort des sieges et la fraicheur de la bi√®re nous ont ravis !

title: Pour les fans d'Alien!
content:
Le d√©tour vaut uniquement pour la d√©coration du bar, unique en son genre!
L'accueil est assez banal.

title: Quaint!
content: A lovely artistic bar! Nice for a drink, swiss prices but no more expensive than anywhere else. Very novel.

title: Toll, muss man erlebt haben!
content: Wer sich auch nur ansatzweise f√ºr die Thematik interessiert, kommt an einem Besuch der Bar nicht vorbei. Reinsitzen, etwas trinken und in die Alien-Welt eintauchen...

title: Nice decor but very pricey
content:
I was glad to at least have a look at this bar. The decor is great as you would expect, but really all that the place has going for it. The menu inside is fairly limited and definitely on the price-gouging side. I settled on an Irish coffee for 10 CHF, the service was okay but not particularly swift or friendly.

In summary, good for a very quick visit, if you want to grab a few more photos of Giger's designs.

title: Interesting Atmosphere
content: Had lunch at the Giger Bar while on a daytrip to Gruyeres as part of an extended Tour of Switzerland last summer. The unique Alien d√©cor of the Giger Bar was designed by H. R. Giger. the Award Willing Artist behind the Alien Movies.

title: Perfekt
content:
So muss eine erfolgreiche Bar betrieben werden. Nette sehr coole
Bedienung, die Humor hat und die
G√§ste aufmerksam bedient. Das Getr√§nkeangebot ist vielf√§ltig und besticht durch auff√§llig gute Qualit√§t
Das Ambiente tr√§gt massgeblich zum Wohlbefinden bei. Obwohl die
Bar nicht jedermanns Sache sein kann, die Lokalit√§t ist als angenehm hell und heimelig zu bezeichnen. Ein
Besuch des H.R. Giger Museums
muss den Barbesuch beinhalten,
sonst fehlt etwas. Einfach perfekt.

title: Sympa
content: Bon accueil. Sympa pour boire un verre dans un cadre plut√¥t unique. Nous n'avons pas mang√© "gore" ! Peut-√™tre serait-il opportun de mettre √† disposition un d√©pliant explicatif de l'oeuvre et de la personnalit√© de Giger.

title: Cadre de folie mais cher pour rien
content: La qualit√© de leur caf√© laisse √† d√©sirer mais il est tr√®s agr√©able de boire un coup dans ce d√©cors magnifique. Et les barmaids sont tr√®s cool.

title: Probablement pour les materas du style
content: Ce bar est fort original mais l'ambiance tr√®s ' sp√©ciale ' ne m√©rite pas autant d'√©loges. A vouloir faire original il y aurait d'autres atouts √† mettre en valeur

title: Super sympa
content: Accueil tr√®s sympathique et service rapide. Choix des boissons tr√®s √©tendu. L'endroit est mythique et vaut le d√©tour.

title: A tester pour le decor
content: Apres la visite du musee laissez vous tenter par un petit verre au bar, le decor vous transporte dans l'univers d'Alien....oeuvre la plus connue du public de son artiste cr√©ateur...

title: Strange but beautiful
content: Went for a beer after being enticed buy what we thought was it's Gothic theme .... nope. It's like having a beer in an Alien's tomb. Surreal.

title: pour l'ambiance extraordinaire
content: On se croirait vraiment sur une autre plan√®te. Un bar incroyable par sa d√©coration. Id√©al pour boire un verre dans un atmosph√®re extra-terrestre !

title: A worthy addition to the museum tour.
content: Defoe worth a visit to sit in an Alien hemmed chair,beneath the ribs,spine and tails of the Legendary Alien creature and its labyrinthine lair. There are cool beers,Alien-themed cocktails,light snacks and great,unusual ambience and decor.

title: Alien is back
content:
Fan du film il fallait forc√©ment faire un d√©tour par le Giger bar qui d√®s l'entr√©e nous laisse sans voix.
Pensant qu'il y aurait beaucoup de monde nous sommes √©tonn√©s de voir que finalement les gens ne consomme pas mais rentre juste pour prendre des photos.
Alors ....on boit un coup tranquille avec un service impeccable et super sympathique de la part des deux serveuses.
Atypique mais g√©nialissime.

title: My favourite bar in one of my favourite towns
content:
The Giger bar is an incredibly cool bar based on the surreal artwork of Swiss artist H.R. Giger, famous for the Alien in the movie of the same name. Sitting inside the bar is like being inside a skeletal whale, with Giger themed furniture and decor.

The bar is right next door to the H.R. Giger museum which has a large selection of his work.

Best of all, the bar is located within the magical Swiss medieval castle town of Gruyere's.

The town is wonderful and worth a visit for many reasons, including the views, the food and the history. The Giger bar is a wonderfully bizarre juxtaposition in the otherwise scenic iconic Swiss environment.

title: Absolut sehenswert
content: Ein Barbesuch nach dem Museumsbesuch lohnt sich auf jeden Fall. Gute Getr√§nke zu annehmbaren Preisen, das Interieur ist fantastisch.

title: a voir c est le dessinateur d Allien
content:
Bar atypique √† voir pour sa deco , consommation s a prix corrects
Evitez les meringues avec creme double pour 10 euros les 3 a ce prix achetez a la laiterie en bas du village vous en aurez beaucoup plus

title: Platz f√ºr Verbesserungen
content:
Diese Bar ist absolut ein Besuch wert. Das Interieur muss man gesehen haben.
Ideal f√ºr ein Eintauchen ins Alien Leben Feeling!
Einige Anregungen:
Die √ñffnungszeiten. Erst ab 10h00??
Speziell in der Hochsaison k√∂nnten Leute dort ein kleines Fr√ºhst√ºck haben und somit mehr Umsatz machen.
Bedienung d√ºrfte mehr Kunden orientiert sein und freundlicher. Wenn das Personal nicht motiviert ist dann stimmt etwas nicht.

title: Interieur top. Getr√§nkeauswahl schrott.
content: Das Interieur ist genial, aber die √ñffnungszeiten und die Getr√§nkeauswahl komplett unsinnig. Schade. ist eher als Minimuseum neben dem richtigen Museum zu sehn.

title: Funky Alien Theme, Good Bar
content: As most reviewers have said, it's a worthwhile visit just for the decor! Clean, intricate, and just bizarre. Good drinks and helpful staff.

title: Einfach toll gemacht
content:
HR Giger war schon echt crazy... Und hier in den Eingang zur Burg solch eine Bar einzubauen einfach genial.
Was ich vorallem immer wieder cool finde ist der Besucher Mix. Da sitzen Bewohner der Altersheims an der Bar (das gerade nebenan eine T√ºr weiter liegt), nat√ºrlich Touristen aus aller Welt ... Und dann immer wieder Leute die sich irgendwie nicht richtig rein trauen und nur schnell ein Photo machen (das war am Anfang nach der Er√∂ffnung noch viel schlimmer).
F√ºr mich einfach eine sehr sehr coole Hollywood reife Bar mit gutem Service.

title: worth it just for the d√©cor
content: The photos speak for themselves. The bar service was good, and there is a small menu which is informal and good for lunch. My grandson loved this place - it has all the "alien" quality of the museum, but without the sexual imagery that disturbed some reviewers of the museum

title: Un bar unico nel suo genere
content: Una visita al Giger Bar √© la degna conclusione di un viaggio iniziato con il museo adiacente. Quello che colpisce subito nonch√© caratteristica principale del bar √© l'arredamento, totalmente ispirato alle opere del maestro. Difatti all'interno sedie, tavoli, pareti, pavimento e perfino il soffitto ci catapultano in uno degli incubi visionari di Giger. Il listino prezzi √® allineato con la media svizzera, e tutto sommato anche italiana, visto che una birra in bottiglia costa 6 CHF, un calice di vino parte dai 5, mentre i cocktail vanno dai 6 ai 13 franchi circa. In ogni caso le consumazioni pi√π interessanti sono il cosiddetto Alien Coffee e l'assenzio brandizzato Giger, uno dei migliori che ho mai provato. In definitiva un esperienza immancabile, per chi si trova nelle vicinanze almeno una birra √® d'obbligo.

title: Magnifique
content:
Un bar sur la vision de l'artiste, ambiance √©trange et osseuse...
Pas tr√®s grand mais poss√®de une grande table........

title: Atenci√≥n demorada
content: Si bien es comprensible que con la cantidad de turistas que s√≥lo entran al bar para sacarse fotos con la ambientaci√≥n de Alien los camareros se tomen su tiempo para atender...perdimos un mont√≥n de tiempo para tomar un caf√© a escasos 3 metros de la barra. Y encima el caf√© no era gran cosa.

title: Allien bar
content:
Bar ambientado en el universo de allien.
Es caro pero quien no pagaria un pco mas por tomar una cocacola en una silla de un esqueleto alienigena?

title: Speciale
content: Come non fermarsi a bere un Bambi Alien Blood ... anche perch√© √® l'unico posto dove poter scattare foto in libert√† catturando le scenografie biomeccaniche e creepy del ventre di Alien uscite dalla mente surreale di questo artista (nel museo √® vietato). Peccato non si possa esportare tale location in altre citt√† penso farebbe il pieno ogni giorno.

title: DE PELICULA
content:
Es un bar dise√±ado por el creador de alien y cuya estetica no deja indiferente.
Merece la pena entrar aunque sea para tomarse una cerveza y sacar alguna foto.
Un bar unico

title: The most alien bar on the planet, in the middle of a magical tiny Swiss town
content: If you know Giger, or have seen Alien (the first one) and were duly impressed by the dark and unusual sets and, well, alien, in that movie, then no visit to Switzerland would be complete without visiting Gruyere, which is an amazing little place in itself, but even more so, the Giger bar. If that isn't your profile, then there is no specific reason to visit the bar. It is still a cool bar, of course, for the interior design that us totally unique on the planet. Can't say much about food or drinks, we went late (it closes early, IIRC at 9:30), and I just had a glass of wine or such.

title: Alien
content: Bar a tema dedicato all'artista visionario creatore di Alien, da non perdere anche solo per un caff√©, basta guardare le foto delle sedie...Di fronte al museo HR Giger e a pochi passi dal Castello.

title: Sympa et original
content: Endroit splendide, original, m√™me si on n aime pas alli√©n c est √† voir car l√† bar est cool av√©c une bonne music! Les hics: service au bar, tres sombre, et l endroit et petit donc vite complet!

title: Un bar de malade mais il faut payer le prix
content:
Je suis all√© au bar avec ma petite amie. Un conseil, n'y allez pas pour un rendez-vous romantique.

L'ambiance est vraiment folle. On se retrouve plong√© dans l'univers Alien : les poutres ont l'apparence de vert√®bres, les tables d'insectes g√©ants et les chaises sont des Aliens.

L'atmosph√®re est vraiment incroyable et je pense que c'est un immanquable de la ville m√™me si √ßa d√©note compl√®tement avec l'ambiance "vieille ville fortifi√©e".

Seul b√©mol, le prix mais c'√©tait √† pr√©voir. Je conseille n√©anmoins pour une bi√®re ou un caf√© (8 Fcs pour deux espressos) pour dire que vous y √™tes all√©s et pouvoir en parler autour de vous.

title: Fantastic!
content: A must see for Giger fans. Remarkable design and atmosphere. Good drink options - not so many food items. I expected a bit 'alien' theme selections - but was thankful that they hadn't overdone it with tackiness. Friendly staff who seem to enjoy the thrill that people get when they first enter the bar.

title: Unbelievable .. Alien in Heidis Heimatdorf
content:
Dieser Ort, diese Bar ist so extraordinary, dass sich ein weiter Umweg lohnt. Ein sehr weiter.
Einfach unbeschreiblich.
Das muss jeder Sehen.
F√ºr Cineasten sollte es die Reise nach Mekka sein!

title: Forget the Museum; the Bar is Where You Can Take Pictures
content:
The Giger Bar is located just across a small alley from the Giger Museum. Hans Rudoff ‚ÄúRuedi‚Äù Giger was a famous surrealist painter. One of his many works was creating the ‚ÄúAlien‚Äù creature in the Sci fi movie with the same name. There are several displays outside the museum, but inside the bar there are even more.

The museum will not allow you to take pictures. But, a paying customer at the bar will allow you to take as many pictures of the creatures around the bar. It is definitely unique and well worth a small beer or two.

If you found this review helpful in any way, please press ‚ÄúLIKE‚Äù to let me know.

title: Bar tem√°tico mais sensacional do planeta
content: Mesmo se voc√™ n√£o gosta do HR Giger vale a pena ir no bar. √â inteiro decorado por ele, no estilo de sua arte. S√≥ isso j√° faz o local √∫nico e estranho, por√©m aconchegante.

title: Joli bar
content: C'est un super bar/restaurant qui est super bien d√©cor√©. La serveuse √©tait aimable et les prix sont un peu √©lev√©. Il y a une bonne ambiance avec de la Bonne musique.

title: Super bar
content: Bar √† voir absolument. Super d√©co. Consommation √† prix correcte et tr√®s bon service. Musique tr√®s sympathique aussi. √Ä voir pour la d√©co

title: A must see
content: Went in to get something to eat but because we had a pushchair there was no space for us so did not stay. An amazing place to see.

title: Pour un verre, mais pas plus
content: La halte vaut le d√©tour si vous voulez faire d√©couvrir un endroit unique √† un fan de science-fiction. Sinon passez votre chemin. Les prix sont assez surfaits, la carte plut√¥t pauvre et en √©t√© il y fait trop chaud. Heureusement, le service est agr√©able et avec le sourire.

title: Bienvenue dans le monstre !!!
content: Au milieu de notre petit village bien suisse avec fromage, meringues et cr√®me de Gruy√®re, un caf√© inqui√©tant et √©trange, A voir absolument juste pour s'asseoir dans la b√™te !!! Manque plus que Sigourney avec son lance-flammes...

title: An opportunity for a glimpse into the mind of an alien
content: The bar itself is open to anyone that would like to come in and purchase a drink or snacks and experience the world of Alien. It is worth a visit for the photo opportunities alone. We had a Carlsberg and a shot of "Alien Blood". Each drink cost $5.00 - $8.00. We recommend this stop to anyone interested in seeing something alien and unusual.

title: Have a drink just to take it all in?
content: Going to the HR Giger Bar is an experience not to be missed. Grap a seat, have drink, move to another seat, have another drink-and you open your eyes. This place seems to unfold before you as you look & wander about the place. Yes, you are required to order something to take pictures, but this is a service to you. A quick snap does not do the artist, HR Giger or you justice. You need to sit and take all the small details in to really appreciate the creativity of the artist and this place.

title: Interessant
content:
Bis zum Schluss wusste ich nicht genau was ich hier f√ºhlen sollte: Faszination oder Angst :-) Auf jeden Fall einen Besuch Wert. Service war nicht besonders nett, hat aber ihre Arbeit gut gemacht und hat total zur Bar gepasst.
Alles in Allem eine au√üergew√∂hnliche bar.

title: Checked off of my artist bucket list, an absynthe in the HR Giger Bar.
content: Nothing can really prepare you for the beauty of Gruyere. It is truly one of the most gorgeous little towns I have ever been to. There is so much detail in every little thing, I can understand how and why Giger is the artist he is. This Bar is incredible. Walking through the door, your jaw just drops. Everything from the spine fitting seats to the disturbing bubble babies on the wall begs for your gaze. Even the concrete floors and glass tables are elaborately decorated with Giger flourish. There were little coves to nestle into, surrounded by spines and creatures. Or if you prefer slide onto a beautiful high back chair complete with spine curving and decorations at about 8 feet high. We took our teens in and grabbed some cokes for them and Giger coffees for ourselves along with a shot of absynthe and meringues with dollops of double cream on the side. Ask for the Giger tray. Our bill came to 30CH and it was an hour well spent. I was so happy to have been there, what an experience! (It is right across from the HR Giger museum and the Gruyere Castle.)

title: Giger, nothing else
content: Fantastic location. Friendly staff. Don't attempt to go in to take pictures only, you are expected to have a drink, coffee or pay for some other consumption. If you want the full Giger experience, don't miss the museum on the other side of the road.

title: Dopo molto tempo finalmente ho potuto prendere un aperitivo in questo bar speciale...
content: Il ristorante √® impregnato dello stile macabro derivante da Alien e le sue scenografie. Qualcosa di particolare che √® difficile di trovare in altri posti. A fianco di questa struttura vi √® il museo Giger. Abbiamo ordinato un aperitivo prima di andare a gustare prelibatezze in altre zone della regione. La barista non brillava di simpatia ma abbiamo preferito ammirare l'architettura interna di questo bar speciale....

title: Decora√ß√£o impressionante!
content: Passei muito rapidamente por este bar para tomar 2 cervejas. A decora√ß√£o interna √© de impressionar. Tudo √© decorado com elementos imitando ossos. Visual diferente e incr√≠vel. O atendimento √© muito bom e a cerveja estava no ponto certo. Recomendo.

title: A little bit disappointing: it's the experience more than the food
content:
We visited after spending a couple of hours at the museum. It was a rainy day so the number of people coming in was vast.

We were near the door and so saw all the people coming in, not having any clue what the bar was about, which was a shame. The food on offer is minimal and very expensive. By the time we arrived around 11.30 they'd ran out of burgers so we just had a ham and cheese pizza.

Someone please please oil the door's hinges; every time it opens it squeaks horribly. You don't really get a feel for the place as it was so busy with tourist and with kids,running round trying to demolish things, looked on by their not-parenting parents.

So a bit disappointing, but still glad we went to complete the Giger experience.

title: Absolument fou
content: Lieu extraordinaire, une d√©co √† vous couper le souffle digne du monde de Giger. Une ambiance chaude, agr√©able et inoubliable. Y faire un tour est absolument indispensable.

title: Bar hors du temps
content:
Dans la belle ville de Gruy√®res, un pause S'impose dans le Giger Bar (situ√© juste en face du mus√©e des Aliens).
Vous entrerez dans le corps D Alien.
Tout est sculpt√©...la vo√ªte, les chaises, les tables, le bar...
Vous pouvez aussi d√©guster une bi√®re canadienne √† 9 degr√©s la fin du monde.

title: Espectacular
content: Si te gusta el mundo de Alien, este es tu bar. Est√° todo decorado con la tem√°tica de la pel√≠cula, incluida barra, mesas, sillas o sillones. Genial

title: impresiona!
content: Es un buen lugar para para a tomar algo y descansar, aunque no parar√°s de mirar para todos los lados decorados con huesos

title: Awesome must visit in Gruyere
content: The Giger Bar is a must visit if you go to Gruyere. The seats and sculptures are amazing and the vibe is really special when you get one of the fancy drinks from the menu.

title: A ne pas manquer !!!!
content:
Quel endroit fantastique ! m√™me pour quelqu'un qui n'est pas fan d'alien, il faut absolument faire un tour dans ce bar.
De plus le caf√© est d√©licieux et le service sympathique.
Essayez la planchette d√©gustation : 1 caf√© et mini-meringues servies avec de la double cr√®me

title: Enigm√°tica
content: Se queres estar num cen√°rio de filme este √© o s√≠tio certo. Um bar cheio de aliens. Cabe√ßas, ossos e olhos de aliens por todo lado. √â um sitio √≥ptimo para escapar do frio.

title: A visiter absolument
content: Un endroit unique √† visiter absolument apr√®s une visite du mus√©e vis √† vis, un charme que vous ne retrouverez nul part ailleurs et une d√©coration des plus originales. A conseiller absolument si vous √™tes dans la r√©gion.

title: Cake and coffee at the bar
content: This bar is decorated from floor to ceiling with HR Gieger work and something special to see. Have the giger espresso and sit in the crafted chairs.

title: An experiance
content: The food is nothing to gaze at. It's just reheated frozen meals like hamburger or sausage and there isn't a big beer selection but what it lacks on food it makes up in atmosphere. Don't come hungry and enjoy the scene.

title: Endroit √† d√©couvrir
content:
Bar tres sympa, la deco est vraiment exceptionnelle, a voir absolument lors de votre passage √† Gruyeres!
L'accueil est sympa aussi!

title: Entrare nel ventre di Alien
content:
Imperdibile location ideata da H.R. Giger, uno degli artisti pi√π controversi del secolo scorso.
Prendere anche solo un caff√® in questo bar, adiacente al HR Giger Museum, √® un'esperienza irrirunciabile.
Il piccolo borgo medioevale che ospita il Museo Giger e il bar rende l'atmosfera ancora pi√π affascinante.
Per chi ha amato Alien e le sue scenografie, per chi ha una certa propensione per il macabro e l'esoterico, √® un posto assolutamente da vedere.
Date un'occhiata alle foto che circolano per la rete, ne rimarrete affascinati.
Per la cronaca, io e mia moglie abbiamo ordinato un Alien Caff√®. Si tratta di un picchiere di caff√® grande, servito con due tipi di creme da mettere, delle meringhe e dell'arsenico. Ottimo.

title: Great for fans, OK for others. Expensive.
content:
If you are a fan of the works and artistic style of HR Giger, no doubt a visit to the bar to sit among the strange creations and visuals is a 'must', but if you happen to be passing by and just fancy a place for a drink and snack then you might find the atmosphere a little weird!

The food - when it eventually turned up - is quite expensive and of 'snack' quality (salads, toasted sandwiches made with stock supermarket bread etc.) and nothing to write home about.

Definitiely a place for fans and people who appreciate the art form.

title: Exceptionnel
content: Bar tr√®s √©trange en terme de d√©coration mais √ßa vaut le coup de franchir la porte, et de d√©couvrir cet univers particulier! Vous en prendrez plein les yeux

title: The most unusual bar I have ever been in
content: If you don't know the relevance of the design of this bar you could be in for a real surprise if you happened to walk in off the streets of this medieval hillside village. Everything has the appearance of being made from bones and the cavernous gothic style arched room gives this a very unusual atmosphere. It is well worth a visit. As a bar, the beer is very good and the staff very friendly, it is a popular alternative to the more traditional village bars and restaurants nearby.

title: BOF

Venu juste pour la d√©co.

Chairs, table, ceiling are all in alien-style, and it's quite dark, not very big, and busy.
We had to wait for an hour for a kitsch and a kind of small pizza, but apparently it was just bad luck (table nearby was served in few minutes).
Not particular good, and a bit expensive for what it was, but you pay for the atmosphere, and the pictures you can take inside (actually some people entered just to take pictures despite the notice forbidding it..)

title: A must if in the area
content:
If you find yourself in Gruy√®res, definitely don't miss stopping in here for a coffee. The d√©cor is eye-popping, as mentioned by other reviewers. You will want to take many pictures. We go to the region every year at Christmastime and always come here once. Service can be a little slow if crowded since there's usually one server and one barista.

There are only a couple of tables that seat more than 5 people so if you're a big group, be prepared to split up or wait. Note the washroom is separate from the caf√©, across the path, next to the Giger Museum (worth to visit for the gift shop).

title: As a huge Giger's fan i was disappointed from the service!!
content:
As a huge Giger's fan i was disappointed from the service not the bar itself.It was a far trip only to visit H.R.Giger's museum and bar.The museum was excellent and the bar but only from the decoration(specila chairs and table created with unique style by Giger).
We went 2 afternoons in a row and i cant hide my disapointment for the staff working there.
Except from the lack of understanding English which is usual for Switzerland the most annoying thing was that the music was too low and the behaviour from staff(2 different girls/one each afternoon) was totally unhospitable like they wanted to sent us away as soon as possible by cleaning completely careless and NOISY the bar while customers were sitting still there.
Although the hours in the door were telling it closes 20:30 they tell us to pay and go before even 20:00.
Very sad this unique bar has so bad staff!!It doesnt honor Giger's creation!

title: Great bar! Super rude staff!!!

The staff had their friends sitting at the bar taking over but all on their cell phones, we walked in and were promptly tolls we couldn't order any coffee as they had cleaned the machine and were closing in an hour!!!! Then the attitude of the bar staff was just ridiculously rude abrasive and pure disrespectful. I'd walk in, takes pictures and leave.

title: A bucket list visit for fans of the bizarre!
content:
Giger Bar and of course Giger Museum would be an incredible addition artistic landscape in any modern city, but drop them in the center of a tiny Swiss town that looks like the setting for a Disney princess film and your brain starts to give off sparks and smoke.

Set in the beautiful village of Gruyeres, surrounded by finest cheeses and chocolates, lies the terrestrial beachhead of Earth's bio-mechanoid invasion. Like any good horror film, the terror starts in the last place you'd expect it. Giger bar is a treat. From floor to ceiling it will take your breathe away. Absinthe and Alien themed beverages flow freely, and the coffee is certainly worth trying as well. The food isn't bad, but when you can step across the path for an incredible Swiss meal I'd recommend focusing on the beverages and enjoying the ambiance you will find nowhere else on Earth. Fans of Giger should not miss the chance to check this off their bucket-list.

title: Come in un film

title: Stunning bar!
content: My husband is a big H.R Giger fan, so we wanted to travel to this little village and stay for 2 days to see the museum and go to this bar, and ohhh my god, what an amazing experience! Completely decorated as if you were in the Alien movie, without missing any details out of it. We went there a couple of times, the first time was on boxing day and they were struggling to cope with the amount of tourist that they had in: there was only 2 of them doing absolutely everything, so i felt bad for them. We had drinks and some snack food, not a great selection of food, but it's not what you go in there for. The next day we just had drinks, and it was a lot calmer with more staff: i highly recommend the shot "Alien blood", which was vodka with strawberry, very nice indeed. In the whole if you go to Gruyeres, you've gotta see the Geiger museum and do a stop a this bar, it's simply alien-tastic! :0)

title: Cool place for a drink

title: Go for the atmosphere!
content:
This bar/cafe is worth a stop if for no other reason than to marvel at the fascinating interior architecture and design. The bar commemorates the Oscar and Academy Award winning Swiss artist HR Giger, who passed away this year but left behind a huge body of surrealist work. I'm not "into" aliens, nor did I even care for the movie Alien, but the bar interior is brilliantly designed, and it's worth a stop to appreciate the unique atmosphere.

The bar is small so on a busy summer day, you might not even find a seat or booth, but you have to at least poke your head in the door!

The prices are high, even for Switzerland, and we didn't order food so I can't speak to whether it's good. A thimble sized cappuccino is about 4 chf, not atypical for elsewhere here, and prices for fancier drinks go up from there. Service was average.

The bar is also right across from the Giger Museum, very near the Tibet Museum, and also very near Gruyeres Castle. If you're visiting any of those, this is a great stop on the way!

If you arrive by car, free parking is offered a few hundred meters down the hill from the castle, bar, and village center, making it very accessible.

title: Ne vaut que pour le d√©cor

Le design du bar est tr√®s original et nous plonge dans l'univers de Giger... Mais pour moi l'int√©r√™t de l'endroit s'arr√™te l√†.
La carte est tr√®s ch√®re (oui c'est la Suisse mais quand m√™me, 6‚Ç¨ pour un smoothie en berlingot...), le service n'est pas vraiment dans le th√®me et pas vraiment aimable. De plus, cela semblera s√ªrement un d√©tail pour la plupart, mais la carte est moche ! Pour un bar aussi iconique je m'attendais vraiment √† mieux, un simple effort de design au niveau de la carte et de l'habillement des serveurs aurait d√©j√† renforc√© mon exp√©rience. J'en attendais beaucoup et je suis d√©√ßue.

title: Great bar with a unique interior

The bar is directly across from the Giger museum. The decor is 100% of the draw, and even if you don't plan to see the museum or have already seen the museum it is worth poking your head in.

We sat in the skeletal chairs and had a drink, but it isn't necessary to order anything to walk in, take pictures, and leave. The bar isn't that big, and you can really see everything standing just inside the entry.

title: ein hervorragender kulinarischer Abend

Mein Mann und ich waren heute Abend im Picanha. Die Bedienung war superfreundlich, begr√ºsste uns mit einem herzlichen L√§cheln und beriet uns fachlich perfekt in unserer Weinauswahl. Auch zu Fragen unseres Hauptgerichts antwortete sie fachlich sehr kompetent, so dass wir uns schon auf unsere gew√§hlte Speise: Oktopus, freuten. Der von uns gew√§hlte gemischte Salat mit italien Dressing war hervorragend, dazu das gew√§rmte Brot ein Genuss!
Der servierte Oktopus mit Knoblauch - in Oliven√∂l geschwenkt - dazu gew√§rmte Tomatenscheiben und hauchd√ºnne gebratene Kartoffeln : ein absolutes Highlight!!! Ich habe schon lange nicht mehr so vorz√ºglich gegessen!! Nichts war √ºberw√ºrzt, jedes Teil des Gerichtes bewahrte seinen nat√ºrlichen Geschmack, und vor allem die Oktopustentakeln bis ins d√ºnnste ein Genuss!! Es ist eine Kunst, alles auf den Punkt zu grillen oder braten, da vor allem die d√ºnnsten Tentakeln leicht zu Kohle verbrennen... Hier jedoch: alles perfekt, vom ersten bis zum letzten Biss!!! Bravo, wir werden wieder einkehren und uns verw√∂hnen lassen!!!

Waitress was clearly disturbed by our request not to 'all' have the 'all you can eat' option as half of the group clearly just wanted to try a small amount. After some convincing from her colleague she accepted to let us sit down and to serve us, but only with plates for the 3 people who would order a meal. i.e. the took all other plates from the table to make sure sharing would not be easy/obvious. Following this very awkward situation, we were presented with a bill of CHF 210. As a result we really did not enjoy our meal. What a pity for all the effort of the owners.
