title: Incroyable !!
content:
Chalet de montagne typique. Les mets propos√©s sont des purs plats du pays d'en haut.
Ambiance conviviale et tr√®s chaleureuse. Le personnel est en costume de la r√©gion et tr√®s serviable. On se croirait v√©ritablement dans un chalet d'alpage.
Allez-y entre 10h et 12h30 et vous aurez la chance d'assister √† la fabrication artisanale du fromage !! Ils le font en plein milieu de la salle √† manger, c'est g√©nial !

A l'√©tage du bas se trouve un petit commerce qui vend des produits du coin, dont le fromage produit par le chalet.

A l'√©tage du haut vous aurez le plaisir de d√©couvrir une gigantesque maquette de train √©lectrique ! Vraiment impressionnante.
Il y a aussi une petite salle de jeu pour les enfants.

J'aime beaucoup cet endroit et j'y viens avec plaisir √† chacun de mes passages dans la r√©gion.

title: Bon restaurant et super accueil
content: Super d√©monstration de la fabrication de fromage par Francis. Tr√®s sympa car il r√©pondait gentiment aux questions de ma fille de 6 ans. Serveuse et serveur tr√®s sympa. Bon repas copieux. superbe vue.

title: La qualit√© des produits et la convivialit√© du service
content: Un restaurant inoubliable durant notre s√©jour de 4 jours √† Ch√¢teau d'Oex. Nous y avons mang√© tous les jours et goutt√© toutes les sp√©cialit√©s du menu ! La raclette, la charcuterie et le vin blanc. On y retourne d√®s que possible :)

title: Sehr gutes Ambiente, hervorragendes Essen
content: Da wird mit Freude und Engagement gute Leistung erbracht: feine Fleischplatte, hervorragendes Raclette und gute Meringues. Die K√§seproduktion ist ein Erlebnis! Sehr zuvorkommendes Personal.

title: Le reflet de la Suisse !
content: L' Accueil, la d√©monstration de la fabrication du fromage de la r√©gion, le repas dans une bonne ambiance chaleureuse, en Bref tout √©tait parfait. Nous y retournons cette ann√©e.

title: √Ñusserst freundliche Mitarbeiter sowie sehr gutes Essen
content: Sehr gem√ºtliches Ambiente. Sowohl der Ap√©ro (reichhaltige Fleischplatte) wie auch der Hauptgang (Raclette) und das Dessert waren sehr lecker. Die Mitarbeiter waren schlicht und einfach top. Herzlichen Dank f√ºr den sch√∂nen Abend, den wir bei euch verbringen durften.

title: Super Lokalit√§t und tolle Mitarbeiter
content: Gem√ºtliche Atmosph√§re und ein perfekter und sympathische Service. Wir verbrachten einen exzellenten Firmenabend mit musikalische Unterst√ºtzung von dem tollen Trio Echo d Oex'Alp und einem feinen Raclette. Weiter war ein K√§ser vor Ort der uns w√§hrend √ºber 2 Stunden die K√§se Produktion demonstrierte und erkl√§rte. Der Besitzer Pierre und die liebe Bedienung Anna waren aufmerksam und sehr sehr freundlich. Das Chalet ist nicht nur f√ºr Firmenanl√§sse sondern auch f√ºr private Besuche sehr geeignet. Wir werden bestimmt wiederkommen und die sch√∂ne Atmosph√§re sowie die sch√∂ne Gegend geniessen. Herzlichen Dank! Merci ch√®res amis!

title: Gem√ºtliche Atmosph√§re und gutes Essen
content: Sehr gem√ºtliche Atmosph√§re, feines Essen. Wir haben mit einer umfangreichen Fleischplatte (inkl. Saucisson) gestartet, danach gab es klassisches Raclette bzw. einen Salatteller und R√∂sti mit Spiegelei, Schinken. Alles wie es sich geh√∂rt, von freundlichem und zuvorkommendem Personal serviert. In der Mitte des Raumes wurden etwa 200 Liter Milch in K√§se in traditioneller Weise in umgewandelt. Alles tiptop.

title: Excellent moment !
content: Restaurant typique de la r√©gion! Comme on en trouve pas ailleurs! Juste le top ! Tr√®s bonne ambiance, tr√®s bon service et tr√®s bonne cuisine ! ;-)

title: magnifique!
content: vous avez envie de bien manger et √† un prix tr√®s abordable? c'est ici qu'il faut venir! Le Chalet est un restaurant traditionnel o√π l'on peut se r√©galer les yeux et les papilles! Maurice le fromager vous fera partager sa passion du fromage au feu de bois et vous pourrez ensuite d√©guster une d√©licieuse fondue ou la copieuse assiette de macaronis de chalet! l'ambiance est d√©contract√©e, les serveuses tr√®s souriantes, on s'y sent vraiment bien! je recommande!

title: O top
content: Tres bonne fondue, fromage fait sur place. Bon accueil, salle sympa et agr√©able. Peu d'attente pour le service.

title: Das Chalet ist sich seit Jahren treu geblieben!
content:
Wir besuchten das Chalet bereits Ende der 70er Jahre! Wir kommen aber immer wieder einmal hierher. Alles ist eigentlich so positiv geblieben, wie damals. D.h. Auch wenn die Jahre vor√ºber gegangen sind, ist das Lokal nicht "versimpelt"!
Ein Highlight ist √ºberdies, dass die "Maquette de la MOB" in gutem Zustand erhalten blieb!
Wir kommen immer wieder einmal aus der Nord-Schweiz ins Pays d'Enhaut!

title: vaut le passage
content:
Nous avons pris l'ap√©ro dans ce restaurant typique. le personnel est tr√®s sympa et habill√© en costume traditionnel. Pour 5 chf vous recevez une d√©licieuse planchette ap√©ro.
Le fromage est confectionn√© sur place et un coin jeu est a disposition pour les enfants.

title: when in the Alps, go Alpine!
content: On an impulse after a long walk downhill I stopped at le Chalet for lunch on a sunny Saturday. I sat outside on the terrace with views across the mountains and towards the church perched above the village. Service was prompt and friendly. The salad I ate was very good, with several flavours of cheese and served with plenty of bread. There were lots of other customers and a guy stirring a big vat full of cheese for the many fondue eaters! Perhaps the flowery skirts and aprons worn by the waitresses and the swinging musak from the speakers were a slight overdose of Alpine "ambience", but on the other hand, when in the Alps, why not. Grey uniforms, rap or rock would be out of place.

title: Une d√©ception
content:
Cadre typique d'un chalet d'alpage suisse, nous nous attendions a beaucoup mieux car le charme et la d√©co laissaient pr√©sager bien mieux. Malheureusement, nous avons √©t√© passablement d√©√ßus. Presque 1h30 d'attente pour recevoir deux plats de r√∂sti, alors que des personnes arriv√©es apr√®s nous ont √©t√© servies avant. Le restaurant emploie 2 serveuses qui semblent compl√®tement perdues et errent dans la salle comme des √¢mes en peine. Heureusement, la qualit√© des r√∂sti sauve un peu les
meubles. Ceci nous semble plus √™tre un attrape touriste. A √©viter...

title: Comme en haute montagne
content:
On se croirait dans un chalet d'alpage, tout en √©tant au centre du village. Les odeurs et la fabrication du fromage en plein restaurant, sur un feu de bois...
extraordinaire. La fondue est excellente et les meringues √† la cr√®me double restent le meilleur des desserts!
A conseiller.

title: Raclette
content: Les enfants souhaitaient une raclette donc nous y sommes all√©s mais quelle d√©ception quand ils nous ont pos√©s le caquelon devant. Dommage qu'ils ne la racle pas. J'ai demand√© s'il s'agissait du fromage maison mais jamais eu de r√©ponse donc j'en d√©duit que non. De plus c'est tr√®s bruyant car de grands groupes viennent pour la fondue.

title: Good, typical swiss mountain food in a chalet.
content:
We were lodging in Chateau d'Oex, and decided to go and eat here Sunday 1st of March. After a good walk we arrived. The table was unfortunately not ready yet, so we went upstairs and took a look of the model train track they have of the local train, the 'MOB'.

The cheese making was already done, so we did unfortunately not get to see it, but the kids got to see and talk with the man when he came to turn around the cheese.

We chose a viande seche/dry meat platter for a starter, then some tried the 'bolet' mushroom fondue, while others chose the 'croute au fromage'. Me and my husband chose to take one croute au fromage (baked bread slices with cheese in the oven) and one rosti (grated potatoes and onions, fried), and split each between us. It was perfect. The bolet mushroom fondue had a real mushroom taste, and pieces of bolet mushroom in it.

For desert some took the very typical meringue with 'double' gruyere cream!!! It is not 'light' food, but gee it is good!

The girls serving have nice typical costumes, and the room is cosy, all in wood of course, as it is a chalet. The paper napkins on the table have typical swiss paper-cut motives.

For those with small kids - I actually saw that they had a TV screen in the dining hall showing the play-corner upstairs (on the same floor as where the train model is)... so that you can eat and be reassured and know what your kids are up to upstairs without running up and down. Good idea I find.

title: Tr√®s bonne fondue, d√©monstration int√©ressante
content: Un restaurant unique. On y fabrique du fromage devant nos yeux dans un grand chaudron sur un feu de bois. On peut participer en aidant le maitre fromager √† couler le fromage dans le moule. Tr√®s bonne fondue, jolie d√©cor.

title: Jedzenie

title: Excellent fondue
content: Lovely restaurant in typical Swiss chalet. Fondue tasted delicious, made with local cheese. Staff were dressed in Swiss costumes and very helpful with good English. Live entertainment on Friday night provided an authentic Swiss evening!

title: very intresting, a "to do" in your list
content: I went two times in a year. The first one the food was extraordinary, the second was quite good. But the most interesting thing about that restaurant was the demonstration of manufacturing of the cheese and the willing of the personnel to explain everything, to laugh and speak with you. I will go again, for sure.

title: Service vraiment minable
content: Nous nous sommes arr√™t√©s boire un verre et manger une meringue un dimanche apr√®s-midi. D√©ception totale, nous nous installons sur la terrasse o√π la totalit√© des tables ne sont pas nettoy√©e du service pr√©c√©dent enfin bref, apr√®s 20 minutes je me d√©cide a aller chercher une serveuse puisque ces derni√®res ne pointaient pas le bout de leur nez dehors (nous √©tions pourtant en plein √©t√©). Cette derni√®re arrive avec nos consommations nous les pose vulgairement sur la table sans rien dire enfin bref nous oublions nos meringues. Vraiment dommage car la qualit√© des produits ainsi que le lieu sont vraiment parfait mais le service est vraiment d√©testable.

title: Typique et enchanteur
content: Qualit√© des produits, cadre enchanteur sur la terrasse si le temps le permet. A d√©couvrir absolument.

title: Des specialit√©s Suisse
content:
Le restaurant est coupl√© avec la fromagerie il propose toute la cuisine suisse avec des croutes au fromage bio ,des fondues ,des salades , des charcuteries du pays et bien evidemment l'incontournable creme double et meringue en dessert .
Attention le restaurant n'est pas ouvert le soir en semaine.

title: Tr√®s bon resto de fromage
content: Les fromages sont fait ici. C est bio et c est bon! Le cadre est typique d un vieux chalet en bois. La fondue ou la raclette sont a tomber par terre. Les charcuteries sont d√©licieuses. Si vous venez le vendredi soir, il y a un groupe qui joue et chantent des chansons typiques. L accueil est hyper chaleureux. On se sent bien tout de suite et on y mange remarquablement bien. Il y a une petite boutique si vous voulez acheter du fromage.

title: Un lieu magique
content:
Nous sommes retourn√©s dans ce restaurant pour la 1√®re fois depuis des ann√©es et la surprise a √©t√© totale, et quelle belle surprise, tout est toujours aussi excellent du d√©but jusqu'√† la fin, un enchantement pour les papilles, on sent l'amour de la cuisine que le chef transmet √† chacun de ses plats.

Le service y est tr√®s professionnel, l‚Äôaccueil sans reproche, aucune fausse note. Nous y reviendrons avec un plaisir non dissimul√©

Une adresse √† transmettre sans aucune h√©sitation.

title: A perfect introduction to Switzerland!!!
content: Our first stop after arriving in Switzerland was this wonderful little restaurant/cheese place. Our host wanted to make sure that we enjoyed the true 'swiss' experience so we shared the best Fondue I have every had in my life! The place was clean and cute, and we were entertained both by an old gentleman playing his accordion and yodeling, as well as a demonstration of just how the cheese is made. Our meal was completed with a desert of meringues and heavy cream, that was just so delicious! It was a wonderful introduction to a wonderful country, and if I find myself back in Switzerland, I would seek it out again!

title: Plaisir visuel et gustatif
content:
Superbe s√©jour dans ce chalet chaleureux et plein de charme.
Le repas du soir √©tait tout simplement exquis digne d'un repas gastronomique.
Le personnel est tr√®s accueillant et sympathique.
Le nuit √©tait tr√®s calme et le paysage sur les montagnes remarquable
Je recommande vraiment cet endroit pour une parenth√®se pleine de douceur

title: wohlf√ºhlen & geniessen
content:
hochstehende Kochkunst und zugleich bodenst√§ndig - genau was wir suchen.

title: A lovely place with lovely staff

The best seats are in the back of the restaurant in the veranda looking over the remparts - hence the name of this restaurant.

If not, then it's just a normal place with average food and Swiss decor. And really, if you want to see the ramparts, just walk outside. Overall this place was just average.

content:

title: Wonderful late family dinner
content: We arrived in Gruyeres late with children and grandparents, and were happy that the Restaurant des Remparts was still happy to serve us dinner. Our server was formal yet friendly and I enjoyed that she spoke to us in lovely European french instead of catering to our English. My cheese fondue was excellent and the family agreed it was better than they (Swiss people) make at home in Canada. There was also a nice raclette for two and a pasta with chanterelles, and some child-friendly soup and quiche. Every restaurant in the town serves a similar menu. We were happy with our dinner and happy to have had the appropriate Gruyeres experience, including meringues and double cream for dessert.

title: Restaurant des Remparts , Gruy√®res .

Impossible de ne pas passer manger une excellente fondue au Restaurant des Remparts , l'ambiance y est fort sympathique , le personnel √©galement , rapide et bien servi , les pommes de terre tremp√©es dans la fondue...que dire...un vrai d√©lice !!! et la vue est superbe , demandez √† √™tre placer dans la v√©randa ;) et profitez juste avant votre repas de passez par le ch√¢teau et le mus√©e Giger !!!

title: Nice view, waiter very kind, good food

title: Favourite restaurant in Gruyere
content: I love the beautiful walled town of Gruyere and this is our restaurant of choice (all restaurants in Gruyere are very touristy = expensive and offer similar menus!). My daughter loves their fondue (I'm not a big fondue fan but theirs is good). We visited 7/8/15 and weren't wanting a huge meal so my husband had the cheese, ham and egg which he said was very tasty and my friend and I chose the starter mixed salad. You can sit on the terrace overlook the pretty town square and people watch or there are lovely views over the countryside at the back. The service is very pleasant and it's clean so worth a visit.

title: Nel
content: Delizioso paese di Gruyere. Il posto vale il viaggio, per il panorama. La raclette si cercher√† di dimenticarla fin da domani. Servizio gentile.

title: Un bon restaurant

Le dessert local, les meringues √† la double cr√®me de Gruy√®re, est une tuerie ! Tout ce qui est √† la carte est super bon ! Pour ma part, aucune h√©sitation. title: Au pays du Gruy√®re

Alors que tous les restaurants √©taient bond√©s nous avons atterri l√† et ce fut une chance ! Un accueil adorable, et nous avons imm√©diatement √©t√© plac√© au fond de la salle √† une table avec une superbe vue sur les remparts !

title: Espetacular
content: Na linda cidade de Gruyeres, h√° v√°rios restaurantes lindos e aconchegantes. Mas o restaurante Des Remparts √© espetacular. Vista maravilhosa, pre√ßos bem acess√≠veis e atendimento r√°pido e cort√™s. O card√°pio √© de dar √°gua na boca. Pedimos um prato de frios de entrada e apostamos para almo√ßo num espaguete, este √∫ltimo um dos melhores que j√° comi. Nota 10!

title: Good, but could be better
content: Wanted a fondue, so we decided to drive to Gruyere for a vacherin fondue (which is a very rich cheese but it cannot be cooked too hot). Parked and had a lovely ten minutes walk up the hill to reach the main village place. After couple stops (chocolate artisanal factory, cheese village factory) we were hungry. We stopped here as it looked nice. We're asked to go upstairs, but a one lady show was happening. No tables were set, obviously they were not ready for that. After some wait we ordered our vacherin fondue which was good. The heating system underneath was not adapted to keep the fondue at the right temperature, we then had a meringue with raspberries and the Gruyere cream which was divine.

title: A meal to remember
content:
We went to this little restaurant because there was no table available at the #1 restaurant in Gruyeres and were too hungry to wait for an hour so decided to settle for something lesser. But I cannot see how this meal could be beaten by any place!
We sat out on a sunny afternoon and ordered the meat platter and a fondue with some housewine and we were DELIGHTED. The fondue was reasonably priced and the quantity was hearty. I wish we had had the Meringue and Gruyeres double cream but we were just too full. Will jsut have to go back to do so! :)

title: Delicious
content: We stopped in here for dinner on a rainy evening in Gruyeres. The restaurant is very inviting with spectacular views and friendly staff. Their menu is large and includes many traditional rostis, fodues, and meringues. I got the ham, cheese, egg, and bread plate and it was spectacular. The cheese was delicious, and the service was very fast. The prices are high, but are the average price range for Switzerland. Overall, a great experience.

title: la meilleure fondue de Gruy√®res
content:
C'est notre restaurant pr√©f√©r√© de Gruy√®res celui o√π nous revenons avec plaisir depuis des ann√©es.
La fondue est toujours parfaite, cr√©meuse jusqu'√† la fin; un vrai d√©lice.
Le choix de la table est difficile, soit une jolie vue sur la fontaine et la ville de Gruy√®re
soit une magnifique vue panoramique de la v√©randa sur les remparts et la r√©gion.Les deux choix
sont parfaits !
Le service est rapide, efficace et l'accueil est sympa.
Le rapport qualit√© prix est plus que correct pour cet endroit tr√®s touristique.

title: Ottimi piatti e cordialit√†.
content: Questo locale mi √® stato indicato da una persona del luogo come un ristorante dalla cucina semplice ma molto gustosa. Confermo e aggiungo che, forse perch√® conosciamo la lingua francese, sia la proprietaria che le cameriere erano di una gentilezza e cordialit√† eccezionale. Il ristorante, molto simpatico, √® situato quasi all' inizio della strada principale del borgo medievale, sulla sinistra quando si va verso il castello. Abbiamo cenato tre volte con nostra piena soddisfazione: civet di capriolo,fondue moiti√®-moiti√®, prosciutto e salsicce con patate. Pure la carta dei vini propone interessanti etichette. La carta dei cibi offre una vasta scelta e le porzioni sono particolarmente abbondanti, sappiatevi regolare. Al sabato e alla domenica il ristorante √® molto frequentato, meglio prenotare!

title: √ìtima comida e excelente vista!
content: Este √© um ≈ìtimo restaurante bem no meio da pra√ßa onde fica o ch√¢teau gruyeres. O atendimento √© muito bom, o card√°pio bem variado, tem card√°pio para crian√ßas, comida muito saborosa e em quantidade suficiente.

title: Qualit√† media, servizio pessimo!
content: Sono stata oggi pomeriggio con le mie due bimbe in questo grazioso locale nella piazza principale di Gruy√®re. Le bimbe desideravano fare una merenda cena con un rosti e un piatto di affettati e formaggio. Abbiamo atteso 40 minuti! Non me ne sono andata unicamente perch√© le bimbe avevano bisogno di mangiare. La cameriera, quando le ho fatto notare che attendevamo da tanto non solo non si √® scusata, ma si √® messa a discutere! Per fortuna personale cos√¨ scortese si incontra raramente! Considerato la qualit√† dei piatti nella media, consiglio vivamente di EVITARE questo locale!

title: Tr√®s bon accueil
content:
Petit restaurant sympatique et tr√®s bien accueillie par le personnel "en habit local".
Nous avons mang√© une fondue "moiti√© moiti√©", bonne et onctueuse.
Mon √©pouse √† demand√© si il √©tait possible d'avoir quelques cornichons pour accompagner les pommes de terre, il nous a √©t√© apport√© un bol rempli sans suppl√©ment de prix !, pas mal pour un restaurant touristique.
Tr√®s vue panoramique depuis le restaurant.

title: Au pays du fromage et de la creme
content:
Agreable PETITE terrasse et a l'interieur veranda offrant une belle vue sur les remparts et la plaine.
Victime du succes touristique le personnel est souvent.... bouscul√© ...
Avec l'humour ca passe

Royaume du fromage sous toutes ses formes ... succulent...bonnes brochettes de viande presentees sur un grill original
Et pour finir des fruits frais que vous napez de double creme fraiche...mmmmm

title: Super!
content: A vista panor√¢mica sobre as plan√≠cies circundantes desde logo predisp√µe o apetite. O espa√ßo e do g√©nero acolhedor e familiar e a comida super, sobretudo no que toca a pratos regionais como "broche au feu", "fondue", "raclette", "jambon de la borne". Para√≠so gastron√≥mico numa vila encantadora.

title: Excellent accueil et tr√®s bonne cuisine !
content:
Apr√®s avoir √©t√© "refus√©s" par l'Auberge de la Halle (voir mon post sur cet √©tablissement) sous pr√©texte que nous avions 15 min de retard sur l'heure de la r√©servation (19h45), nous avons √©t√© SUPERBEMENT accueillis au Restaurant des Remparts √† 20h00 ! Un service impeccable, avec recommandation de manger sur ardoise (agneau et cheval)... un vrai d√©lice, avec un excellent vin, bien conseill√© par le personnel.
La vue est √©poustouflante sur le chemin de ronde et la Basse Gruy√®re. A recommander vivement, car le personnel est tr√®s tr√®s avenant ! Bravo et merci, vous nous avez sauv√© la soir√©e !!

title: O lugar √© super aconchegante
content: Comemos o founde de queijo. Acompanha batatinhas que mergulhadas no queijo...huuummmm!!!!! Nada se compara ao queijo desse povo. Estamos na su√≠√ßa mas a cultura √® francesa e o queijo beira a perfei√ß√£o. Enchi a mala e trouxe um monte pro Brasil. A pequena vila te leva em uma viagem no tempo dos castelos. Meio dia √© o suficiente pra conhecer e almo√ßar.

title: D√©couverte
content:
Restaurant simple accueil tr√®s agr√©able
D√©couverte des fondus du cru
Un vrai d√©lice dans le respect de la tradition
Rapport qualit√© prix sachant que tous les restaurants sont dans la m√™me tranche de prix dans ce village adorable
√Ä conseiller

title: Accueil avec les deux s≈ìurs sourires
content:
Autant la petite mauricienne de la veille avait un accueil chaleureux autant les deux patronnes du lendemain vous refroidissaient...
√Ä une question avez vous du poulet r√¥ti : on vous r√©pond s√®chement : tout est la!!"Quand la corbeille de pain arrive au plat principal on vous r√©pond " je n'ai pas 4 mains" sic ...quand on demande la note une deuxi√®me fois on vous r√©pond : " vous l'avez d√©j√† demand√©...!!" Quelle hospitalit√© suisse dans ce village de Gruy√®re , incroyable pourtant qu'il est beau ce village mais pour leurs habitants su'ils prennent des champignons hallucinog√®nes !!!

title: tres bon accueil
content: Tous les restaurants etant ferm√©s le dimanche soir celui ci nous a accueilli avec le sourire. Les serveuses etaient adorables et la fondue delicieuse.

title: they charge for tap water!!
content: unfortunately the charming ancient walled town of gruyeres is fast turning if not already turned into tourist rip-off trap. most of the hotels and restaurants are owned by a monopoly (gruyere hotels group) and the prices everywhere are ridiculous. we were so appalled at the Chalet Restaurant - see review- that we decided the remparts restaurant was the best of a poor selection. the food we had was very nice and we would have gone back but THEY CHARGED US 3 swiss francs FOR 2 GLASSES OF TAP WATER! its not a country short of water and we felt totally fleeced by this attempt to squeeeeeze the last franc out of each tourist through their door. there are plenty of other charming cheese towns in Switzerland which are not a rip off - try appenzell for instance. our advice is to go to visit the town and wonderful castle but eat and stay in the valley below.

title: A definite stop for food in this Medieval Swiss Town
content:
This is one of the several restaurants in the Medieval Town of Gruy√®res.

The food is good, and if -during the day -you ask for the tables overlooking the valley, you will enjoy fabulous views of this attracting rural Swiss landscape, and the city walls that give the name to the restaurant.

I do recommend it.

title: Plats bon mais personnel peu agr√©able
content:
Les plats que nous avons pris (fondue et r√¥ti de boeuf) √©taient bons.
Par contre, on a eu l'impression d'emb√™ter la serveuse qui s'occupait de nous : on ne nous a pas propos√© de boissons,pas de vins, on a d√ª r√©clamer et avions vraiment l'impression de demander l'impossible. Dommage.

title: Fantastic Fondue !
content: What a find this restaurant was its very popular and we were lucky to secure a table with stunning views across the country side. We selected a fondue from the menu, service was friendly and efficient and the food amazing for desserts a meringue with fresh berries and local double cream which was absolutely delicious! Just need to go for a bit of a walk to walk off the extra calories, but so worth the indulgence!!

title: Authentique et tr√®s bon
content:
Un restaurant qui a su rester authentique malgr√© le lieu TR√àS touristique !
Nous avons pris la fondue : bien servie et excellente accompagn√©e de pain et de pommes de terre ! Les vins blanc sont aussi bien conseill√©s. Petit plus : la terrasse panoramique !

title: Ritrovarsi in una fiaba
content: A pranzo nel giorno del mio compleanno ho continuato i miei festeggiamenti a Gruyeres..pittoresco borgo...in questo caratteristico ristorantino con pochi tavoli all'esterno che danno sulla piazzetta,il locale dispone inoltre di una terrazza panoramica con vista sulla valle...ovviamente la mia scelta √® caduta sulla nota fondute di formaggio prodotto proprio nel posto davvero favolosa servita con patate lesse e pane...come dessert come avrei potuto rinunciare al dolce tipico: la meringa di Gruyeres con crema di latte e uova una prelibatezza...impossibile non andarci!!!

title: Formaggio come se piovesse
content:
Fondue e raclette sono i piatti forti, se ne sente il profumo dalla strada.
Anche la carne merita.
Il bello √® che ti cucini quasi da solo.
La fondue viene servita su un fornelletto per mantere fuso il formaggio.
La raclette, che √® un formaggio un po' piu forte, viene presentata su un trespolo elettrico che scalda la parte superiore del panetto di formaggio dal quale poi si raschia la parte fusa mano a mano.
Bel sistema per mangiate di gruppo.

title: en toute simplicit√©
content:
L'accueil peut para√Ætre froid au premier abord mais en fait le personnel est charmant et attentionn√© envers les enfants de bas √¢ges.
pas de surprise c√¥t√© menu, vous retrouvez la cro√ªte, les fondue et autre raclette. Rien de transcendant mais correct dans l'ensemble.
Evitez de prendre une bouteille d'eau, celle-ci est √† plus de 7CHF

title: Sans plus...
content:
Il y a plusieurs restaurants √† Gruy√®re et nous avons opt√© pour celui l√†, par rapport aux prix et au choix.
Malheureusement nous avons √©t√© d√©√ßus au niveau du rapport qualit√©/prix, les plats sont servis sans accompagnement (pas m√™me une salade) donc vous devez au minimum rajouter entre 6 et 10CHF (nous avions pris cassolette de chanterelles fra√Æches et cro√ªte au fromage qui n'est autre que du pain avec du fromage fondu). Par contre pour les fruits de saison √† la cr√®me de Gruy√®re, il y a du choix : fraises, framboises, myrtilles ou m√ªres (les autres ne font que framboise...) mais je suspecte que les framboises √©taient congel√©es (plus petites et ab√Æm√©es que celles servies dans d'autres restaurant du village).
Ceci dit le service est agr√©able, les dames sont sympathiques mais quand nous y sommes retourn√©s nous avons opt√© pour un autre √©tablissement

title: Belle √©tape...
content: Magnifique village a voir absolument, et accessoirement, se restaurer au cafe restaurant des Remparts dont l'accueil et le service sont tr√®s agr√©ables est une etape a ne pas rater.La fondue au vacherin est divine, et la double cr√®me de Gruy√®re qui nappe la coupe de fruit....Miam Miam, je n'en dis pas plus !!!

title: splendid location
content:
The small town of Gruyeres has on the historical townsquare a few good restaurants.
Whave eaten twice the fondue here. It is reasonable priced. The terrace is charming with a splendid view of the square. The service is correct and rapid. The housewine is good.
I find the landscape of La Gruyere one of the most interesting in the country and there is always the Cheesemuseum to visit.

title: Service rapide et pain tr√®s ordinaire
content:
Nous sommes une famille de 2 adultes et 2 enfants. Nous sommes bien tristes d'√™tre sorti de l√† d√©√ßus.
Le service √©tait froid et peu engageant.
Je me faisait une joie de manger une fondue au fromage alors pour le prix je m'attendais √† un Wow. Mais non, le pain √©tait pas bon et tr√®s frais, donc avec le fromage chaud, cela faisait assez mou. Le fromage √©tait bon par contre, mais si cela avait √©t√© le contraire √† Gruy√®re cela n'aurais aucun sens!
mon conjoint a mang√© un entrec√¥te de boeuf qu!il avait demand√© saignant. Il est arriv√© m√©dium avec aucune sauce et des frites sans l√©gumes.
L,omelette √©tait bonne et le repas enfant consistait en une tr√®s mince tranche de jambon gras avec une montagne de frites. C'est quoi l'id√©e de ne mettre aucun l√©gumes color√©s aux enfants. Au prix que cela co√ªte, c'est exorbitant!
bref je ne le conseille pas et sommes repartis d√©√ßus, malheureusement.

title: OK, but a smile or two would help.
content:
We had dinner in the back area with a great view. The sun was I my face, so I sat beside my wife instead of across from her as I would have preferred. The service was good, but a smile would have made it better. We had fondue, of course. When we asked if a salad each and splitting the fondue would be enough, the waitress told us no. It would have easily been enough...

If you like a heavy dose of cheese, it was good, but, like everything in Switzerland , very pricey. About CHF 90 for what we had and 1/2 liter of local wine.

title: lovely view
content: Good food with good portion sizes.Meat cooked to your liking. quite reasonable priced for Switzerland. Lovely view from the back part.

title: One of our top meals
content: Many Swiss restaurants serve small portions for a lot of money. This restaurant in picture perfect tiny Gruyere does the opposite. We tried four different dishes, and the food was all delicious and in take-home sized servings. The rich quiche, hot crisp Rosti and meat and cheese platters were reasonably priced (for Switzerland) and prepared and presented well. We sat on the Terrace with an amazing view across the valley to the nearby mountains. Our dining experience added greatly to our impressions of Gruyere. Would definitely return here.

title: fondue..
content:
Le restaurant est dans un cadre superbe... Le personnel est sympa, la nourriture bonne...
L'assiette de viande s√©ch√©e √©tait un peu petite pour le prix !!! Et peut-√™tre que le d√©cor des tables.. nappes... couverts.. devraient √™tre un peu am√©lior√©.. vu le prix!

title: Good choice
content: We ended up here because everything was closed at 19:30. It was a good choice.Food was good and they had a good Swiss wine selection. I made a good choice with the wine and also with the food.

title: Para volver
content: Hemos ido varias veces a Gruyere, la primera comimos en este Restaurante y siempre volvemos. Tiene una buenas vistas en la parte trasera pero en cualquier sitio pasamos un buen rato, ya que hay un ambiente muy c√°lido y acogedor. Es perfecto para comer platos t√≠picos de la zona y los detalles de la mesa y el servicio nos parecen agradables. El precio es el normal de los restaurante de Suiza.

title: Ended up here after the higher ranked choices were booked up, didn't regret it at all...
content:
The wife, 2yr old daugher and I drove over to Gruyeres for a one night stay and given it was March and not at all high season for tourism here, figured we wouldn't sweat reserving a spot for dinner at the more popular destinations in the tiny city centre of Gruyeres. Well, we were surprised to find nearly everything booked as we walked from our first choice to second choice....

Then we were happy and relieved to find out that we'd still be getting our fondue fix at Restaurant des Ramparts. They sat us without trouble, were super pleasant and attentive from the first table setting through the check/payment. The food was as you'd expect from fondue in the epicenter of it's origins, awesome. Was it as awesome as the other higher ranked places around? Probably. I say that because out of all the fondue I've had in Switzerland and France, it's pretty damn hard to find a place that messes it up. As others noted, the wine selection was really good, and the prices were also pretty reasonable. They had a good selection of lower priced "house" type wines despite not offering an actual house wine. We went with a cheap bottle of Vully white to pair with the fondue and it was great for the money. We got our daughter a small pizza for 9chf which is basically the ideal thing to keep her quiet while mom and dad enjoy dinner. That part of the meal was perhaps a bit overpriced since it was definitely not much more than something on par with a microwave pizza. They were otherwise very family oriented in that the seating was spacious enough for a stroller and the vibe wasn't at all stuffy with patrons casting judgement like can sometimes be the case in quieter more intimate places. I'd definitely recommend this place to anyone with kids, as a potentially better option than some of the other more tempting locations if you're going solely off tripadvisor reviews.

title: Bon repas et tr√®s bon service
content: Tr√®s bon service, rapide et sans encombre. Cadre agr√©able et restaurant bien situ√© √† l'int√©rieur de les remparts. Notre repas √©tait bon mais pas exceptionnel pour le prix

title: very traditional, very nice
content: You don't go to Gruyeres for innovative cuisine. This restaurant is traditional and very typically Swiss. We were a party of 6 and had vol-au-vent (puff pastry filled with creamy chicken, bacon sauce), a horse-meat steak (yes, horse meat is popular in Switzerland), fondu, spaghetti and an omelette. All the meals arrived fresh and hot and were tasty. Prices are a little high by Canadian standards, but then again, not really when you think about the fact that you are in a picture perfect, very touristy village, with a panoramic view out the window of the Alps, green fields (even in late November) and the perfectly manicured Swiss countryside. Individual plates were about 23-25 Swiss francs which is about $25-27 Canadian dollars (the Canadian dollar is slightly higher than the US dollar). The wine we had was Swiss and very ordinary. The dessert specialty is fruit with Gruyere cream, which is like Devonshire cream in England, a very thick, very rich cream not common in North America. Service was extraordinary - warm, efficient, friendly, thoughtful...I have the impression that good service is a Swiss thing. I wouldn't want to eat like this very often, the food is too rich and not very exciting, but once and a while, on a family or friend outing it's great.

title: Service consternant !
content: J'y suis all√© avec des amis venant de l'√©tranger pour boire un caf√©. Je ne peux rien dire sur la v√©randa, car comme nous ne voulions "que boire un verre" son acc√®s nous a √©t√© refus√© bien que le restaurant √©tait pratiquement vide (17h). Nous avons pris un caf√©, avec lequel on nous a servi un petit pot de cr√®me "√©paisse" (quasiment du beurre) Doutant de la fra√Æcheur du produit, j'ai demand√© s'ils n'avaient pas de la cr√®me liquide. La serveuse, d√©j√† fort d√©sagr√©able m'a dit qu'ils servent uniquement de la cr√®me √©paisse de Gruy√®res √† prendre avec une cuill√®re ????. Quand je lui ai fait remarqu√© que je connais la cr√®me double de Gruy√®res et que d'habitude elle n'ai pas solide elle m'a quasiement enguirland√© en disant qu'avant les gens se plaignaient qu'elle √©tait trop liquide et que maintenant elle ne l'ai plus !!!! √ßa c'est s√ªr.

title: Oh my Fondue
content: Great fondue with tiny potatoes, great selection of wine, brilliant hosts, the mozzarella and tomato salad was insanely tasty, the tomatoes were as fresh as ever, taking a bite felt like eating an apple.

title: Comida de la zona
content: Un local bonito con vistas a la calle principal o al valle. Comidas t√≠picas de la zona, sobretodo basadas en el queso gruy√®re, como fondues o raclette. Buen servicio. Precio razonable.

title: Nice fondue
content: We had a nice fondue meal here and some amazing fruit, cream and meringues for dessert. Atmosphere is OK - it was too bad a busload of loud all-male tourists came in and drowned out any chance of conversation. But it was a nice experience.

title: Recomendable
content: Tienen un men√∫ variado dentro de las espacialidades del queso Gruyeres, todo muy rico, la atenci√≥n no es demasiado esmerada, pero est√° bien. Es recomendable por el sabor de las comidas. Al fondo tienen una bella terraza cubierta tambien.

title: One of better options in Gruyeres
content: My wife and I like this restaurant. We've been several times and a recent visit in late July 2012 confirmed it as a favoured option in Gruyeres. Four of us had Sunday lunch. We arrived early enough to secure a window table with great views. We had a pasta dish, two fondues and a raclette, and one fruit dessert (with the obligatory cream!). All meals were excellent. In summer the place is packed and I sense the service can be variable but this time we had a helpful, smiley waitress. We'll go back.

title: restaurant luxueux
content: Si vous voulez un petit restaurant luxueux avec vue en bas des montagnes et un bon repas.J'y est ete et il est tranquille avec terrasse panoramique et veranda our illuminer la piece et voire les coucher de soleil.En amoureux en tete a tete ou en famille ce petit restaurant tranquilledans le centre de la gruyere est pas mal. J'y est ete le soir et le serveur a ete a notre disposition toute la soir√©e avec les choses a visiter et nous a toujours servit avec le sourire

title: Highly recommended stop to eat
content:
Next to the central springs of the village. Better price than the rest, friendly and very polite staff (like all Swiss in general). Really good food - coffee (coffee in Switzerland is similar to the Italian espresso but milder and in bigger quantities).
If you visit the village you should definitely go there. During the winter you can sit inside and have great views of the valley.

title: Service abominable
content: J'y suis all√© avec ma femme et mes enfants. Nous avons choisi ce restaurant pour sa v√©randa offrant un joli point de vue sur la vall√©e. Nous avons pris une fondue au fromage qui √©tait excellente (ce n'est pas tr√®s difficile). En dessert, les framboises √† la double cr√®me sont tr√®s bonnes. Par contre, je ne recommande certainement pas ce restaurant pour son service. Les deux serveuses sont tr√®s s√®ches, √† la limite du correct. Je viens de lire les avis d'autres voyageurs et apparemment je ne suis pas le seul a avoir √©t√© mal re√ßu. Il y a pl√©thore de restaurants √† Gruy√®res, allez donc voir ailleurs.

title: Fantastic!
content: After going to the castle we planned on having a fondue lunch near by. We first went to another restaurantlisted on here only to be to.d they could not seat all 7 of us. We went to Ramparts. Greeted nicely & taken to a table in the back with such a view!! The server spoke perfect English. She was so kind to our 2 kids ( 7 & 4). She answered our questions & looked after us just fine. The adults all had fondue while the kids had spaghetti. Heard the village does a great job if decorating for Christmas. We will be back again for that & will eat here again....if not sooner.

title: Fondue mit Aussicht
content: Super netten Personal. Die Lage im kleinen Dorf war sehr leicht zu finden. Das Service war ausgezeichnet. Die Fondue vacherin war exzellent. Einige haben auch Raclette gegessen... und dazu sehr viel Tee getrunken. Praktisch, wenn schon zu viert Tee trink, kriegt man eine volle Karaffe warmen Tee. Den Hammer! Sehr empfehlenswert! Und lecker!! :)

title: Poor service
content: We had lunch at this restaurant recently. We're Asian and do not speak French. The staff serving us was able to speak English but she sounded unfriendly and impatient when asking us to place our order. The menu items were mostly in French and I thought of asking for details on some items we shortlisted. But the unfriendly tone of the staff made us decided to drop the idea. After we told the staff our choice of main course and my partner was still deciding the choice of dessert from the menu, the staff grabbed the menu from us and said we could take our own sweet time deciding later. We felt we were being pressurized to place our order quickly, though the restaurant wasn't even half-full. The food didn't take too long to arrive. We finished what we could and left quickly. To be fair, the food was all right but wasn't fantastic. But a dining experience is not just about the food, it's also about the service. I wonder whether the poor service was due to us not being locals and unable to speak their language. I won't come back to this restaurant again.

title: Empfelenswert
content: Via TripAdvisor hattten wir uns auch √ºber die Restaurants in Gruyere informiert. Unser Fazit war: mal schauen aber sicher nicht ins les Remparts. Als uns dann aber genau dieses Restaurant empfohlen wurde, waten wir es trotzdem. Zum Gl√ºck! Das Angebot der Gasth√§user in Gruyere ist nahezu identisch. Wir haben zwei mal dort gegessen im les Rempatrs war es klar besser und weniger teuer!

title: Too expensive for what it is, lousy service
content:
We've been in all restaurants in Gruy√®res already, and this one is like the others. They take the tourists as cashcows (most restaurants in Gruy√®res are owned by the same group). We reserved on the backside of the restaurant, which has a beautiful view of Bulle and the region and has evening sun. The service personnel does not treat the foreigners really well. We heard some discussion from the staff that wasn't very friendly to a table of Asian visitors. They are absolutely not flexible, when you ask to modify your menu. The food is rather expensive (it's in all Gruy√®res restaurants expensive, so a tip is to eat in Pringy in the Restaurant de la Fromagerie, which is 10-20% less expensive and features a fast services). We had to wait for a long time, even the restaurant had only 7 tables filled.
It was not our best experince there and I would not recommend this restaurant anymore.

title: Sympathique
content:
Nous avions choisi ce restaurant un peu par hasard. Nous avons √©t√© agr√©ablement surpris. Le service √©tait sympathique. Le restaurant √©tait plein et nous avons d√ª attendre un peu avant que les plats arrivent, mais nous √©tions une grande table avec des plats diff√©rents.
Un petit b√©mol sur la cuisson de la viande, mieux vaut le demander bleu, si on le veut saignant.
Petit plus : nous avons √©videmment pris des meringues avec de la cr√®me de Gruy√®re et nous en avons eu une belle ration.

title: De qui se moque-t-on ?
content: Depuis des ann√©es, √† chaque visite √† Gruy√®re je me rends dans ce restaurant car le service √©tait impeccable et la nourriture de qualit√©. Mais qu'elle surprise j'ai eu en m'y rendant derni√®rement... Nous nous sommes faite "gronder" par la serveuse car nous avons coll√© 2 tables, nous √©tions trop nombreux pour tenir sur une table. Les enfants n'ont pas pu choisir leur glace comme le pr√©sente la carte. Le caf√© glac√© √©tait en faite 2 boules de glace caf√© avec un mini filet de sauce chocolat et un petit godet de cr√®me de gruy√®re tr√®s liquide (on aurait dit qu'elle √©tait m√©lang√©e avec de la cr√®me √† caf√©). content: We had macaroni de chalet and fondue for 1. We were 4 people but were stuffed with food portioned for 2 people. Everything ordered also came with a small portion of salad. title: Love it. Will definitely come back for more.
content:
Love this place would come back for more!
We loved the food and ambience of this place.
We had salad, plate of ham fondue and house white wine. I would of come back to try some other items on the menu since it was not enough room in my tummy at that particular moment. And we wanted to try some items from desert menu. If you like cheese you can not go wrong with any item on the menu.

title: Tr√®s bon, ambiance "√† la ferme" tr√®s appr√©ciable
content:
De notre point de vue c'est le plus beau restaurant de la ville de Gruy√®res, il vaut bien le d√©tour tant pour l'ambiance comme gustativement.

Ce restaurant est presque victime de son succ√®s, alors pr√©f√©rez r√©server √† l'avance pour avoir votre table garantie. Demandez votre table "en haut", c'est √† dire dans la belle partie chalet traditionnel en bois o√π vous serez plong√© dans une ambiance "√† la ferme traditionnelle" tr√®s belle sans pourtant √™tre surcharg√©e.
Question cuisine il va de soi qu'une fondue ou une raclette puis des meringues √† la double cr√®me sont les plats √† ne pas manquer, mais tout le reste est excellent aussi !
Enfin, le service tr√®s aimable et impliqu√© est plus qu'appr√©ciable, sachant garder sourire et calme malgr√© le flux tendu et soutenu de clients et de commandes.
Les prix qui ne cessent d'augmenter montrent bien que la demande est plus forte que l'offre, ils ont un tr√®s grand succ√®s !

title: Perfect for a raclette
content:
Gruyeres is a lovely place to visit, with a fantastic view at the top. the village is car free so you will have to park the car down hill, cost is 10CHF for 5 hours.
We sat on the terrace for lunch. the staff was very welcoming and friendly. The food was excellent, I went for the raclette, but i also recommend the quiche very tasty too. Try some cheese ball for aperitif nice way to start with.

content: Siamo stati per cena in questo splendido chalet che domina sulla via principale di Gruyere. Abbiamo preso sia la fondue che la racchette. Ottime entrambi. Personale gentile ed accogliente. Lo consiglio vivamente per chi si trova in zona. Prezzi nella norma.

title: Une excellente fondue
content:
Restaurant recommand√© par des amis: nous avons pris 2 fondues avec une petite assiette de b≈ìuf sech√©, cela suffit comme portion.
Le tout accompagn√© de cornichons et oignons a gogo.

Les desserts sont tr√®s copieux coupe glac√©e, nous n'avons pas pu finir. Apres la serveuse nous a dit qu'il y avait possibilit√© de demander des demi parts.

Le tout pour 120 francs suisses .

title: Repas d√©couverte avec des amis fran√ßais
content:
Suite √† la visite de la chocolaterie Cailler nous sommes allez manger une fondue. Certe cela fait tr√®s clich√© Suisse.

title: Great fondue

Un chalet typique pour de la nourriture incontournable... √Ä un tarif √©lev√© (suisse surtout)

title: Un restaurant bien touristique !
content:
Restaurant pr√©sent sur la place du village de gruy√®re. Vous pouvez soit manger √† l'int√©rieur soit en terrasse un peu plus loin du restaurant.
L'int√©rieur pr√©sente un style chalet montagnard et les serveurs en costumes d'√©poque plut√¥t sympa mais voil√† cette d√©co ce paye..
Nous avons pris les bruy√®res en entr√©e que nous avons pas trouv√© top au tarif de 9 euros la poign√©e.
Puis nous avons pris une cro√ªte au fromage et des p√¢tes au fromage.
La cro√ªte √©tait pas trop mauvaise en revanche les p√¢tes n'√©taient pas exceptionnelles...
C√¥t√© desserts ceux ci sont un peu chers mais plut√¥t bons nous avions opt√© pour une coupe glac√©e √† la framboise avec la douvle cr√®me meringu√©e qui √©tait plut√¥t bonne. Les autres clients avaient l'air d'√™tre satisfait des desserts √©galement, les assiettes √©taient vides.
Ils proposent √©galement sur leur carte, des fondues, raclettes, p√¢tes, cro√ªtes au fromage..
L'addition est un peu sal√© 80 euros pour deux... Bref un restaurant plut√¥t pas mauvais mais disons pour les touristes. Un pourquoi pas....

title: Une immersion dans les sp√©cialit√©s locales

title: Tr√®s joli mais plus cher que les autres
content: Nous √©tions dans la salle en bas qui est beaucoup moins typique que celle du haut. Le service √©tait correct, la tenue est sympathique mais manquait un peu de chaleur dans le service. Les produits sont d√©licieux mais un peu cher.

title: Fonduta ottima

title: cadre agr√©able

title: Sehr feines Fondue
content:
Wir wollten zuerst beim Chalet selber essen. Aufgrund der starken Sonneneinstrahlung entschieden wir uns dann aber f√ºr die Terrasse vis √† vis mit etwas mehr Schatten.

Das Fondue ist sehr zu empfehlen, kostet jedoch pro Person fast CHF 30. dazu gibt es Kartoffeln, Brot, Essiggurken und Silberzwiebeln.
Zusammen mit 2 dl Wein und 1 Liter Mineral bezahlten wir total CHF 80.

Das Fondue ist wirklich sehr gut. Die Bedienung (eine j√ºngere Dame) war sehr freundlich, √ºberaus aufmerksam und hat sogar sehr gut deutsch gesprochen. Die etwas √§ltere Dame war daf√ºr aber dann nicht ganz so freundlich (etwas ungeduldig und gestresst).

Alles in allem aber ein super Abend mit einem feinen Fondue.

title: Great Swiss Food in Historic Location
content: Had lunch here after a long hike to Gruy√®res. We sat on the terrace. Service was a little slow but very friendly and charming. And the food was delicious. I had the home made quiche and the custard tart. Wonderful savoury and sweet pastry. Also some interesting local beers (pictured). Well worth a visit.

title: VACACIONES ESTIVALES
content:
Fuimos a cenar a este restaurante recomendados por el personal de la recepci√≥n del hotel y por ello nos efectuaron un 10% de descuento.
La cena consisti√≥ en un surtido de quesos (gruyere, cabra i otros) y carne a la plancha que nos la hicimos nosotros mismos acompanyada de salsa de mostaza y salsa tartara.De bebida dos cervezas y terminamos con dos caf√©s
Estuvimos en una terraza y a pesar que las mesas estaban un poco juntas existia cierto grado de intimidad.
El precio total de 65 euros y el servicio muy atento y √°gil
Totalmente recomendable

title: Des bon produits dans un super cadre !

title: Authentique et excellent
content: Le lieu mythique de Gruy√®res incontournable depuis au moins 50 ans, et toujours de qualit√© √©gale ! On y vient pour le lieu magique, pour le service traditionnel, pour la cuisine r√©gionale : cro√ªte au fromage, fondue au gruy√®re, ou raclette. Impossible de manquer les √©normes framboises √† la cr√®me double ou l‚Äôauthentique vermicelle (vermicelle de cr√®me de marrons, kirsch, meringues et glace vanille). A vivre une fois dans sa vie pour tout gourmand gourmet.

title: Une bonne table r√©gionale traditionnelle
content:
Bien situ√© sur le haut du village au pied du ch√¢teau, le Chalet de Gruy√®res propose des plats typiques a bas de fromages, de Gruy√®res entre autres, notamment une tr√®s bonne et copieuse fondue, suivie d'un dessert de framboises √† la double cr√®me, un vrai r√©gal.
Service bien suivi alors que le restaurant √©tait complet.
La terrasse est tr√®s agr√©able lorsque le temps le permet.

title: Numero uno de TripAdvisor con raz√≥n.
content:
Buen servicio y mucha atenci√≥n al detalle. La comida precio calidad excelente.

Para repartir.

title: Un incontournable pour d√©couvrir les sp√©cialit√©s de la r√©gion
content:
Cadre magnifique typique chalet. Accueil souriant et tr√®s attentionn√©. Service rapide.
La carte est claire, le choix est r√©duit mais largement suffisant, que des choses qui font saliver. Nous avons pris une fondue qui √©tait excellente et tr√®s copieuse m√™me pour nos 3 ados ! En dessert la double cr√®me est un incontournable. Les framboises sont excellentes et les glaces dignes d'un super glacier. Bref, mis √† part le pris √† la hauteur du plaisir gustatif, c'est une exp√©rience culinaire qui laissera des traces dans nos m√©moires. En plus la digestion a √©t√© comme une lettre √† la Poste (enfin avant quand elle fonctionnait :-).
Je recommande fortement et j'ai h√¢te d'y retourner.

title: Sitio para recomendar en Gruy√®re
content: Entre pensando que era un sitio sin m√°s por su carta pero sin duda a sido una gran sorpresa. Todo riqu√≠simo, sin duda lo recomendar√© !

title: Buen√≠simo pero casi reviento :-)
content:
Todo muy bueno, pero alguien tendria que avisar de que las raciones son grandes. Ojo, pide menos y si te falta ya pedir√°s porque son realmente grandes. Muy bueno cada plato, pero grandes. MEJOR PEDIR PARA COMPARTIR.
Que aproveche!!!

title: La Raclettes del Cielo !
content:
Aunque las Raclettes se ‚Äúhacen‚Äù con un queso propio del cant√≥n Suizo de ‚ÄúValais, las Raclettes que preparan en Le-Chalet de Grouy√©res en el ‚Äú
cant√≥n de Friburg‚Äù, no tienen nada que envidiar a cualquiera de las de aquel cant√≥n, en fin, son cantones vecinos y las vacas, sus campanas y el pasto son los mismos.
Es el caso que llegamos al H√¥tel de Gruy√©res, en el pueblo del mismo nombre y nos asignaron una bella habitaci√≥n con vista a las espectaculares monta√±as y valles, algo fuera de serie.
Preguntamos en el H√¥tel, donde almorzar y la respuesta obvia, fue: en Le-Chalet de Grouy√©res‚Äù, caminamos unos 500 metros y llegamos. Luego de mirar la carta y para 3 personas, pedimos para comenzar: una Asiette de Crudit√©s (plato de vegetales), un Jambon √† l'os de Campagne‚Äù (plato de jamones del cant√≥n) y luego el obligado plato de una raci√≥n de Raclette para 2 personas. Estupendos los 3 platos, aunque algo exagerada la raci√≥n de Raclette (casi 1/2 kg. de queso para 2 personas). Rematamos, por golosos, con un ‚ÄùMeringue Avec cr√®me Double de la Gruy√©re‚Äù (merengue con doble crema)‚Ä¶ auque luego, tuvimos que caminar un rato largo.
Recomendamos, para el amuerzo este Restaurante, algo r√∫stico, pero muy bueno y agradable.

title: Bestes Fondue und Raclette
content: Wir waren 8 Personen und alle haben das Lokal gl√ºcklich und zufrieden verlassen. Ja, es ist touristisch... Aber das Essen war von guter Qualit√§t und der Service top. Wir sind uns einig: Wir kommen wieder.

title: Un incontournable
content:
Nous √©tions 2 adultes, 3 enfants 11,13ans et un b√©b√© de 21mois.
Accueil sympathique dans des tenues d'√©poque avec un service rapide mais qui nous laisse le temps d'appr√©cier. Chaise b√©b√© √† disposition.
La fondue est tr√®s bonne m√™me en ao√ªt.

A vous d'y aller...

title: Buena comida pero no repetiremos

DECEPCIONANTE

title: Buena relaci√≥n calidad-precio
content: Trato amable por parte del servicio. Bastante bien de precio para ser Suiza. Comimos una fondue para dos, con cervezas, postre y caf√©. Pagamos 64 ‚Ç¨

title: Revenez-y!!!!
content:
Trop bon, trop beau, nous y sommes venus 2 jours de suite tellement ce lieu est id√©al !!!
La vue depuis la salle √† l'√©tage est superbe, les personnes sont exceptionnelles, gentilles, souriantes, de bon conseil, bref c'est vraiment un lieu incontournable √† Gruy√®res.
En plus de la visite, qui elle aussi est typique. Christine, Didier et Tony.

title: Bonne adresse
content:
Des plats typiques

content: Siamo stati per pranzo in questo ristorante nel centro di gruyere per mangiare una buona fonduta di vacherin mont d'or. Locale accogliente. Prezzi nella media Svizzera.

title: Un incontournable !
content: Vous ne connaissez pas la vraie fondue moite/moite et la cr√®me double, sp√©cialit√©s toute gruyerenne? Alors c‚Äôest ici qu‚Äôil faut s‚Äôarr√™ter. Essayez en dessert les fruits rouges avec la cr√®me double : un d√©lice !

title: Very cosy and amazing food
content: This place was very cosy and the the food was amazing. We had the fondue and an exquisite quiche! The prices are quite high, but it is a must experience

title: Very good local food and excellent service
content:
If you are craving for Fondue or Raclette this is then the place to go in the best environment of the old city of Gruyeres , you will not be deceived and will be able to taste authentic local food.
Stay in Gruyeres for 4 days and had 3 times dinner at Le chalet.
Highly recommended

title: Fondue or Raclette at Gruyere
content: At Gruyere you can find a real Raclette or Fondue for cheese lovers. Typical Switzerland village, with its own castle, and although it is quite touristic the food is beyond expectations. High / Medium price, but within normal parameters for the country. Excellent service on a very nice location, including a terrace for summer or lovely inside for winter

title: Mal atendimento
content: Demorado e p√©ssimo atendimento. Esquecem os pedidos. Ambiente legal e boa comida para quem n√£o est√° com pressa.

content: We were part of a tour, we had a set menu. The fun was we cooked the food ourselves. Our first course was raclette cheese cooked under a heat lamp, and fondue both were delicious. It's fantastic , washed down with a local wine and you must follow it with meringue with double cream, trust me you will love it. The service this time was once again excellent as well and we had a discount as we were staying at Hotel de Gruyere down the road.

title: Best Meal Experience we had in Switzerland
content: We loved our fondue experience in this charming Chalet. What a cozy and delicious place. This was our favorite meal of our entire trip. We loved Gruyere and this just topped off our visit. We got to sit upstairs and the servers were very patient with us as we had no idea how to order. We ended up with the Gruyere fondue and it as not at all what we were expecting - it was much, much better. The melted cheese was served with boiled potatoes, gerkins, tiny pearl onions and bread. We paired it with a white wine from the region and it all went together perfectly. I really hope we get to go back someday. We are not foodies by any stretch, but all of us enjoyed this one!

I was there solo and believe it was about 30 dollars for myself (it was a ton of food too). A menu complete with fondue and raclette options.. loved this place. Even the chalet building..love that too. Yeah its in a somewhat touristy town as I've seen others post..but I'm sure they knew that before arriving. Tutto completamente in legno, ben lavorato, con le ragazze in costume locale. Abbiamo preso tutti una cosa diversa per assaggiare e abbiamo trovato tutto di nostro gradimento. Non sono mancati gentilezza e disponibilit√† di chi serviva al tavolo.

title: Good place considering the touristy location
content:
A rather good place located in the heart of Gruyeres - a very touristy village.
Place is nicely decorated, although somewhat cramped.
Service is good, although a little slow, but it's alrighy.
Fondue is OK (not very good/excellent, in case you are a connoisseur).
Prices are OK (although somewhat on the high side, but you're in Switzerland...).
Reservations are a must - many people tried to get a table without a reservation, and failed miserably.

title: Tr√®s bon restaurant

title: Assolutamente da non perdere
content:
Locale tipico nel centro del paese, subito prima dell'ingresso nel castello di Gruyeres.
Fondue eccezionale, non ovviamente economica considerato i prezzi svizzeri, ma assolutamente da non perdere per quel che riguarda l'esperienza.
Il personale √® cordiale, disponibile e simpatico.
Inutile dire che vista la location, lo spazio ridotto ed il continuo afflusso di turisti, la prenotazione √® obbligatoria (anche parecchi giorni in anticipo)

title: Great food, atmosphere and super-professional staff!
content: If your are travelling around the Fribourg area, do not miss this very traditional Swiss 'Chalet'. Food speciality is mainly Fondue (melted cheese) served in the typical heated pan where all guests dip potatoes and bread - or sliced meat or ham, if not vegetarians. The d√©cor is all what you can expect from Switzerland: wood, soft light, warm atmoshpere. A special note: the staff is amazing!! They can manage perfectly so many things at the same time (all women, of course :-): attending customers with great care (and not all customers are nice...), organizing the orders, preparing the food. Girrls, you are one of the most professional staff I have ever met!! Only a little negative note: prices are not cheap at all (even for Swiss standards) and be careful if you pay in foreign currency (for example euros) as they count 1 Swiss franc=1Euro (which is of course not the correct change). I know this is a rather common practice in Switzerland, but with such a great place, with such an amazing food and staff, do you really have to do that? And this is the only reason why I did not put FIVE points, but only FOUR.

title: HANDS UP!

title: Expensive and rude waitress

We went there as tourists (like all the rest of the people there) and were treated quite badly by the waitress when we said we had a discount (that we announced already when we booked the table). The food was good. We had some charcuterie (ham, viande s√©ch√©e) that was tasty. Then the fondue was o.k. I was kind of expecting something exceptional as being in the hometown of fondue. Or at least they could offer a broad choice of special kinds of fondue... Moreover, they're really overprincing things, simply because it's not for locals. It's a classical tourist trap!
I understand that these guys don't have to make any special effort as they have tourists flowing in their place. But if you happen to be in Gruy√®re and in search of a restaurant, I would recommend you to pick another one of the many available!

title: C'est √† faire

title: The Best in Gruyere!

I‚Äôve visited Le chalet for the first time 23 years ago and came back this last week with my family to have a memorable lunch. It was Thursday midday and fortunately we had a reservation as at 2:30 PM the restaurant will still busy!

We had a marvelous foundie moitie-motie and an amazing Raclette. My children even tried their macaroni fondue. To make the full experience, we had to end our lunch with the famous ‚ÄúFramboise a la double creme de Gruyere‚Äù, truly delicious raspberries topped with the most amazing thick wipped cream.

We had a wonderful Fendant white wine (5dl). We were graciously served by a wonderful Peruvian lady Aydee and greeted by the manager F.V.

It is not cheap, but it‚Äôs worth the money!!! Always make a reservation as we wanted to return on Saturday (walk in) and had to choose another place.

content:
Of course this is a tourist trap! A traditional Swiss chalet in the tiny, picturesque Gruyeres and right in front of the castle, but give it a try. You won't be disappointed by the wooden interior and strong smell of molten cheese!

Just be ready to grab your wallet. Prices are a bit high. We have had a fondue for 2 people and 2 glasses of wine and paid 80 Swiss francs (corresponding to 72 euros).

The service is ok.

Even in a crowdy place, service remains friendly, professional and fast. You will be getting hot inside from the dishes and warm outside from the ambiance. title: Cena tra colleghi

title: D√©paysant

content: Excelente lugar. Muy bien atendidos. Amables. Se puede saborear la rica comida de la zona y, por supuesto, un buen pedazo del famoso queso Gruy√®res

title: Hearty Food
content: Very hearty food. We came here because we were still jet lagged and were hungry after everything else in the town closed. This restaurant was kind enough to serve us even though it looked like they were pretty much done with closing duties. Everything on the menu seemed heavy, so I thought I would get an order of the Mac and Cheese. It had bits of ham and potatoes- this made it a very hearty and filling dish. I feel like I got full after about five or six bites because it was very heavy. Definitely a great place and the decor is exactly as I would imagine a Swiss Chalet to look.

title: Sur un coup de t√™te

Bref, nous avons tr√®s bien mang√©. Belle carte des vins. Le prix est un peu surfait. Mais le service est bien l'endroit aussi.

Joli cadre avec une minuscule terrasse, dans un style traditionnel typique, surplombant la rue principale (il y a une autre terrasse plus grande de l'autre c√¥t√© de la rue, mais moins typique), nous sommes venus prendre LA sp√©cialit√© (sucr√©e) de Gruy√®res, des meringues et framboises √† la double-cr√®me.
Les prix sont assez √©lev√©s, mais nous n'avons vraiment pas √©t√© d√©√ßus, les framboises √©taient excellentes, et les portions gargantuesques. La double-cr√®me est servie dans un grand pot en bois.
Bien loin de certains autres pi√®ges √† touristes de Gruy√®re o√π la double-cr√®me est servie dans un pot qui parait grand au premier abord, mais o√π on a la mauvaise surprise de trouver un double-fond apr√®s quelques cuiller√©es, et d'o√π l'on ressort avec la d√©sagr√©able impression de s'√™tre fait avoir.

title: Beautiful and Delicious
content: Food and service was amazing. Nothing could be nicer that having a Swiss fondue in this beautiful location. We would go again and again. A must try!

title: Excellent Fondue
content: The service, the view and the food was excellent. Although the fondue was served with potatoes we asked to have bread instead which was done with no problem. The attention and the quality of the food is top.

title: Got screwed with fondue
content: Touristy spot which means watch out as you will get screwed. We had the fondue for lunch - 2 adults and 2 kids; we were charged CHF120 or CHF30 each! The kids had like 3 bites; they had separate plate of meats, cheese and bread for their meal. Lunch was nearly CHF200!!! The waitress should have known better or even suggested pay for 3 since the kids were clearly not going to eat full meals. Don't get me wrong it is the best place to have cheese fondue but we were royally screwed by the waitress/restaurant.

I love cheese anyway but the whole fondue experience is well worth the trip. The service is fantastic, we sampled local wine and enjoyed an excellent meal right next to the castle.

title: Bad service

The staff were kind to accommodate us but not very prompt on service as they had too many tables to service the shortage of staff was the main reason for the bad service as they couldn't attend to our needs. The fondue was cold and thick and the burner kept going off. We left unstaisfied and didn't get the real fondue experience we expected. Wouldn't visit or recommend it.

title: Was not my favorite fondu
content:
When we arrived, it was kinda after the heavy rush of lunch service so there was an open table, a lovely waitress and room for my pup. We decided to split a fondu because, well, we're in Gruyere! Now they do not propose the moitie-moitie which is my favorite kind of fondu, but I was just thinking the cheese can't get any better than from here right?
Well to be honest it was ok, but quite bland. Nothing to shout about. Quite disappointed. When you only have 1 choice, it should be awesome. All n all the place is very kitche, but they go all out so it's "so bad it's good" as decor, and although I found the place a bit stuffy, when a window was opened it was shut by another couple a few tables away, so that could be me.... I probably wouldn't go back just to try other local restaurants to see who is best, but if you was a bit of atmosphere (knowing it is kinda a tourist trap) but not a horrible experience. Why not!

title: So Swiss in all the right ways!
content: The ambience here is fantastic! The restaurant was full when we were there...full of happy people eating a good food. We had the raclette, and it was delicious. We also had a meat tray and wine. Not only was the food very good, but we also had excellent service - no hovering, but staff was definitely aware of when a guest needed something. Although the price may have been higher than in other restaurants, the restaurant itself was far more authentic than many other places.

title: Fresh meal in cute setting
content: It's good Swiss mountain food served as they should be - freshest ingredients, great cheese and cream, meringue that's crispy on the outside and gooey on the inside. Service is perfunctory but not unsatisfactory. Recommended for the Gruyere experience.

content: It is a cozy little place with great service. The food is not amazing but it is a part of the culture here and it tastes good. It is worth your time. Make sure you make a reservation as it tends to be busy for lunch.

title: no good no bad.
content:
First at all, you leave the car in the parking of outside of Gruyeres and have to walk a large slope, this is for remind you arrive with at less 20 minutes prior your reservation. When you arrive with the tongue outside. You enter in a typicall well decorated house, with two floors.
The waiters was oversatured of work, it was Easter and it was full of spanish and italian people. But we have to wait more than 20 minutes for taking note of our order. The small salad is just lettuce and son carrot, nothing special. The Gruyere fondue is ok, smelly and tasty. The desserts are good but just a bit expensive. Reco: try to go in not holiday.

content: Very traditional restaurant with selections of good food based on cheese. You might have to reconsider if you doesn't like cheese

La raclette m√°s ins√≠pida. Creo que merecen una oportunidad otros sitios. No se merece el puesto que tiene. No volver√≠amos y no lo recomendar√≠amos.

title: Beautiful restaurant in the heart of Gruyere
content:
This is your typical Swiss chalet experience. The restaurant is beautifully decorated Swiss style. It is all about the ambience here. This is a great place to go if you are bringing guests from abroad.

The restaurant serves the typical fare of fondue and raclette. The quality is good but expect to pay a bit more than usual because of the ambience and location.

The staffs are friendly and efficient as you would expect of the Swiss.

Der untere Teil ist nicht so urchig und gem√ºtlich. Dazu haben die Angestellten beim Tisch nebenan ihre Tupperware ausgepackt und gegessen, laut gelacht, gesprochen und diskutiert. Das war sehr ungem√ºtlich, man f√ºhlte sich wie in einer Abstellkammer. Das Fondue war eher f√ºr wenig hungrige, da es eher wenig gab. K√§sekuchen und Dessert war in Ordnung. Wir waren eher fr√ºh am Abend, und ich w√ºrde nur noch den oberen Teil des Chalets empfehlen.

Tr√®s d√©√ßue!

100chf tout rond pour 1 plat/personne et 1 verre de vin blanc pr mon mari, pas d'ap√©ro, pas de dessert.

title: Excelente!!!!

title: Best fondue ever ! Just go !!

title: What an evening!
content: After a lengthy hike TO the village of Gruyeres and a brief stop at the Giger Bar (reviewed separately), we settled in for a very cozy meal at Le Chalet. A starter of dried meat with pickles and pickled onions, the fondue was served. The fondue was served with bread and potato and was a remarkable burst of flavour. I was with a group of swiss people who encouraged me to dip my bread into a small glass of schnapps before the fondue. I followed directions dutifully but with some suspicion that it was a bit of a practical joke. To my surprise, the pre-cheese schnapps added another dimension of flavour to the experience. Our dessert was a mix of raspberries and meringue with double cream which was as decadent as it sounds but well earned after our hike.

Ali√°s, at√© o cafezinho veio com esse creme (vide foto) dentro de um copinho de chocolate. Aqui √© pra engordar mesmo!!!

title: Ambientazione ottima ma fonduta da evitare
content: Il posto √® molto tipico al centro del villaggio della Gruy√®re, tuttavia la fonduta √® molto turistica, ci sono molti posti migliori in zona in cui mangiare una fonduta ottima!

title: Pause gourmande typique

title: Espectacular
content: Hemos estado en fam√≠lia celebramos el cumple de mi hijo mayor tomando una deliciosa fondue. Madre mia, que sitio, espectacular, el pueblo, las vistas, el pa√≠s todooooooo me encanta Suiza, me chifla Gruy√®res y me enamora Les Chalet, un servicio inmejorable, unas chicas muy amables, atentas, sonrientes y muy buenas en su oficio, y la fondue....que fondue!!!! Os recomiendo que la proveis, yo s√© que volver√©, no s√© cuando, pero como dijo Terminator: "Volver√©".

title: Bonne fondue √† Gruy√®re
content: Repas en famille, fondue,raclette avec viande s√©ch√©e. Cadre typique et service professionnel. Bonne fondue onctueuse.viande s√©ch√©e tr√®s bonne mais un peu ch√®re.tres bonne soir√©e .

title: La mejor fondue!
content: Pedimos una raclette y una fondue para 3 y todo fue espectacular, tanto el servicio como la cantidad y el lugar taaaaan acogedor en un d√≠a lluvioso como el que tuvimos. Recomendable 100%

title: Decepcionante
content: El 4 de agosto de 2017 hemos estado cenando en Le Chalet de Gruyeres. √çbamos dispuestos a comernos una foundie ya que los comentarios que siempre hab√≠amos le√≠do eran incre√≠bles. Supuestamente reservamos mesa aquella misma tarde, digo supuestamente porque luego otra de las camareras desconoc√≠a completamente de dicha reserva. Ah√≠ empezamos mal la noche. Debido a que el restaurante estaba pr√°cticamente vac√≠o, nos dieron mesa. Pedimos una foundie para dos, porque hab√≠amos le√≠do que con una era suficiente. La camarera nos mir√≥ con mala cara y haciendo un comentario de muy mal gusto. Las cosas se pueden decir de muchas formas. Al final al pedimos dos foundies, una para cada uno, que nos la sirvieron en una sola. Lo cierto fue que era lo adecuado. Este lugar es famoso por sus foundies. Como amantes de los quesos que somos y nos encanta la foundie, cabe decir que la he probado mejor. Estaba buena, pero como en un restaurante de Par√≠s llamado "Pan, vine y fromatge"... ninguna. Aquella si que estaba de infarto. Otra cosa a destacar es que una botella de vino de 75ml cuesta unos 60chf, el m√°s sencillito y si no quieres una botella, te sirven y cobran el vino por minivasos de decilitro... a nuestro parecer una verg√ºenza. Jam√°s lo hab√≠amos visto. Nuestra experiencia no fue buena. Foundie normal, vino p√©simo y caro y una camarera de lo m√°s borde. Desde luego no volveremos.

title: Tr√®s bon
content: Joli d√©cor, serveuse en tenue traditionnelle, pas de doute nous sommes en Suisse. Fondue tr√®s bonne suivie de glaces copieuses et d√©licieuses avec cr√®me... c s√ªr, un poil cher mais nous avons pass√© un tr√®s bon moment.

title: Pi√®ge √† touristes
content:
Pi√®ge √† touristes √† √©viter!
26.- pour une cro√ªte au fromage sans aucun go√ªt avec 1 tranche de jambon et un fromage insipide c'est un peu fort!
Point positif qui compense: l'accueil tr√®s agr√©able des serveuses qui sont tr√®s souriantes.
De plus, publicit√© fausse: n'est plus le 1er restaurant sur TripAdvisor mais le 2√®me. Il serait bien de corriger la devanture du restaurant et modifier vos remarques sur les tickets de caisse.

title: Un cumplea√±os entre fondues
content:
Nunca olbidar√© este cumplea√±os, el pueblo de Gruyeres es tan.... perfecto: las casas de piedra y madera al estilo n√≥rdico, la calle ENORME y con un estilo muy medieval, las vistas que son espectaculares, un castillo hermoso... pero como no voy a hablar de Le Chalet de Gruyeres!

Es una casa de madera oscura que desde fuera ya da un aspecto calido (y de categor√≠a). Primero entramos a preguntar si pod√≠amos comer con perros (tengo dos, mejor preguntar ). La respuesta fue un "Por supuesto", entonces reservamos mesa para la 13....

Ya sentados en la mesa, vino la camarera, con un vestido cl√°sico suizo y una sonrisa en la cara, el servicio que nos prest√≥ durante la comida fue excelente: intentaba hablar en espa√±ol, si faltaba algo nos preguntaba....

FONDUE PARA TRES, PORFAVOR.
Esto fue lo que pedimos, cuando lleg√≥ a la mesa se nos ca√≠a la baba:
Unos olores que nos llegaban y todo puesto en un recipiente de fondue decorado y muy bonito, con su pan y sus patatas....
¬øEl sabor? Creo que la RAE no ha inventado las palabras necesarias para expresar eso... Era una fondue que hac√≠a que el cuerpo te pidiera m√°s tras cada bocado. Con el sabor tan √∫nico del buen Gruyere.... Mejor que pare que si no dar√© media vuelta con el coche solo para volver...

Mi hermano no quiso comer fondue (√©l se lo pierde :P) y se pidi√≥ unos macarrones, que le llegaron dentro de otra cacerola estilo fondue i con un buen pu√±ado de Gruyere rallado al lado. Estaban muy buenos!!! Los prob√© y ten√≠an un sabor tan diferente (pero tan bueno).

Eso si, si pides algo que sea fondue, que para eso se va a comer aqu√≠. Cuando acabamos de comer nos enteramos de una cosa: el Wall Street Journal y Tripadvisor la han condecorado como la mejor fondue, Y DOY FE! Se lo merece, porque ese queso tan especial, entre esas paredes y con gente tan amable, SE MERECE UN 10!!!

Menudo cumplea√±os que me he montado

title: N√£o tem como errar
content: Localizado na principal via da cidade, n√£o tem como errar. Sempre bastante frequentado. Comidas t√≠picas, atendimento su√≠√ßo pre√ßo razo√°vel. √â o melhor.

title: Very Nice
content: Very nice Restaurant and very good Food. The Service is very frendly and the Swiss Chess Fondue is delicious.

content:
Gruy√®res ist ein Touristenort, und an solchen Orten gibt's eben Touristenfallen. Es scheint mir, dass ich mit dem Chalet in genau so eine getappt bin.

Zum Abendessen gab's eine Art K√§sepasta, die wir f√ºr zwei Personen orderten. Der Umfang war mehr als Bescheiden und der Preis grenzte ans absurde. Dreissig Franken f√ºr ein bisschen in Teigwaren geschmolzenem K√§se, das ist selbst f√ºr einen Touristenort wie Gruy√©res absurd. Da kommt man an der Z√ºrcher Bahnhofstrasse g√ºnstiger davon.

title: La meringue !!!!!!
content: Oblig√©e d'avouer que je n'ai franchi le seuil de ce charmant restaurant typique uniquement pour leur meringue cr√®me double ! Un plaisir compl√®tement r√©gressif qui m'a rappel√© mon enfance quand je passais mes √©t√©s non loin de l√†. Et tout y √©tait : le service adorable,un cadre chaleureux sans faire clich√© et cette meringue.... √† tomber !

title: The best year after year
content: We came here last here and had to come back again while we are in Switzerland and the Gruy√®res region. A must to visit. Price is very good for Switzerland standards, food is amazing, the house cheese fondu recipe is to die for, one of the best we have ever had. The meringue is out of this world. Overall wow, you will not be disappointed. Will come back again when in gruy√®re.

title: Avec vue sur la place
content: Situation dominante por d√©guster une vraie bonne fondue moiti√©-moiti√©! La viande s√©ch√©e, onctueuse! Un service impeccable et attentionn√© malgr√© la pression de la foule. Un endroit charmant qui n'a pas perdu son authenticit√© dans un des endroits les plus visit√©s de Suisse.

content:
Nos acercamos a Gruyeres porque nos quedaba muy cerca de la visita que hicimos a la f√°brica de chocolate Maison Cailler. Y qu√© mejor despu√©s de esa dulce visita que una fondue.

El local es como una casa t√≠pica alpina de madera, con una decoraci√≥n muy bonita de cencerros, flores y objetos artesanales.

Ah√≠ queda el consejo. S√≠ la acompa√±amos de una copa de vino blanco fresquito de la zona.

El queso estaba buen√≠simo, y las patatas, peque√±itas y redonditas, estaban blanditas y jugosas, listas para ser sumergidas en el burbujeante queso fundido.
