title: Grosse d√©ception !
content:
Cela fait 25 ans que nous venons au Chalet, o√π la fondue demeure excellente. Mais cet √©t√© Gruy√®res est envahie de gu√™pes, nous en avions 8 √† notre table et c'√©tait vraiment d√©sagr√©able, cela nous a g√¢ch√© la sortie, nous n'avions qu'une envie, payer et partir.

J'estime qu'un √©tablissement se doit de faire le n√©cessaire pour √©liminer ce probl√®me, d'entente avec la commune pour d√©truire le nid qui devait se trouver √† proximit√©. Il y avait de petits enfants et des personnes √¢g√©es qui peuvent faire une grosse allergie. On ne peut pas juste dire "C'est comme √ßa, on ne peut rien faire".

D'autre part, la r√©novation de la terrasse a fait perdre son caract√®re √† cet √©tablissement.

title: A faire au moins pour la fondue
content:
Malgr√© les prix peut √™tre un peu √©lev√©s cette adresse vaut le d√©tour au moins pour la fondue au gruy√®re qui est d√©licieuse .Compte tenu de ce plat tr√®s copieux , nous n'avons pas pu d√©guster les fameux d√©sserts √† la cr√®me que sont les framboises et les meringues. title: Very friendly service
content: I chose this restaurant for our only night in Gruy√®res based on TripAdvisor reviews, and was very happy with the choice. Had we booked, we might have been able to get a table upstairs, which is nicer than the more down-to-earth downstairs. Nevertheless, it did not matter. The service was very friendly and the food as expected - we had a fondue made with local cheese, and I took it upon me to eat the meringues with double cream afterwards. The craziest of desserts really, just sugar and fat, but delicious if you, like me, are not afraid of the calories. This restaurant is especially good if you want to have fondue or raclette for the first time in your life and are unsure about the procedure - we are no fondue novices, but saw how the waitresses in a very friendly manner explained to two different tables what to do with the fondue and raclette. Raclette is served here in the traditional manner and not already sliced on little pans, I.e. you're in for an authentic experience for a restaurant setting. The town of Gruy√®res is as cute as it gets. The only thing I would do differently? Book ahead.

title: Raclette Heaven!
content: Excellent place to get a traditional raclette. Stick with the raclette or fondue and do without the cold cut plate. Potatoes with cheese should fill you up and go for the dessert! Anything with the double cream goes well.

title: Une fondue extraordinaire
content: Ce chalet est situ√© tout pr√®s du ch√¢teau de gruy√®re .Typiquement suisse √† l'int√©rieur qu'√† l'ext√©rieur. Les produits dont locaux suisse : charcuterie , fromages, vins. Une fondue √† faire saliver

title: √ìtimo
content:
Uma atendente portuguesa trabalha l√°, muito simp√°tica! Pedimos 1 fondue e 1 raclete para comer em 3, foi a quantidade perfeita
Estava tudo delicioso.

title: Lunch
content: We stopped here before our tour for lunch. The food was very good and our server as extremely polite. The price wasn't expensive when compared to other swiss cities. It's surroundings are absolutely charming. I would highly recommend d this place, specially if one is interested in fondue.

title: Yummy raclette
content: The raclette, cold cuts etc all super. Authentic Gruyere experience. Service is friendly but a tad slow. But then the experience is to be savoured at a gentle pace.

title: Recommended but expensive!
content:
Yes, Switzerland is expensive.
I knew that before I traveled there. I don't mind paying a little extra money for good, quality, food.
We came for the fondue. The cheesy fondue was served with bread, pickled onions, small pickles and warm yellow potatoes. The fondue was delicious, but didn't seem like enough for three people. In my mind I was thinking, maybe we should have ordered a second one.
Well, we get the bill and the server( who was an exchange student and very kind) charged us for 3 fondue in one pot that wasn't even a kilo of cheese. In the end, we paid ‚Ç¨90 (not including drinks, just melted cheese) for three people to eat fondue and not even be full. People are supposed to be full after eating fondue. Maybe she misrang the order or maybe that was the actual total (I saw the receipt AFTER we paid), either way, 90‚Ç¨ for three people and for just a little bit of melted cheese is absurd.

title: Para los amantes del queso
content:
El fondue delicioso y abundante, la raclette divertida y tambien muy buena.
Ojo con la cantidad que pidas porque eramos 7 y pedimos 4 raciones de fondue y tres de raclette y nos sobro de los dos. Pero mas vale que sobre a que falte.
El servicio amable pero un poco lento.

title: Very good
content: Very good cheese fondue. Pleasant and efficient service. Prices are not so low but ... would recommend it to cheese fondue fans.. mix half gruyere half vacherin is excellent

title: D√©couverte

J'ai d√©couvert la fondue moiti√®-moiti√® de Gruy√®re et l√† j'avoue, je me suis r√©gal√©e, elle √©tait accompagn√©e de pommes de terre et de viande de grison le tout arros√© d'un petit vin blanc local "Peau de vache". Huuuummmmm ! une tuerie, je n'ai m√™me pas √©t√© malade ou "barbouill√©e" apr√®s... J'ai m√™me termin√© avec une tarte √† la double cr√®me de Gruy√®re, il faut la go√ªter, il n'y a pas de mot pour la d√©crire, tellement que c'est bon ! title: Bon resto !
content:
Personnel sympathique, fondue d√©licieuse,
Desserts fabuleux, cadre fabuleux et prix trop √©lev√© (16.50frs la double cr√®me avec fruits rouges par exemple)

title: Cadre tr√®s sympathique mais beaucoup trop cher !

Contrairement √† certains avis nous avons √©t√© tr√®s bien accueillis
La fondue au fromage √©tait tr√®s bonne mais elle n'a m√™me pas √©t√© accompagn√©e d'un peu de charcuterie.

title: Best fondue in Switzerland

Trust me, I am a local, here you will enjoy best fondue in Switzerland. If you hopefully have the capacity, polish it off with a traditional dessert of merengues with double cream or raspberries.

content:
La canicule nous conduit √† opter pour le repas en terrasse, non encore √©quip√©e √©lectriquement. Pas de raclette possible.
Choix de la fondue. Pour avoir un peu de viande des grisons, il faut doubler le prix.

content: They have an incredibly varied list of desserts! Many have some sort of liquor in them, just in case you are dining with little ones. I opted to have a Coupe Danemark dessert for dinner tonight! Many entrees are quite filling on their own so this plan worked for me tonight! Waitress was so personable. The service seemed a bit slow and "tourist weary" but we were dinning at 2 after the rush from the tour buses had abated, which may explain it. The outdoor dinning setting and food food were excellent however. It IS all about the cheese in Gruyere.

title: Piacevole
content: Ristorante tipico, ottimi i men√π con formaggio ( croute au fromage, fondue), porzione abbondante. Prezzo nella media.

title: Excellente fondue et service impeccable
content: Accueil chaleureux, ambiance typique avec une d√©coration authentique Suisse, personnel sympathique et avenant, fondue d√©licieuse et bien servie.

title: Aconchegante
content: O chal√© uma casa t√≠pica francesa que fica entre o castelo e a rua principal. Pe√ßa o tradicional raclette e o fondue! Vale a pena. Staff bem humorado e tratam bem os turistas. Vale o almoco ou a janta!

title: Great food but expensive
content: It has a nice setting - inside the chalet or you can also sit outside in the open air. The food is good as we had ordered fondue and raclette.

title: Perfect spot in a picture perfect village
content: The Chalet is in almost every photograph of Gruyeres, so I don't need to tell you how to find it. It's the only restaurant open late (till 11 in summer) in Gruyeres on the weekend, so it's inevitably busy at night. Great fondue. Really solid service. My favorite: the balcony tables overlooking the entire village. Perfect!

content: Excellent fondue, made with wine and cheese and served with silverskin onions, gherkins, crusty bread and delicious baby potatoes. Staff are well organised and able to cope with groups and individuals.

title: une institution
content: voil√† quarante ans que je connais et viens manger une fondue au Chalet. Le restaurant Le Chalet de Gruy√®res est une institution pour les sp√©cialit√©s locales comme la fondue, la raclette, la double cr√®me et bien entendu le charme et l'ambiance des lieux. Il est vrai que d'habitude en √©t√© la fondue se mange sur la terrasse (pas de bol cette ann√©e elle est en r√©novation, vivement la prochaine fois). Conclusion le village de la Gruy√®res se conjugue avec Le Chalet de Gruy√®res.

content:
Visita al grazioso paesino La Gruy√®res. Abbiamo pranzato all'aperto nella terrazza/giardino. Tipiche le specialit√† locali: fondue moiti√©-moiti√© con pane e patate, carne secca. Pranzo delizioso, servizio cordiale.
Una visita √® consigliata!

title: Ausgezeichnet
content:
Hier gab es das beste Fondue das wir je gegessen haben.
Sch√∂n rustikal eingerichtetes Lokal. Ohne Reservation noch einen Tisch erhalten.

title: Cheese Fondue
content: After enjoying the walk through the town, this is where we had our cheese fondue of course accompanied by local wine! Deserts are a healthy portion but read the menu carefully so you don't order the ice cream desert with quite a bit of delicious liquor!

title: Delicioso foundue
content:
Restaurante charmoso situado na parte alta da cidade, perto do castelo.

√â bem cheio, vi que algumas pessoas chegavam com reservas.

title: Usine √† touristes
content: En un mot, d√©√ßus. Cadre typique, fondue satisfaisante mais service peu agr√©able et prix exorbitants.

title: Cheese lovers delight
content: We went with two friends and had the raclette which was excellent. The gorgeous melted cheese, fresh bread, new potatoes, onions & gherkins with the extra salad we ordered made this a perfect lunch all set in a lovely Swiss chalet in one of the prettiest villages ever.

title: Cheese fondue!!
content: One of the best restaurants in Gruyeres....amidst panoramic views the food is a delight....the vegetable soup is highly recommended and for cheese lovers, you must try the fondue üëçüëçüëç

title: Absolutely amazing!
content:
We do recommend this place! It's romantic, cosy but also family friendly and have a delicious and authentic cheese fondue served by Swiss ladies.
The roasted small potatoes were very tender and pickles went well with the fondue cheese. Please save room for their legendary desserts! Of particular note is the unforgettable ice cream cup with Double Cream!

title: Comida regional a excelente precio

title: Muy buena elecci√≥n
content:
Trato personal muy bueno y comida excelente , fondue y raclette , una para cada 3 personas.El vino es de lo que menos me gust√≥ pero tambi√©n es verdad que en Espa√±a tenemos un nivel alto.
Precio por persona unos 45 francos ( sin postre pero porque est√°bamos todos llenos).Totalmente recomendable

title: excellente fondue
content:
Un repas a gruyere avec une bonne fondue suisse onctueuse au menu. l addition est plut√¥t √©lev√© mais on est en suisse et le go√ªt est au rendez vous donc le rapport qualit√© prix est bon.
en dessert le double creme framboise ,ou meringue n hesitez pas

title: Too much for tourists
content: Good fondue quality Always busy Fast service Mainly for tourists Quite expensive In general a positive note

title: K√§se und Doppelrahm
content: Sehr urchige Lokalit√§t im Herzen des Ortes. Es werden K√§sespezialit√§ten aller Art angeboten. Aus diesem Grunde ist auch die Luft im Innern des Lokals wie in einer K√§serei. Allerdings sind die Speisen hervorragend und es bekommt sicher jeder mehr als genug. Die Meringues mit Doppelrahm sind f√ºr mich als Dessertgeniesser der Oberhammer. Der Service ist schnell und zuvorkommend. Wir k√∂nnen es nur weiter empfehlen. Reservierung von Vorteil.

title: Gutes Fondue - gute Atmosph√§re - mittelm√§ssige Bedienung beim Giger Haus
content: Das Restaurant hat eine heimelige Atmosph√§re. Das Fondue ist trotz Massenabfertigung wirklich sehr gut. Moiti√© Moiti√© ist sehr empfehlenswert. Unbedingt hingehen wenn man in der N√§he ist.

title: T√≠pico e charmoso

title: Lugar imperdible si estas cerca de la regi√≥n
content:
Si parte de tu ruta es pasar por aqu√≠, te recomiendo que pares a comer en este lugar.

Pedimos un Fondue y los sabores eran espectaculares, como segundo platillo mi esposa se pidi√≥ un risotto... que hasta la fecha recuerda como el mejor risotto que ha probado.

title: Expected a tourist trap, but it wasn't...
content:
we took some visiting close friends to The Chalet de Gruyeres this weekend. We had warned them that in this kind of location, you should manage your expectations... the reality is, we had a fantastic lunch with quality products. The fondues were VERY good, and service was friendly and efficient. Be warned that (1) the fondue is 230g/person, which is a hefty serving, so order accordingly (they are fine if you share, reasonably) (2) it isn't the cheapest fondue you'll have in the region... but then again, given the setting, this was expected, so no-one stabbed us in the back.

Ask for a table upstairs, much more typical than the modernised ground floor.

title: La fondue

title: A little of deception

title: Delicious Cheese Fondue
content: „ÉÅ„Éº„Ç∫„Éï„Ç©„É≥„Éá„É•„Å®„ÉÜ„Ç∂„Éº„Éà„ÇíÔºí‰∫∫„Åß„Ç∑„Çß„Ç¢„Åó„Åæ„Åó„Åü„ÄÇ „ÉÅ„Éº„Ç∫„Éï„Ç©„É≥„Éá„É•„ÅØ„ÄÅ„Å®„Å¶„ÇÇÈ£ü„Åπ„ÇÑ„Åô„Åè„ÄÅ„Ç≥„ÇØ„ÇÇ„ÅÇ„Çä„ÄÅÁæéÂë≥„Åó„Åã„Å£„Åü„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ„Ç∏„É£„Ç¨„Ç§„É¢„Å®„Éî„ÇØ„É´„Çπ„ÅÆ„Çª„ÉÉ„Éà„ÇíÔºë‰∫∫ÂàÜÊ≥®Êñá„Åó„Åæ„Åó„Åü„Åå„ÄÅÔºí‰∫∫„ÅßÈ£ü„Åπ„Å¶„ÇÇ„Åã„Å™„ÇäÊ∫ÄËÖπ„Å´„Å™„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ„É°„É¨„É≥„Ç≤„ÇÇ„Åª„Å©„Çà„ÅÑÁîò„Åï„ÅßÁæéÂë≥„Åó„Åã„Å£„Åü„Åß„Åô„ÄÇÂ∫óÂÜÖ„ÇÇÂèØÊÑõ„Åè„ÄÅ„Åæ„ÅüÊ©ü‰ºö„Åå„ÅÇ„Çå„Å∞Ë®™„Çå„Åü„ÅÑ„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ We shared the cheese fondue and melange. We loved the rich taste of Gruyere cheese. We ordered one fondue and shared by two, but enough for us. Melange was also good.

title: Maravilhoso!
content: Almo√ßo com os amigos durante o passeio com o trem do chocolate; pedi uma raclette e n√£o me decepcionei: estava deliciosa! O ambiente √© aconchegante e o atendimento muito bom. Recomendo!

title: Wow!
content: This is a very good place for a very typical Swiss meal. Better go there when it is not too hot. The food is so rich... and delicious!

title: Typically Swiss!
content: Had a nice lunch, classic Gruyere fondue and raclette, the desserts fantastic and soooo rich! Service was not exceptional, our waitress was ticked off because we didn't "over order" for four people, we just wanted a light lunch!

title: Excelente comida y trato
content:
Reservamos en el mismo d√≠a cuando abri√≥ el restaurante y no tuvimos problema.
Pedimos una raclette de viande para compartir junto con una cerveza y agua. La raclette ya de por si viene con patatas cocidas (tama√±o peque√±o), pan, pepinillos y cebolletas, sin olvidar que el trozo de queso es generoso. Nosotros eramos dos personas y no llegamos a terminarlo por poco. Todo estaba muy bueno.
Pedimos postre por gula, ya que habiamos leido que las frambuesas con una especia de nata agria del lugar eran bastante buenas y no decepcion√≥.
El precio era de esperar, lo com√∫n en suiza, salimos a 93‚Ç¨ pero no es algo que comas todos los d√≠as y vale la pena.
El personal muy atento, hab√≠a una camarera que hablaba espa√±ol.

title: Great fondue, impolite service
content: We shared a fondue with friends last week and were very pleased with the feel of the restaurant and the quality and preparation of the fondue. The portions are generous and they offer bread and potatoes in unlimited quantities. The restaurant, especially the top floor is a very charming old style chalet and a perfet environment for sharing a fondue. However, I think the personnel is quite stressed as they shouted at one of our friends for sitting at the table before it had be cleared. The restaurant is very crowded and instead of standing in everyones way she decided to sit in order to get out of they way. She was told in three different languages that her behaviour was not acceptable!!!

title: Service catastrophique, nourriture moyen (√† part la fondue)
content: A part la fondue qui est bonne, le reste est moyen. Les plats sont servis tr√®s tr√®s vite, pas le temps de profiter. Nous y sommes all√©s plusieurs fois mais c'√©tais la derni√®re. Les serveuses sont d'un accueil plus que moyen (regarde de haut en bas et rigole, etc.). Niveau cuisine, √ßa d√©pend du plat, la fondue est bonne. Nous avons pris une croute au fromage, pain mouill√© au vin... Bref, tellement moyen niveau service qu'on a pas envie d'y retourner. Dommage.

title: The fondue as it should be
content: I cam here with my friend to have a true Fondue with the most amazing Swiss cheese, the Gruyeres Cheese. The restaurant is so classic with allot of elements from the Swiss countryside. The Fondue was perfect with all what you need to dip in. Just dont let your dips fall in the cheese else you will have to give someone the wheel to drive back home.

title: Fondue essen
content: Das Chalet liegt im Zentrum von Gruy√®re. Es ist eher touristisch aufgebaut, aber sympathisch. Die Einrichtung ist heimelig. Wir waren 2x dort essen. Vorallem das Fondue war sehr fein. Da wir nach dem Fondue noch nicht genug hatten, fragten wir nach einem Nachschub. Die Bedienung √§usserte, dass dies kein Problem ist. Der Nachschub war dann freundlicherweise f√ºr uns gratis.

title: The best in gruyeres
content: Most restaurant in Gruyeres are touristic with average quality. This is one of the few that is really authentic, the food is fabulous and the ambiance is the best in Gruyere.

title: Usine √† fondue
content: Bon rapport qualit√© prix ...mais usine √† fondue. Service rapide .cadre agr√©able personnel sympathique .

title: Most amazing fondue I have EVER had
content: I love cheese and this blew every fondue I have had before away. On top of that, the service was fantastic. Wish I could eat there every day :)

title: Comida tradicional y rica
content:
Tomamos una fondue y un roast beef. Todo muy rico y es servicio correcto.

El ambiente est√° bonito con el personal vestido con trajes tradicionales.

title: enjoy fondue
content: i reserved a table in the early mornig for the following dinner when we arrived the table they reserved for us was next to the main entrance (every time guests open the door entrance was cold) we were also next to toilette, please don't get booking if you do not have avaibility or at least inform the guest about the position, by the way food was very good and very expensive too

title: Superbe fondue !
content:
Tr√®s bien une bonne fondue, un accueil chaleureux. Une note un peu √©lev√©e mais qui vaut la peine.
A refaire !

title: Amazing fondue
content:
I came to this restaurant with colleagues and had an amazing lunch here. I'd never really thought of fondue before but it was absolutely delicious. The bread and potatoes went really well with the fondue. I also really liked the meat and cheese starter. The staff were really helpful and welcoming. It's also a lovely setting with beautiful interiors.

I would definitely eat here again as it's atmospheric and serves really good food.

title: Visite
content: Tres bel endroit typique avec un petit balcon avec quelques tables; fondue excellente, double cr√®me de Gruy√®res avec fruits; ne pas avoir peur de sentir le fromage en sortant :) A tester si vous n'√™tes pas sensibles aux serveuses antipathiques.

title: Fondue buen√≠sima

title: Uriges Lokal

Wir kommen wieder. Reservierung vorteilhaft, da √§usserst gut besucht. Tisch im ersten Stock buchen, direkt unter dem Dach ist es richtig urig.

title: Great fondue

title: Molto buono

title: La mejor fondue de Gruyeres

title: Comme un d√©cor de cin√©ma
content: On se croirait dans He√Ødi. Gruy√®res est une tr√®s jolie ville ceintur√©e de remparts o√π l'on mange √©videmment du ... gruy√®re. Le Gruy√®re de Gruy√®res n'est pas le truc inf√¢me rap√© que l'on trouve dans des sachets plastiques... Au chalet, on peut manger du Gruy√®re en fondue, en salade, avec d'autres fromages, en quiche... La fondue est accompagn√©e de petites pommes de terre que l'on trempe dans le fromages, de cornichons... On peut manger aussi de la charcuterie de montagne. Le d√©cor, rustique fait penser au chalet dans He√Ødi vraiment tr√®s mignon.En dessert, les meringues ou les framboises √† la double cr√®me de la Gruy√®re sont un must, pas tr√®s l√©ger tout √ßa mais si bon!

title: Lunch in Gruyere
content: A wonderful lunch. A very good fondue, followed by an excellent ice-cream Sundae with local double cream. The staff were very helpful, providing colouring pencils and a colour sheet for our small children. I would highly recommend booking as it was very busy with people being turned away...

title: D√©licieux, typique et chaleureux
content: Un super d√©cor, des plats tr√®s bons (oui je sais on parle de fromage etc etc... mais la qualit√© est l√†), un service attentionn√© et une bonne ambiance. A faire lorsque vous √™tes √† Gruy√®res.

title: Peter Borneo
content:
The Chalet - this is a typical authentic regional wooden Building ... you must go and see also inside ... and experience their great Swiss specialites. Try
Gruyere Cheese Fondue ..(or moitie/moitie) one of THE best you can have
Try any other Cheese dishes on the Menu..
As a starter don't miss the air dry beef (Bundnerfleisch) and other type of sausages with it. For Dessert choose:
Raspberries with double cream and ice cream
Meringue with double cream

Don't miss it This Is A Must

title: Vrai repas authentique
content:
Un vrai repas Suisse avec une bonne fondue au menu. Effectivement le prix est plut√¥t √©lev√© mais le go√ªt est au rendez vous donc le rapport qualit√© prix est assez bon. Le lieu est vraiment typique chalet suisse donc ce restaurant vaut le detour.

P.S : pensez √† reserver

title: Terrible staff attitude and behaviour
content: We came to this place wth my 70 years old parents and my partner for lunch. We were told it's fully booked and asked go back not earlier than 4-5. No one took our name or proposed to reserve a table. We came back at 5pm and were told off again but they took our names for the booking. We got back again at 6pm to ask for our table and were told that it's too late. We looked around the room and saw a table in the middle of the restaurant with four waitresses sitting and eating at the customer's table. When we pointed to this the other waitress said, that this is fine for them to eat instead of customers and this table will be taken later anyway and that we can't be served. One of the waitresses from the table turned and said - no we have no places for you. I was ashamed to let my parents see this behaviour. I don't leave many reviews but I could not not say to the management to this place that it is shameful to treat customer this way and let staff be so rude. I don't know any country in which these customs are allowed. Real shame.

title: Lugar c√°lido, acogedor con una Fondeu excelente
content: Estuvimos muy bien atendidos, fue un viernes de pascua, hubo que reservar si bien mas tarde (fuimos 13hs) hab√≠a lugar. La fondee era muy abundante y el queso excelente. Los precios de la fondue 30 CHF por persona, no es barato pero vale el precio

title: Ideal para comida t√≠pica de la zona
content:
Esta ubicado dentro del pueblo amurallado de Gruy√©res, un lugar fant√°stico.
La comida buen√≠sima, tanto la fondue de queso como sopas t√≠picas de la zona. El personal es muy eficiente y explica con paciencia los platos.

title: Tr√®s content, m√™me si un peu cher
content:
Une petite visite en famille avec nos parents, journ√©e ensoleill√©e en Gruy√®res. L'int√©rieur est tr√®s typique, en bois, nous √©tions en haut. Dommage que la petite terrasse d'en face a disparue, car construction d'un nouvel immeuble.
Nous sommes rest√©s classiques, viande s√©ch√©e, tr√®s bonne coup√©e tr√®s fine, fondue moiti√©-moiti√©, excellente, fluide, pas trop sal√©e avec pain et pdt, et desserts √† la cr√®me double de Gruy√®res. Seul b√©mol, les prix qui sont tr√®s hauts, presque prohibitifs.... Lieu touristique malheureusement

title: Vive le fromage
content:
Restaurant avec beaucoup de charme.

Les cro√ªtes au fromages sont d√©licieuse tout comme les desserts.

title: Good fondue, best dessert
content:
Typical place in the village.The fondue with the local cheese was very tasty, as well as the complementary meat we ordered. But the best of all was the dessert, the icecream with griottes and the double cream was fantastic.
The price a bit high, specially the wines,

title: Amazing fondue
content: I went with a friend and we had a fondue for two. It came with bread, potatoes and little cucumbers and onions. It was really good. At first I thought that the combination of the cucumbers and onions with the cheese would not be good, but it was. The price was not expensive for Switzerland. I would repeate.

title: Un bon repas suisse
content: Bon accueil. Service attentionn√©. Bon choix de mets typiques et de bonne qualit√©. Prix un peu √©lev√©s mais la qualit√© y est.

title: Must seen next to HR Giger s Allien museum
content: You love a beautiful scenery of green hills, cows, a beautiful clean small village, a beautiful castle on top of a hill, the famous sculpture museum of the Swiss artist HR Giger with its picturesque bar? Great - BUT after sightseeing and enjoying the Swiss French region around Fribourg/Bulle, 10 min drive from the motorway you HAVE TO eat a moite-moite cheese fondue and try the vermicelli with merenque and double cream - just brilliant in a wooden nice old chalet.

title: Ottima fondue
content: Ambiente molto carino,sembra di entrare in un rifugio di montagna. La fondue √® ottima,cos√¨ come il dessert (frutta con doppia panna,porzione abbondante). Unico appunto,ho trovato un po' caro l'antipasto (ottima qualit√† degli affettati,ma quantit√† scarsina). Per√≤ il posto merita davvero una visita.

title: Top fribourger/schweizer Spezialit√§ten
content: Ganz typisch f√ºr die Region, super gelegen im Kern des St√§ttchen... Sehr Turistisch, da Service-Mitarbeiter in Trachten etc.. aber es passt einfach! Hatten eine Trockenfleischplatte zur Vorspeise, danach ein moiti√©/moiti√© Fondue und zum Desserert Merege mit Doppelrahm... einfach ein Erlebnis das in die Region passt! Tipp: Zu verbinden mit der nahe gelegenen Show-K√§serei und der Cailler/Nestl√© Schokoladen-Fabrick/Museum...

title: Solid, aber ohne jegliche Begeisterung
content: Le Chalet de Gruyeres ist f√ºr mich eine gelungene Touristenattraktion. Die Lokalit√§t ist √ºppig dekoriert und sch√∂n Gelegen auf dem Weg in Richtung Schloss. Unsere Speisen (Salat, K√§semakronen, K√§sekuchen) waren ok, mehr aber nicht. Die hohen Preise lassen sich durch den exklusiven Standort rechtfertigen. Leider gliederte sich das Personal mit seinem Auftritt nahtlos in den durchzogenen Eindruck ein. Ohne L√§cheln wurde Dienst nach Vorschrift geleistet und als Gast wurde man regelrecht abgefertigt: Gleich auf die Bestellung folgten Vorspeise, Hauptgang und Rechnung und nach etwas mehr als einer halben Stunde war der Spuk bereits vorbei. Das Chalet wird seinem Namen also nicht wirklich gerecht. Wer sich einen gem√ºtlichen Abend und feine K√§sespeisen erhofft, w√§re wo anders besser bedient. F√ºr Touristen f√ºr einen einmaligen Besuch genau richtig.

title: Ottima atmosfera... Tipicamente Svizzera
content:
Posto situato in un bellissimo borgo medievale.
L'atmosfera del borgo √® veramente magica.
Il ristorante √® molto caratteristico tutto legno con le cameriere vestite in tipico stile svizzero.
Si mangia discretamente e i prezzi per essere in Svizzera sono abbastanza "dignitosi".
Lo consiglio per una serata romantica

title: Best place for a cheese fondue!
content: If you want to try a local cheese fondue, you have to go here! The cheese is incredible, the environment looks very local, and the waiters are good. White wine recommended.

title: Une valeur s√ªre √† la Gruy√®re
content: Certes le restaurant est un peu exigu par endroit, il faut imp√©rativement r√©serv√© pour avoir une table et les prix ne sont pas les plus bas du village mais c'est, et de loin, le meilleur √©tablissement de la Gruy√®re. Fondue, raclette, plateau de viande sech√©e, framboise fraiche avec de la double cr√®me, tout est excellent. Sans oublier un cadre typique magnifique. N'h√©sitez pas √† pousser la porte et bonne d√©gustation !

title: typisches, lokas kleinod
content:
super leckere lokale spezialit√§ten, frisch zubereitet und in nicht zu knappen portionen serviert.
die bedienung - man staune - ist gekleidet in der greyerzer tracht. eine gute adresse um 'swissness' in seiner reinsten form zu bestaunen und geniessen

title: Gruy√®re's specialty and with a vew!
content: Stop in for desert with traditional Gruyere cream. Wonderful views of the Medieval city as you eat. The d√©cor is very Swiss everything is a little exaggerated for the tourists but still very much worth a visit. Deserts were 16 franc each.

title: Fondue excellente !
content:
Apr√®s avoir visit√© la chocolaterie "Cailler" √† Broc, et apr√®s avoir fait le tour des remparts du ch√¢teau, nous avons appr√©ci√© une excellente fondue au chalet de Gruy√®res !
Je recommande malgr√© des tarifs un peu √©lev√©s !

title: Perfect Swiss lunch
content: I rate my experience 5 Star given we did not have a lot of time for lunch but the service was fast and effective and I had the best quiche there I ever had! It is decorated in typical swiss fashion and waitresses dressed i traditional attire with swiss music. The menu offers a variety of swiss cheese and meats delicassies. These are simple but well prepared. We truly enjoyed our lunch.

title: perfecto para fondues y raclettes
content: Buen servicio y excelente preparaci√≥n de la fondue y la raclette, el servicio bien atendido por una camarera portuguesa muy atenta, y el precio razonable para la zona.

title: Acogedor y muy amables
content:
Fuimos a comer un poco tarde y nos recibieron fenomenal, trabaja una espa√±ola. Pedimos unos macarrones muy ricos y una tabla de embutido. Nos sorprendi√≥ lo rico q estaba todo. Pagamos 60 francos y bebimos una cerveza y agua.
El servicio muy atento. Para repetir.

title: Toujours bien accueilli ! N'oubliez pas de r√©server.
content:
Bel accueil et une tr√®s bonne fondue et des meringues double cr√®me comme j'adore avant la visite de la fabrique de chocolat..
Je conseille ce restaurant au cadre typique !

title: One of the best Fondues
content:
Very cozy place, very authentic swiss. A Little stuffy and smelly but expectable as it is an all cheese place. I must admit I might have had a cheese coma after everything - we shared 2 different fondues (one stronger than the other, both very nice), Raclette, a gruyere salad and 2 portions of the local creme with berries and Meringue. Oh and 2 Beef broths that were a nice "Palette cleanser" :)
Overall quite quick friendly Service. Prices are ok, but after living in Zurich anywhere is ok I guess. If you are visiting the HR Guger Museum (and if you were not planning to - please do, ist a 2 min walk and it is just smth else, but probably not for small kids) this is a perfect stop for a nice lunch to experience the best of the swiss cheese capital. Book in advance.

content:
accueil tr√®s sympathique
fondu et double cr√®me excellent
fondant d√©licieux
restaurant √† conseiller
un peu cher 29 frs la fondu et 16.50 meringue double cr√®me
mais √ßa vaut le d√©tour
R√âSERVEZ AVANT

title: √Ä la hauteur des attentes
content:
Fondues succulentes et double cr√®me...
Accueil sympathique cadre savoyard
Les portions sont copieuses

title: Restaurant typique
content:
Restaurant √† la d√©coration typiquement montagnarde (les serveuses sont √©galement en costume/uniforme), Le chalet est un havre d√©di√© √† la gastronomie des montagnes : fondue, raclette, charcuterie etc. Service efficace et rapide bien qu'assez peu souriant. La fondue est un d√©lice et les desserts incroyables. M√™me si le prix est un peu √©lev√©, la nourriture est servie en quantit√© et est de grande qualit√©. Pensez √† r√©server, le restaurant est souvent plein et de nombreuses personnes n'ont pas pu acc√©der √† une table. Le Chalet est un restaurant convivial qui accueille tout aussi bien les couples, les familles et les grandes tabl√©es.
Deux √©tages sont propos√©s au sein de l'√©tablissement ainsi qu'une petite terrasse tr√®s agr√©able quand arrivent les beaux jours. Un endroit tr√®s plaisant √† d√©couvrir !

title: Buon pranzo
content:
Buon pranzo tipico in uno chalet... ottima la fonduta e la raclette
Consiglio: presentatevi a stomaco vuoto

title: Touristisch, aber gut
content: Wir waren 8 Personen und kamen nach einer telefonischen Vorank√ºndigung erst um 21.00 Uhr an. Wir hatten reserviert. Uns wurde mitgeteilt, dass es nach 21.00 Uhr leider keine warme K√ºche mehr g√§be. Ok, nicht schlimm, trafen kurz vor 21.00 Uhr ein. √Ä la carte bestellt und fein gegessen. Die Bedienung war freundlich und effizient. Sind sich wohl gewohnt, die Leute schnell zu bedienen und so auch mehr Umsatz zu machen. Kann mir gut vorstellen, dass w√§ren der Hochsaison es hier wie in Disney zugeht. Das ganze Dorf scheint auf Tourismus eingestellt. Die Einrichtung ist rustikal und typisch, nat√ºrlich auch etwas f√ºr ausl√§ndische Touristen. Empfehle in der Nebensaison. Wenn man in Gruyere ist, dann sollte man sicherlich einen Besuch machen.

title: Super dejeuner
content:
D√©paysement total dans un petit chalet. La nourriture est top et le service tr√®s agr√©able.
√Ä refaire lors de notre prochain passage en suisse.

title: Typiquement Suisse
content:
R√©servation effectu√©e quelques jours avant notre visite, table pr√™te et libre √† notre arriv√©e.

Service rapide et pr√©cis, manque un petit sourire. Aucune attente.

Nourriture (fondue) bonne et quantit√© convenable. Excellent dessert avec une belle quantit√© !

Cadre typique mais sans kitsch.

A recommander pour un repas typiquement suisse.

Prix dans la cat√©gorie sup√©rieure mais on paye le lieu touristique.

title: Charmante fondue sous le soleil printanier de f√©vrier
content:

: excellente

title: Un jeudi midi avec des amis suisses
content:
Un peu d'attente mais un personnel tr√®s sympathique et arrangeant
Macaronis au fromage et √† la cr√®me un d√©lice et l'assortiment de viande √† griller soit m√™me idem
Un peu surpris par le tarif des mais en suisse pour nous fran√ßais il faut s'attendre √† ce que tout soit plus ch√®re

Vaut le d√©tour

title: Erg toeristisch, niet goedkoop
content:
Een restaurant wat typische Zwitserse gerechten op de kaart heeft staan.
De kwaliteit van het eten was prima, maar niet speciaal.
Het personeel kwam niet gemotiveerd over.
Ook zijn de gerechten prijzig. Voor 3 personen, hoofd- en nagerecht, kun je minstens rekenen op 150 CHF.

title: Belle carte et excellents mets au fromage
content: Nous avons opt√© pour les macaronis du chalet et une cro√ªte au fromage (avec jambon et ananas). C'√©tait excellent et tr√®s bien servi. Les macaronis √©taient servis dans une petite casserole qui reste au chaud sur un r√©chaud .... donc on peut manger tranquillement. L'accueil √©tait sympathique et le temps d'attente √©tait correct. La b√¢tisse est charmante et vous devez manger √† la salle du haut (elle est superbe)

title: chalet typique de Gruyere
content:
la fondue gruy√®re vacherin accompagn√©e de pomme de terre √©tait excellente, c'est la premi√®re fois que je mangeais ce type de fondue, et j'en referai.
Le service √©tait impeccable.
Dommage que nous n'ayons pas p√ªt manger √† l'√©tage

title: Muy original
content: El lugar est√° muy conservador a su regi√≥n y √©poca tradicional, delicioso todo. El ambiente muy acogedor respetan tu reservaci√≥n y tienen tu mesa lista, buena ubicaci√≥n y muy atentos en el servicio de las meseras, el servicio es r√°pido nada de demora volver√≠a a venir.

title: toujours aussi exceptionnel
content: En terminant nos vacances par la Suisse, nous avons fait un d√©tour pour retourner √† Gruyeres, et y d√©guster la fondue au vacherin et les fraises √† la cr√®me de gruy√®re au restaurant le Chalet.Ce que nous avions d√©couvert il y a tr√®s longtemps, gr√¢ce √† nos amis suisses n'a pas chang√©.Le village est magnifique, tout fleuri, l'accueil chaleureux, aussi bien de la population que des serveuses en costume local, tr√®s aimables et souriantes, quant √† la qualit√© du repas, dans un cadre magnifiquement d√©cor√©, elle est toujours aussi exceptionnelle comme √† chaque fois que nous y sommes all√©s, depuis plusieurs d√©cennies

title: Pas pu tester!
content:
Vu l'accueil plus que m√©diocre que nous avons eu, nous avons d√©cid√© de ne pas y passer la soir√©e. Mieux vaut r√©server car la salle n'est pas grande. Effectivement il restait deux places juste √† c√¥t√© la porte en plein courant d'air... bof ! Du coup on nous a propos√© d'aller dans la salle du bas (moins de charme mais au chaud) et l√† les serveuses nous ont dit que s'il restait des place en haut c'est l√† qu'on devait aller...
Visiblement ils n'avaient pas besoin de nous comme clients. Dommage!

title: Definitely YES
content:
Definitely it's place worth to visit and have a dinner.
We arrived afternoon after visiting the castle and very hungry.
We ordered a lot of dishes and did not estimate the portion size and the calories consumed.
Melted cheese is served with small potatoes and pickles. Huge portions even for "big men".
Overall spent 100 euro per person including several glasses of vine.
For evening meal it's better to book a table in advance because everything is occupied.

title: Super pranzo!!!
content: Super pranzo in svizzero in questo chalet. Consigliata la prenotazione. Fonduta ottima e buonissimo anche il dolce. Molto caro!

title: Il miglior posto per la fondue
content: Locale veramente tipico e molto frequentato, a giusta ragione. Imperdibile la fondue ch√¢teau de gruy√®res cos√¨ come la coppa danemark con la cr√®me double. Ci ritorneremo

title: Un bout de terroir √† croquer sans mod√©ration
content: Une carte de mets traditionnels √† tomber √† par terre. Quand on se rel√®ve et qu'on y go√ªte c'est le top. La fondue est excellente ! la meringue c'est le paradis ! Service impeccable, rapide et sympa !

title: Fonduta da non perdere
content: Bellissima scoperta e grande pranzo a base di fonduta e con ottima scelta di vini locali e splendidi dolci, il tutto veramente buono, il prezzo un po' alto anche per la Svizzera.

title: Un diner au top
content:
Par -10c dehors, la petite fondue a rte fort apreciee.
Je recommande fortement les desserts franboises fraiches a la cr√®me double et la vermicelle :meringue ,boule de vanillecreme de marin et glace marron en forme de vermicelle accompagne de sa cr√®me double, de quoi reprendre des forces

Accueil tr√®s agr√©able

title: Incontournable
content:
Ah le charme des montagnes enneig√©es ! √áa donne envie d'un bon feu de chemin√©e, de regarder les flocons tomber en mangeant une bonne fondue, non ?
Le Chalet c'est tout √ßa ! L'odeur du bois, celle du fromage, les petits rideaux rouges et blancs brod√©s, la double cr√®me ... on s'attend presque √† voir entrer Heidi lol
S'il est vraique la note est un peu sal√©e il n'en est pas moins que venir √† Gruy√®res sans venir d√©jeuner ou d√Æner au chalet me semblerait inconcevable.
Apr√®s tout c'est ici qu'elle est n√©e notre ch√®re fondue !
Le personnel est aux petits soins. Par exemple n'ayant pas pris de dessert (la fondue √©tant largement suffisante pour mon app√©tit ), la serveuse m'a apport√© gracieusement, un peu de double cr√®me accompagn√©e de chocolat pour que je puisse y go√ªter.
J'ai trouv√© cette attention particuli√®rement d√©licate et j'ai franchement beaucoup aim√© l'onctuosit√© de cette sp√©cialit√©. Au point que nous en avons achet√© pour en ramener chez nous.
L'hospitalit√© est une vertu que savent cultiver les gens de la montagne, leurs plats g√©n√©reux sont l√† pour nous rappeler √† quel point le repas est un moment convivial. Alors m√™me si vous payez l√©g√®rement plus qu'ailleurs, ne boudez pas votre plaisir. Vous verrez, c'est totalement d√©paysant ... et d√©licieux, ce qui ne g√¢che rien

title: Restaurante con encanto y buena comida
content:
Cuando entras al sitio por primera vez y durante los primeros minutos de estancia en √©l, el olor a queso es lo √∫nico perceptible, al fin y al cabo se trata de un restaurante t√≠pico Suizo; Suizo, s√≠, pero tur√≠stico. Adornado como si se tratase de un "chalet" -o cobertizo- tiene los platos t√≠picos de la cocina suiza, entre los que no se puede dejar pasar la fondue o los macarrones con queso -en serio-.

Nos atendieron en ingl√©s sin mayor dificultad, pero nos pareci√≥ que tambi√©n podr√≠an haberlo hecho en castellano.

Pidiendo comida abundante, postre y bebida, la comida puede salir en torno a los 50chf, pero quedas saciado.

title: Great place !
content: The place to go if you are in Gruyere , cheese, soup, decor and great service and nice view !!! Definitely recommended Probably high season need to book in advance

title: Ricordi di giovent√π confermati in parte
content: Siamo torinati dopo 20 anni, ci rircordavamo il locale che √® rimasto eguale. Abbiamo cenato in famiglia in una sera freddissima ma dentro era caldo, fin troppo caldo. Specialit√† locali a prezzi folli. Il doppio che in un ristorante valdostano. 2 raclette, 1 fonduta, una mezza bottiglia di vino della casa tappo a vite, un caff√© ed una grappa 150 franchi e passa...... e se paghi in ‚Ç¨uro c'√® scritto chiaro che il loro cambio √® 1 a 1!!!! Non credo che ci torneremo malgrado il servizio di una cameriera in particolare sia stato cortese (l'altra di tanto in tanto si sedeva a fianco del pass....??) Peccato Svizzera.

title: Sp√©cialit√©s typiques
content:
En visite √† Gruy√®re, manger dans un restaurant √† sp√©cialit√©s (fromage, charcuterie, meringues...) est un passage oblig√© et fait partie de la visite.
Nous avons d√©jeun√© au Chalet et nous avons trouv√© ce que nous recherchions. Le cadre est typique, les serveuses en costume traditionnel sont accueillantes, certes les prix sont quelque peu excessifs mais les portions sont g√©n√©reuses et c'est tr√®s bon. Les produits sont de qualit√©.
Le service est rapide.
R√©servation conseill√©e

title: Ambience Plus
content:
We had a wonderful lunch here, in a beautiful village. The service was excellent and very friendly. (Victoria) A nice surprise! The desserts were beautiful, especially the meringue, icecream and fresh cream. (A local delicacy)
The main course of macaroni fondue and meats was also lovely.
Expensive by Australian standards (not helped by the exchange rate) but very happy we went to such a beautiful restaurant.
Loved the cow bells on the rafters!

title: Un chalet au coeur de Gruyeres
content: L'adresse est clairement orient√©e vers la cuisine montagnarde suisse. La d√©coration est chaleureuse, notamment dans la salle du haut. La cuisine est roborative et bien r√©alis√©e. Le service efficace m√™me s'il n'est pas le plus chaleureux rencontr√©s. Un endroit tr√®s sympa, notamment en soir√©e. Des tarifs quelque peu √©lev√©s mais √† relativiser avec le lieu (Gruy√®res et la Suisse)... En dessert, vous pouvez notamment prendre un vermicelle au marrons assez co√ªteux mais tr√®s bon et tr√®s bien servi.

title: A Unmatched Fondue Experience
content:
The restaurant provides the quintessential French fondue experience in a period restaurant. Prepare for hearty food served by friendly and expedient staff. The top floor has slightly better views then the lower floor, however, anything near a window lets you gaze over the valley. While the price can seem dear, they are standard fare for the area. Well worth the experience.

The fondue dish was supplemented with a cured meat paring and the standard bread, pickles, and pickled onion. For variation in the fondue, try the seasonal dish that includes a higher quality cheese fondue that is a little stronger in taste. It comes with a supplement of potatoes so you add further variety to the experience.

For those with children, particularly little boys, the desert dishes include glass dinosaur cups that are quite a collectible. We were given a set of four just for asking for one.

title: Assolutamente da non perdere
content:
Tipico ristorantino dal sapore di formaggio. Ottima fondue di formaggio e raclette.
Personale molto gentile e disponibile.
Da non perdere anche le meringhe con la panna della Gruy√®re.
Meglio riservare per tempo i posti a tavola.

title: Um bom recanto gastron√¥mico em Gruy√®res
content: √Ä esquerda da sa√≠da do Castelo est√° esse bom caf√©, com lanches e refei√ß√µes bem preparadas e um atendimento bem afetuoso. Uma boa parada para repor a energia consumida nos passeios por essa bela vila Su√≠√ßa.

title: il paradiso della fondue
content: qui tutto parla della fondue, la vera, l'originale, la squisita fondue di Gruy√®res. L'inconfodibile aroma di questa rinomata specialit√† svizzera di formaggio assale le vostre narici ancor prima di entare nel locale, arredato nel tipico stile degli chalets svizzeri, con il legno delle travi, del pavimento delle pareti e dei tavoli che da subito una sensazione confortevole ed accogliente.

title: Ein Must bei det Reise ins Wallis
content: Jedes Mal, wenn wir ins Wallis fahren, machen wir einen Zwischenstop in Gruy√®re. Und dann ist Le Chalet unser absolutes Lieblingsrestaurant. Unbedingt reservieren. 5 Sterne wohl verdient.

title: Aussen hui, Innen pfui
content: Wir waren im Dez 16 in diesem Restaurant. Von aussen sieht es sehr charmant aus und so beschlossen wir, das Dessert da zu bestellen. Leider gab es keinerlei Begr√ºssung, als wir eintraten, sondern nur die Frage ob wir reserviert h√§tten. Wir wurden stehen gelassen und einige Minuten sp√§ter wurde uns dann mitgeteilt, dass es im oberen Stockwerk noch Platz h√§tte. Oben angekommen, f√ºhlten wir uns auch da nicht willkommen geheissen. Wieder die erneute Frage, ob wir reserviert h√§tten. Nach der Verneinung unsererseits, sagte uns die Bedienung, dass wir Platz nehmen d√ºrfen, jedoch nur f√ºr eine gewisse Zeit, da der Tisch f√ºr sp√§ter noch reserviert worden w√§re. Wir setzten uns und mussten auf das einfache Dessert (Meringues mit Creme) auch nicht lange warten. Allerdings fehlte es dann an einem Teller und Servietten. Die Rechnung kam zwar auch nach kurzer Zeit, aber f√ºrs Einkassieren wurden wir ignoriert. Ohne Verabschiedung und mit dem Geld auf dem Tisch verliessen wir das Restaurant. Dieses gem√ºtliche Restaurant h√§tte eine freundlichere Bedienung verdient! Zudem w√§re dies aufgrund der hohen Preise auch zu erwarten gewesen. Sehr schade!

title: Week end en gruy√®re
content:
Un stop tr√®s sympathique.
Une fondu moiti√© moiti√© √† la hauteur et un service tr√®s chaleureux.

A refaire !

title: Incontournable √† Gruy√®res, ambiance chalet typique
content:
Service sympa, fondue et raclette parfaite, on y retourne r√©guli√®rement!
Il faut souvent r√©server car l'endroit est tr√®s pris√©

title: Fondue impec√°vel
content: Na terra do queijo su√≠√ßo tive a grata experi√™ncia nesse t√≠pico restaurante perto do famoso Castelo de Gruy√®res . Pedimos o famoso Foundue e a Raclete estavam de tirar o chap√©u. Magn√≠fico. Magnificent.

title: ambiance montagnarde et cuisine excellente
content: Endroit tr√®s agr√©able et typique , cuisine parfaite, personnel aimable. Points n√©gatifs manque d'a√©ration quand tout le monde mange bras√©rade, fondue... l'odeur et la fum√©e sont au rendez vous. Tarif un peu √©lev√© mais cuisine raffin√©e.

title: Simplesmente inesquec√≠vel
content: Um dos melhores restaurantes onde j√° tive o prazer de comer. A fondue de queijo √© inesquec√≠vel, com um sabor √∫nico, a raclete tamb√©m n√£o deixa nada a desejar e ainda tem excelentes vinhos Sui√ßos.

title: expensive...and not that great
content: for some reason when you order from them they add on a bunch of things which get added to your check. Next to us were two college girls who ordered fondue for one so they could share and they got a bill which they weren't able to pay. They explained that they already had lunch and just wanted to try it, but then the waitress pretended she didn't understand...thankfully the girls were persistent and were able to negotiate a better price. I had to step out because of the overwhelming smell of stinky cheese and I was gagging but my friends enjoyed it and were shocked at their bill. But the room upstairs was very charming!!

title: Delicious fondue!
content:
We visited Le Chalet on a busy Saturday beginning of December. We had a reservation but our table still was not released by the previous guests so we agreed to wait outside in the little balcony. It was a beautiful cold but sunny day, the owner came out and offered us free drinks while waiting. We had a glass of wine and ice tea for the kids at no charge, we connected to their wifi and we had the chance to glance through the beautiful photos we took that day. A few minutes later, we were escorted to our table and we ordered cheese fondue, an appetizer, and another house specialty. The kids loved the food and for us the fondue with the baby potatoes was delicious, the best we ever had. Service was good, price was reasonable for the Swiss standards, and the hospitality was remarkable.
Many thanks

title: Typique sans √™tre kitsch !
content: En rentrant de Lucerne nous avons souhait√© faire une halte et faire un petit d√©tour par Gruy√®res. Quelle bonne id√©e ! Nous voulions manger une fondue et nous avons √©t√© servis au Chalet. Service rapide et efficace, fromage de qualit√© et d√©cor r√©el. Ne pas h√©siter √† passer la porte de cette bonne adresse.

title: petite escapade
content:
Je recommande vivement cet √©tablissement.
J'avais juste oubli√© qu'il existait encore un accueil et un service impeccable et professionnels.
La raclette est excellente.
L'ambiance est chaleureuse on si sent bien.

title: Bello ma caro
content:
Sicuramente Chalet tipico Svizzero in tutti i sensi ma troppo caro per mangiare cose semplici a base di formaggi ecc.
Forse con gli anni la molta affluenza di turisti gli sono andati in testa visto i prezzi esagerati!!!

title: Joli cadre.... mais d√©√ßu
content: Je m'attendais √† manger une des meilleures fondue, et j'ai √©t√© d√©√ßu.... pas besoin de se d√©placer √† Gruy√®re pour √ßa... et beaucoup trop cher.... endroit pour les touristes. Nous avons √©t√© servis par une √©tudiante super gentille mais qui visiblement d√©pass√©e par la carte des vins. Quand on pratique des prix pareil on peut demander √† √™tre servi par des professionnels.

title: Muy aut√©ntico y bueno
content: Es el restaurante que domina la plaza y desde donde puedes ver todo el pueblo de una peque√±ita terraza, todo est√° bueno nosotros hicimos como una merienda y nos gust√≥ mucho, buen trato buenas vistas y ambiente aut√©ntico

title: ottima fonduta
content: abbiamo pranzato in questo ristorante per assaggiare la vera fonduta e rachlette svizzera con il loro formaggio tipico. Pranzo superbo

title: The BEST (Swiss) Fondue
content:
Extra for a first venue in Switzerland, and a must to do.
Book in advance, and ask for the upper room, which is decorated as a typical chalet. This restaurant does the best Swiss Fondue I've ever tested (I'm french, and I can certify that Swiss fondue is better than the French / savoyarde one ;-)). You cannot help yourself taking another bite !

title: The best
content: If you want Swiss food, est here We travel for it and during summer reservations for outside are needed

title: dimanche en couple
content:
nous voulions boire un caf√©...√† notre arriv√©e 5 personnes discutent derri√®re le comptoir pas un bonjour 10 minutes apr√®s aucune d'entre elles ne nous a demand√© notre d√©sir...nous sommes sortis et l√† une serveuse nous dit . au revoir ....
Nous ni retournerons plus.

title: tutto benissimo
content:
eravamo un gruppo e abbiamo preso sia fondue che raclette , quest'ultima in particolare era eccellente. anche ilpiatto di carne tipo bresaola e di altri salumi erano ottimi
le porzioni molto abbondanti (avremmo potuto prendere anche meno cose)
Per finire se avete ancora posto la meringa alla doppia crema
Prezzi non bassi
prenotate in anticipo per stare al piano di sopra (quello di sotto e' del tutto anonimo)

title: Fabuleux
content:
Lors de nos voyages en Suisse, ce restaurant reste un passage oblig√© !
Une fondue moiti√©-moiti√© inoubliable accompagn√©e de petites pommes de terre et de viande de grisons !

title: Buena comida en restaurante acogedor y encanto
content:
Comimos unas raclette y fondue en familia. La comida buena y el trato correcto. Muy recomendable.
Est√° en la parte alta de la calle de Gruyeres, desde donde tienes buenas vistas. Tiene planta arriba y abajo. Recomiendo reservar en la de arriba, es m√°s acogedora.

title: Acogedor
content:
Muy pintoresco y acogedor. Hablan espa√±ol perfectamente. La foundie y la raclete muy ricas.
Comimos en la terraza superior. Un poco calurosa pero se agradece despu√©s del frio que hac√≠a ese d√≠a.

title: Disappointed
content: Went there for a family fondue lunch. The fondue was tasteless and too thick. No fries available for small children or something else suitable. There are other places in Gruyere which serve a much better fondue. The old chalet style looks nice inside. If only the food was better.

title: "Le Chalet" food now at "tourist only" level
content:
For decades I had cheese fondues at "Le Chalet" in Gruy√®res, with visitors from abroad and friend from Switzerland - and was always satisfied by the quality of their fondues.
Then they started raising prices, up to 20% above prices in other restaurants in Gruy√®res serving fondues at comparable quality.
This week the restaurant I usually went in Gruy√®res was closed - so I decided to try again "Le Chalet" for fondues, to realise that the fondues served are now really at "tourist only" level.
Fondue had not taste at all (bad cheese selection), bread served was to fresh, of poor quality. Service least to say average.
The only reason for visiting "Le Chalet" imho is just the exceptional atmosphere, great decoration. I grew up in that region, am familiar with cheese fondues (and other cheese products) - for what was served this week a no go.

title: Gnammmm!
content:
Mangiato benissimo, tutto veramente ottimo.
Peccato abbiamo trovato proprio la cameriera con la luna storta... abbastanza antipatica e con un sorrisino falso...

title: Best Fondue
content: Very nice place in this little and cozy town. The fondue was great and also the macaroni whit cheese. The service was ok and price in line with the Swiss standard.

title: Avis
content:
Super restaurant.
Serveuses tr√®s agr√©ables
Fondue d√©licieuse avec pommes de terre et viande s√©ch√©e
Dessert meringue et cr√®me de la gruy√®re d√©licieux
Je recommande vraiment

title: Superbe s√©jour
content: Magnifique endroit, gens sympa et tr√®s bon accueil. Les environs sont interessant surtout au ch√¢teau.

title: Fondue
content: La carte est hyper simple. Il faut y aller pour la raclette et la fondue. Si ce n'est la cadre ni la fondue ni la raclette sort de l'ordinaire. Par contre le cadre a du charme. Les prix sont un poil √©lev√©.

title: Great lunch!
content: Excellent restaurant in a rustic section of the old city. Reservations are a must even for lunch. Family friendly. Great place to experience the aithentic cheese fondue treat. Beautiful scenery adds to the wonderful experience. Looking forward to returning.

title: Resto √† fondue traditionnel
content: Cadre typique, carte traditionnelle, repas terroir. Service agr√©able. Une valeur s√ªre au pays du fromage. Rien a dire, resto sympa.

title: La meilleure fondue en Suisse
content:
Very cozy, nice ambiance. My husband and I had cheese fondue, which was the best we had in all our stay in Switzerland. He had a dessert made of cream and raspberries, very tasty and fresh.
And the price was average, in my opinion a good value for the quality.
If I ever go back to Gruyeres, I will make sure to go there again.

title: Tr√®s bien.
content: C'est un restaurant dans un chalet en bois b√¢tit juste devant l'entr√©e du chateau. Il y r√®gne une ambiance locale et conviviale. Une bonne cuisine avec des tarifs corrects. Une cuisine locale.

title: TIPICO, RUSTICO Y EXCELENTE CARTA
content:
Comida deliciosa. Fondue deliciosa y buena carta de vinos. Cocina tradicional suiza. Ambiente familiar, local silencioso y muy acogedor.
El personal es muy atento, educado y eficiente.
La ubicaci√≥n simplemente idilica.

title: La Suisse autentique
content: cadre chaleureux , personnel sympathique,ambiance typique chalet suisse et repas excellent, on y reviendra

title: Restaurant typique
content: Le Chalet est un restaurant de sp√©cialit√©s a base de fromage fondue , la carte n a pas un grand choix de plat ni de dessert . La salle est d√©cor√©e avec d anciens objets en bois ce qui donne un environnement agr√©able . Le restaurant est bruyant et pas tres bien entretenu .

title: Delicious but be careful when you order
content: As I was travelling alone I ordered the fondue for one. It was delicious and came with the traditional bread, potatoes, cornichon and pickled onions. I was also served a plate of cured meats that I had not ordered. They were a nice addition to the meal. I didn't question this until the bill came. Too late, caught in a common restaurant trick to pad the bill, another 15 francs added to the total.

title: Beau et bon moment au Chalet de Gruyeres
content:
Tr√®s bon restaurant id√©alement situ√© √† Gruy√®res
La cuisine traditionnelle est excellente et la terrasse permet de profiter d'un cadre formidable dans Gruy√®res

title: Nie wieder
content:
Wir waren schon 2/ 3 im le Chalet fondue essen aber heute war es naja.
Man merkt einfach das nur noch ums Geld machen geht.schade
Keine Begr√º√üung im oberen restaurant. Im unteren restaurant stehen sie gelangweilt mit verschr√§nkten armen am bufett und ignorieren die G√§ste. Freundlichkeit ist glaube ich bei den Bedienungen ein Fremdwort.
Das fondue auf das wir uns gefreut haben war lauwarm die Flammen konnte man nicht h√∂her stellen.
F√ºr uns heisst es das wir das Restaurant nicht mehr besuchen werden.

title: Super
content: Super service pour un tr√®s bon repas avec des produits de qualit√©s . Nous avons manger le vacherin et les prix sont tr√®s correcte. Le cadre est typique. Bref √† recommander.

title: Superbe !
content: Fromage de qualit√© et service impeccable, tout cela r√©unis dans un joli cadre typique campagne suisse. nous avons passer un super moment !

title: "Great location on a perfect place"
content: A great Place to have a nice cheese Fondue. The Building is a very old Chalet. Make reservations before you go there because it is a very busy an well known Restaurant.

title: One of the best cheese fondue in Switzerland
content: Been there for the second time with family and friends. Unique location, great customer service and fondue and raclette consistently very good. Great crisp and crunchy pickles served with fondue. Difficult to find place without reservation during weekends. Good with kids and families.

title: Cadre magnifique pour une bonne fondue
content: J'ai mang√© une fondue au vacherin dans ce tr√®s joli restaurant typiquement suisse (d√©co, table, etc). Accueil sympa, service assez rapide, bonne fondue. Seul b√©mol: la fondue √©tait un peu froide au fond, j'ai demand√© √† ce qu'elle soit un tout petit peu r√©chauff√©e (on doit la manger ti√®de). Pour le reste, c'√©tait tr√®s bien!

title: Typiquement Suisse
content:
J'ai fait visiter la Gruy√®re √† un ami fran√ßais, enfin alsacien qui a ador√© le cadre et le repas.
Fondue excellente, on a pas eu le courage de prendre un dessert.
La serveuse aux petits soins.
Parfait

title: Incompar√°vel!
content: Almo√ßamos no Le Chalet, e nossa pedida foi Fondue de queijo e Raclete. Simplesmente incompar√°vel, o sabor e o atendimento! O Restaurante conta com dois andares e √© muito lindo!

title: Un peu d√©√ßu
content:
Le restaurant est typique, les plats tr√®s bons mais vraiment d√©√ßu par le service surtout avec un prix si √©lev√©.
Nous ne retournerons pas dans ce restaurant.

title: K√§seplausch
content: Sehr beliebt, Reservation empfohlen (bis 10 Personen nur telefonisch), im oberen Stock ist es gem√ºtlicher, Fondue und Raclette gibts auch je f√ºr nur eine Person (29.- inkl. ca. 200g K√§se, Brot, Kartoffeln, Silberzwiebeln, Essiggurken), wobei mich der K√§se im Fondue mehr √ºberzeugt hat (Raclette gut, aber nicht herausragend), f√ºrs Dessert hatten wir keinen Platz mehr, gute lokale Weine dazu, der f√ºrs Fondue ben√∂tigte Kirsch ist auch nicht so teuer, Personal taut erst allm√§hlich auf, hat wohl schon zu viele Touristen bedient, frische Kleider f√ºr den n√§chsten Tag einpacken (K√§se und Tischgrill ...) - so etwa war unser in Gruy√®res obligatorische K√§seplausch hier!

title: Super Ambiente
content: Sehr herziges, gem√ºtliches Restaurant. Essen und Wein war super! Bedienung freundlich und konnte auch deutsch sprechen! K√∂nnen wir weiter empfehlen. Ist sehr warm im Restaurant.

title: Loved the cheese fondue!
content: The cheese fondue at the Chalet was fabulous. It contained a variety of cheeses, some white wine, and was full of flavour. We enjoyed dipping the fresh bread into the fondue, and it also came with cooked potatoes. At the end, we asked the server to turn up the heat on the remaining cheese in the bottom of the pot so it would get nice and crunchy, and she willingly obliged. Lovely, paired with local beer.

title: Favoloso!
content: Bellissimo ristorante molto accogliente e tipicamente svizzero. Personale molto gentile e disponibile, sempre attento ai tavoli (nonostante fosse pieno non ho dovuto attendere mai tra una portata e l'altra o a fare le ordinazioni). Ho mangiato sia la fondue, sia la raclette, entrambe ottime. Pure il dessert √® stato delizioso ed abbondante. I prezzi nella media della regione. Un consiglio: riservate la sala al piano superiore perch√© √® una favola!

title: Absolutely worthless
content: Wow, so disappointed. Have no clue why this place has any good reviews. Both waitress were snooty and rude, wouldn't explain menu properly. Place stinks with flys everywhere. Super overpriced. Left with a 130 euro bill and hungry. Just melted cheese and potatoes. 40 euros for a small plate of cured ham. Wine extremely over priced. Can I mention again how bad the service was? Such a horrible tourist trap. I felt used and unwelcome. One of the worst places I have ever been, food was just as bad.

title: Awesome Food
content: If you are looking for great fondue in the beautiful town of Gruyerre this is it. Our 2nd time eating here and we were not disappointed. Service and restaurant are warm and friendly, we will definitely be back,

title: Almo√ßo
content:
Comemos um fundue e um raclette e foi fant√°stico e serve tranquilamente 4 pessoas!

Atendimento bom e com atendentes que falam portugu√™s!

Segue a foto da sobremesa com a tradicional creme double de l√° gruyere!

Vale muito a pena e recomendo!

title: Imperdible la fondue y los macarrones pero deben mejorar la atenci√≥n.
content: Sab√≠amos por otros viajeros que era EL lugar para comer fondue, obviamente de queso gruyere. Llegamos a Gruyere a las 11:30 pasamos a reservar previamente para las 13:00 y nos dieron la posibilidad de elegir la mesa, elegimos una mesa en planta baja al lado de una ventana. Al llegar nuestra mesa estaba ocupada y nadie si hizo cargo, nos llevaron al primer piso. Las camareras se la pasan hablando entre ellas con lo que para que lo atiendan a uno hay que pasarse haciendoles se√±as. Digamos que la comida salva al lugar, muy rica la fondue, y muy buenos los macarrones gratinados al gruyere, los postres correctos. La relaci√≥n precio/calidad es buena.

title: Tipico Svizzero, cibo ottimo
content:
Cibo ottimo! al nostro tavolo abbiamo mangiato insalate, fondue, raclette, carne alla griglia e desserts. Il tutto era ottimo e di qualit√†.
Il personale veramente disponibile e gentile.
consiglio: raclette e desserts (meringhe e double creme o lamponi e double creme)
Ci torner√≤ sicuro!

PS: l'unica nota dolente √® che, visto il tipo di pietanze proposte (formaggi cotti direttamente al tavolo), i vestiti poi puzzano terribilmente.. ma ne vale la pena!

title: Authentique et d√©licieux !
content:
On pourrait difficilement faire plus typique ! Au c≈ìur du tr√®s mignon petit bourg de Gruy√®res (√ßa ne s'invente pas), l'odeur de fromage et le cadre chaleureux nous plongent directement dans l'ambiance ! Cuisine excellente ! Je suis fan de la cro√ªte (on n'y vient pas pour faire r√©gime ^^) j'ai √©galement go√ªt√© la fondue et la quiche de mes voisins de table, le tout d√©licieux (et convient parfaitement v√©g√©). Et m√™me s'il ne reste absolument plus de place pour le dessert, il convient tout de m√™me de craquer pour une petite meringue glac√©e (meringue + boule de vanille). Ne suis personnellement pas fan du sceau de cr√®me (litt√©ralement !!!) servi avec, mais ok, c'est une sp√©cialit√©...
Rien √† redire sur la qualit√© donc, un tout petit b√©mol cependant pour le service. Notre serveuse n'√©tait pas du tout d√©sagr√©able mais pas tr√®s attentionn√©e... Un excellent moment tout de m√™me !

title: Les touristes l'appr√©cient mais pleurent es prix
content:
dans le temps nous visiteurs r√©guliers et on osait prendre un caf√© sur le balcon sans craindre la facture. Aujourd'hui c'est un must pour chinois, russes qui trouvent m√™me leur langue sur le menu.
Les prix sont bien cach√©s e indiqu√©s de fa√ßon malhonn√™te (sans CHF et souvent du vol)

title: Nous avons FONDUE
content: Restaurant atypique, quand nous rentrons nous sommes transport√©s dans un chalet d'alpage (d√©coration et tenue du personnel). Accueil tr√®s agr√©able, la carte est compos√© de plats traditionnels locaux. La fondue est sublime.... le b√©mol est le prix un peu √©lev√© et pour accueillir un maximum de personnes les tables sont serr√©es. Malgr√© tout si vous allez √† Gruy√®re il faut faire une halte. Un conseil reservez

title: ottima la funduta
content:
un bel posto, caratteristico, assai affollato.
La fonduta √® davvero ottima, molto buone anche le meringhe alla doppia panna.

Prezzi abbastanza alti

title: Mahnifique
content: Si vous avez la chance d avoir une des petites tables install√©es sur le devant du chalet, le lieu est typique et magnifique. La carte un peu chere Mais d√©paysante tout comme le personnel qui para√Æt venir d un autre monde...

title: Formaggio a volont√†!
content:
Lo chalet √® un locale dall'atmosfera molto calda e accogliente situato sulla strada che porta al castello di Gruyeres..impossibile non notarlo!
Abbiamo mangiato degli ottimi crostoni al formaggio, accompagnati con salumi e del vino ros√® locali....una vera goduria!!! Servizio efficiente.

title: Excellent repas typiquement Suisse !
content:
Il s'agit d'un endroit cosy, qui refl√®te l'ambiance de la montagne, une fois pass√© le seuil de la porte nous sommes vite submerg√©s par les odeurs de fromage comme le gruy√®re ou la raclette. En effet, la carte nous propose un large choix de plat √† base de fromage, de crudit√©s, et autres grillades. Pour les gourmands, il y a des desserts comme des framboises avec de la double cr√®me de Gruy√®re, ou un accompagnement avec de la meringue, des glaces diverses et caf√© glac√©.
Toutes ces bonnes choses sont √† des prix un peu √©lev√© pour des jeunes couples ou familles nombreuses malgr√© qu'il s'agisse de francs suisses ...

title: I have no words to describe the experience we had!
content:
We went there a Monday noon and we were delightful from the service, the place and the delicious food!
Go there and enjoy the raclette with baby boiled potatoes, the cheese and cold cuts, the fondue and of course the amazing deserts with the fresh cream of Gruyeres.
Don't miss the meringues with ice cream and the marron cream.
Absolutely recommended!

title: Best lunch in Switzerland
content: My family had lunch here (we believe) in 1967 or 1968. I remember the fondue was amazing and nothing much has changed. Please note, in high or shoulder season, reservations for lunch are a must even though we we told differently. They are very busy, especially on the large outdoor terrace. So be patient. The service is a little slow but they are doing their best to provide a great customer experience. Looking forward to our next visit!

title: Fondue agreable

title: Buena comida en un buen entorno

Tras repasar los men√∫s del resto de restaurantes del pueblo, y comprobar que eran b√°sicamente los mismos... pues nos decantamos por el mas pintoresco. Aunque hacia algo de calor, comimos en el comedor del piso alto (es mas bonito que el de abajo...) nos situamos en una mesa pegada a una ventana para disfrutar el paisaje y nos pedimos una Fondue para los dos (la camarera se extra√±o de que solo pidi√©semos una y nos quer√≠a colocar otro plato mas, pero la idea era mas que cenar, tomar un brunch tard√≠o y probar la fondue en su origen)

Riqu√≠sima, nos dieron para acompa√±arla unas patatitas asadas y pan, y estaba fant√°stica. Nos llego de sobra para los dos, as√≠ que si vais, tened en cuenta que las raciones son algo grandes.

De precio... como todo en Suiza, caro para nuestros bolsillos, pero normal para lo que es all√≠. La fondue 29.50 chf y las cervezas a 4.40 la Cardinal (que es la t√≠pica y mas normalita...) y a 6.00 otras marcas de la zona. A todo esto se puede pagar con euros pero te hacen el cambio facil (para ellos, claro), 1‚Ç¨ = 1chf, pero esta facilidad la ver√©is en otros locales con el mismo tipo de cambio.

El local... precioso tanto por dentro como por fuera, la decoraci√≥n muy alpina, y el trato con los empleados del local excepcional, todos muy atentos y amables. Se hac√≠an entender perfectamente, y se agradece el esfuerzo.

title: Cozy mutha?!$&@(/

title: Perfect reward after a hike!
content:
After spending the late afternoon hiking through the gorges of the Jogne, a big pot of fondue sounded like a dream to us. We drove from Charmey to the fairytale town of Gruy√®re and walked up to this picturesque chalet to claim our reward. On a Thursday evening in September, one hour before closing, we were graciously received and sat at a roomy table in the terrace. We ordered the viable seche, one pot of fondue and a demi-liter of Cotes du Rh√¥ne. We were given a bread, cornichons, pearl onions and young potatoes for dipping in the melted cheese. Our food was delicious and very pleasant, though our server was a bit flustered around closing and completely forgot to bring the carafe of water I asked for. But overall, we had a lovely time and I would highly recommend this to anyone visiting the area.

PS: We had meringue with double creme Gruy√®re earlier in the day so we skipped it here, but if you haven't had it, this would be a great place to indulge!

title: Good fondue in Gruyeres
content: Good place to go in Gruyere to taste an authentic swiss fondue. Prices are quite high for average european people, but just as the rest of restaurants in Gruyeres. We asked for a 3-person fondue (29 CHF each person) to be shared among 6 people, and in fact it was more than enough. The waitresses were very welcoming and kind, and after the lunch we had a 10% discount in a local store.

Opting away from the standard fondue or raclette options (the weather was too warm for such heavy meals), we had the soup du jour (vege with pasta and cream - average tasting), cheese platter (including a beautiful goat cheese and a soft cheese), Gruy√®re quiche (very tasty) and the pi√©ce-de-resistance: Gruy√®re's famous double cream, served with both raspberries and tasty fresh meringues! title: OMG delish beyond!!!
content:
Right in the heart of the town of Gruyeres is an authentic fondue restaurant and I cannot begin to describe how happy your taste buds will be with you for going!!! We ordered the classic fondue - giant pot of the MOST amazing cheese I have ever had - talk about having "Gruyeres in Gruyeres" LOLOL You can actually hear the cow bells clanging in the distance while you are eating their fabulous cheese!!!

We were fortunate to have made an online reservation prior to going on vacation so they had a table by a window waiting for us - and the gentle mountain breeze was blowing in as we filled ourselves to capacity!!!

One thing, however - be warned - we were lucky that the exchange rate was 1:1 - and lunch was still about $80 per couple - fondue lunch in Switzerland is very expensive...but you only live once!!!

title: Excelente fondue
content:
En el √∫ltimo viaje a Europa cruzamos los Alpes s√≥lo para ir a Suiza a conocer la cuna del queso Gruyere. Como no pod√≠a ser de otra manera, luego de visitar la f√°brica modelo y otros puntos de inter√©s, se impon√≠a cerrar la jornada a toda orquesta cenando fondue en el mism√≠simo castillo de Gruyere (aunque su nombre t√©cnico es Chateau ST Germain), y sin lugar a dudas fue un adecuado broche de oro para esta excursi√≥n netamente gastron√≥mica...jejeje. title: Speciale
content: Cenetta tra romantica e rustica. Ambiente veramente unico e tipico, pure il personale di sala in vestito tradizionale, molto cordiale e abituato a gestire i turisti. La fonduta merita e i dolci con doppia panna poi sono indimenticabili. Gran finale con distillato di albicocche. Veramente da non perdere e vale i soldi spesi.

title: Good food experience
content: We visited with family, a mix of adults and children. We ate in the courtyard and ordered fondue and raclette. The food was good and the experience of these two unique dishes combined was very good however, unless you want cheese overload I'd suggest one portion feeds two especially if you have children in tow. Also some variety may help. The downside for us was the smoking. We had people smoking at three tables near us and one was a chain smoker. The net effect was nicotine flavoured fondue in a choked smokey environment. Eating outside you'd hope to avoid it but the restaurant provides great shade on the terrace and it seemed to keep the smoke in. In fairness to the restaurant Swiss law may be at fault here rather than the chalet itself. I'd like to give a better review but what may have been a great culinary experience was undone by the smokey environment

title: La mejor founde

title: The Best Quiche Ever.

My husband got the fondue, which was good, but he quickly wished he had gotten the raclette when he saw it at other tables. I have no regrets about the quiche. You know how you have that one meal on a vacation and you dream about forever afterwards? This was it for me.

title: tres typique
content: restaurant charmant au c≈ìur de gruy√®re au pied du ch√¢teau - cuisine a base de fromage suisse -caf√© a la double cr√®me excellent - personnel au top

This is a nice place with the Swiss chalet ambiance in a medieval town setting where you can enjoy Swiss food in a town that has its own cheese! As a non-Swiss I can get over cheesed but we started with two nice sized and tasty salads. This was followed by a Mac and cheese with ham that I really enjoyed and ham and cheese baked on toast that was flavorful but overwhelmed me a bit, like fondue in a dish with ham.

We were too full for desserts that looked tasty. Ordering is mostly in French or pointing but it worked fine. An nice place worth the visit.

content: Friendly service and lovely terrace, not much menu variety but fondue was very tasty and great raspberries with Gruyere double cream!

At the end we paid 50 CHF per person and it worthed it each franc suisse.

Cute setting, very good service and prices what you would expect in Switzerland.

title: Great!
content: In the center of the castle I did not expect much from what looks like standard swiss chalet. I was very surprised to get fast, efficient service and great food. The 'Macaroni' dish was the best Ive had, a great taste of the area. Would definitely eat here again.

content: This place is specially for Cheese lovers. This is not the place for non Cheese lovers. If you are planning to this place in weekends its better book a table before you go as this Village will be crowded in Weekends. Staff is good and Price will be bit high.

rien √† dire √† part que la fondue et raclette est tr√®s bonne, les patate tr√®s chaude, comme on les aime et surtout fraiche! le pain frais, tr√®s bon aussi (si on en aurais du aussi bon par Fribourg ce serais g√©nial). content:

title: Restaurant: Fondue sehr lecker
content: es ist sehr nett schweizerisch eingerichtet und es riecht extrem nach K√§se im Inneren. Das Personal ist sehr fleissig und hat viel zu tun, was zu Wartezeiten f√ºhrt. also einfach zu wenig Personal, wenn der Laden voll ist. sonst wirklich nett dort. Wir waren nur im Restaurant.

content:
Nous voulions faire d√©couvrir un restaurant typique avec des amis venus sp√©cialement d'Alsace. Cependant pas de suggestions ni conseils de la serveuse. Quand un plat n'est plus disponible, on le sait juste au moment de la commande. Nous avons command√© une cro√ªte au fromage, tr√®s imbib√© de vin blanc alors qu'on ne voulait pas de plat avec alcool... mais rien d'inscrit sur la carte.
Dommage. La serveuse nous a chang√© le plat heureusement. Pour finir c'est globalement assez cher. Quasiment 10 chf la bouteille d'eau. Mais les macaronis √©taient d√©licieuses, √† recommander :-)

title: Acceuil chaleureux
content:
Personnel vraiment aimable, les plats sont assez bons mais vraiment sans plus.

title: Aunque turistico la comida es muy
content: He estado varias veces y siempre pedimos raclette , es la mejor que he probado. Tienen dos opciones : la racion o "A volont√©" en la que van sacando queso hasta que decides parar.

title: stay away from the croute du fromage
content: great atmosphere inside, but the Croute was simply horrible. There was no flavor at all, and the bread was practically fresh bread lithesome melted cheese and some ham. I have lived in Switzerland for five years now and have had this dish on numerous occasions, but this was absolutely the worst one ever. We also ordered wine, but the waitress forgot about it. We had to remind her HALFWAY through our dinner, so she finally brought it. I'll never be back...

title: Tourist trap, but probably the best in town
content:
Le Chalet comes up highly rated in every Gruyeres review. The town is simply small and very touristic, but as we were there for the Giger museum and wanted to try the famous fondue, we gave it a try anyway.
It's a cute little Swiss chalet, with all the local specialities, but beware of the "tourist trap"... our meal ended up costing more than CHF 100. The fondue comes in a single portion for CHF 29.50 (take this option if you eat light, the portion for two people is simply enormous, including potatoes, and bread).
Lesson learned when visting a super touristic town... if you are hungry and can't afford to wait driving to the next town then try this place.
The service was a bit hit and miss - we were welcomed by a fantastic warm Swiss lady, but then saw the staff eating their staff meal next to us. Upon the shift change, another (very cranky) lady served us with no charm and almost hurried us out of the restaurant.
In hindsight, we would have driven elsewhere to have a warmer Swiss experience.

title: O melhor fondue do mundo!
content:
N√£o pode existir melhor fondue no mundo! S√≥ de lembrar me d√° √°gua na boca!
O lugar √© muito aconchegante e o atendimento √© excelente. Pedimos uma reclette e um fondue. Acabamos com os dois e ainda raspamos a panela. √â bom fazer reserva. Fomos muito bem atendidos por uma portuguesa, o que facilitou a comunica√ß√£o. Espero poder voltar em breve!

title: pour une bonne fondue

title: Touristy place, nice food
