title: Pour une raclette sur une terrasse d'un village M√©di√©vale.
content:
Sans r√©server, je suis all√© un samedi vers 13 h 15. Personnel visiblement avec une grande charge de travail, bon accueil.
J'ai mang√© une raclette avec une assiette de viande s√©ch√©e, une bonne portion de fromage √† raclette et j'ai termin√© avec des fruits rouge en dessert et la fameuse double cr√®me de la Gruy√®re.

title: bien agr√©able
content: Le parking du haut pr√®s du village est bien pratique. Il permet d'acc√©der au village et de le visiter sans peine. Le Bourg m√©di√©val et son ch√¢teau est magnifique. Le Chalet est la cerise sur le g√¢teau. L'accueil y est fort sympathique et nous sommes transpos√©s dans un chalet d'alpage traditionnel tellement tout est parfait dans sa d√©coration. Nous choisissons la raclette et finissons par les petits fruits √† la cr√®me de Gruy√®res. Nous sommes heureux de ce moment pass√© dans un environnement typique de chez nous. Le service √©tait tr√®s aimable et le prix tout √† fait correct pour une exp√©rience m√©morable. Nous reviendrons souvent.Jf2g

title: Une adresse typique de Gruy√®res
content:
Je n'√©tais pas revenue depuis de nombreuses ann√©es, mais l'exp√©rience fut toujours aussi sympathique !

L'√©tage est un peu plus typique que le rez de chauss√©e, la fondue au vacherin est toujours aussi bonne, pareil pour la viande s√©ch√©e, le tout accompagn√© d'un bon vin suisse.

Le tout tr√®s bon. Service un peu long, mais avec le sourire. A leur d√©charge, malgr√© l'heure tr√®s tardive pour le lunch (15h), le restaurant √©tait plein √† notre arriv√©e.

R√©servation conseill√©e.

title: AFFOLLATISSIMO
content: bello l'ambiente ma troppo turistico. Molto pieno, non abbiamo trovato posto. Personale stanco e stressato.

title: typique !
content: En premier il vaudra mieux reserver , ensuite c'est pour moi l'endroit le plus adapt√© pour deguster les sp√©cialit√©s fromag√®res et c'est pour cela que vous serez venus ( sinon il y a un mac'do √† bulle) et enfin le service est tr√©s aimable et non stop , alors pourquoi hesiter davantage ?

title: Fondue overdose
content:
Dined here during our visit after the recommendation by our Fairmont concierge also matched with Tripadvisor. Good fondue and pleasant service.

- from Montreux we took the train to Montbovon. This route is known as the Golden Pass. Take a regional train from here to Gruyere. After getting off at Gruyere, exit left at the railway station and at the main road cross the railway tracks. At the cross roads, follow the footpath uphill along the main road and as the road curves, you will see Gruyere on your left. Mind you, it is an uphill climb and takes about 15-20 mins to reach Gruyere. When in the main square, turn left and walk till you see the wooden structure of the chalet again on your left.

- We struggled to finished the fondue for 2. Please ration according to your appetite.

- We sat in the terrace on the left as the main building was a bit too hot for our liking. Can be packed. Was a bit better at about 5 pm when we had our late lunch.

Enjoy

title: Typiquement suisse
content:
Vous chercher de l'authenticit√©, le c√¥t√© rustique et l'ambiance alpage, en gros la suisse typique: c'est ici qu'il faut venir.

Fromage et charcuterie de qualit√© (donc vous avez compris si vous n'aimez pas la fondue au fromage et la raclette passez votre chemin) servis par des serveuses, en costume d'√©poque, autant sympathique qu'efficace.

Niveau finance √ßa reste pas donn√© mais bon en m√™me temps vous √™tes en suisse et c'est bon.

title: authentic setting
content: Great fondue and raclette, but not a lot of other choices. Friendly service and they have colour-in place matts for kids. It is a must to have merengues and cream after dinner.

title: fondue dans ce restaurant
content:
accueil tr√®s chaleureux ..la fondue fromage mixte accompagn√©e de viande de grisons et petites pommes de terre excellente et tr√®s copieusx et un conseil pour 2 personnes ne prendre qu'une fondue et n'oubliez pas les fruits des bois et autres servis avec un ramequin de double cr√®me ...d√©licieux.
Le village est √† visiter absolument.

title: The best bet in Gruyeres
content: A cosy little restaurant that offers the best fondue you have ever tasted.It is wall to wall with castle. Make reservation in high season or won't get in.

title: excelente
content: Fuimos a cenar, las camareras impecables, muy amables y simp√°ticas. El ambiente muy bonito y acogedor. Y la comida inmejorable, pedimos fondue y raclette, y nos trajeron m√°s cantidad cuando vieron que se hab√≠a acabado el queso de raclette. Fue una cena magn√≠fica y el pueblo iluminado es precioso.

title: as usual very excellent
content:
Typical Swiss Restaurant where you have to eat Fondue, excellent said by a Swiss, Raclette, which is also fine but the best one is in Valais, or a Charbonnade...drink a typical white wine from the terrasses de lavaux and enjoy the ambient...

The dessert are also very good double-cream with Meringues or mixed berries, but a litte overprice...
at the end a nice shot of apricot, pear or plum spirits

Booking is mandatory

title: Tr√®s bon
content: Nous avons mang√© dans ce restaurant. Nous avons bien √©videment pris une fondue qui √©tait Excellente. Le seul reproche √† faire √† ce restaurant est sur le tarif. Sur les dessert surtout. Nous avons m√™me pr√©f√©r√© aller en manger un ailleur.

title: Worthy of the town
content:
We ate here solely because it was # 1 on Trip Advisor!

Hey everybody. You were right!

I'm sure all the restos in town are good. They all looked delicious.

My advice? Go to Grueyere. It's not as touristy as we read and a real treasure. If you do eat at Le Chalet we had yummy garden salad, yummy yummy fondue, and triple yummy raclet!

title: excellent !
content:
tres bel endroit pour manger une fondue mi gruyere mi vacherin , m√™me en plein √©t√© !
service rapide et personnel agr√©able.

title: Best Cheese Fondue
content: The cheese fondue is great, but don't miss out on the dessert with the cream along with raspberries.

title: Great place to enjoy with the fondue, maybe the best!
content: The gruyeres town is an amaizing place and the restaurant is a great location. We decided to go because the recommendations and after the dinner we can say that the food, quality and service was really very good. The quality versus price was good as well. Two portions of fondue, two consome and a bottle of swiss wine was 92FR

title: Del√≠cia de Fondue
content: Quer comer o melhor fondue? Tomar um excelente vinho? e namorar a luz da lua? ent√£o corra para o Le Chalet.

title: Bon restaurant
content:
Nous n'avons pas mang√© beaucoup de choses (crudit√©s, assiette de charcuterie et fromages, framboises √† la double-cr√®me) mais elles √©tait tr√®s bonnes et servies avec de grands sourires.
Je pense donc que la r√©putation du Chalet n'est pas du tout usurp√©e et je recommande ce restaurant si vous mangez √† Gruy√®res.

title: A great fondue in a great restaurant.
content:
A trip to Gruyeres would not be complete without a fondue, and Le Chalet did not let us down. A traditionally rustic building and friendly helpful staff made us feel at home.
The wine wad delicious and the moitie, moitie fondue (half Gruyeres and half Vacherin) was out of this world. There was plenty of it, served unusually with small boiled potatoes as well as bread, and we all ate to the bottom of the pan, where my sister and I scraped the crusty bits of cheese stuck to the base of the pot. My brother in-law who was not at all sure about eating so much cheese thoroughly enjoyed every mouthful. As others have said, it was not cheap, but it was wonderful.

title: Traditional Swiss fare. Great setting!
content:
The most famous restaurant in Le Gruyeres, for sure. The outside was unmistakably Swiss, and the food, even more so.

The seating was quite tight but fine. We had fondue, meat on a hot plate, and cream and strawberries; raspberries were not in season. It was a really tasty meal and one should experience this at least once.

Service was quite good and there were many other traditional dishes to try. Recommended.

title: fantastico
content: A chi non piace il formaggio e la fondue basta prendere la grigliata di carne! tutto davvero ottimo e che dire della dubble cream !!! lasciate perdere il colesterolo e godetevela !

title: Delicious (but not inexpensive) regional specialties
content:
I ate a thoroughly delicious dinner of regional specialties at the Restaurant Le Chalet one night in May. I began with a generous salad that included a nicely dressed selection of various greens, carrots, and hardboiled egg. I then tried the raclette -- my first experience with it, and I thought it wonderful! I ordered a portion of very thinly sliced dried meat with it (excellent!), and also enjoyed its standard accompaniments ‚Äì small potates, pickles, pickled onions, and bread. Everything was very tasty! And I couldn‚Äôt resist the local dessert specialty ‚Äì meringue served with double cream. OMG, that was good! Thank goodness my server suggested the half portion!

My table faced a window that looked down Gruyeres‚Äôs main street, so I had a wonderful view of the town and the mountains beyond it. Other seats faced the restaurant‚Äôs pleasantly rustic d√©cor. The service I received was attentive and courteous and appropriately relaxed.

I enjoyed this evening very much, but ‚Äì as I expected -- it was not inexpensive. (You can check the menu on line.) I thought it worth the price to experience these delicious local specialties, but I can‚Äôt speak for you.

title: Un bell'ambiente per gustare la fondue
content:
Molto grazioso " Lo Chalet" e caldo come ambiente dove si possono provare tutte le specialit√† della regione a base di formaggio Gruy√®res,oltre le grigliate..
Memorabile la semplice coppa di lamponi servita con il mastellino di legno con la "double cr√®me".
Molto gentile e paziente il personale che deve servire i clienti di questo locale sempre pieno.

title: Toujours aussi bon!
content:
Entre amis, en famille, les occasions ne manquent pas pour venir manger une fondue au chalet.
On y est toujours bien servi, la fondue; la double cr√®me et toutes les sp√©cialit√©s sont excellentes.
On appr√©cie y venir tous les ans.
Mieux vaut r√©server dans la salle du haut, plus typique

title: Tr√®s bonne adresse
content: Charmant chalet dans le village de gruy√®res , ici tout est mignon et typique . Tr√®s bonne raclette , mention sp√©ciale pour la fondue excellente et le service . Seul b√©mol: une salle un peu bruyante

title: Le chalet l√† haut sur la montagne
content: Restaurant avec carte de circonstance : fondus, raclette sous toutes ces formes. Meilleurs fondus suisse que j'ai mang√© mi vacherin-mi gruy√®re avec en dessert une meringue double cr√®me. Service sympa, bien mang√©, cadre agr√©able si vous mang√© dehors. Le plus: il nous ont dit d'avance que les framboises √©taient surgel√©es. Le moins: le prix, mais bon, on est en suisse!

title: Super bon
content:
Je ne suis pas du tout fan des fondues, mais je dois avouer qu'ici, c'√©tait vraiment bon.
D√©cors et serveuses qui vous emportent dans le petit monde des suisse.
Vous vous sentez completement ailleurs et mangez √† votre faim. Le fromage est succulent.. et le reste aussi.
Un fou rire venant d'une table, et c'est le restaurant qui rigole.
A recommand√©!!

title: calda atmosfera in una valle svizzera
content:
Prima di cenare abbiamo visitato il piccolo centro di Gruyeres, spettacolare posizione nella valle del fiume Sarine nel cantone del Friburgo. Atmosfera estremamente rilassante fuori in un contesto lontanissimo dalla confusione delle citt√† tra prati verdi, greggi e fattorie ....
Lo Chalet s'impone come chiusura della giornata: offre accoglienza e menu ricco e gustosissimo!
Alcuni suggerimenti: fromages assortis, raclette, fondue, grillade du chalet, meringue avec creme de gruyeres, ...
Irresistibile! Identificate prima della cena l'autista che vi ricondurr√† a casa o in albergo....

title: Traditional lunch.
content:
We visited Gruyeres earlier this week while on holiday. The village itself is wonderfully picturesque .

Lunch in the Chalet was interesting. We opted for the Swiss delicacy of Raclette. A pound of local cheese which is melted under a grill contraption on your table with bread, dried meat, pickles and small boiled potatoes. Accompanied by a local beer. It was very good and very filling. You scrape the melted cheese off the top and spread it on your bread etc.

We thoroughly enjoyed it. It is quite a social way of eating lunch.

Quite expensive but that seems to be the norm in Switzerland. The service was friendly but with our limited French and the waitress having little English no scope for conversation.

Well worth a visit. There are plenty of eating places in Gruyeres with the Chalet being a bit further up the hill but worth the effort.

title: Caratteristico!!
content: L hotel e'molto carino vicino al castello e caratteristico. Fonduta e raclette ottime! Servizio un po cosi, nel senso che ho chiesto consiglio ma la cameriera non consigliava! Prezzo giusto!!! Lo consiglio vivamente!

title: √† recommander
content: un d√©cor magnifique, un service tr√®s attentionn√©, une carte sympathique et typique du pays gruy√©rien, mieux vaut r√©server!

title: Delicious Fondue
content: Nice atmosphere, friendly service, and good food. There were three of us and we ordered Fondue for two. It was just enough and we had a little room left for dessert and coffee. We were glad we made reservations as it was very busy for a late lunch. Will go back when we have more guests looking for a good fondue.

title: Learn the real beauty of La Gruyere
content:
It's a picturesque parts of Switzerland. This is a must to go site. La Gruyere could be proud of it's traditions. We visited this May, which is a unique time to feel a grass fragrance and the Alpine flora. I understood why the internationally reputed cheeses are so delicious.
Le chalet has a typical decor and view. The decor of a typical Alpine chalet was very nice and the smell of a gruyere was unforgettable. We saw to many tools and object that now became the decor of the chalet.
We had a very typical menu with fondue, raclette and some other specialities. We were full and couldn't imagine to eat any more. We advised to taste the dessert too and we couldn't resist. I will advise to taste a berries and an ice cream with double cream before leaving the region. That was something you will never find in any place else.

title: tre bien
content:
nous avons passe au chalet une exellente soir√©e
le personel d une grande gentillesse et tre serviable
le decord tres chaleureux notre repas fromage super soupe chalet que je recommande croute au fromage tout est parfait

title: very touristy but wonderful for cheese lovers
content: Absolutely touristy but are really delicious Fondue and raclet, prepared according to the tradition and with the fresh and DOC ingredients. The desserts are nice. Huge and crowded, but the place really nice.

title: Caratteristico chalet di montagna
content: Lo chalet dove √® ubicato il ristorante √® molto bello e sorge in prossimit√† del magnifico Castello di Gruy√®res. All'interno l'ambiente √® molto caldo e tipico di uno chalet di montagna. Menu non molto assortito ma perfetto per chi, come il sottoscritto, adora la fondue (particolarmente buona fatta con il gruy√®re) e la raclet. Buoni anche i desserts. Costo in linea con i prezzi della Svizzera.

title: Buono, ma veramente troppo turistico
content: √à gi√† la seconda volta che mangio qui. Non posso dire di essermi trovata male, ma questo posto da essenzialmente l'impressione di essere un meccanico distributore di cibo per turisti. Il locale √® molto bello e Gruy√®re √® incantevole. Vale la pena probabilmente visitare entrambi fuori dai giorni affollati per non avere questa brutta impressione. Secondo me √® abbastanza caro. In pi√π sul men√π quando si ordina Raclette a volont√© non √® specificato che √® a volont√† se ordinata da pi√π di tre persone, altrimenti √® una porzione normale (anche un po' scarsa direi...)

title: Eat there every visit
content: We always eat here for a good swiss fondue whenever we visit Gruyeres. Be sure to also try the meringue dessert. Was not interested to try, but glad I did! A swiss tradition, on which I am hooked!

title: Good food but poor service
content:
I am still not sure if I have to consider this restaurant as a tourist trap or not.
The food was good (don't miss the double cream meringue !) however pretty expensive, the restaurant design is a bit too much to be authentic and the service was quite bad.
We were forced to buy a bottle of water while I had clearly asked for tap water... the waitress didn't give us a single smile nor a gently word, she was busy and almost rude. We could feel as well they wanted to have a high customer turn-over, she was asking for our order too early and we felt like pushed out to the exit once we were done with our meal.
As well, the food was too wine-flavored, I had a hard time finishing my meal while my japanse friend simply can't "eat" that much alcohol!

title: Die beste K√§sefondue der Welt
content: hier gibt es die beste K√§sefondue der Welt.In einer urigen Scheune gibt es hier alles was irgendwie um K√§se handelt.Vom Fondue mit jungen Kartoffeln bis zum Raclette mit oder ohne B√ºndnerfleisch....Alles genial.

title: Delicioso fondue!!!
content: Es un lugar en el centro de Gruyere, la carta es peque√±a y sencilla. El fondue es maravilloso, simplemente lo mejor junto con el postre de merengues. Lo que es de mediana calidad es la atenci√≥n pues estaba muy lleno el restaurante y poco personal

title: Good, but not great, fondue; okay service
content: Le Chalet comes highly recommended in several guidebooks. Perhaps because it is just a few steps from the Chateau de Gruyeres. The fondue was good. Nothing special. A little too wine-flavored to be top-ranked. The dipping bread a little too light and fluffy. The service was efficient, but not particularly friendly. It seems strange that getting GREAT fondue in the heart of Gruyeres should be difficult. There's certainly no shortage of great cheese.

title: Good fondue
content: The fondue was quite good, although be sure there will be no problem with understanding your request. We asked for one fondue (of course to share between two) and they charged us two times. Almost 50 Euros!!!. It was a big pot with a lot of cheese and we came up to realize this issue when we asked for the bill. The service was ok, but not to say Wow! Anyway I reccommend this place for tourists who want to have a good cheese experience.

title: Pas le meilleur de Gruy√®res
content:
Etant une grande fan de fondue j'ai √©t√© assez d√©√ßue du Chalet. Trop cher (portions trop petites aussi), service m√©diocre, et fondue "touristes" assez standard et peu savoureuse. Deux amis ont pris les macaronis et ont express√©ment demand√© une grande portion... Il s'est aver√© que leur petite portion (21.-/pp) √©tait √† partager...
Grande d√©ception pour eux.
Il y a assez de bons endroits qui servent de d√©licieuses fondues √† des prix un peu plus bas √† Gruy√®res... Je n'y retournerai plus.

title: Swiss from top to toe
content: Ah Gruyeres ..... cheese and lots of it, everywhere. It was raining, we rushed into the delightful Chalet for cover and comfort from the weather. We absolutely found THE best, authentic Swiss cuisine ..... yummy fondue and macaroni dishes followed by berries and cream, and the others had huge meringues with cream and a splash of berries. Staff were dressed in traditional 'costume' and were friendly and extremely efficient. The older waitress that we had kept a close eye on the entire scene. Great value for money and generous serves.

title: ChC50
content: Dans le village suisse de Gruy√®res, perch√© sur une petite colline o√π tr√¥ne un chateau m√©di√©val, nous avons d√©couvert le "Chalet", restaurant typique de chalet d'alpage. Nous nous sommes d√©lect√©s des sp√©cialit√©s culinaires de la Gruy√®re en d√©gustant la d√©licieuse "Fondue au Vacherin" sans oublier les divines " coupes de fraises ou framboises √† la cr√®me " Tout cela servi par de jeunes femmes portant le "Dzaquillon", costume traditionnel des femmes de la r√©gion.

title: Essen war (auch nur) okay-Bedienung sehr unfreundlich!!!
content: Mein Freund und ich (beide Gastro's;-)) machten einen Tagesausflug nach Gruy√®re und wollten am Abend lecker im Le Chalet speisen. Leider waren wir sehr entt√§uscht. Das Raclette war nur mittelm√§ssig (gibt wirklich bessere) und die Bedienung sehr unfreundlich und unaufmerksam!!! Die Servicemitarbeiterin sass unt√§tig am Nebentisch, war sichtlich schlecht gelaunt und wir mussten den Wein selbst eingiessen.. Einrichtung ist das einzig Sehenswerte dort! Schade!!!

title: Bon restaurant
content:
tr√©s bonne!!!!!!!!! Le service √®tait tr√©s agreable, nous √©tions un couple avec 2 enfants.
Nous en avons eu pour 75‚Ç¨

title: Typique et accueillant!
content: Charmant chalet nich√© au coeur du village de Gruy√®re, parfait pour d√©guster les sp√©cialit√©s locales dans un cadre typique! L'accueil est tr√®s engageant et les serveuses portent l'habit r√©gional, ce qui rajoute encore un plus au charme de l'endroit. Petit b√©mol: l'odeur tr√®s forte de fromage qui vous parfume pour le reste de la journ√©e!

title: pas recommandable
content: personnel pas sympa. petit, odeur tr√®s fort, pas de place, les tables les unes a cotes des autres. sombres

title: Tr√®s bon
content: Restaurant typique de la r√©gion. Sp√©cialit√©s r√©gionales excellentes. Cadre fort sympathique et accueil chaleureux.

title: Le d√©cor avant tout, voire uniquement
content: C'est un pur pi√®ge √† touristes, mais il faut avouer que la situation et le d√©cor, si l'on a la chance d'avoir une table √† l'√©tage, sont vraiment admirables et justifient la visite. A l'√©tage inf√©rieur, √ßa ne vaut plus la peine de s'arr√™ter. A noter que lors de ma derni√®re viiste avec des amis valaisans, notre fondue vacherin a tranch√©, ce qui est quand m√™me un comble ...

title: Typique et chaleureux
content: Dans un cadre typique et chaleureux d√©couvrez la cuisine authentique montagnarde de la gruy√®re. Nous vous conseillons d'essayer la fondue aux 2 fromages Gruy√®re & Vacherin accompagn√© de sa charcuterie de montagne et vous terminerais avec l'authentique meringue √† la double cr√®me de gruy√®re (cr√®me fraiche). Restaurant au cadre tr√®s montagne avec le personnel en costume local. Le d√©paysement est assur√©. Vraiment sympa

title: Best fondue in the world!
content:
This is the place to come if your in Switzerland and have the best ever raclette or fondue ! It is the real Swiss chalet, it is where I will bring any tourist or locals and make sure everyone will enjoy it! The merengue with cream is simply outstanding so make sure to leave a spot for dessert.. The hole region is beautiful guaranteed to make the trip worth going!!
Best to make reservations, and the second flor is the place you like to be!!

title: Un must per quando se √® nella regione
content: Un ristorante tipicamente svizzero, in un ambiente particolarmente invitante. Spesso ci vado nel periodo autunnale-invernale perch√® in questo periodo si assaporano le specialita' in un'altra maniera. Consiglio di riservare dei posti nel secondo piano e di provare una volta il "Mont d'or" servito con patate. I dolci con la panna doppia sono deliziosi. Lo consiglio caldamente!

title: super typique
content: √† chacune de nos visites de Gruy√®re nous passons par ce restaurant et n'avons jamais √©t√© d√©√ßu. toujours un bel accueil et une cuisine typique excellente et bien servie. joli choix de vins et desserts typiques aussi. le cadre est super dans ce chalet bien entretenu, l'√©tage est encore plus sympa. je le conseille fortement de plus prix raisonnable.

title: Mal was anderes
content: Nach einem Ausflug nach Bulle besuchten wir das Schloss Gruyeres. Dann ging es die Gigerbar zu einem Ap√©ro. Nach einem guten Glas Wein f√ºhrte uns der Hunger ins Le Chalet. Uns erwartete eine freundliche Bedinung, sehr gutes Fondue, angenehmes Ambiente. Gerne kommen wir wieder.. Liebe Gr√ºsse aus dem Aargau

title: Best Fondue EVER. Period.
content:
I was brought here special by my Swiss Friends who regularly drive 1.5 hours one way just to have the Fondue here. YES. It is that good. I have eaten Fondue all over Switzerland and I can honestly say this the the BEST I've ever had. I'm still thinking about it, and will be back for sure.

Tip: Sit upstairs where the decor is really traditional :)

title: magn√≠fica fondue¬°
content: comimos una fondue y una parrilla para 2 personas, nos pusimos las botas. precio de la bebida es muy elevado, como en toda suiza. el local es muy acogedor, t√≠pico suizo. las camareras son mayores y no hablan casi ingl√©s, es mejor intentar hablarles en franc√©s.

title: C'est un peu l'usine
content:
Le jour de notre arriv√©e, le restaurant de notre h√¥tel √©tait ferm√© comme tous les mardis.
Le chalet est sur 2 niveaux. Le rez de chauss√©e est moderne et pas du tout chalet. L'√©tage est un chalet d'alpage reconstitu√©.
Vous pourrez y manger tous les mets traditionnels du pays de Fribourg. Le service est rapide, la cuisine moyennement bonne,
mais cela permet √† des √©trangers de go√ªter plusieurs sp√©cialit√©s.
En d√©pannage ...

title: Typique et tr√®s bon
content: Une belle adresse √† partager avec des amis √©trangers. Joli chalet, tr√®s typique, tr√®s bois. La fondue √©tait vraiment excellente. Les enfants ont mang√©s ds macaronis alpin, tr√®s bons.

title: Great fondue, skip the wine
content: The Fondue Gruyeres (about 30 Swiss francs) for two was delicious, served with both bread and fingerling potatoes. Skip the Swiss Dole wine.

title: touristenfalle
content: Das "Chalet" is nat√ºrlich kein echtes, sondern eins f√ºr Touristen hergerichtetes und daher enstprechend kitschig. Essen ist standard, hab schon bessere Raclette und Fondue gegessen.. Bedienung ist eher genervt und echte "locals" w√ºrden hier niemals essen.

title: die ambiente macht's
content: leider sehr touristisch und die bedienung dementsprechend. aber das fondue war sehr gut und die atmosphere sehr angenehm. wenn man in gruyeres weilt, eigentlich ein muss...:-)

title: Excellent fondue!
content: This is the best fondue I've had and I've eaten quite a bit of fondue. Gruyere, home of the cheese, is what made it so luscious.

title: Good Cheese dishes and dessert, kind of formulaic otherwise...
content:
My second trip here - the first was 13 years on my honeymoon. My memory may be failing,but the place seems to have descended into too touristy. The cheese dishes (fondue for the Mrs, cheese toast for me and a fabulous dessert "Coupe Gruy√®re" (don't judge it by the photo on the menu, it is muuucchhh better) and meringue for the wife along with a passable Swiss red wine left us feeling full and satisfied.

Unfortunately, it seemed to be tourbus day with lots of long tables filled with people from other lands. OK, I'm one too, but it did detract from the expected experience of dining in a Swiss Chalet that we had 13 years ago. Service was good, prices in line with the Switzerland norm.

title: Tourist trap. Bad service and low quality food. Attrap touriste
content:
Are you tourist? Do you want to taste Switzerland? Go elsewhere in Gruyeres village, this restaurant it is a tourist trap. I grew up in Fribourg, trust me. Service is bad. Portugese lady to serve you, cannot English, oberbusy. You order and you have to ask twice. Fondue and raclette were industrial cheese. Overpriced.
But why s local eat there? I have been invited for a company dinner, some no local swiss colleagues wanted to impress our foreign guests... Rat√©!

title: Swiss Fondue
content: First time enjoying true Swiss Fondue! First of all this is a true Swiss town & the cutest to boot! Fell in love! A little on the pricier side, but so worth it! Can you believe we ate here in during mid August, sweating bullets! We were too full to try the Swiss desert stamp...a must try though!! Check it out or at least the town :)

title: faut pas nous prendre pour des ch√®vres!!!
content: entre l'installation √† table et la prise de commande le temps est long, trop long, et le seul sourire des serveuses ne parvient pas √† vous faire oublier le temps qui passe. La cuisine est bonne, sans fioriture

title: Lively and Delicious
content: We went on a Monday night in September and it was very lively and the food and service were great. I had the 1/2 order of the noodles with cheese and ham, that came with a lovely small salad and it was perfect!

title: Yum Yum
content:
The fondue was lovely we chose the one with meat there was more than we could eat
We found it very quaint it's obviously aimed for tourists & it works
When we first looked in it was full and we were told to come back in half an hour so we went to the museum just up the hill a bit & spent some time there
The service was ok

title: Tasty Diversion!
content:
We were on our way up the hill to tour the castle. A sign at the door of Le Chalet de Gruy√®res that simply said: ‚Äúframboises et cr√®me‚Äù (raspberries and cream). And this was no ordinary cream; it was Gruy√®re double cream, made from milk of cows that had pastured in the local alps. My friend Jacques cocked one brow and gave me a sliding smile. We hadn‚Äôt had desert.

We entered the cozy traditional caf√© and sat by a window that overlooked St. Germain courtyard. I ordered a caf√© cr√®me with the raspberries and cream that we shared between us. The server, in traditional Swiss folk dress, handed me my caf√© cr√®me along with a chocolate tub of double cream! Bonus! By the time we left the caf√©, dusk had fallen and we decided to return the next day to devote our time to the Upper Borough and the castle.

title: Le top de la fondue et quel cadre !
content: Nous √©tions en Gruy√®res hier soir et avons manger dans ce petit restaurant tr√®s typique situ√© en plein milieu du village. Nous avons d√©gust√© la meilleure fondue que nous ayons jamais mang√© (et pourtant nous sommes suisses, nous avons l'habitude d'en manger) Le restaurant √©tait plein et les serveuses tr√®s gentilles. Nous avions une petite table qui donnait sur le Mol√©son, la vue √©tait magnifique. Je recommande vraiment ce restaurant, certes le prix est un peu √©lev√© mais les plats sont tr√®s copieux !

title: Imperd√≠vel!!!
content: Local aconchegante, excelente atendimento e comida deliciosa. Se passar por Gruyere nao deixe de comer o Fondue Moitie excelente pedida para duas pessoas. Ahh de sobremesa coma o Meringue Creme. Divino!!!

title: "The" Fondue and raclette place, but bad service
content: If you want to taste cheese fondue and raclette in Switzerland, this is the place. The cheese specialities are delicious. Like many other restaurants in Switzerland, unfortunately the service is zero. :-( It is always over crowded, noisy and hot in the inside. When you go out of the restaurant, you will feel yourself smelling cheese, so wear something washable when you go there. Traditonal decoration, traditional food and traditional bad (!) service.

title: Au pays de Heidi
content: Ici tout respire la Suisse profonde, celle de Heidi et du bon lait des vaches de la Gruy√®res. L'int√©rieur du Chalet est comme on l'imagine et on le voit sur les cartes postales, m√™me les serveuses sont en costume - tablier - d'√©poque. Dans son assiette, c'est Tradition en avant toute: la meilleure raclette et meilleure fondue moiti√©-moiti√© (mi vacherin, mi Gruy√®re) jamais d√©gust√©es dans toute la suisse romande (peut √™tre aux Paccots, un concurrent). Quant au dessert, l'incontournable merigue √† la cr√®me de la Gury√®re. Un grand moment

title: Un'istituzione per...i turisti
content: Conosciamo da diversi anni questo locale, che rimane comunque un punto fisso in una visita a Gruy√®res, anche se nel corso degli anni il men√π √® rimasto pressoch√® identico (fondue, raclette, carne secca ed altri piatti tipici della regione) mentre sono aumentati molto i prezzi, forse per via del cambio non sempre favorevole EU/CHF. Sul cibo nulla da eccepire, abbondanti le porzioni;se si sceglie la formula "√† volont√®" nella raclette, evitate di prendere qualsiasi altro piatto! "Tipico" anche il profumo di formaggio che lascer√† sui vostri indumenti un simpatico ricordo, soprattutto se andate nei mesi freddi. ASSENTE il climatizzatore d'estate, consigliata la prenotazione!

title: ne manquait plus qu' une musique d' ambiance !!!
content:
voil√† un endroit charmant , tres typique , un acueuil chaleureux , la cuisine copieuse et bonne
un service present mais discret , si vous y allez avec des enfants , vous etes servit " en priorite"
avec le sourire .....
un endroit a recommander vivement ....;
quand au village une pure merveille , avec vue sur les alpages suisse !!

title: great place to taste Gruyeres
content: we had fondue the day before at Interlaken, so we decided to have Raclette per friends' recommendation. Excellent! it goes well with the white wine. Service is friendly and price of food is reasonable. HIghly recommend!

title: Tr√®s belle adresse au coeur d'un village historique tr√®s touristique)
content:
Conseill√©e par le Michelin vert, cette adresse qui r√©alise des produits locaux, ne nous a pas d√©√ßus.
Notre choix s'est port√© sur une soupe du chalet (excellente, faite de l√©gumes, cr√®me, pommes de terre et petites p√¢tes) et sur un plat de macaronis du chalet (p√¢tes, jambon, petits d√©s de pomme de terre et de jambon).
En dessert, un bol de framboises, un autre de myrtilles servis avec un bol de fromage blanc m√©lang√© √† de la cr√®me fra√Æche.
Tout √©tait extra. Juste deux petits points √† am√©liorer :
-une demi-heure avant d'√™tre servis peut para√Ætre exag√©r√©...
-les myrtilles (de culture) n'avaient aucune saveur particuli√®re (alors qu'en randonn√©e nous en avons mang√© des bien meilleures !).
Le service √©tait r√©alis√© avec le sourire et le cadre tr√®s sympathique.
Bref, nous avons pass√© un tr√®s bon moment au Chalet de Gruy√®re !

title: Surfait!
content: Nous y sommes all√©s pour f√™ter l'anniversaire d'un ami, malgr√© que la fondue fut excellente, le prix lui nous est rest√© sur l'estomac. Enfin, le lieu est unique et cela co√ªte certainement.

title: la fondu au render vous
content: Ce petit chalet dans la ville est beau que se soit sur la terrasse ou a l'interieure car chaque fois que je suit venue j'ai etemanger la fondu la bas.Belle vue sur la place de la gruyere,l'interieure est un vieux chalet tipyque,les glaces sont tres bonnes,la promenade dans la ville est toujours aussi bien apres manger.En revanche se qui m'a un peut d√©√ßu s'est le temps que sa a mis pour arriver,le personnelle etait antipatique au debut mais ensuite sa allait, et les prix etait un petit peut trop elever pour une fondue. mais je vous le conseille parce qu'avec les autres restaurants s'est celui qui m'a le plus plu. Alors pour une bonne fondue et unvue imprenable dans la ville meme de la gruyere sa vaut quand meme le coups

title: An excellent restaurant in Gruyeres
content:
While planning about visiting Gruyeres, we thought that having lunch in Le Chalet de Gruyeres was a good idea.

It was indeed.

The restaurant is a lovely swiss chalet. The waitresses were polite and friendly. The food was superb! The raclette was really, really good. We ordered a vegetable salad, and the flavour of the dressing really complement the raclette.

This was a memorable lunch in a lovely little town of Gruyeres.

Raclette anyone? Then go to Le Chalet de Gruyeres. It is the place to be.

title: Trop cher!
content: L'ambiance agr√©able, mais rien de sp√©cial, le fondu avait un bon go√ªt, mais mais j'aurais aim√© recevoir un peu plus. J'ai trouv√© trop cher payer pour le fondu et le vin du pays plus que 100 francs pour deux personnes!

title: Acceptable food and price
content:
Raclette, fondue and croute au fromage were acceptable. Prices below 30 francs per person ( one main dish is sufficient in quantity) , drinks excluded.

Service polite and efficient.

Standard decoration, could be improved.

As reccomendable as any restaurant in Gruyeres, all with similar prices and food based on the excellent raw material of the area.

title: Way better than the Melting Pot :)
content: The fondue here was excellent. They seem to have the right balance of Gruyere cheese and white wine. We ordered the Fondue chateau de Gruyeres and it came with pickles, shallots (mini onions), bread and mini potatoes for dipping.

title: fondue !!!
content: Es EL lugar para pedir una fondee. L atraen con papas, fiambres y pan. Buena atenci√≥n. El lugar muy bien decorado. La fondue se come con vino blanco o te. No se toma agua ni durante ni despu√©s ya que te doler√° la panza. Que la disfruten....

title: Ambiente tipico, ottimo cibo!
content:
Il ristorante √® su due piani: il pianterreno √® normale mentre al primo piano sembra proprio di essere in uno chalet. Tutto di legno proprio sotto il tetto con tutte le conseguenze del caso. Nel nostro... si moriva dal caldo nonostante fuori non ci fossero pi√π di 15¬∞.
i piatti propopsti sono quelli tipici ed anche abusati della regione: fondue di formaggio in diversi modi, raclette ed in generale tutto quanto ha a che fare con il formaggio che √® ovviamente ottimo.
Noi abbiamo scelto la carne e per una cifra pi√π che ragionevole abbiamo gustato un0ottima grigliata con 5-6 differenti tipi di carne, mega insalata mista e patate bollite con due ottime salse. Dessert (meringhe con doppia panne), acqua, vino e caff√©. Prezzo ca. Fr. 110.-. Per la zona non male!

title: Very good fondue, excellent raclette, what else?
content:
Some could criticise Le Chalet arguing it is a bit touristy. Of course it is. Everything in Gruyeres is a bit touristy. So we have to live with it and focus on the key aspects:
- Do we eat well at le Chalet? As a good Swiss guy :-), I love fondue and raclette. Ate both today. Truly excellent. So the straight answer is Yes.
- Is it nice? Yes again. Inside, it looks like a typical Swiss Chalet. And the terrace overlooks Gruyeres' main street, with a view on the nearby mountains. Very nice.
- What's about the service? Good although a bit slow when full. So I had to be a bit persistent today...

Price-wise, it is a bit on the expensive side (a fondue costs almost CHF 30 but the quantity is generous (250 grams of cheese instead of the usual 200). And the quality is there. Also the fact le Chalet belongs to the well know St George hotel counts.

Finally, have a look at the Chalet's website (www.chalet-gruyeres.ch): the menu is available there, with prices and photos.

Will I go back there next time? Very probably! So why don't you try?

title: Nice Cheese Fondue
content:
The traditional cheese fondue is good. Not too much of the alcoholic taste. Cost CHF29.9 per portion which includes bread, potatoes and pickles.

Service-wise is so so. When we are there, most of the waitresses are having lunch and one senior lady who couldnt speak English attended to us, so we had quite a tough time understanding the menu. Surprisingly, they did not try to get one English speaking waitress to attend to us.

title: Superb Fondue!
content: If you ever have the opportunity to visit ''Gruyere'' this lovely traditional Swiss Restaurant is not to be missed - it's location is at the top of the village and sitting outside you can watch all the activity in the Village.. The 'Fondue'' is excellent and a real choice of various ''Fondue's to choose from - on minus the seating is quite cramped outside - however it was still very enjoyable and would return again.

title: A place for tourists...
content:
Honestly, if I must say the truth... this place has been created only for tourists. I am not saying that it is not a good place, but the prices are made for the tourists that come to Gruy√®re.
There are a lot of different places in the region to eat the FONDUE, and this one is not one of the best. The CHALET is a nice house, etc. but if you go inside you will see nothing swiss at all. Tourists, and tourist everywhere...

title: Best Fondue I ever ate
content:
Location, location, location is even better when the food is great ... and that is the case here. Located at the end of town, looking down on the village, and at the foot of the castle, the building is adorable and in the right place. We had the fondue and the raclette, as well as a ham sandwich for our daughter. I'd never had raclette before and it was yummy and would have been a highlight, but the fondue stole the show.

Normally in the US we dip fruits and breads into the fondue, but they serve bread to dip. They also give you the pickles and onions (but I don't think you dip those) and then a basket of tiny roasted and peeled potatoes. I'm not sure if I was supposed to dip those, but I did and now salty potatoes covered in cheese is my new favorite food. Seriously, best fondue I've ever had ... not too much wine, two types of cheeses that mellowed the bite without killing the flavor ... seriously, you must eat this.

The place gets full quickly, so go and get a reservation as soon as you get into town and then shop around and come back for your time.

title: Carino ed accogliente ma c'√® di meglio
content: E' di grande impatto, trovandosi nel bel mezzo del borgo ed essendo deliziosamente ricavato da un tipico chalet in legno. All'interno, piccolo e ben tenuto presenta rivestimenti in legno naturale. non si pu√≤ mangiare prima delle 12, quindi inutile chiedere piatti salati. Mentre i dolci ve li propinano in ogni momento. Ho assaggiato i lamponi con la crema-panna (Flamb√®√® e ramboise) ma mi sento vivamente di sconsigliarlo! 13 euro costo del piccolo formaggio (forse burro? considerato il sapore sciapito). Un insuccesso. Ve lo portano in porzione mignon, tra l'altro. Lo staff non √® dei meglio, l'accoglienza ha lasciato a desiderare. Infine, accettano gli euro e vi restituiscono il resto in franchi.

title: Un'ottima cena tipica
content: Abbiamo cenato in questo locale in una fredda serata di aprile. L'atmosfera √® molto accogliente (pur essendo il locale affollatissimo: √® consigliabile prenotare) e il cibo ottimo. Certo non si tratta di un menu raffinato, ma di gustosissimi piatti tipici. Da consigliare: la fonduta e la grigliata mista - che vengono servite con abbondanti e freschi contorni. Riguardo ai dolci, i frutti di bosco con la cr√®me double sono deliziosi. Le porzioni sono generosissime: noi eravamo 5 adulti e 2 bambini e sarebbe stato sufficiente ordinare la met√† di ci√≤ che abbiamo preso. Il prezzo, tenendo conto del costo medio dei ristoranti in Svizzera, non √® affatto caro.

title: Fondue et double Cr√®me
content: un petit creux? Lors d'une promenade dans cette ville m√©di√©vale - arr√™tez-vous pour d√©guster une fondue avec, comme d√©ssert, des petits fruits rouges et myrilles avec la fameuse cr√®me double de la Gruy√®re. Un d√©lice doublement bon. Le personnel de service en habit traditionnel vous acceuille avec le sourire dans ce vieux chalet plein de charme.

title: gut - aber Touristenfalle :-)
content: Das Le Chalet in Gruyere ist sehr, sehr herzig von aussen. Innen finde ich den unteren Stock noch gem√ºtlich - oben finde ich dann gleicht es eher einem Bierzelt. Ich war verwundert, dass ich das Restaurant Ende Dezember in einem Artikel der New York Times gesehen habe und als ich zuf√§llig in Gruyere war habe ich das Restaurant ebenfalls besucht. Das Raclette war mittelm√§ssig - geschmacklich etc. - w√ºrde ich nicht mehr nehmen. Allerdings war ich sehr, sehr positiv √ºberrascht von diesem geschmolzenen Mont d'or ! Sensationell - werde ich wieder einmal geniessen!

title: Amazing fondue
content: We went there for lunch on one day and liked it so much we came back for dinner. We didn't think we needed reservations so we were lucky to get the last table. Everything was amazing.

title: gut, aber sehr teuer
content: Sehr nett und stimmungsvoll, aber v√∂llig √ºberteuert. Ein Klotz K√§se, G√ºrkchen, Silberzwiebeln und Pellkartoffeln, dazu etwas Trockenfleisch, Wein und Tee: 100 Euro f√ºr zwei Personen. Wie gesagt, sehr h√ºbsches Traditionsgasthaus, aber daf√ºr, dass der K√§segeruch noch stundenlang in den Kleidern h√§ngt und der Koch null Arbeit mit diesem Essen hatte (sieht man mal vom Pellkartoffelkochen ab), reichlich teuer.

title: Merveilleux
content:
Si vous vous voulez d√©guster du Gruy√®res (fromage suisse sans trou)et voir toute la fabrication de ce c√©l√®bre fromage.. c'est le lieu !
Ensuite n'oubliez pas d'aller visiter la petite ville de Gruy√®res, absolument fantastique de po√©sie et de pittoresque. Et manger une v√©ritable fondue au fromage "moiti√©-moiti√©" ou fondue ti√®de au vacherin. C'est absolument d√©licieux...
Ensuite d√©gustez les meringues avec la cr√®me double de Gruy√®res... vous ne le regretterez pas !

title: Picture perfect swiss dining experience.
content:
There are several restaurants where you can have fondue in Gruyere however we have get in and out of couple before we decide to sat in this one because of its authentic decoration and nice panoramic view.
We ordered fondue for 3 and some dried cured meat, the food was quite a lot and taste-smell wise excellent.¬†
You might find a cheaper option to save couple of ¬†euros (20‚Ç¨ per person for fondue and 22‚Ç¨ for a plate of cured meat) but I don't think it is worth to save money if you are having this once or twice in your life! You can eat a lot and have a glass of wive and get out 30‚Ç¨ per person.
If you are a foodie and want to scratch fondue from your list this restaurant in Gruyere should be the place to do it.

title: Good fondue but poor service
content: We had our best fondue of our Swiss trip here and the dessert (meringue) was great. But - the service is lackluster and there is little patience talking to Americans, even those who speak French. Also, there are few choices other than fondue. The salad was quite good and so was dried beef. The soup was mediocre.

title: magnifica founde
content:
la mejor foundee de gruyere.
magnifico trato y magnificos postres. recomendamos las frutas del bosque con nata

title: L'atmosfera favolosa ad un costo anormale
content:
Il paesino √® letteralmente favoloso, sembra irreale, fatto in modo da attrarre i turisti. Un sacco dei ristorantini decorati fuori e dentro per rendere l'atmosfera pittoresca, favolosa. Siamo finiti in questo ristorante per caso visto che √® il pi√π vicino al museo HR Giger (che era la nostra meta principale) e anche per la posizione - posizionato in alto per poter ammirare il paesino (se non ci sia qualche foschia/nebbia come capitato a noi).

Sia fuori che dentro il ristorante √® molto autentico per la Svizzera, non mancano i tipici dettagli pittoreschi per renderlo molto simpatico, caloroso. Quindi, dal punto di vista estetico, chi apprezza questi dettagli autentici bellissimo. Ma il resto, deludente (ovviamente de gustibus non disputandum est). Il personale √® sorridente, accogliente ma non parla le lingue straniere (noi abbiamo provato sia con l'inglese che con l'italiano, zero!). Quindi si corre il rischio che ci sar√† qualche malinteso facendo l'ordine (soprattutto se non √® abbastanza chiaro il menu e non conoscete la cucina della zona). Il menu √® tipico della zona, svizzero-francese (quindi troverete le raclette al formaggio....ovunque quel terribile formaggio che puzza da panico!). Poi, il menu comprende maggiormente i piatti freddi che non possono scaldarvi d'inverno. E alla fine, i prezzi sono elevatissimi - anche se intera Svizzera √® costosissima ma sinceramente aspettavo mangiare ad un costo ragionevole visto che siamo proprio nel mezzo di niente (nonostante il paesino √® famoso turisticamente).

Secondo me meglio provare gli altri ristoranti visto che ci sono tantissimi in questo paesino. Questo ristorante sinceramente non merita essere raccomandato.

title: Per chi vuole immergersi nello stereotipo della Svizzera
content:
Nel locale...che pi√π svizzero non si pu√≤; nel paese...che pi√π svizzero non si pu√≤, a mangiare piatti, che pi√π svizzeri non si pu√≤.
Chi arriva in questo favoloso (proprio nel senso della favola) paesino, cerca proprio un locale cos√¨ e un cibo cos√¨.
Avvolti nell'odore-profumo del formaggio caldo, si debbono mangiare i tipici prodotti della Svizzera interna: raclette che si autoregola con apparecchietti "t√™te-√†-t√™te" (veramente la vera "raclette" deve essere sul fuoco a legna, ma pensate alla comodit√†...), misti di salumi o di formaggi..." insalate ecc. Delizioso il dessert di fragole o lamponi con una insuperabile doppia panna di Gruyeres...che pi√π colesterolo non si pu√≤.
Nella strepitosa ovviet√† del contesto, manca ovviamente un po' di originalit√†: locale solo per turisti!!!

title: Super cheese fondue - the real thing!!!
content:
Have been to this restaurant on both visits to Gruyere and never been disappointed!!!

We had the cheese fondue to start with which was just outstanding!!! We also had another melted cheese dish with meats - montre d'or (or something like that) - again excellent.

The service in the restaurant was ok - not bad but not very friendly or accomodating either. Albeit the servers are rushed off their feet with the tourists. I usually like to visit restaurants where the locals go to and not tourists but this is difficult in Gruyere - as the whole place is so touristy as its like a picture postcard!!! Truly lovely!

Would definitely recommend this restaurant to anyone visiting. However just a warning - the restaurant does get very warm (and stuffy) inside even in winter!!!!

title: Cheese, cheese and more cheese!
content: When in Gruyeres you must have fondue or any of the local cheese and creme dishes. We ate here, in the room under the main dining room, that was a little more modern. It was warm when we were there, and the upper room was super hot, from the weather, combined with 20 fondue machines and open grills going full speed! If it was cool out side, the upper room would have been super cozy, but it was a bit too hot for us. Regarding fondue ordering anywhere, ALWAYS talk to the waitress frankly, before ordering about how they recommend you ordering, and for how many people. We were 4 people, and we got salads to start, fondue for 2, a side of dried beef, and another speciality melted cheese dish that they had seasonally, Mont d' Or?. If you go over what you want with the waitress first, it will avoid confusion later, and you will pay for what you get. They fondue was great and the speciallity dish was really good too. We also had some sundaes for dessert that came with delicious fresh creme to pour on top. Really yum!

title: GO SOMEWHERE ELSE!
content:
This fondue restaurant seems cute, but completely took advantage of us (three students)! They charged us for 3X what we ordered because we were Americans!

As three American students, we were looking for an authentic Swiss fondue experience. After ordering a pot of fondue to share which was served with bread, onions, and meat ($40 on the menu), the waitress brought us the bill for $140! They charged us for 3 fondue pots when we clearly only ordered one to share.

The waitress asserted that we ordered three fondue pots and that is what she brought us. This was untrue, and she was completely taking advantage of us because we were Americans. Another group of Americans approached us when we were arguing with the waitress indicating that they had also been completely ripped off at lunch!

After 40 mins of arguing back and forth, it was evident that we did have the money to pay the bill. The 3 of us were borderline tears. Finally our waitress reluctantly adjusted the bill for 1 cheese fondue.

Go somewhere else! This restaurant is over priced and touristy and rips off Americans!! There are plenty of adorable restaurants in the village to check out.

title: Un "must" pour qui va √† Gruy√®re
content:
Je suis amoureux de ce splendide
et magique lieu qui est Gruy√®re.
Allez √† Gruy√®re et ne pas manger une
bonne fondue aux fromages et des
bonnes meringues avec cr√®me fraiche,
perderais sont charme. O√π donc ajouter
ces √©lements pour rendre la visite √†
Gruy√®re parfaite ?

Le Chalet de Gruy√®re sans aucun doute!

Restaurant tipique, tout en bois et plein de
d√©coration. Vue panoramique sur la pleine.
Les femmes serve avec le costume tipique.
Vraiment g√©ial.

Le rapport qualiter/prix est juste.
Vous ne pouvait pas dire d'√©tre allez √† Gruy√®re
sans passer par le Chalet.

title: Buona cucina svizzera ma tremendamente rumoroso
content:
Ho cenato in questo locale con il mio compagno. Il posto √© estremamente turistico ma merita una visita se capitate da queste parti. Il menu comprende unicamente piatti locali a base di formaggio. Noi abbiamo scelto la Raclette accompagnata da un piatto di carne secca, ottima la qualit√†. Prezzi alti come tutto da queste parti.
Il locale √© sempre affollato e molto rumoroso, se volete un posto tranquillo lasciate perdere!

title: ottima raclette
content: Ambiente tipico della zona, sia nell'arredo che nell'abbigliamento del personale, molto carino, ottimo servizio, accogliente, siamo venuti in questo locale su consiglio di amici. per il cibo: noi abbiamo preso esclusivamente la raclette, e devo dire ottima, a differenza di altri ristoranti in svizzera, le chalet porta un apposito apparecchio elettrico al tavolo dove viene composto un bel pezzo di raclette, ottima ed originale idea. sicuramente per la raclette lo consigliamo.

title: Bonne fondue g√¢ch√©e par un service plus qu'approximatif.
content:
Par beau temps la terrasse est un lieu tr√®s agr√©able.

La fondue est tr√®s bonne, onctueuse √¢ souhait, mais un peu "l√©g√®re" en quantit√©. Niveau desserts la double cr√®me de Gruy√®res remplace plus qu'avantageusement la classique chantilly dans les coupes glac√©es.

Un peu trop cher quand m√™me, mais reste dans la norme.

Les serveuses sont sympathiques mais sont h√©las d'une inefficacit√© crasse.

title: Il n'y a pas que le chert√© de franc suisse...
content:
v√©ritable pi√®ge √† touriste, rapport qualit√© prix tr√®s d√©favorable. Accueil peu avenant. J'ai eu honte vis √† vis de mes amis fran√ßais. L'assiette gruy√®rienne tr√®s petite en quantit√©. Quant √† la qualit√© elle n'avait d'√©lev√© que le prix absolument d√©mentiel pour pas plus de 120 gr. de viande. La planchette de fromage sortie directement du frigo offrait des saveur tr√®s m√©diocres. Tr√®s mauvaise publicit√© pour les fromages suisse.
Bref une adresse √† √©viter absolument mais vu le lieu hautement touristique il y aura toujours assez de cochon de payant!

title: Busy and Touristy but not bad Fondue
content: The tourist information bureau on the nearby autoroute suggested Le Chalet as the best fondue in Gruyeres (also had good TA recommendations) so we gave it a try. It was raining so we did not look at other places, many of which had mixed reviews on TA. It was busy at Le Chalet so we had to wait about 5 minutes for a table. Service was slow but we were not in a hurry to get back out in the rain. Limited menu. We had the cheese fondue that came with cornichons, bread and potatoes. Big slices of bread and not the usual cut up crusts Fondue was not bad but not great. House Fendant wine was good value. Would like to try Le Carnotzet up the street next time - not as busy and looked interesting.

title: Great fondue!
content: Wonderful Gruyere fondeau accompanied by a glass of Fendant wine...beautiful city and great restaurant!

title: Pi√®ge √† touriste, nourriture immangeable, tr√®s cher.
content: Propose les m√™mes plats que les autres restaurants de Gruy√®re, mais prix major√©s de 30%. A √©viter absolument : le croute au fromage flottant dans son vin blanc, et le salade au fromage, qui se compose exclusivement d'env. 300 g de copeau de fromage (style m√©lange √† fondue), seule 2-3 feuilles de salade en d√©co. Atmosph√®re √©touffante.

title: Klischeeambiente, gutes Fondue
content: sch√∂nes Holzambiente, gem√ºtlicher Raum, sehr sehr touristisch aber OK. Fondue OK aber kein Hightlight, eher massenware und ein 08/15 Rezept. Bedienung OK aber nicht herzlich. In diesem Restaurant ist einfach alles OK aber nicht herausragendes, ausser das Ambiente. Wir haben als Vorspeise ein sehr kleines Trockenfleisch Tellerli erhalten, danach ein K√§se-Fondue als Dessert Fr√ºchte mit Quark. Qualtit√§t wie beschrieben OK

title: Le meilleur restaurant de Gruyeres. Je...
content: Le meilleur restaurant de Gruyeres. Je suis une inconditionnelle depuis 20 ans!

title: We were 11 people in my group. We are...
content: We were 11 people in my group. We are Swiss and live just next to this restaurant. Never seen a fondu that expensive (but good and tasty but a little too much alcohol for about 30 chf) The very small plate of meat very expensive as well 30 chf but taste is like in a shop. We all never seen such small quantiyfor such the price. We saw the small dessert 28 strawberries with double cream for 15 chf. We were mad !!! So we took the dessert in another restaurant. Beautiful inside the restaurant but only for tourists ad we saw lots of foreign people. Poor of you going in such expensive restaurant without eating real real real nice food !

title: Tres bien
content: Terrasse ouverte. Fondu servi avec des pommes de terre. Panache frais. :) Pas loin du Chateau de Gruyere.

title: yummmmmyyyy and value for money
content:
it's one of our favourite restaurants in the region-our meaning our college campus- a special occasion in winter, our parents visiting... good value for money. Gruyere fondue is the best in my opinion. The grilled meat selection is pretty awesome too. One time I brought my folks visiting there, we enjoyed a fondue for two and a grilled meat platter for two.. the tables around kept turning to look at us cos of the amazing aroma. The lamb was especially good- tender, and "like eating air", as described by a fellow classmate who visited the restaurant before me. Make sure you don't drink coke or water with the fondue, otherwise u'll feel like you have a rock in your belly after (tried an true by many friends)..Have some nice Swiss wine -ask the nice ladies for recommendations, Attack the desserts after! Highly recommend the meringues with gruyere double cream, then a williamine to wash it all down after. Be sure to have a cuppa at the alien cafe behind before! :D
Can get real packed on weekends/ cold weather times.

title: La magia de Gruyere
content:
Sin lugar a dudas que al cuzar el umbral de la porte del Chalet, uno se siente transportado a una √©poca m√°gica, con sus encantos manifestados en los olores de sus comidas, de los muebles de madera r√∫sticos, de la atenci√≥n de las damas con sus atuendos t√≠picos y la decoraci√≥n con elementos capesinos y cencerros de diversos tama√±os. Si uno se acerca a las petite fenetres, quedar√° anonadado por la imagen majestuosa de sus colinas suavesy verdes y sus altas monta√±as nevadas.
Es un escenario √∫nico en el mundo. Belleza pura. C¬¥est beau.

title: Nice traditionnal tourist place
content: Nice traditionnal tourist place

title: pas mal pour une fondue...
content: pas mal pour une fondue...

title: Le charme d'un chalet en...
content: Le charme d'un chalet en bois et de ses serveuses locales dans un cadre exceptionnel... D√©licieuse raclette, √† volont√©!

title: Good and bad
content:
Good: very tasty Rosti with cheese and pickles, very good roast beef with sauces and French fries.
Bad: the restaurant was very cold, people at the nearby table had a grill on the table that made so much smoke that even the waiter came and opened the door, but it was too late and we stank at the end of the day as if we had barbecued in the forest
I was not impressed by the dessert. In all commercials you see the cream pouring over the fruits but in our case the double cream was stiff. I had to use a teaspoon. This might be a good choice in summer when fruits are sweet...
It is a good restaurant as food goes, in the back it has a nice balcony with tables and a gorgeous view, if you stay at Gruyeres Rooms you get 10% discount from your bill.

title: Super d√©jeuner pour superbe journ√©e dans le bourg!

title: Touristenfalle
content: √úber die Strasse wird eine ungeniessbare ‚Äûhausgemachte‚Äú heisse Schokolade zu einem unversch√§mten Wucherpreis von 6 Franken verkauft: Touristenfalle!

title: INCONTOURNABLE

title: Cuisine typiquement suisse

title: "Raclette a volont√©"? denke nicht...
content:
Auf der Karte stand es "Raclette a volonte", aber leider erhielten wir nachder erste Portion K√§se fast keine Bedienung mehr. Nach st√§ndigen Nachfragen brachten die Bediener, zum Teil nur teilweise, unseren Nachschub. Ich bin ja nicht jemand der all zu viel isst, aber am Tisch f√ºhlte ich mich wie ein unerw√ºnschter Sumo-Ringer. Auch keine entsprechende Kondimente waren dabei.

Die Schmelzvorrichtung wurde garnicht erkl√§rt und war f√ºr mich sehr aufw√§ndig zu bedienen, ausserdem ist es beim Gebraucht aussernander gefallen. Da h√§tte sich schon jemand verbrennen k√∂nnen.

F√ºr ein Restaurant in Gruyeres h√§tte ich jetzt viel mehr erwartet und bin entsprechend entt√§uscht...

title: Sehr freundlicher Service/ fantastischer Dessert
content: Die Soupe du Chalet ist sehr lecker. Die Bedienung sehr freundlich, obwohl sie viel Stress haben ( Restaurant voll). Ich durfte sogar mein Menu mit einer Beilage, die zu einem anderen Menu geh√∂rt, kombinieren. Das Wohl des Gastes steht im Vordergrund. Der Dessert: Cro√ªte dor√©e war fantastisch! Sehr, sehr lecker genaues wie Meringues √† la cr√®me! Kann ich sehr weiterempfehlen‚Ä¶

title: Mediocre meal served by a team descended from Dory (of "Finding Nemo" fame)
content: Visiting this restaurant was like attending an international competition for short attention spans; it was like an interview with Dory the fish from Finding Nemo. The waitresses, while certainly nice enough, kept forgetting what we asked for. We ordered a fondue for 2 and got 1. They brought a 2nd one, and the flame under the fondue went out and messed what was left of it by the time it was re-lit. The fondue bread was really nothing great. We had to ask for the cornichons and onions (which should be standard fare for any fondue meal). We ordered 1 liter of water and got a demi-litre; then had to ask for the next demi-litre. We ordered 2 chocolate ice-creams and got 1 vanilla. We ordered tea and coffee and they never came. They reimbursed us for that, though. The food was mediocre. The ambience is okish, with a super cute entrance to the place. I wouldn't go back, though.

title: Haciendo queso...
content: Es una f√°brica del t√≠pico queso Gruy√®res donde se ve la elaboraci√≥n del mismo y hay un peque√±o reccorrido con la ingredientes, las vaquitas y esas cosas. Te dan un poco de queso para probar al llegar.

title: Amazing Fondue and Raclette

We were 6 friends and ordered 2 fondues (basic and truffle) and 1 Raclette, more than enough for all with beer and wine. The Raclette includes free "refill" of cheese and potatoes. Definitely recommended.

content: Wir haben schon viele Freiburger Fondues gegessen, aber niemals ein so schlechtes. Eine Entt√§uschung. W√ºrde das Restaurant nicht empfehlen

Prendiamo quindi una moite moite ed una Raclette. Sono rimasta un po‚Äô delusa dal pane, seppur buono, non tipico per la Fondue e non a cubetti. Il gusto di entrambe era comunque buono, ma speravo in un po‚Äô pi√π di tradizione!

title: Super late service
content:
We went there as 2 families. But half of the order came super late around 1 hour!!! We followed up 3 times in the meantime and they said ‚Äòit is coming in 5 minutes‚Äô eachtime. Then Realised that there is no order at all! So basically they were lying instead of checking. We kept waiting with 2 kids and myself being pregnant. But they choose to lie. Was not acceptable at all. Very disappointed

title: Tr√®s bonne fondue

Et la meringue double cr√®me √©tait sublime √† tomber par terre. Vous pouvez y aller les yeux ferm√©s. La preuve, le restaurant √©tait complet. Personnel tr√®s sympathique, un autre point positif.

title: Tradition & go√ªt
content: Voyage fromager au c≈ìur de la Suisse, la vue de la terrasse est imprenable et pittoresque pour ce restaurant o√π nous avons deguste des plats savoureux et pr√©par√©s avec passion ! En plus la quantit√© de fromage √©tait pas assez pour tous. Mauvaise exp√©rience et en plus c'√©tait pas la premi√®re fois, l ann√©e pass√©e on a fait la m√™me Mauvaise exp√©rience. Tr√®s d√©√ßu.

title: Disappointing experience
content: We came here for dinner and we got a table on the terrace. The waiter assigned to our table was uncaring / inattentive. He first brought a bottle of wine without opening it and without glasses (we had to ask a waitress to bring glasses and open the bottle). Then he took a very long time to bring the fondue. When the fondue arrived, we had to ask for bread, even if there was clearly nothing on the table. We ordered a dish (pickles and onions) that never arrived. Restaurants are about service right? We really didn‚Äôt get that.

title: Pas terrible
content: Bon nous sommes arriv√©s on √©tait 12 par table de 4 because covid-19 nous avons pris le menu √† 56 francs 2 planchettes de couper jambon salami et viande s√©ch√©e √©tait bon par contre en saucisson qui avait plus l'air de viande hach√©e que le saucisson Fade et beaucoup trop frais. La suite fondue nous avons re√ßu la fondue sans avoir les les assiettes ni le pain donc nous avons pas pu remuer la fondue qui √©tait d√©j√† sur le r√©chaud ce qui a fait quel a en peut br√ªler au fond et qu'elle c est s√©parer. Nous avions command√© du th√© et je crois que le the ont √©t√© factur√©e alors que sur la formule il y aurait en choix de the gratuit mais je suis pas s√ªr et enfin le dessert les meringues n'avaient rien d'extraordinaire mais par contre la double cr√®me avait absolument aucun go√ªt et tr√®s trop l√©g√®re pour √™tre de la vraie double cr√®me de gruy√®re nous avons d√ª aussi attendre assez longtemps pour avoir la facture. Il y avait quelque chose aussi de pas normal normalement nous pouvons manger √† l'int√©rieur malgr√© le covit vide si nous mangeons √† l'h√¥tel o√π nous avons les chambres or ce restaurant √† un arrangement avec l'h√¥tel mais c'est pas le m√™me patron et c'est pas la m√™me maison mais je suppose que √ßa leur permet de mettre des gens √† l'int√©rieur alors que s'il y avait pas l'arrangement avec l'h√¥tel il aurait droit d'ouvrir que en terrasse √† cause du covid-19.

title: Miserabler Service und verbranntes R√∂sti
content:
Die Bedienung ist √ºberhaupt nicht koordiniert und hat null Struktur!
Das R√∂sti war verbrannt und das Raclette unterirdisch.
F√ºr Familien ungeeignet, Stifte zum Malen f√ºr Kinder haben wir bis zum Bezahlen nicht erhalten.

title: What a disappointment.
content:
Visited Gruy√®re village on a weekday and after a wonderful time visiting the museums and the Castle decided to have lunch at this restaurant.

Therestaurant has mixed reviews and it was practically empty, yet we decided to give it a shot. Big mistake, should have gone to the restaurant across the street.

Anyways, we ordered a quiche (with cheese and herbs, served with salad and dressing) and a R√∂sti with fried egg.

1st, the quiche (21chf). The portion size was ok, and as per Swiss standard. The salad was fresh and the dressing was good. The quiche itself, not so much, It was soggy. I have had better quiche at coop/Migros take away section.

2nd the R√∂sti with egg (22.50chf). Oh what a disaster it was. It was oily, soggy, tasteless and extremely unpleasant to look at. Thanks to the service staff for putting salt and pepper on the table, otherwise the R√∂sti was unbearable.
I have lived in Switzerland for more then 6yrs and this is probably the worst R√∂sti I have ever seen or eaten.

We did finish everything served to us, even though we hated it precisely for 2 reasons.
- Tought not to waste food and
- Food is expensive in Switzerland

Very disappointed. With this review I hope to save someone's money and experience.

title: Tr√®s bien
content:
Je vous recommande sans h√©siter la fondue moit moit qui est divine ! Vraiment !
Service chaleureux
Nous avons pass√© un bon moment

title: Lorsque nous sommes arriv√©s,
content:
Lorsque nous sommes arriv√©s, nous avons attendus au moins dix minutes avant que quelqu‚Äôun vienne nous accueillir. Durant cette longue attente nous avons pu assister √† une premi√®re dispute entre coll√®gues, une premiere parmi tant d‚Äôautre finalement.
Un monsieur vient nous accueillir et nous conduit jusqu‚Äô√† notre table r√©serv√©e le mercredi pour le dimanche 25/04. Il nous annonce que notre table a √©t√© donn√©e √† d‚Äôautre personnes. Nous devons donc ENCORE attendre pour ENFIN nous proposer une autre table cinq minutes plus tard.
Une fois assis, nous remarquons beaucoup de discordes et d‚Äôincoh√©rences entre les serveurs et les serveuses. C‚Äôest dommage.
Aussi, mon conjoint d√©cide de commander un verre de vin blanc pour accompagner la fondue, une serveuse arrive avec deux verres de vin blanc, cette derni√®re se fait reprendre par sa coll√®gue qui n‚Äôh√©site pas √† la r√©primander devant nous et √† pr√©ciser qu‚Äôelle lui a r√©p√©ter 4 fois la m√™me chose.
Tous les conflits entre le personnel fut vraiment d√©solant et en tant que client cela nous met dans une position vraiment tr√®s malaisante.
Quant √† la fondue, elle √©tait tr√®s bonne. Je pense que √ßa restera le seul point positif de notre d√©jeuner dans ce restaurant. Nous avons pr√©f√©r√© aller prendre le dessert ailleurs.

title: Petite Fondue en terrasse panoramique
content:
Nous avons profit√© d'une journ√©e estivale pour manger en terrasse. Le cadre √©tait vraiment sympa. L'accueil irr√©prochable, serveur souriant, blagueur tout en restant professionnel.
De la Fondue, aux desserts, tout √©tait parfait et tr√®s bons.

title: Fondue "comme il faut"
content: L'arredamento e il ristorante sono tipici del posto e perfettamente in abbinamento alla tipologia d'offerta e al luogo circostante. Il legno rende l'ambiente molto caldo,e conviviale. L'accoglienza √® stata buona e i camerieri, la maggior parte giovani, sono stati molto gentili e disponibili ad ascoltare le nostre richieste. La fondue √® sicuramente molto buona, anche se era presente un po' troppo "olio" (forse e probabilmente contenuto nei formaggi usati). Unica pecca, √® la lentezza del servizio in generale, ma sopratutto per il dessert, dove abbiamo dovuto aspettare quasi 30 minuti per due palline di gelato. Spero sia stato solo un caso dovuto al numero di gente presente. Per il resto, bellissima serata.

title: JE VOUS LE RECOMMANDE
content: La nourriture est vraiment bonne et Anthony est super sympa et tr√®s tr√®s serviable. Merci pour tout! Salutations

title: Un d√©lice
content: Service tr√®s professionnel. Merci √† Antoine pour l'accueil. Les plats sont d√©licieux et copieux. A ne pas manquer

title: D√©licieuses traditions !
content: Tr√®s bon accueil. Cadre agr√©able . Fondue d√©licieuse, ajoutez une planche de viande des grisons , et vous baignerez ds la tradition . Pour cl√¥turer le tout , un peu de fausse l√©g√®ret√© avec de tr√®s bonnes framboises √† la cr√®me de gruy√®re agr√©ment√©es des fameuses meringues . Je vous conseille la visite du village en digestif! Tr√®s agr√©able moment !

title: Delicious Lunch with Great Views
content: Came here for lunch and the portion was pretty generous. Sat outside and had a great time enjoying the views of the snow capped Swiss alps. Great food and service too.

title: Au c≈ìur d‚Äôun superbe village
content: Au c≈ìur d‚Äôun superbe village atypique et rempli d‚Äôhistoire. Ce restaurant avec une magnifique rue panoramique offre une convivialit√© et un service impeccable

title: Best truffle fondue ever!!
content: This restaurant serves the only fondue in Gruyeres (if not in Switzerland) where the cheese is made INHOUSE truly exceptional, delicious, not to be missed!!!!!

title: Merveilleux repas √† 20 personnes
content: Un accueil magnifique pour notre groupe de 10 adultes et 10 enfants sur la terrasse se trouvant derri√®re le b√¢timent. Nous nous sommes r√©gal√©s de A √† Z. Le service est professionnel, souriant et efficace. Une petite visite de la fromagerie a √©t√© fortement appr√©ci√© de chacun! Que du bonheur ... foncez-y!

title: When in Gruy√®re... this is the place to eat!
content:
For any cheese lover search no more. This place offers the classics fondue & raclette with the most incredible ‚Äúviande s√©ch√©e‚Äù which was excellent. We had the fondue (yum!) and the burger... with a bottle (or two) of their best Prosecco (JAYA Prosecco)
The burger is boar meat and was honestly astounding. Original and tasty. Lovely experience, offers multiple types of environments inside and outdoor. The outdoor terrasse is definitely worth it. When in Gruy√®re... this is the place to eat!

title: Excellent food, great team
content:

title: Mal servicio

title: Worst Service in Gruy√®re
content:
Wanting to enjoy a pleasant summer evening, I went with my wife to Gruy√®re. We went in this restaurant as it has a terrace with a great view of the mountains. The restaurant had a great view from the terrace and staff were young and friendly. But the restaurant was understaffed and the staff inexperienced.

After a long waiting time, we were given menus with pictures of the plates. After ordering some cold plates and waiting for another twenty minutes, we were served the wrong plates. How difficult is it to take not√©s? After telling our waiter that the wrong order was served, he came back from the kitchen, saying they couldn‚Äôt take it back. The experience made me feel humiliated and not welcome.

From what I observed, it seems the restaurant understaffed, using seasonal, temporary, underpaid employees. I‚Äôm Swiss, I live 20 minutes away from Gruy√®re and it‚Äôs not the first time I visit the town. I‚Äôm not a professional food critic but this place tops as one of the worst restaurants in the country, if not the worst in Gruy√®re.

title: Einmal und ...

Wir mussten lange warten bis wir bestellen konnten. Anschliessend wurden die bestellten 8 Dessert nicht gemeinsam geliefert, sondern zwei Dessert wurden sehr zackig gebracht auf den Rest mussten wir ca. weitere 20Min. warten...
Die Rechnung wurde ohne Kommentar auf den Tisch gestellt ohne das alle Desserts da waren. Fazit: Touristenfalle einmal und nie wieder.

title: Good Swiss food and nice service
content: Gruy√®re is worth the visit, not far from Geneva and you get to this beautiful medieval town which is gorgeous!! This restaurant serves good fondue and great rosti!! Leave enough room for dessert!!!

title: It so easily could have been good!
content: The fondue, when it came, was very nice. Staff were friendly too. However, it wasn't a pleasant experience. There were not enough staff on duty but, those staff that were there were so inefficient and nobody seemed to be in charge. There had been a table for 8 people next to us and the remains of what they'd had were left for over minutes. This attracted a huge number of flies and it was disgusting. We waited for 20 minutes to even be approached for our order and we were on the point of leaving when we were eventually served. My son's a chef and he couldn't understand why staff went back to the kitchen empty-handed. They should never do this. We visit our son a lot but never go back to this restaurant.

title: Terrace with a view.
content:
Good choice for a "touristy" village. The food is reflective of the Region: Gruyeres, that means Fondue. Home made, the Restaurant has cheese making facilities on site.
But if you're not a Fondue lover, especially in the middle of a hot summer, you have other choices; try the R√∂sti with Speck.
The service is friendly, a bit slow if you are sitting at the lower level terrace, but acceptable and the view will make up for it and is way better than the one on the other terrace or in front of the Restaurant.
Yannick will do his best to accommodate your request, just ask for him.
The price is correct all things considered.
I will definitely recommend this Restaurant to any cheese lover or other.

title: Nein, das war kein Fr√ºhst√ºcksbuffet!
content:

Dort erwartete uns ein etwas enger, sehr lauter Fr√ºhst√ºcksraum. Das Fr√ºhst√ºcksbuffet war un√ºbersichtlich und nicht gut sortiert. Der Kaffeeautomat war mehrfach leer. Das R√ºhrei war kalt.

I highly recommend stopping and having lunch.

title: Pas satisfait
content: Salade pas frais , dessert pas terrible cr√®me double pas tr√®s bonne , coca pas frais

content:

Die √Ñlplermaggronen schwimmten in der K√§se Rahmsauce, Zwiebeln und Kartoffeln fehlten komplett. Das √ñl bei den R√∂sti tropfte nur herab und die R√∂sti waren latschig. Die Pizza war eine Gallette mit K√§se und Tomatensauce (falls man keine 0815 Pizza anbieten kann, sollte es man sein lassen und diese gar nicht anbieten).
Insgesamt ein liebloses und fettiges Angebot.

content: J'adore la fondue au fromage, et un des meilleurs endroits pour en manger est sans nul doute Gruy√®re Traditions. Wir wollten eigentlich nur etwas trinken gehen, bevor wir uns auf dem Heimweg machen, und uns auf die Terrasse gesetzt. Aus Neugier haben wir die Speisekarte angeschaut und dann doch Hunger bekommen. Die Bedienung hat uns dann geraten, uns drinnen hinzusetzen, da es draussen schnell zu kalt und ungem√ºtlich wird. Schnell wurde uns ein Tisch bereit gemacht. Wir haben lecker gegessen, die Portionen waren ausreichend gross und jeder hatte genug. Auch der oft bem√§ngelte Dessert, fanden wir nach einem reichhalten Essen gross genug. Dass es nicht immer g√ºnstig ist - weiss man ja in der Schweiz ;-)
Die Bedienung war sehr freundlich, hilfsbereit und trotz Stress immer zu einem Spass bereit.

I don't mind waiting on a relaxing Easter Friday but as we had an appointment at the cailler factory I wished we had more time to visit the town of Gruyere after lunch.
