Apr√®s une assiette de sp√©cialit√©s r√©gionales (partag√©e √† 8 pour l'ap√©ro), nous avons pris des fondues moiti√©-moiti√©, dont une √† l'√©chalote ... un d√©lice.
Niveau ambiance, ce resto est sympa et d√©cor√© de fa√ßon tr√®s typique.

title: Raclette et fondue savoureuse
content: Super resto, ambiance extra, tout bois√©, un vrai d√©paysement. Les serveuses sont habill√©es en habit tr√®s joli! Nous avons choisi la raclette et la fondue au vacherin, tout √©tait tr√®s bon. Puis un dessert a la liqueur de framboises, un r√©gal et ils n'ont pas l√©sin√© sur l'alcool! Qualit√© prix super, je recommande vivement ce restaurant charmant et j'y retournerai volontiers.

title: Parfait ! Service irr√©prochable !
content: Restaurant traditionnel typique. La fondue est excellente, le service est rapide et attentionn√©. Le cadre intimiste est tr√®s appr√©ciable.

title: Tr√®s bonne cuisine, service sympathique et cadre agr√©able
content: Un vrai caf√© Gruy√©rien, tout en bois avec une terrasse donnant sur la vall√©e. Excellent roestis avec un non moins excellent jambon de la borne. Et une v√©ritable meringue √† la double cr√®me tout aussi v√©ritable. Servi avec le sourire et comp√©tence. Que du bonheur

title: Tr√®s bien mais cher
content:
Apr√®s avoir lu les critiques sur tripadvisor, notre premier choix s'√©tait port√© sur le restaurant le chalet mais qui √©tait complet jusqu'√† 16h alors qu'il √©tait 14h !

Finalement je me suis rendu dans mon choix num√©ro 2 qui est l'auberge de la halle.

La situation ainsi que la d√©co n'a rien √† envier au restaurant le chalet, je dirai m√™me que c'est plus sympa !

Seulement lorsque je suis entre, le personnel √©tait d√©bord√©, personne vous salue et vous ne savez pas si vous allez trouvez de la place ! Comme il y avait que deux couples devant moi je me suis dit qu'il √©tait pr√©f√©rable d'attendre. Nous vais' nient fait nous avons eu une table au bout de 15/20 minutes, √ßa qui √©tait inimaginable vu le monde dans le village et les files d'attente dans les autres restaurants voisins.

D√®s que nous √©tions install√©s, le personnel fut tr√®s sympa. On a compris qu'il faisait tout pour satisfaire les clients √† table et la mauvaise exp√©rience de l'accueil √©tait oubli√©e !

Il y a un large choix de fondue mais √©galement des salades, de la cro√ªte, de la charcuterie... m√™me un plat enfant de bonne qualit√© √† 13 chf.

Notre fondue ainsi que notre plateau de charcuterie √©taient tr√®s bonnes. Des personnes de la table voisine ont m√™me dit qu'elle √©tait meilleur qu'au chalet ! Seulement je m'attendais √† des prix inf√©rieurs compares au chalet o√π les autres restaurants et j'ai constat√© que c'√©tait tr√®s proche, en tout cas pas grande diff√©rence !

Donc bonne exp√©rience, service plut√¥t rapide mais prix final √©lev√© 2 adultes et 2 enfants avec 2 fondues + 2 plats enfant + 2 boissons + un plateau de charcuterie en entr√©e = 120 chf environ ! Je ne regrette pas mais ceux qui pr√©tendent dans les avis que √ße n'est pas cher ont √† mon sens tort !

title: Fantastic cheese fondue
content:
I went with my couple and ordered a cheese fondue with boletus (mushrooms). It was delicious!. They put bread and small potatoes to mix with the melted cheese. Typical but very good combination!
The service was kind and the restaurant closes late comparing with the commerce in the village. We started dinner at 21h.
Price is not cheap like almost every place on Switzerland but we enjoyed the dinner.

title: Beautifully Done
content: This is our 2nd time in Gruyerre and eating at Auberge. The food and service is superb with the menu offering a great variety that is perfect for sharing and expiercing the different taste, all yummy! And normally not a desert eater, I enjoyed the best fruit and double cream, very special,

title: Sortie en Gruy√®re
content:
Le restaurant est bien repr√©sentatif de la Gruy√®re. La restauration est tr√®s bonne nous avons pris une fondue aux bolets, un vrai d√©lice. Les portions sont tr√®s bien m√™me plus. Les prix sont un peu plus ch√®re mais tous est compris dedans qui n'est pas le cas d'autre restaurant.
Que dire du personnel qui est aux petits soins avec nous, quand je pense que dans certain restaurant au bout d'un service le personnel est d√©sagr√©able la le personnel tourne service sur service et ils sont toujours au top

title: Fondue Ottima
content: Il posto √® incantevole, immerso nella storia e nella cultura di questo villaggio che ti permetteranno di rivivere i tempi medioevali. Il ristorante √® ubicato al centro della grande piazza, su due piani. Molto carino ed accogliente, offre un menu completo. Abbiamo scelto la fondue ai porcini..ottima scelta!!! Troppo abbondante per 2 persone, ma gustosissima!! Ultra consigliato!

title: Caldo e accogliente
content: Siamo stati qui per pranzo, di sabato. La sala √® semplice e pulita, il personale molto accogliente ed educato, ci siamo sentiti ben accolti. Abbiamo mangiato una fondue (a discrezione) ed era eccellente! I prezzi sono svizzeri, e uguali a tutti gli altri ristoranti in paese. Tornerei volentieri e lo consiglio vivamente!

title: Traditional food
content: This is one of many restaurants in the village, also one of a number offering the local specialities. At midday in the week it was quiet, so service was rapid. You can eat on the terrace in front, or go through to the back room for a view of the mountains. We had the "soupe de chalet", essentially a thick vegetable soup. For Fr 17.50 you can eat as much as you want, very good value.

title: Excellent √©tablissement.
content:
Tr√®s bon accueil dans cet √©tablissement situ√© dans un village mythique. Apr√®s la visite du mus√©e Giger, un excellent point o√π se restaurer avec d'excellents plats de la r√©gion. Petite terrasse tr√®s sympathique, personnel tr√®s attentionn√©, souriant et qui ont le sens de l'accueil. Rapport qualit√©/prix tr√®s bon en comparant les autres prix appliqu√©s dans le m√™me village.
Vivement conseill√© √† mon go√ªt !

title: Sympa
content: Tr√®s bonne ambiance avec service sympathique cuisine locale et tr√®s copieuse prix mod√©r√© je conseille sans probl√®me vous ne regretterez pas votre venu avec sa vue panoramique

title: Leider kein Service
content: Oulisse h√§tte gerne hier einen Salat mit Quiche und einen gr√ºnen Salat gegessen. Nach l√§ngerer Wartezeit draussen betrat er das Lokal und fragte nach Bedienung. Es gab nur eine f√ºr das ganze Lokal drinnen und draussen. Die Preise der angebotenen Speisen h√§tten vier Kellner erwarten lassen. Als dann die Bedienung nach draussen kam, ging das Rechnungzahlen am Nebentisch der Neubestellung vor. Oulisse gab auf, und ging ins Cafe am Ortseingang. Das war eine gute Entscheidung!

title: Nous y retournerons
content: Accueil tr√®s chaleureux malgr√© les nombreux clients. Service rapide et impeccable. La fondue aux bolets √©tait d√©licieuse et bien servie avec du pain et des petites pommes de terre. Une belle carte des vins √† des prix raisonnables. Et pour terminer de d√©licieuses meringues √† la cr√®me double et un verre de Poire √† botzi. Nous y retournerons.

title: Visite touristique
content:
Dans le charmant village de Gruy√®re o√π on ne peut acc√©der qu'a pied et apr√®s la visite du site on a une petite faim...
Il est vrai que parfois on a une h√©sitation par rapport aux resto dans ces endroits qui attirent du monde. Et en cherchant ce qui pourrait nous faire plaisir nous sommes tomb√©s sur l'auberge de la halle. Bon accueil service diligent. Rosti et fondue copieux et tr√®s gouteux. Le dessert excellent. Le prix raisonnable pour la Suisse. Bonne journ√©e en famille.

title: Great Food with a great view
content:
Had dinner here last Saturday evening, and we made sure we book a table at the rear end of the restaurant, where there is an amazing view of the valley.

The Food was very delicious and also the wine (Humagne Rouge) we were had.

I had the Chocolate waffle with Gruyere double cream. Saying its was very delicious is not good enough as a description!!! Very yummy.

title: Tr√®s bonne fondue moiti√©-moiti√©
content: Tr√®s bon accueil, serveuse sympa, tr√®s bonne et copieuse fondue moiti√©-moiti√©, prix abordable pour la suisse. Bonne adresse dans Gruy√®res.

title: Fast friendly service
content: Good service, had the fondue for 1 for lunch. Good place if you sit outside you get a view on the main street below.

title: bonne fondue
content:
Certes c est dans ce village touristique , donc ....., maid pour manger une fondue aux c
Bolets ou royale ( avec cr√®me double) , cette auberge est parfaite , prenez le rose du coin , 50cl , moins cher que 75! Les prix sont abordables pour la Suisse

title: Meringues
content: Meringues tr√®s mauvaises. Impossible de les couper avec une cuill√®re. Le cuisinier refuse de reconna√Ætre le probl√®me. Pas normal du tout. Dommage ...

title: Good food and friendly service
content: My favorite restaurant in Gruyere. If you want something light then the salads with quiche or dried meets and cheeses are a good choice. For something more substantial go for the excellent fondues, my favorite is the one with truffles.

title: La halle aux grains
content: Apr√®s une visite de la ville de Gruy√®re nous sommes all√©s boire un verre √† cette terrasse qui nous semblait atypique du fait de son ancien syst√®me de mesure de grains mais serveuse non souriante et s√ªrement "muette " car pas un mot.... Domage car tr√®s beau site

title: Gen√ºsslich
content: Ein Salat und ein tartar .. war wunderbar gen√ºsslich. W√ºrde wieder kommen. Sonnigen Tag auf der Terrasse nach dem Besuch des Giger Museum. So k√∂nnen Ferien starten.

title: Caro como todo suiza
content: Paramos para tomar un cafe despues de haber comido en otro sitio que nos recomendaron y como vereis los precios siguen estando fuera del alcance de lo que normalmente conocemos en Espa√±a,pero,si quieres un cafe lo pagas.

title: Sans pr√©tention
content: On est dans Gruy√®res, on craint le pire dans un lieu aussi touristique, et puis ce n'est finalement pas si mal. L'avantage. c'est la grande salle panoramique √† l'arri√®re, qui tourne le dos √† la grande rue centrale et trop anim√©e. Cuisine qui restaure, service un peu brouillon.

title: Calidad-precio
content: En el centro del casco antiguo de Gruyere con terracita no muy grande y el comedor de dentro con ventanal al valle y monta, muy agrada, todo en madera. Muy buena calidad de los productos, carne ( tournedos) y rosti de verduras. Exquisita la tarta de manzana y una porci√≥n bastante grande, comen 2 personas.

title: Very good!
content: Very nice place with tasty traditional local food. The staff is very friendly and welcoming. Would defenetly recommend this place! You should absolutely try local desert if fresh berries, meringues and fresh double cream, it's amazing!

title: Lovely Swiss food - try it!
content:
It is quiet and lovely restaurant which serves traditional cheese fondue, rosti and other European dishes like veal and fish.

The rosti tastes different from what we have in Singapore and it is very good. The veal will be better if it is a little more tender but the taste is good. The accompanying fries are crispy and goes really well with the gravy of the veal.

title: Nob restaurant pr√©f√©r√© √† Gruy√®re.
content: Le restaurant est id√©alement plac√© au centre de la place, le restaurant a une magnifique vue. Nous sommes toujours bien accueilli. Nous avons mang√© un r√∂sti avec du jambon √† la borne, c'√©tait d√©licieux. Je vous recommande √©videmment la double cr√®me de Gruy√®re.

title: Um fant√°stico fondue em Gruyeres!
content: Almo√ßamos no Auberge de la Halle em um dia muito agrad√°vel, ap√≥s nossa visita a f√°brica de queijos e a pequenina cidade de Gruyeres. N√£o poder√≠amos deixar de experimentar o aut√™ntico fondue Su√≠√ßo e, sem sombra de d√∫vidas, a escolha foi excelente. O local √© aconchegante e a gar√ßonete que nos atendeu, Patr√≠cia, foi extremamente gentil nos apresentando todos os tipos de fondue de queijos que poder√≠amos escolher, al√©m das deliciosas sobremesas. Recomendo, com certeza.

title: Excellent Food - Way Too Much Cheese
content: My wife and I went here on recommendation from the hotel. We started with the cheese and cured meat plate which was excellent. We followed that up with fondue with chanterelles. It was excellent. Swiss restaurants are always pricy so I just get over it. The only reason I knocked them a star was they had one waitress on duty and she was run ragged. She did a good job, but for a restaurant that size she needs help.

title: pour une raclette
content:
restaurant sans pr√©tention mais bien situ√© de par sa vue.
Bonne raclette. belle carte de desserts.....essayez la coupe de framboise √† la cr√®me de Gruy√®re ! divin!

title: Accogliente
content:
ERAVAMO UN GRANDE GRUPPO(8 adulti+8 bambini) il ristoratore ci ha riservato una sala tutta per noi al primo piano : cosa vuoi di pi√π !!!
Fondute ottime ( ne abbiamo mangiato 4 diverse) cos√¨ come i rosti e soprattutto le morilles farcite !!
Qualit√† buona e prezzi corretti .....
sicuramente da consigliare e da ritornarci .....
GIUSEPPE

title: Na ja
content: Nicht das, was man von einer Schweizer Herberge erwartet. Insgesamt sehr touristisch, entsprechend das Angebot!

title: Ottima fondue
content: Abbiamo cenato in questo ristorante durante la nostra breve visita nel villaggio di Gruyeres. Siamo stati fortunati con la nostra scelta: personale gentile e cortese, buona qualit√† (e quantit√†) della fondue moitie-moitie, rapporto prezzo/prestazioni corretto. Dopo la fondue ci siamo concessi anche le meringhe, assolutamente da consigliare pure quelle.

title: convivial
content: Tres bon accueil, serveuse top, sympa, rapide et un mot pour tous, fondue excellentet et raclette √† discr√©tion, prix correct

title: Lo esperado
content: Restaurante mas que correcto donde degustar una fondue deliciosa. Interior decorado tradicional, con bonitas vistas delas monta√±as del alrededor y carta con todo lo esperado

title: Amazing view
content: Great place to eat raclette, with an amazing view to the montains, very nice employes, and not to expensive.

title: Tasty "morilles farcies", fondue was ok
content: Smack in the center or Gruyeres, this restaurant has a nice view and a cozy atmosphere. We went there for an early dinner. We had Vacherin fondue (27 CHF) that was not warm enough for me and ‚Äúmorilles farcies‚Äù that were expensive (43 CHF) but oh so tasty!! The waitress was very friendly and we had a good time.

title: Troppo bello
content: E un posto bellissimo con una vista magnifica sulle montagne e il ftaff √® gentilissimo :) un giorno prometto che torner√≤ anche per dormire :) lo consiglio

title: Cosy and friendly, great fondue and alp-macaroni! Magical view too.
content: We weren't expecting too much from this place, but it delivered a relaxed evening with good solid food. There's a list of fondues (mushroom, herbs...) on the menu, but we just went with the classic, which we enjoyed particularly because they brought little raclette potatoes to dip in as well as the bread, a great idea. We also thought they did a good job on the "alp macaroni" which is a very filling dish for people who have been herding cows all day (macaroni, creamy cheese sauce, potato bits, more cheese to sprinkle and croutons). Really enjoyed the wine too.

title: spontaner Besuch in Auberge de la Halle
content:
Ich war am Freitag den 26.2.2016 spontan mit meiner Schwester am Mittag in Gruyere und entschlossen uns, spontan im erw√§hnten Lokal zu speisen.
Das Ambiente wirkt nett, an der Fensterfront war die Bestuhlung was eng, aber wir waren vollends begeistert von den Maccaroni und einer Gem√ºsesuppe.
Auch die herzliche Bedienung trug dazu bei, das wir gerne wieder kommen werden.

Der Grund, wieso wir kein K√§sefondue eingenommen haben, liegt daran, das wir Mittags hier gegessen haben

title: Correct mais trop chers
content: Nous avons bien √©t√© accueilli. Nous avons mang√© un r√∂sti avec du jambon √† la borne. Si le jambon √©tait tr√®s bon, le r√∂sti √©tait un peu trop grill√© sans √™tre totalement cuit. Si globalement le plat √©tait correct, le prix √©tait trop √©lev√©. Sans compter un soda √† 33 cl √† CHF 4.50. C'est manifestement les prix pratiqu√©s dans le village de Gruy√®res. Mais alors il faut arr√™ter de se plaindre de la baisse du tourisme car avec de pareils prix cela n'est pas surprenant.

title: lunch at gruyere
content: A beautiful place , cozy, comfortable, staff very kind with us; I expect return as soon as possible.

title: Enjoyed our meal very much
content: After a tour of the Gruyeres Castle, my wife and two friends had lunch here (15.12.2013). Everyone had a cheese fondue except me who preferred a potato soup and quiche (see attached images). The restaurant has a warm atmosphere and we all enjoyed our dishes immensely. The sole waitress was cheerful and very friendly. Always happy to return.

title: D√©licieuse fondue aux chanterelles
content: Moiti√©-moiti√© ben s√ªr, excellent service la premi√®re fois en novembre, juste un petit regret : j'aime avoir aussi le choix d'un pain complet pour la fondue (comme √† la Cloche √† Fromage √† Strasbourg ‚ò∫)

title: Good choice!
content: Lots of touristy cafes & restaurants to choose from and we picked a good one! The service was friendly. There's a nice view over a valley. I had the the Roesti with egg and bacon. Very filling and good. I especially liked our Swiss wine! My only complaint is that the Roesti wasn't crispy.

title: La meilleure fondue auc c√®pes!
content: Nous avions pr√©vu de faire 2 restaurants √† Gruy√®re. Le 1er soir nous avons choisi l'Auberge des Halles au d√©part pour le c√¥t√© pratique : juste √† c√¥t√© de notre h√¥tel. Nous avons pass√© une tr√®s bonne soir√©e, le personnel tr√®s sympathique, et les plats.. excellents!! les desserts, tout √©tait parfait, si bien que nous n'avons pas chercher de 2eme resto pour le lendemain. Nous sommes retourn√© √† l'Auberge des Halles et avons mang√© la fondue aux c√®pes... une tuerie!

title: Im Wartsaal ...
content:
Am Samstag haben wir Gruy√®res besucht und wie es √ºblich ist bei uns, wollen wir zu einem Glas Wein auch regionale Spezialit√§ten probieren. Wir haben uns die Auberge de la Halle ausgesucht.
Es ist ca. 16h - beim Eintreten werden wir erst nicht beachtet, ein Tisch ist besetzt im vorderen Teil des Restaurants. Erst als wir am Buffet vorbei, in den hinteren Raum gehen, werden wir gestoppt und es wird uns gesagt, dass man da nur essen k√∂nne. Wollen wir ja ...

Wir d√ºrfen uns an das Fenster setzen und bestellen Weisswein, eine Quiche (ohne den Salatteller) und ein Brettchen mit Trockenfleischspezialit√§ten und K√§se.
Letzteres ist sehr fein und lecker, die Quiche ist zwar gut im Geschmack, aber der Teig ist gummig, fettig und z√§h! Das kommt wohl von der Mikrowelle ...

Wir staunen dann aber nicht schlecht, dass wir f√ºr zwei Glas (warmen) Wein, das Essen und ein Wasser knapp Fr. 70.- bezahlen m√ºssen. Man hat u.a. den gleichen Preis f√ºr die Quiche verlangt, wie wenn wir das komplette Gericht bestellt h√§tten...

Es geht uns nicht um das Geld. Aber wenn wir die ganze Zeit √ºber nicht einmal gefragt werden, ob alles Ok ist, die leeren Teller nicht abger√§umt werden und wir aufstehen m√ºssen um zahlen zu k√∂nnen, dann ist das nicht OK!
Am Tisch neben uns sass eine Frau die sich ein Fondue genehmigt hat. Auch sie ist aufgestanden zum Zahlen und der Tisch war noch nicht abger√§umt, als wir gegangen waren ....

Die Verantwortliche (evt. die Chefin) sass vorne am einzigen besetzten Tisch und hat es auch nicht f√ºr n√∂tig gefunden, uns zu verabschieden. Das gleiche gilt f√ºr die Serviceangestellte hinter dem Buffet, die uns zwar weggehen sieht, aber auch nichts sagt ....

Schade, dass man das dies unter Schweizer Gastfreundschaft versteht - nix gut !!
:-(

title: Raclette here is worth trying
content:
The first thing I would like to say to anyone reading this is that restaurants, hotels and bars in Gruyeres are focused entirely on tourism. The service is not the best in the world, because they know you will not probably come back, so it is just not worth the effort! (Or so they think!). I doubt a Swiss customer would consider price/quality in most places acceptable, definitely just for foreign tourists.

I went with friends and our experience was OK though. The raclette, served with boiled potatoes and cornichons, was nice but expensive (27CHF/person). Drinks and desserts were also quitte a robbery (water 9‚Ç¨, an average dessert 12‚Ç¨).
There were two waitresses. One was really nice, the other not at all (she seemed to be tired and not in the mood).
We knew what we were in for, so all in all we were sattisfied with the experience.

title: Fondue ou croute
content:
Accueil chaleureux, 1 fondue , 1 croute et 1 planchette, nous nous sommes r√©gal√©s. table en terrasse int√©rieur, a l'arri√®re. D√©coration typique, on est au pays du fromage !!!
Pas tr√®s light, mais tellement bon !!

title: Worth the stop
content: We had a great view of the mountains while we enjoyed our lunch. If you're looking for a traditional swiss meal you won't be disappointed. The service and food were great.

title: Tutto perfetto!
content: Ottima la location, buono il personale, ottimo il cibo.. La Fondue Ssquisitissima.. Una bomba per il palato le Meringue creme gruyere.. Se ci andate provate questo dessert. I prezzi nella norma per essere in svizzera.

title: Best soup ever
content: Spent the day in the region with a big group of friends and finished off the evening here with big bowls of Soup de Chalet. Absolutely delicious with croutons and cheese. A perfect meal for a cold day

title: Cozy and Tasty
content:
My daughter and I stopped at Auberge de la Halle to grab lunch during a full day of touring. We ordered the two cheapest things on the menu as we did not want to spend enough money to order fondue or raclette or any of the other more typical dishes from this restaurant. I had what I think was called a house soup, and it was warm and tasty and full of cheese.

The restaurant was not what I would describe as overly friendly, but our waitress was extremely patient and kind and even funny about our lack of French while she also didn't seem to have much knowledge of English. I didn't want to pay 4 CHF for a glass of wine, but due to communication errors and bad sign language, I ordered a 9 CHF bottle of water instead!!!! The waitress was very kind, though, and it was not her fault.

The location is very convenient in the middle of the old town of Gruyere. If you are visiting the castle, this is a nice place to stop for a bite to eat. The atmosphere is extremely homey and cozy with lots of wood paneling and tables and chairs. There is a beautiful view through the large windows in the back, and there is outdoor dining under the front awning. The food was very tasty. No complaints there.

If you are new to Swiss travel, you should know that you will not find any meals at any restaurants for under 19.50 CHF. Most, in fact, are 30 CHF and over. This was our first and last restaurant meal of a 10 day tour, so I can't really compare it to other Swiss restaurants. We found the grocery to be a much more reasonable way to eat. That being said, Auberge de la Halle is extremely reasonably priced compared to other Swiss restaurants, and the food and atmosphere are most enjoyable.

title: Good fondue in a charming venue
content:
We went there for a late lunch. I had the basic cheese fondue and my partner a dish with bacon, egg and melted cheese (I can't remember the name). Both were great and very filling with generous portions. Good wine as well. (The 'Fendant' goes great with Fondue)

It's a really charming venue with polite and friendly staff. There was also some live local music playing whilst we were there.

It's good value when compared to the other restaurants in Gruyeres, although nothing is that cheap in Switzerland. It was a great end to a lovely walk and I'd happily eat there again.

title: What a shame fondue
content:
Hi, sorry to say that this time, our fondue wasn't good enough and we were disappointed with the cheese (Vacherin) and the taste.
I think the mixture wasn't as usual and somewhat poor tasting. And you still pay 27.- swiss francs per person for it.

Will not come back for the fondue. Maybe other dishes but not this one.

Service is nice and not too long. Atmosphere is good.

title: Good fondue
content: We had lunch with my mom inside at the back, where there are a big windows and a nice view. The staff was friendly and always on time with the food and beverages. We had fondue and it was absolutely delicious! Better if you eat it with potatoes than bread. For dessert we had meringue with cream and berries...a must! So leave space for the dessert.

title: Sesationelles Ambiente, gutes Essen, sehr freundliche Bedienung
content: Wir haben je einen gemischten Salat, Macaroni de chalet und Roesti mit Schinken und Ei gehabt und alles war sehr gut und ausreichend. Preis-Leistungsverhaeltnis ist ok. Die Bedienung wars ehr aufmerksam und sehr freundlich. Es war ein wunderschoener Sommerabend und herrlich in der super schoenen Altstadt von Gruyere zu Essen!

title: Fascinado
content: Me he quedado fascinado con este sitio. La foundeu estaba riquisima y la atencion es muy buena. Pense que podia ser una atraccion de turistas, pero estaba muy equivocado

title: La vue de carte postale et une bonne fondue
content:
Les plus de cet incontournable que je visite syst√©matiquement (peur de changer et d'√™tre d√©√ßue ?) :
- la vue de carte postale (on ne s'en lasse pas) pour autant qu'on prenne une table au fond vers les fen√™tres
- on y mange bien et des portions pas super g√©n√©reuses mais qui peuvent contenter une maman et sa fille (on a pris une fondue pour deux)
Les moins : un service moyen, pas beaucoup de souplesse dans les changements menu (j'adore jouer aux legos) et on ne voit jamais le patron du restau ( la serveuse est sympa mais c'est toujours mieux quand le patron jette au moins un ≈ìil √† la salle)
Bref en gros je recommande la preuve j'y retourne ! :) mais j'essaierai quand m√™me un autre la prochaine fois...

title: Tr√®s bon d√©jeuner
content: Nous sommes all√©s visit√© ce magnifique village, et nous nous sommes arr√™t√©s d√©jeuner dans cette auberge de charme avec vue panoramique sur les Alpes, nous avons pris bien s√ªr la fameuse fondue sp√©cialit√© locale nous avons ador√©. Je recommande vivement.

title: Une fondue extra !
content: Nous avons ador√© la fondue moiti√©-moiti√© et le petit vin blanc qui l'accompagnait. Nous sommes arriv√©s √† 14 h sans avoir r√©serv√© et nous avons pourtant √©t√© tr√®s bien accueillis. Le cadre est aussi tr√®s joli. Une bonne table √† recommander.

title: Un endroit hors du temps . Excellent
content:
Sur la place de cet adorable petit village suisse, perch√© dans la montagne, une auberge typique, non loin du Ch√¢teau .
Petite terrasse donnant sur cette jolie place pi√©tonne ou c√¥t√© montagne, la v√©randa vous accueille au calme .
Service souriant et attentif pour des plats typiques de la r√©gion, fondues, r√∂stis : d√©licieux !

title: Comida muito boa, atendimento a desejar!
content: Fui com minha fam√≠lia no restaurante. Adoramos a comida, feita com especialidade local. O pre√ßo est√° na m√©dia entre os restaurantes e, como os outros, √© bem "salgado". Vale a pena por causa do sabor e da vista, se voc√™ conseguir uma mesa no fundo com vista panor√¢mica para os montes ao fundo. O atendimento n√£o √© muito bom. Achei as gar√ßonetes bem sem educa√ß√£o e sem paci√™ncia conosco, al√©m de s√≥ uma delas falar um ingl√™s bem mais ou menos. De modo geral compensa!

title: Best fondue ever!
content: Super charming restaurant with nice view in the terrace in the back. Very polite and attentive personel, fair prices for Switzerland and the best fondue with truffles I have ever tasted. Simply delicious!

title: Da considerare!
content:
Sicuramente uno dei migliori indirizzi di Gruyeres.
Siamo stati a mezzogiorno di un sabato in cui il bellissimo borgo e' affollato all'inverosimile.
Il posto √® caratteristico, il personale simpatico e caloroso, il servizio sufficientemente celere.
Il cibo e' abbondante e di ottima qualit√†. Il confronto fatto con i miseri piatti di diversi ristoranti sulla strada e' impietoso per la concorrenza!
Il prezzo: nella media.

title: Fondue aux bolets extraordinaire
content: Je ne pensais pas un jour √™tre autant enthousiasm√©e par une fondue, m√™me aux bolets! Une pure merveille, de la premi√®re √† la derni√®re bouch√©e, au point que nous avons oubli√© de poivrer le m√©lange. Ce repas, agr√©ment√© de la pr√©venance discr√®te et aimable de notre charmante h√¥tesse, a couronn√© notre visite √† Gruy√®res. Cette auberge pourrait bien √™tre le but principal de notre prochaine visite.

title: Best food in Gruyere
content: I have been there 3 times, just to check which place is best for fondue/raclette. I think they are the best - prices are normal for Switzerland (meaning high), but service and atmosphere is the best. Enjoy

title: Typique
content: excellente fondue dans ce restaurant situ√© en plein centre du village. L'accueil est tr√®s chaleureux. Essayez de reserver une table dans la v√©randa afin de pouvoir profiter de la vue pendant le dejeuner.

title: Fantastic fondue
content: If you want to try some great fondue in Gruy√®res then this place is highly recommended. Plenty of choice (we tried ours with chanterelles mushroom in) and the portions are great - fondues come with potato, bread, pickles and onions to try with the cheese. Some nice local wines are available and I should also mention the delicious desserts...if you're at all a fan of dessert wine then any dessert involving vin cuit is going to wow you! A really great place to eat in this beautiful village.

title: Un tr√®s bon resto
content: Nous √©tions dans la r√©gion et nous avons d√©cider de manger √† midi. Il faut savoir que dans cet √©tablissement il faut √™tre √† l'heure (nous sommes arriv√©s √† 13h45 alors que nous avions r√©serv√© √† 14h et on nous √† gentiment demander de revenir √† 14h). Nous √©tions nombreux donc nous avons √©t√© installer √† l'√©tage. Nous avons √©t√© servis par une demoiselle ravissante, elle fut au petit soin avec nous du d√©but √† la fin de notre visite. Pour r√©sumer des plats succulents nous n'avons pas r√©ussi √† finir nos fondues car les quantit√©s sont g√©n√©reuses, un vin tout √† fait en harmonie avec nos mets, les boissons pour les enfants n'ont pas √©t√© compt√©s dans l'addition sirop et carafes d'eau et un service tout √† fait charmant. Si nous retournons dans la r√©gion nous referons une halte dans ce charmant √©tablissement que nous conseillons vivement.

title: Joli restaurant typique au coeur des montagnes
content:
Nous avons fait une tr√®s agr√©able halte dans ce sympathique restaurant au c≈ìur du village de Gruy√®res
Tr√®s jolie terrasse panoramique √† l'arri√®re du restaurant avec la montagne en arri√®re plan ! Nous avons d√©gust√© une fabuleuse fondue au Vacherin, une excellente raclette avec des produits r√©gionaux impeccables.
Le service est aussi √† la hauteur, sympathique, attentionn√©, discret et souriant.
Un sans faute, une tr√®s jolie adresse.

title: Solo para queso.
content:
Caro no, car√≠simo.

Si vas dispuesto a comer Raclette o fondu√© y eres amante del queso disfrutar√°s como un ni√±o. El resto de cosas normales tirando a excasas.

La ambientaci√≥n buena aunque algo incomodo.

title: Very good fondue and service
content: The fondue that we ate here was very good and better than in other touristy restaurant in Gruyeres. The service was very attentive and kind. I definitely recommend it when in the area.

title: Êú¨Â†¥„ÅÆ„ÉÅ„Éº„Ç∫„Éï„Ç©„É≥„Éá„É•
content: „ÉÅ„Éº„Ç∫„Éï„Ç©„É≥„Éá„É•„ÅÆÁ®ÆÈ°û„ÅåÂ§ö„ÅèËø∑„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åó„Åü„Åå„ÄÅ„Éè„Éº„ÉïÔºÜ„Éè„Éº„Éï„Å´„Åó„Åæ„Åó„Åü„ÄÇ„Éë„É≥„Å®„Åò„ÇÉ„Åå„ÅÑ„ÇÇ„Éª„Éî„ÇØ„É´„Çπ„Åå„Å§„ÅÑ„Å¶„Åç„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇÂ§ß‰∫∫3‰∫∫„Åß1‰∫∫Ââç„Å´„Åó„Åæ„Åó„Åü„Åå„ÄÅ„Å°„Çá„ÅÜ„Å©„Çà„Åã„Å£„Åü„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ‰ªñ„Å´„Çµ„É©„ÉÄ„Å™„Å©„ÇÇÊ≥®Êñá„Åó„Åæ„Åó„Åü„ÄÇ„Ç≥„Éº„Éí„Éº„ÇíÈ†º„ÇÄ„Å®„ÉÄ„Éñ„É´„ÇØ„É™„Éº„É†„ÇÇ„Å§„ÅÑ„Å¶„Åç„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ„ÉÄ„Éñ„É´„ÇØ„É™„Éº„É†„ÅØ„Ç∞„É™„É•„Ç§„Ç®„Éº„É´„ÅÆÂêçÁî£„Å™„ÅÆ„Åß„ÄÅ„ÉÅ„Éº„Ç∫„Éï„Ç©„É≥„Éá„É•ÂêåÊßò„ÄÅÈ£ü„Åπ„Çã‰æ°ÂÄ§„ÅÇ„Çä„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ

title: Cosy and atmospheric
content: Looking up and down the cobbled street of Gruyere to chose a restaurant for lunch could be seen as one of spoilt for choice - there are many all with a similar theme; cheese. But we picked this one and we were not disappointed. Cosy, small with a setting overlooking the mountains and the outer walls of the village. Choice was extremely good (not just cheese!) which satisfied my visitors coming from Italy. Even so the fondue moietie-moitie was excellent, and the roast ham on the bone a delight. Service attentive and pleasant. And the price quite reasonable for a touristic destination. All in all, yes to be recommended.

title: Great food in a quaint village surroundings
content: We stopped here for lunch on the Chocolate Train Tour. Suggest you order the soup of the day and the toasted ham, cheese and tomato on bread. Really delicious food, very popular restaurant and large serves. Good value and one recommended by Lonely Planet to try.

title: Excellent food & service
content: Best service you can get in Switzerland in my POV :) and the le entercotte de beef is a no miss - the cheese fondue and raclatte are also very good (3rd visit)

title: Petite halte extra!
content:
Alors que nous visitions ce magnifique lieu qu'est Gruy√®re, nous sommes tomb√©s par hasard sur ce petit restaurant typique.
Nous avons √©t√© accueilli et servi par une dame aussi souriante que professionnelle.
Nous avons mang√© des r≈ìsti au lard et jambon d√©licieux et avons termin√© par des meringues et de la cr√®me double....que du bonheur.

Nous recommandons ce petit √©tablissement sans retenue.

title: Excellent fondue, and a service that very few can match
content: Despite a very large amount of tourists today in Gruyere, we had an excellent lunch at the Auberge de la Halle. Vesna was our waitress and did an amazing job bringing the plates quickly, giving us good advice on the fondue (one of the best ever), and smilling at all times.

title: very great meal
content: enjoyable lunch, nice service and great views. Typical Swiss meal. Had the macaroni with Grueyere, a little off the square so a little more peaceful.

title: Typical excellent Swiss meal
content:
We went to this restaurant based on a recommendation from a friend. This is truly a Very nice restaurant. Their raclettes and fondues were delicious especially with the classic Swiss cheese. Their small sized potatoes are incredible especially after you dip them in the hot Swiss cheese. After the meal , we took a quick tour in this typical , nice and quiet Swiss village. The views of the green mountains are magnificent.
Truly , worth visiting.

title: Classic Swiss
content: Pull in here for a great set of classic Swiss dishes, and most especially the gruyere cheese-based ones: fondue or raclette especially. Delicious dishes, generous portions, good service and even - if you manage to get a seat near the back - wonderful views over the nearby mountains. Prices also better than some of the alternatives in the town. Desserts were also decent, although perhaps not as outstanding.

title: Une halte au hasard
content:
Lors d'une sortie moto bien humide, nous avons √©t√© fort bien accueillis, malgr√© nos tenues d√©goulinantes.
Les plats servis sont r√©gionaux, tr√®s bien pr√©par√©s et d'un bon rapport qualit√© prix.
Je vous conseil la fondue aux truffes, c'est une vrai tuerie.

title: Excelente almuerzo
content: Paseando por Gruyere nos deparamos con este restaurante ,Delicioso todo . Servicio muy lento ,pues ten√≠an mucha gente , disfrutamos del ambiente de la casona antigua mientras esper√°bamos .La comida es deliciosa . La Sra que nos atendi√≥ era muy simp√°tica . Muchas gracias disfrutamos mucho de nuestra comida en su restaurante .

title: Family Lunch
content:
We were welcomed in 3 languages, French, German and English. The menu was varied. The Soup was generous big bowl, My Cousin enjoyed her salad. The Bernese Roesti with bacon and a fried egg was excellent. The meal was not that expensive but worth every penny.
A restaurant and a village well worth visiting

title: Bien servi
content: Nous avons mang√© dans la v√©randa qui offre une belle vue sur les Prealpes. La fondue √©tait bonne, quoique peu cors√©e. Le service impeccable. Il n'y a qu'un plat enfant et il n'est pas donn√©, mais il est bon et copieux. On nous a servi sans souci de l'eau pour les enfants. Le rapport global qualit√© prix √©tait bon.

title: Joli petit restaurant
content: Nous avons mang√© √† l'int√©rieur pour pouvoir b√©n√©ficier d'une vue absolument fantastique sur la montagne. Jolie d√©co, personne tr√®s gentil et serviable. Service rapide. Nous avons pris chacun une fondue moiti√© moiti√© qui √©tait excellente. Peut aussi √™tre servie pour une personne. Servie avec pommes de terre tr√®s bonnes. Seul b√©mol : la carafe d'eau est payante. Peut √™tre que cela se fait ailleurs en Suisse (nous sommes fran√ßais) mais cela nous a interpell√©!

title: Restaurant ferm√© malgr√© une r√©servation confirm√©e !
content:
A c c u e i l l a m e n t a b l e ! Malgr√© une r√©servation t√©l√©phonique faite le matin m√™me pour 19h30, nous avons trouv√© le restaurant en train de fermer √† notre arriv√©e √† 19h45, sous pr√©texte que nous √©tions trop en retard et que le restaurant "avait eu une mauvaise journ√©e ce jour-l√†" !
Bien que j'aie donn√© mes coordonn√©es t√©l√©phoniques lors de la r√©servation, aucun appel n'a √©t√© fait pour m'informer que le restaurant souhaitait fermer plus t√¥t... le personnel n'√©tait pas du tout sympathique, se bornant √† dire qu'ils avaient d√©j√† d√ª attendre notre arriv√©e depuis 17h sans clients et que les cuisiniers √©taient partis sit√¥t 19h30 pass√©es..
Nous r√©sidons dans la r√©gion et je vais m'√©vertuer √† faire une mauvaise publicit√© √† cet √©tablissement. Quelle image pour Gruy√®res et le tourisme dans la r√©gion ! Je pense que cet √©tablissement a d√©j√† trop de clients et n'est pas trop int√©ress√© √† travailler...

Par contre, nous nous sommes rabattus sur le Caf√© Restaurant des Remparts, o√π l'accueil, √† 20h00 √©tait charmant, attentionn√© et... √©poustoufl√© qu'un √©tablissement ne puisse patienter 15 minutes l'arriv√©e de clients...
Nos voisins de table ont d'ailleurs confirm√© qu'ils voulaient manger √† l'Auberge de la Halle, mais en entendant la r√©ponse du personnel, ils avaient d√©cid√© de passer leur chemin... Quelle honte pour l'h√¥tellerie suisse..

title: Un r√©gal!
content:
Gruy√®res = Fondue et double cr√®me de Gruy√®res, c'est donc ce que nous avons tent√© et nous n'avons pas regrett√© car nous avons excellemment bien mang√© dans ce restaurant. Fondue moiti√©/moiti√© d√©licieuse et dans des proportions parfaites, meringue et fruits rouges accompagn√©e de la "fameuse" double cr√®me, autant de merveilles gustatives sublim√©es par la qualit√© et la fra√Æcheur des mets servis; le cadre est typique (rempli de Suisses ce qui est d√©j√† un tr√®s bon indicateur) tout de pin rev√™tu poss√©dant une magnifique vue sur les montagnes environnantes.

Le prix reste raisonnable par rapport √† d'autres restaurants qui abusent de leur emplacement.
Fondue pour deux : 23 FSuisses /personne et la meringue fruits rouge/cr√®me double de Gruy√®res est √† 14 FSuisses.
Nous avons vu la m√™me fondue avec assiette de viande des grisons "obligatoire" √† 39 FSuisses/pers dans le village, les diff√©rences sont donc cons√©quentes d'un resto √† l'autre.

Enfin, l'accueil est assur√© par une personne adorable, tr√®s souriante et tr√®s professionnelle et qui sait mettre √† l'aise imm√©diatement, Merci!
Nous reviendrons dans cet endroit authentique et d√©licieux!!

title: Fondue de queijo maravilhoso
content: Ambiente extremamente agrad√°vel. Atendimento dentro dos padr√µes europeus com simpatia e muita educa√ß√£o. Comi o Fondue Moiti√©-Moiti√©, simplesmente divino. O prato Morilles farcies (cogumelos recheados) tamb√©m √© delicioso. Muito bem servido e saboros√≠ssimo. Recomendo demais se estiver passeando por Gruyeres.

title: Un original fondue de gruyere
content: Delicioso el fondue de queso gruyere acompa√±ado de dos copas de vino rosado de la casa... Con una vista Espectacular!!!

title: Deliciosa Fondue
content:
He de confesar que era la primera Fondue que probaba, pero estaba deliciosa! Escogimos la de mitad y mitad, son unos 23 francos por persona, pero es muy abundante, y adem√°s del queso trae una fuente con patatas peque√±as cocidas con piel y una bandejita de encurtidos, que parece raro mezclarlos con queso, pero el sabor sorprende para bien!
Tardan un poco en atender, el servicio es lento, pero muy simp√°tico, y si tienes suerte y cojes una de las mesas del fondo, la vista es espectacular.

title: tasty!
content: Very nice restaurant, raclettes and fondues really recommented! also the "a volonte" soup, delicious!

title: Efficient and good
content: Fabulous window view of the valley and mountains while enjoying a nice fondue. This is located on ancient grounds and connected to the old town grain scales/measuring system. Chanterelle fondue was an interesting variation but neither an impressive mushroom experience or phenomenal fondue; it had finely chopped mushrooms and onions. Probably better to stick with a moitie-moitie. The heat was turned up high in this restaurant to the level of semi-tropical and uncomfortable. The two servers were working very hard to keep up with all their customers but we had efficient and friendly service. Had a nice dry white wine from Sion.

title: Best morilles mushrooms
content: Quite touristic but very cosy. Best morel mushrooms i have ever had, and the biggest too. Great view, great local traditional food

title: Very good fondue and nice staff
content:
For a nice experience in Gruy√®res, after or before visiting the castle, enjoy a fondue at Auberge de la Halle. The fondue Moiti√©-Moiti√© is very good and we have also liked the fondue aux bolets (boletus) (1 pot per two people) served with a bottle of Gamaret. The staff is very kind and efficient.
As the room is not so large and if you want to enjoy the landscape view, it's probably better to make a reservation.

title: Jolie auberge au coeur du village de Gruy√®res
content: Une superbe auberge toute de bois √† l'int√©rieur. Une fondue moiti√© (gruy√®re) moiti√© (vacherin) qui peut √™tre servie pour une personne (rare dans les restaurants! souvent la fondue est √† partir de 2 personnes et votre pauvre partenaire de table doit se plier √† la fondue pour faire plaisir !!). Servie avec pomme de terre, bon pain et cornichons, les portions sont parfaites. On a du mal √† finir les 2 derni√®res, mais pas de g√¢chis ! Des prix corrects pour ce que j'ai pu voir dans le reste du village.

title: Degustationsfondue
content: Leider war schlechtes Wetter und wir konnten die wundersch√∂ne Aussicht nicht geniessen. Das Restaurant bietet verschiedene Teller mit kleinen Degustationsfondues an welche lecker schmecken. In Gruyeres sollte man sowieso nur Essen gehen wenn man auch K√§se mag. Die Preise sind den Touristenstr√∂men angepasst.

title: Nice small restaurant, kind staff
content: Excellent Fondue and helpful staff. always a pleasure to be there. Authentic style and good quality for reasonable price! Also organise events with dinner for groups.

title: Over-Rated
content: Their fondue was too heavy on the wine side. As well, do NOT order more than 1 pot of fondue for 2 or 3 people. It is way too expensive and we had to throw out over half. Staff should advise their customers of the "filling nature" of the fondue!

title: Bon restaurant
content:
Un bon restaurant avec des plats certes st√©r√©otyp√©s, mais de qualit√©.
Une fondue au vacherin excellente et des r√∂stis faits maison copieusement servi.
Une bonne adresse √† retenir.

title: Un resto sympathique !
content:
Comment faire le tri parmi tous les restos qui se pressent dans la cit√© de Gruy√®res‚Ä¶ Celui-l√† nous a √©t√© recommand√© par une habitante de la r√©gion alors que nous √©tions en visite touristique et nous n'avons pas √©t√© d√©√ßus !

Niveau tarif, cela m'a paru semblable √† ce que l'on trouve alentours.

Malgr√© une arriv√© en soir√©e un peu tardive, nous avons √©t√© re√ßus tr√®s sympathiquement. Cadre traditionnel, la petite terrasse √©tait d√©j√† remplie, malheureusement pour nous, mais nous avons √©t√© install√©s √† l'int√©rieur de l'autre c√¥t√© sur la vue panoramique, tr√®s appr√©ciable.

A la carte, les morilles farcies (35 francs) ont ravi mon ami. Pendant que j'ai d√©gust√© une classique fondue moiti√© gruy√®re, moiti√© vacherin (23 francs), je me suis r√©gal√© !

En fin de repas, nous avons eu droit √† la visite du chef, que la table d'√† c√¥t√© tenait √† f√©liciter pour ses morilles farcies (il faudra donc que j'y retourne pour les go√ªter personnellement !) et en plus de son sympathique salut, il a aussi livr√© quelques secrets de sa recette‚Ä¶ √† vous d'aller d√©couvrir √ßa !

title: Great fondue!
content: Friendly welcome, efficient service, good food, all are ingredients to spend a lovely moment in this nice restaurant. If the decoration is a bit outdated, you will soon be overtaken by the quality of the fondues and other local dishes. Children can order the usual spaghetti bolognaise or chicken and chips, while adults can indulge in several sorts of cheese plates, specialty menues and great desserts. If you want to enjoy a view, ask for a table at the back of the restaurant. To be recommended.

title: Creamiest fondue by far!
content: Went here for Mother's Day - good job I checked the reviews first and made a booking as it was packed the whole time we were there. Our waitress was awesome; smiley and very attentive and efficient despite the masses of people. We all had the menu which included a fondue and the viande seche was really soft and yummy. This fondue was so so creamy and delicious, would highly recommend. A perfect Mother's Day experience! Our table was at the front rather than at the back where all the awesome views are but it really didn't matter to us.

title: had a funny smell.
content: The place was clean and tidy but it had a very over powering smell, like potpourri, which was giving me headache. The food was good, came hot and quickly.

title: Tres bien nourriture et service, prix resonables
content:
Pour la trosi√®me fois j'ai visit√© ce restaurante et pour la trosi√©eme fois je suis convincu que c'est le meilleure √† Gruy√®res. Depuis l'accueil, assiette, service tr√®es simpatique, restaurant chaleureux et ambiance tr√®es amicale.
Cette fois j'ai mang√© Croute sp√©ecial Halle, une vrai d√©lice, la meilleure que j'ai mang√©.
Je conseille vivement √†a tous mes amis, visit√©.

title: Very Good Food and Service, price reasonable.
content: Had lunch with the family here the 30th Dec 2012. Had a range of Swiss classics and all were good. The prices are exactly what would be expected - less than expected given the fantastic location near Gruyere castle and in the middle of the old town of Gruyere.

title: un tres bon moment
content:
tres tres bien re√ßu par le personnel et avec le sourire
fondue tres bonne et copieuse
nous avons vraiment pass√© un bon moment
Je vous recommande cette adresse

title: Une adresse sympa √† Gruy√®res
content: Nous avons mang√© √† 15h et le service fut sympathique malgr√© l'heure avanc√©e. La fondue vacherin (on peut commander une seule portion = rare dans le village) et les roestis √©taient excellents. La salle est jolie. Bref, une adresse √† recommander dans le village.

title: Location and...
content:
A Historic building and location and...not much else, unfortunately is what I got at the Auberge de la Halle.
There's a cool grain-measure stone block at the entrance and the atmosphere seems attractive, at first. We were geeted by a smiling waitress who showed us a table on the veranda which had a nice view.
Starved after a nice visit of the quaint castle nearby, a bit cold on this snowy Saturday afternoon, a Fondue was exactly what we wanted. And that's when the bread was dry and cut already ! What a lay-down! In Gruyere, the Fondue-capital of the world, on a snowy afternoon...So anyway, we asked for more(fresh)bread and the Fondue was actually not that bad. The dried-meat we ordered with it was presented on not-so nice wooden boards, not very hygienic considering their much-used appearance.
A closer look showed a restaurant on the old and which could easily use some renovations.The bathroom was not particularly clean.
Overall, it was just a really ordinary restaurant in a great town...a restaurant which I will not visit again.

title: A dandy roesti
content: We took a day trip to Gruyeres and stopped at the Auberge de a Halle for lunch. They were not set up yet, but we went back. The friendly waitress thanked us for returning. We shared a roesti with vegetables and cheese -- lots of cheese and some of the best vegetables we've had since landing in Switzerland. The price was reasonable for here.

title: Above-average food, but expensive
content: The fondue was good, but the other items on the menu are hardly above average and lacks variety, and the price isn't quite right: a bit once expensive side - which is to be expected, given the location.

title: One of the best meals I've had in Switzerland
content:
Fantastic meal here, with very good prices for Switzerland.

I had the menu Gruyeres whose main attraction is the fondue, which was absolutely excellent - served with boiled potatoes, fantastic breads and a selection of gherkins, and, pickled onions. Really great.

My other half had the Entrecote of beef - which is served seared and you get to cook the rest of it on a hot stone. This worked really well and the beef was super high quality - far surpassing the cuts we've had in proper steak restaurants here in Switzerland.

Friendly service and a nice wooden chalet feel inside. Nothing to fault here. Gruyeres is a lovely place to visit and a meal here was one of our best memories.

title: tr√®s sympathique...
content:
J'ai d√Æn√© le 17 octobre 12 dans ce petit resto tr√®s sympa. L'accueil de la jeune propri√©taire √©tait tr√®s chaleureux et la table id√©alement plac√©e avec vue panoramique sur la vall√©e. Nous nous sommes r√©gal√©s pour l'un d'une d√©licieuse et copieuse soupe de chalet et pour l'autre de morilles farcies: plat original et d√©licieuse sp√©cialit√© de ce restaurant.
Il est situ√© sur la place principale de ce charmant village beaucoup lus calme en cette saison que l'√©t√© ou le WE.

title: Get the soup!
content: Lovely, creamy soup and you can have as much as you want - one bowl was enough for me though! My husband had the noodles with cheese and ham and it was amazing too!

title: Soupe de Chalet divine
content:
J'ai visit√© ce restaurant dimanche pass√©. ...Et simplement on a commander 2soupes de chalet et elle √©tait delicieuse...servi dans un bac en bois avec cuill√®re en bois comme c'√©tait dans le temps et on √† pas pass√© fain√©ants...bien assez pour un prix bas.
Service tr√®s agr√©able et sympathique...
Il faut vraiment visiter

title: J'ai ador√© les morilles
content:
J'ai visit√© ce restaurant avec mon copain pour lui faire go√ªter les morilles est on √† simplement ador√© les... l'assiette tr√®s copieuse est une agr√©able ambiance avec un service tr√®s sympa et souriant...
vraiment super...√† visiter

title: the best ever food
content: Without a doubt the best dining experience I have ever had. Mastery at its absolute best. With a combination of a stylish decor, outstanding atmosphere, world class food, and flawless service -. I cannot praise this restaurant enough. Highly recommended.

title: Good food but Service runs on gruyeres time
content: We ate lunch at this restaurant today. The service was very friendly but just took a long time. We loved the truffles mushrooms filled with meat. The mixed salad was also nice. Shame they got our macaroni cheese order wrong so double waiting game... Otherwise ok. Swiss prices not outrageously expensive but not cheap. All in all good place of you are not in a rush.. (we had an important meeting at the chocolate factory that afternoon ;)

title: Meilleur restaurant de Gruy√®re !
content: Le meilleur restaurant de Gruy√®re ! Ne manquer pas de manger les morilles farcies !!! Nouveau chef depuis f√©vrier. Excellent restaurant et tr√®s bon accueil.

title: A decent dining experience
content:
Unlike several of the more recent reviewers we actually had a decent dinner at Auberge de la Halle. The service was very friendly and we never waited long to either place our order or receive our food.

My wife and son shared the "motie, motie" fondue and declared to be very good (we do eat a lot of fondue) and felt the fresh bread really enhanced the dish. I went with a rosti and sausage plate. While a little on the heavy/greasy side I nonetheless very much enjoyed it. Enjoy a bottle of local wine with dinner (reasonably priced at about 22 CHF for a 500ml bottle).

If you can, eat in the back room which offers a great view towards the mountains east of Gruyeres. At dinner time the light is perfect and as the sun sets it turns to mountain tops a rose colour.

title: Excellent repas
content:
Les morilles farcies, la sp√©cialit√© de ce restaurant, est un plat vraiment extraordinaire,
Personnel tr√®s sympathique et prix tr√®s correctes. Terrasse tr√®s agr√©able, et belle v√©randa √† l'int√©rieur avec vue sur la vall√©e de l'intyamon. Les assiettes sont bien remplies, et la ville de M√©di√©vale de Gruy√®re est un jolie but de ballade entre amis, en famille ou en couple.

title: Sympathique petit resto
content: Depuis que √ßa a √©t√© repris par une nouvelle √©quipe ce printemps, c'est devenu mon resto favori √† Gruy√®res. Bon rapport qualit√©-prix, pas un attrape-touriste. Et les morilles farcies sont divines!

title: tr√®s bon
content:
Resto tr√®s bon, service rapide et plats copieux mais bouratifs. Raclette √† volont√©.
Tr√®s propre.
Le seul ic c'est que la terrasse est petite et lorsque viennent les beaux jours pas beaucoup de places sont disponibles. Si vous y dinez le soir, le village n'est pas dot√© de lampadaires donc la nuit tombante, seule les lumi√®res des restaurants allument ce qui devient probl√©matique si on s'attarde trop!

title: Disappointing new ownership
content: I have visited this restaurant 7 times in the last 3 years, bringing visitors on a trip to Gruyeres and to enjoy the original macaroni & cheese. Their macaroni & cheese was so delicious - lots of gruyere, topped with carmelized onions!! - that every time we visited Gruyeres we ordered the same thing. Then yesterday we went back, and our mac n cheese came with overcooked penne, with a very thin cream sauce nearly devoid of cheese, and just a little onion sauteed in the sauce. So disappointing. Clearly the new ownership has not maintained the same quality. I can't speak specifically about any of the other dishes, but I will not return as the new owners clearly had no respect for the reputation of their restaurant.

title: NON MERCI! PLUS JAMAIS! LA PIRE DES FONDUES DANS MA VIE!
content:
Le probl√®me c'est que nous ne sommes pas des touristes! Mon fr√®re, ma fille et moi √©tions en compagnie ma m√®re qui a travaill√© des ann√©es dans le domaine du fromage... Donc, il faut pas nous prendre pour des [--]!

Nous avons command√© d'abord une assi√®te de charcuterie, nous avons eu pour un prix exag√©r√© de la charcuterie industrielle et italienne avec simplement un petit drapeau Suisse mignature piqu√© dessus... Ca nous a fait un peu rire de voir les touristes sud-am√©ricains derri√®re notre table, commander la m√™me chose, puis prendre une photo de leur planchette de charcuterie, en pensant que c'est √ßa la Suisse!!!

Ma fille qui ne mange pas de fromage a eu des frites r√©chauff√©es infames. Ma m√®re qui en a go√ªt√© une a failli mourir √©touff√©e, tellement qu'elles √©taient dures!

La fondue a √©t√© servie 1h apr√®s la commande. Elle avait probablement √©t√© oubli√©e aux cuisinnes, puisqu'elle √©tait √† peine chaude et toute durcie, lorsqu'elle se trouvait en fin sur notre table! Pas de go√ªt d'ail, pas de go√ªt de kirsch, pas de go√ªt de vin blanc, ni de go√ªt de gruy√®re, encore moin de vacherin... Ca avait plut√¥t un go√ªt de fromage "philadelphia".

Nous nous sommes permis de dire ce que nous pensions au chef. Il nous a r√©pondu: Ah bon? C'est la premi√®re fois qu'on nous dit √ßa! Il ne nous a m√™me pas propos√© un caf√©!

JE TROUVE QUE C'EST UN SCANDALE!!!!!!! N'ALLEZ PAS L√Ä-BAS POUR DECOUVRIR LA FONDUE SUISSE! ALLEZ PLUT√îT AU RESTO D'A COT√â "L'HOSTELLERIE ST-GEORGES" OU AU CAFE DE LA GARE A BULLE!!!

title: Bof!
content: Nous somme all√©s tout en esp√©rant manger "LA" Fondue - en Gruy√®re c'est un must...mais quelle dec√©ption!!! Fondue servie refroidie dans le caquelon (donc lisse mais toute dure :-((( et il a fallu attendre 10 min pour qu'elle commence √† fondre et √™tre mangeable (tout juste car fade et franchement pas bonne!)...le top √©tait quand m√™me le pain servi dans un panier ou la moitie √©tait pain frais et l'autre moitie du pain d√©congel√© (!!!) et tout mouill√©.....Bof! S√ªr que je ne remetrai plus jmais les pieds!

title: Excellent fondue in a tourist-trap town
content: Gruyeres is a tourist-trap in high season but was delightfully calm when my friend and I visited in March. After touring the castle (and seeing its quirky paintings), we looked for somewhere to have a cheese fondue (the town having given its name to a cheese of the same name). By chance we saw the Auberge with a sign saying fondue at CHF 24.50 per head. We ventured in and found a homely decor. Service by the two (?) owners was slow as it was very busy. The fondue with bread and potatoes was delicious. We had half litre of pinot noir. With water and coffee it came to CHF 93. I would return

title: Manger une fondue
content: Premiere fois que je mangeais une fondue dans ce r√©chaud. Tres sympa est la fondue √©tait tr√®s bonne. 230 gr par pers 23 fr.petite terrasse devant le restaurant sympa.

title: Best place for coffee and meringue
content:
This place is at the very start of the village; as you walk up from the car park, on your left.

Does not look like much, but do not be deceived. Especially if they have all the fondue stuff out. This place is great for a coffee together with meringue, double cream and fruit. Indulgent as all hell, but worth every calorie.

Service was pretty good too.

Sit outside if you can.

title: War alleine unterwegs
content:
Aussage der Bedienung, Sorry, aber man bedient hier keine Einzelperson! So geschehen am Sonntag, 17. Oktober 2021 um 13.30
M√∂chte erw√§hnen dass es draussen freie Tische gab, auch der Innenbereich war leer.

title: 1 personne √† manger.. pas acceptable
content: Je n‚Äô√©tais pas accept√© au restaurant, sur la terrasse presque vide, parce ce que j‚Äô√©tais toute seule √† manger. Je comprends quand il y a beaucoup de monde, mais le local vide..

title: Accueil √† revoir..............
content:
Endroit peu chaleureux. je ne le recommande pas!
Nous avons simplement bu une boisson mais pas test√© les mets (chose que nous ne ferons pas......)

title: Meringues cr√®me de la Gruy√®re
content:
In Greyerz muss man einfach entweder
ein Fondue oder Meringues essen
Wir haben uns f√ºr das Dessert entschieden.
Der Doppelrahm ist einmalig und gibt es nur

title: Meringues and Double Cream
content:
This little spot, situated a bit away from the main part of the village, is pleasant for an afternoon coffee. A group of six of us shared two servings of the meringues with double cream, which was more than enough since we had already had lunch. The dish was very filling and rich, topped with chocolate shavings and berries. The coffee was OK.

There is a little art gallery in the back of the restaurant and the interiors are kind of funky, so it could be fun to take a look around the premises.

No wonder it was empty.

When I pointed it out, I was told by the couple running the place that they could not sell the sandwich anymore, as I had taken a bite. They refused to make me another one.
The place itself is very nice, at the beginning of the town, with outside seating. But if their customer service is so bad that it stops them from making another ham sandwich.. I would not recommend it to anybody else.

title: Pizza passabile e attesa infinita

Nonostante la cortesia della cameriera sempre gentile e sorridente l‚Äôattesa per le pizze √® stata di pi√π di 50 minuti, quando dopo di noi, √à arrivata un‚Äôaltra famiglia ed √® stata servita prima sia con delle pizze che con della fondue. In quel momento mi sono arrabbiato e ho chiamato la cameriera, lei mi ha detto che le pizze erano in forno ma ci sono voluti altri 15 minuti.
La qualit√† della pizza dove viene descritta al forno a legna ma personalmente ci credo poco, era pi√π vicina alla pizza industriale che artigianale.
Per concludere quattro pizze, di cui una bambino, due birre un bicchiere di vino E una bottiglia d‚Äôacqua da 75 cl (10.-) hanno fatturato 115 Fr. E per l‚Äôattesa nessuno si √® scusato ne tantomeno hanno offerto un caff√® o un digestivo.

Une honte lors d'un premier ao√ªt. Nous √©tions si abasourdis que nous n'avons pas relev√© sur le moment. Il faut malheureusement ajouter des erreurs en pagaille tout au long du repas (commandes erron√©es, soupe servie sans cuill√®re qu'il a fallu demander plusieurs fois, plus de 45 minutes pour d√©barrasser la table malgr√© des signes de notre part, etc) Des petites choses qui mises bout √† bout g√¢chent l'exp√©rience.

Les plats soit disant typiques sont sans √¢me (comment peut-on rater des roestis...).

Les pizzas sont bonnes, mais √©viter les plats suisses qui sont bien meilleurs et mieux servis dans les autres enseignes du village.

Nous sommes visiteurs r√©guliers du village depuis de nombreuses ann√©es et y avons test√© une bonne partie des restaurants, il s'agit malheureusement de la pire exp√©rience que nous ayons eu √† Gruy√®res.

Pr√©cisons tout de m√™me que le pizzaiolo a gentiment offert une glace √† l'enfant qui √©tait √† notre table, ce qui a adouci l'ambiance √† la fin du repas.

il fallait demander le pain, les boissons, le sel et poivre.

title: My wife can't stop talking about her meal here

With a new management in place, we give a try to this restaurant. Unfortunately on the terrace, nobody comes to get our drink order. After two attempts (ring the bell for the service), minutes apart, we leave for "Les Remparts" where the staff immediately takes our order.

As we are staying at the Hotel de Gruyeres we were able to choose from two restaurants and get a discount. Given how pricey eating out in Switzerland can be, this was welcomed!

We opted for the fondue academy as we hadn‚Äôt tried it yet and it was a lovely meal. As you can imagine, it involved a lot of cheese. You get a plate of gherkins and pickled onions, and can also get a type of prosciutto and bread to start. The fondue itself comes with baby potatoes for dipping. We were too full for desert, but they did have a few nice sounding options.

My husband accidentally ordered a shandy instead of a regular beer - if you don‚Äôt speak much french then note that ‚Äòavec panache‚Äô is a shandy.

The staff were lovely and it has a lovely atmosphere. You also get 10% discount in the store downstairs.

content: A great place to visit after dinner (or for dinner i think too), but come inside, go through the nice gift shoppe on the ground floor and up the stylish wooden staircase to the fondue academy. This is where you obviously take cooking classes and learn the fine details of Swiss cooking. For us, we came just for ice cream, crepes, and general dessert. Very modern, comfortable, and tasty.

title: " Good but not exceptional "
content: I believe that if you are visiting the factory it would be a good idea to try out their restaurant. That's what we did when we were there. title: Cheese Beignets!
content: We had a wonderful visit to the restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere. We ate here as part of the visit to the larger museum, but it was the most enjoyable part. The Cheese Beignets were wonderful. They came with a large, wonderful salad that offset the cheese nicely. Nice selection of wine and beer. The restaurant is large and the service was friendly - I can imagine it would get a bit crazy during the high tourist season though. There is both indoor and outdoor seating, along with a large playground for the kids.

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere
title: Cheese fondue is good and very swiss, but overpriced
content: I think the restaurant, despite being attached to the cheese factory, does a fairly good job at serving traditional swiss food. The fondue was good (althought it might not be stellar quality) we also had a cold cut ham and it was also quite good. I had a coffee with the double cream of Gruyeres and that was really quite special. The service was also fair as an English speaking waitress explained things patiently for us. The only problem is that it is overpriced. I think this is between 3-4 out of 5.

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere
title: La fondue buenisima. El servicio a mejorar.
content:
Como esta situado en la manufactura del queso gruy√®res, uno espera que sea el mejor sitio para comer una fondue...No estoy segura de ello.

El lugar es bastante amplio, pero al ser un sitio tan turistico, es dificil tener una mesa. Tuvimos la mala suerte de que no nos atendieran, y cuando pediamos mesa, nos daban largas. Asi estuvimos 20 minutos hasta que ya un poco desesperados (y a punto de irnos) nos pusieron a esperar mesa en el bar, tomando unas cervezas.

Cuando por fin nos designaron una mesa, el servicio mejoro, pero los 20 minutos de espera sin saber qu√© pasaba no nos los quita nadie.

La comida es excelente. La fondue es inmejorable. Los camareros son honestos a la hora de proponer cantidades.

Pero no es un restaurante con encanto. En realidad creo que se pueden encontrar otros restaurantes, quizas un poco mas caros, pero que ofrezcan la misma calidad (pues el queso finalmente es el mismo) y con un mejor servicio, un ambiente mas acogedor, y menos turistico.

content: We toured the factory and had some time before catching our train (trains depart every hour), so we decided to grab a bite. It was pretty crowded. We were having trouble finding a seat. We went to a table, but it had a reserved sign on it. The young man who ended up serving us told us we could have the table, that the reserved sign was for us. (points) Of course, we ordered cheese fondue for two. It was AMAZING. Fresh fruit with double cream - are you kidding me - total decadence - first cream from the cow, so thick!!! Espresso is served with a little chocolate filled with the double cream.

Restaurants in the town of gruyere are much more accommodating. Management here refused to do adjust their preparation in any way. Avoid.

Je suis venue boire un verre en terrasse, apr√®s 10 minutes d'attente (4 serveurs d√©barrassaient tranquillement des tables √† l' int√©rieur) je me suis lev√©e et suis all√©e commander au bar...
C'est dommage pour un √©tablissement tr√®s touristique de faire poiroter des personnes par manque d'envie d'aller les servir
Je mets 2 points car une fois command√©, c'est arriv√© vite (sauf qu'on ne peut pas payer tout de suite, il a fallu √† nouveau appeler un serveur)

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere
title: Moyen
content:
De passage √† Gruy√®res, nous sommes attir√©s par cette √©tablissement qui offre une vue surprenante sur les caves d'affinage .
Pass√©e cette belle vue, nous nous retrouvons dans un restaurant surpeupl√© (type restaurant d'autoroute √† l'heure de pointe) . On attends longtemps (presque 2h30 pour un plat et un dessert), les plats sont simples et sans saveur, bref une petite d√©ception .
Nous d√©conseillons .

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere
title: Excellent!
content:
Ap√©ro lors d'un mariage: produits du terroir d'une qualit√© rare. Tout ce que j'ai pu go√ªter √©tait EXCELLENT, le jambon cuit, le saucisson, les fromages, les l√©gumes croquants avec les diff√©rentes sauces o√π encore les petits ramequins '√† tomber'!!
Je reviendrai rien que pour ces derniers ;-) Et le service √©tait sympa et efficace. BRAVO!

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere
title: A Culinary Piece of Swiss History
content: On your way between Geneva and Luzern, you should make the time to stop in this wonderful little town, especially if you enjoy Swiss cheese. This is as real as it gets. You may get in a small traffic jam if you leave too late in the afternoon. The place is also known for the ski slopes nearby. You should be able to navigate out of there if you can drive European style. This is, for me at least, a di not miss as it is so traditional. I highly recommend their cheese fondue with potatoes and bread. Stay away from the wine. I'm a wine drinker but, I tell you, the local beer is cheap and very tasty. You'll have a great time.

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere
title: √Ä recommander
content: Accueil sympa, service rapide et souriant, carte offrant plusieurs sp√©cialit√©s typiques de la r√©gion, excellent repas ! √Ä recommander

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere
title: Nice cheese food, good price
content: The restaurant itself has a nice environment and the service was excellent. We had the menu of the day for 19 CHF offering simple nice plates with home-made taste

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere
title: Delicious!
content: This restaurant has a great environment, good service and, of course, an excellent "cheese fondue". Very, very tasty, this fondue 50/50 is made with 2 cheese (Gruy√®re and Vacherin Fribourgeois). The best that I've ever eaten. And as a dessert, take a "meringue avec double cr√®me". Impecable.

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere
title: Tr√®s vivant et tr√®s chaleureux
content: Le restaurant de la maison du gruy√®re est une excellente surprise. Le menu est surprenant copieux et tr√®s bon. Le personnel est tr√®s actifs il y a beaucoup de mondes, mais n√©anmoins le service est assez rapide et chaleureux. Beaucoup de sp√©cialit√© √† base de gruy√®re bien s√ªr. Je le recommande pour un repas revigorant le midi entre deux visites. Ce n'est pas un gastronique mais il vaut cependantled√©tour

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere
title: Expensive and below-average food, poor service
content: Very slow service and at times impolite. We had a r√∂sti which was lukewarm and of poor quality. On top of that, prices are quite high for both food and drinks (10 CHF a bottle of sparkling water). Many tourists stop here to eat after a visit to the fromagerie because it's just in front; however, it's really not worthing it and you'd better find some other place where to have lunch.

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere
title: Usine √† touriste
content:
Cette cantine qui permet de donner suite √† une visite typique nous laisse dans l ambiance d une usine a touriste.
Les mets seront bien meilleurs ailleurs, les robots du service paraissent faire ce qu ils peuvent car s√ªrement tres gentils si ils travaillaient ailleurs... mieux vaut prendre sa voiture et s √©loigner un peu pour manger dans de meilleures conditions...

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere
title: Very disappointing
content: After visiting the chocolate factory we thought we would have food from the restaurant infront of the cheese factory and then visit the place. The restaurant was a utter disappointment for us.The waiters were not polite and she took more than an hour to server just two dishes.We had to wait with our toddler doing nothing just to eat a food which was not even worth it. After having the food we rushes to the counter to take the ticket for the tour and sadly it was closed as the last tour ends at 3. We were not able to visit the factory .

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere
title: Bien mang√© en dans la r√©gion de la Gruy√®re
content: Service rapide et excellent. Une cuisine remarquable par sa qualit√©, choix de menus. Ambiance tr√®s jovial. Le patron et la patronne tr√®s agr√©able. Tr√®s bon rapport qualit√© prix.

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere
title: Um √≤timo foundue
content: Almo√ßamos l√° depois da visita a Gruyeres. O restaurante √© grande e rebe v√°rias excursoes. Comemos o fondue, servido com pao e batatas e extava delicioso. Bebemos o vinho da casa. O ambiente n√£o √© sofisticado mas valeu a visita. Tem uma lojinha onde vc pode comprar queijos tamb√©m

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere
title: Delicious fondue
content: Had a lovely lunch here with my mum. Prices are very reasonable for Switzerland and the fondue was excellent!

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere

content: Sitio precioso y acogedor en madera. Restaurante circular en el que ves de fondo los Alpes mientras degustas una fond√∫ riqu√≠sima. Los precios de la comida muy asequibles la bebida cara.una coca-cola y un agua casi 10 euros. Pero acost√∫mbrate a estos precios si pretendes visitar Suiza. Yo lo llevaba asumido y a√∫n as√≠ flipaba.

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere
title: Est√° bien
content: Es una buena opci√≥n cuando todos los restaurantes del pueblo (al que hay que llegar caminando 10-15 minutos, porque no se puede acceder en coche) est√°n llenos de turistas (cosa m√°s que habitual). Este restaurante est√° al lado del aparcamiento m√°s pr√≥ximo al pueblo, y es adem√°s una factor√≠a de queso Gruy√®re. La fondue est√° muy buena, aunque es algo cara, igual que todo en Suiza en general. El servicio es amable, pero algo lento cuando se saturan de comensales. Se puede aprovechar para visitar la f√°brica de quesos, y para comprarlos en el propio complejo.

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere
title: interessante
content: non fatevi mancare l'assaggio di una meringa con la "doppia crema"....attenzione non si tratta di volgarissima panna montata, ma di una fantastica crema di panna: praticamente un dessert che vale un pasto

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere
title: Menu muy bueno luego del tour a Gruyere famosa queseria
content: Buena atenci√≥n y ambiente agradable. Cuidar de llegar a buena hora pues el men√∫ se acaba pronto. Por su ubicaci√≥n optimizas tu tiempo de desplazamiento por la zona. Muy recomendable. Fuera del men√∫ un buen Fondeau en este lugar original, es lo m√°ximo.

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere
title: Normal
content: Aqui se come la Fondeau mas barato que en el pueblo, estas bien atendido en un lugar ameno, las demas comida no son tan economica.-

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere
title: A nice place to try Swiss fondue!
content: We were late for the cheese demonstration but decided to stay and try the fondue! The staff is very helpful and the fondue is well presented and very tasty -- a serving size for one was more than enough for three of us to share and feel very full! Still adjusting to Swiss prices -- fondue for one in a casual restaurant is CHF24, and a liter of sparkling water is CHF9!! The flavor of the Gruyere cheese is much milder and more pleasing than what is typically found in the States!

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere
title: Buen lugar en el centro de producci√≥n del m√≠tico queso
content: un lugar sencillo, para probar los quesos que all√≠ mismo se elaboran. Muy tuir√¨stico, mucha gente, atenci√≥n cordial y correcta. Hay milanesas y por su puesto quesos.Muy cerca del castillo.

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere
title: Best fondue we've had on three trips to Switzerland
content: We stopped here for the cheese museum tour and couldn't resist the aromas coming from the restaurant. Fondue is served for 1,2 or more persons. Typically it's served with small chunks of bread and small potatoes. We find this just too much with the delicious cheese. Now, we are bring pre cut vegetables with us to dip in the fondue pot. We don't know if this would be possible in a more formal restaurant but we have done it here several times without a problem.

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere
title: La casa della fonduta
content: Dopo una piacevole vuole vista al bel castello che sovrasta il paese, abbiamo visitato La Maison di Gruyere, dove √® possibile assistere direttamente alla produzione del celebre formaggio locale ed acquistare diversi prodotti tipici. Finita la visita ci siamo fermati nell'attiguo ristorante, dove √® possibile gustare la famosa "fondue moitie-moitie" servita con patate bollite. Uniche note negative sono il prezzo (ma d'altronde siamo in Svizzera) ed il fatto che, finite le patate, restava solo il pane per accompagnare la fonduta, pane veramente buono ma poco adatto alla fonduta, perch√© dolce (sarebbero stati meglio dei crostini di pane tostato). Ampio parcheggio disponibile.

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere
title: V√°rias op√ß√µes de prato com Queijo Gruyere!
content: Ap√≥s a visita para conhecer o processo de fabrica√ß√£o do queijo, recomendo almo√ßar neste restaurante. L√° tem v√°rias op√ß√µes de prato que levam queijo Gruyere na receita. Para finalizar, pe√ßa um creme merengue com morangos (demais). Muito bom. O atendimento √© excelente!

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere
title: Best mac and cheese ever!!
content: While visiting Switzerland in December our friends took us around the countryside and we visited the cheese factory and had a quick lunch here, as I love cheese. The restaurant is a bit expensive, but the mac and cheese we had with Gruyere was amazing and the best we ever had. The soup was also very good.

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere
title: Sp√©cialit√© de Gruy√®re

Triste mais je recommande aux future clients de privil√©gier les alentours mais d √©viter ce lieu sauf pour la visite de la caverne. ..

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere
title: A very average experience
content: While travelling back from a ski holiday in the Swiss Alps stopped for a short while at Gruyere. After visiting the village had lunch at Restaurant de la Maison. Food was fine but not particularly good value for money. We weren't looking for much so we ordered soup and salad. CHF9 for soup is a lot and we had to ask for some bread. Otherwise service was good.

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere
title: visite de la maison
content: pas mang√© au restaurant,, visite de la fabrication du gruyere, superbe visite, bien organis√© autant pour les petits comme les grands, bien expliqu√©, superbe

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere

content: The most tasteful cheese ever!! Do not forget to try the different kind of cheese they have there. Excellent place, helpful staff and traditional design. Totally worth the visit!

title: L'incontournable local
content:
Une fois l'odeur de fromage ...."dissip√©e" c'est une grande salle de restaurant e type un peu "cantine", bryante o√π les tables sont redress√©es jusque 3 fois par service...un peu l'usine mais pas trop le choix....tant aller au restaurant en suisse en famille est on√©reux.

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere
title: Bad service not sure about the food
content: We did not manage to sit even if the restaurant was not full simply because of bad organisation of the staff and disinterest from their side.. !

accueil professionnel
