restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere
title: visite de la gruyere
content: nous avons voulu rester dans la tradition et nous avons mang√© une fondue moiti√©-moiti√© suivie par des meringues a la creme et aux framboises

title: Very touristic, but good enogh
content: Exactly what you expect from a Swiss restaurant: lots of cheese in all different forms (in the soup, raw, fondue,...). A bit expensive for what you eat, as you can expect. title: Lovely Huge set of Swiss Fondue
content: The melted cheese in the pot must be almost 1 kg. of cheese. Do not order 2 set for 2 persons. Both of us struggle to finish it. It was fantastic Swiss Fondue. It should came with some pickle for contrasting the taste but it only bread and potatoes in the set.

title: Tourist like
content: We went to visit the Gruyere factory or "La maison Du Gruy√®re" so what better and easy place to eat after the tour than in their restaurant. We ate fondue (of course); Service was quick, food OK. The best of the visit was their ice creams! I don't think we will repeat the experience and for first-timers I will better suggest to wait and have lunch in any of the restaurants near the "Chate√¢u". Also tourist places but a bit more charming.

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere
title: Sitio tur√≠stico
content: Buen lugar para comer y visitar la f√°brica de queso. Es un lugar para turistas, bastante concurrido en temporada alta. Tomamos una fondue que no estaba mal. El local es agradable aunque como he dicho, en temporada alta puede estar muy concurrido.

content:
Atmosph√®re 100% touristique, mais accueil chaleureux et professionnel. Notre serveur ne nous a pas pouss√© a la consommation.Et c'est tant mieux, vu les prix dans la r√©gion.Les,prix sont un peu moins √©lev√©s que dans le village ancien de Gruy√®res.

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere
title: Maravilhoso
content: Fomos para comer um fondue! O melhor fondue que ja comemos e por um bom pre√ßo! Atendimento muito bom e rapido!

title: Un accueil tr√®s souriant
content: Je f√©licite le personnel pour leur accueil tr√®s sympathique et pour la rapidit√© du service. Nous avons mang√© pendant 1 semaine dans cet √©tablissement et tout a √©t√© parfait. restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere
title: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere
content: Comida e pre√ßo decentes, bem saboroso e preparada √† franco-sui√ßa. A carne de porco estava levemente defumada e os aspargos, de produ√ß√£o pr√≥pria, frescos e saborosos. Vinho tinto seco leve e muito bom.

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere
title: good for a late lunch
content: Our niece who lives in Switzerland took us here for a late lunch as she said would be open and fairly quick. Although mostly tourist for the cheese factory-shop it was actually pretty good. Won't say one of the best meals in Switzerland but the foudue was good and we did get in and out fairly quickly.

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere

content: We had the fondue of course which was good and the kid had a spaghetti with the local cheese instead of parmesan. Why not? Prices where ok for the Swiss standards. (3 adults & 2 kids 80 chf nonalcoholic drinks included). We had fun and the service was nice. Any way we did not expect much from this place as this is the restaurant from the cheese factory. We strongly recommend a visit and why not a nice fondue at the end.

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere

content: C'est le restaurant attenant √† la fabrique de fromage et il vaut le d√©tour! Vous y retrouvez les produits du terroir fribourgeois, tr√®s bien pr√©par√©s. Les prix sont tout √† fait corrects pour un restaurant touristique suisse. Le restaurant est grand donc il vaut mieux choisir les horaires pour ne pas trop attendre (√©viter d'y aller √† 13:00, je pense). Des petites machines pour appeler les serveuses sont tr√®s pratiques.

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere
title: Pas terrible
content: Nous avons mang√© une fondue qui √©tait beaucoup trop √©paisse.Les pommes de terre avec un go√ªt sucr√© . Heureusement que les meringues avec la double cr√®me √©taient tr√®s bonne.La prochaine fois nous mangerons dans un autre restaurant.

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere

content:

accueil tr√®s sympathique dans ce grand espace aux couleurs suisses.

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere

Restaurant tr√®s touristique, serveuse tr√®s charmante mais cuisine qui ne suis pas.

Le plat arrive je commence a le mang√© mais il ne correspondait pas a ma commande. La serveuse s'excuse et me demande si je d√©sir le bon plat, je dit non donn√© moi mon entr√©e et ca ira.

Seul b√©mol, la lenteur du service en raison des nombreuses tables. Les serveuses faisaient de leur mieux mais √ßa ne suivait pas...Nos enfants ont √©t√© servis en dernier et s'impatientaient vraiment. Prix relativement chers

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere
title: Simple et bon
content:
Nous nous arr√™tons r√©guli√®rement lors de nos d√©placements dans la region et avons rarement √©t√© d√©√ßus. Les plats du jour sont copieux, les quiches d√©licieuse et les fondues cr√©meuses a souhait.
Pour ceux trouvant le service long, prenez le temps de lire les mots sculptes dans les murs ( en hauteur) et relaxez-vous.

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere
title: Petite halte pour un dessert
content: Nous nous sommes arr√™t√© pour d√©guster une authentique meringue cr√®me double. Que vous dire d'autre, on ne peux rien faire de faux. 2 meringues, 2 boules vanille et un petit bol de cr√®me double!!!

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere
title: We were very disappointed
content: As we arrived we felt the stress in the room. The waitress hurried us to our seets and we waited for over 30 min just to receive a menu. The poor lady was nice but extremely stressed. The restaurant is clearly understaffed. This made for an awkward and unpleasant experience. I live in switzerland and have had thousands of fondues and I cannot complain about the one we had here. But the 3 hours we spent in the restaurant mostly waiting for our meal made us regret coming here. The atmosphere in this restaurant is very unpleasant and I would avoid it in future.

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere
title: Quick and Convenient
content: The food was good and the service was good despite the fact there was a large group accupying most of the diningroom. A little pricey but was good. Our waitress spoke English and we had no trouble communicating with her. I had never had aGruyeres wonton salad but I wsa plesantly surprised. My husband had ham and eggs, not was he was expecting (see pic) but it was good.

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere
title: Touristique, bon et cher
content: Ce restaurant fait parti du complexe de la Maison du Gruy√®re, comprenant √©galement la fromagerie et une boutique. Il a donc le charme d'une caf√©t√©ria. On y sert de bons plats et des produits helv√®tes (fromages, cr√®me, charcuterie, glace...). Tout est bon mais un peu cher, mais c'est une bonne √©tape pour un d√©jeuner. Par contre, il faut arriver t√¥t pour manger calmement car la salle est un peu bruyante.

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere
title: La Maison du Gruy√®re
content: Dopo la visita al castello ed una passeggiata per le vie del borgo siamo andati a la Fromagerie De Gruyere. La preparazione del formaggio ci ha fatto venire fame e cos√¨ ci siamo accomodati al ristorante adiacente. Abbiamo pranzato con un abbondante piatto di spaghetti e una fondue di Gruy√®re AOP accompagnata da patatine bollite. Per finire in dolcezza meringhe con doppia panna. Che dire? solo a ripensarci mi viene l'acquolina in bocca! consigliatissimo

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere
title: Molto buono
content: Sono stata in questo ristorante due giorni fa,durante un breve soggiorno in svizzera.Locale molto caratteristico,un po caro per gli standard italiani ma nella norma per il costo della vita del posto.Abbiamo mangiato una fonduta veramente molto buona e abbondante seguita da due rosti eccezionali,tutti piatti tipici svizzeri.Per finire ci siamo concessi dei dolci a base di lamponi e crema di gruy√®re...La fine del mondo.Unica nota negativa la cameriera che ci ha serviti:sgarbata e arrogante che non ci ha permesso di dividere il conto per poterlo pagare con due carte di credito.

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere
title: Che fondue!!
content:
Ristorante annesso al Caseificio. Molto frequentato.
Non ci si pu√≤ non fermare ad assaggiare la fondue con le patate: morbida al punto giusto, veramente eccezionale. Buoni anche i piatti di r√∂sti. Panna doppia: notevole! da assaggiare con le meringhe o con i lamponi! Il servizio √® un p√≤ lento, ma non si pu√≤ pretendere troppo! Molto buono. Prezzi accettabili.

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere
title: Very slow service
content:
We had lunch at this restaurant just before doing the cheese factory tour.

Considering that this is a super-touristy place, the restaurant could do with some more multi-lingual staff! We had some trouble communicating with a waitress who could not speak much English.

The food was OK - we are vegetarians and could get some decent salads. Contrary to prior reviews, we did not really find the restaurant too expensive (of course, we found Switzerland restaurants expensive in general).

The biggest issue with this restaurant was the excruciatingly slow service - for taking orders, for bringing the food AND for bringing the bill!

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere
title: Tr√®s bonne cuisine de montagne
content:
c'est sur que on est vraiment dans le restaurant √† touristes par excellence par la nourriture n'a je trouve pas perdu son √¢me et le fromage de gruyeres est ici bien repr√©sent√© et mis en valeur.
La fondue est vraiment savoureuses et go√ªtez les macaronis au fromage c'est une tuerie service dans un baquet en bois avec sa cuill√®re en bois √©galement tr√®s typique et touristique ;-)
Prix dans la moyenne, desserts simples mais pas mauvais, go√ªtez la cr√®me double de gruyeres

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere
title: Overrated as easy option close to cheese museum
content: Been here for the 2nd time with friend visiting. We came for the town and the cheese museum then they wanted to try the cheese fondue at an authentic place. Both times i was disappointed. Overpriced, avarage quality food and last time the staff was super super slow in serving us. The lady at some point went to clean the tables after clients instead of taking our orders. Fondue is ok (hard to ruin if made from good quality cheese) but rosti and salad were both avarage. There are so many much nicer places in Gruy√®re, i advise having lunch there.

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere
title: Bons produits mais usine √† touristes
content:
Ambiance cafet un peu bruyante.
Tr√®s bons produits en grande quantit√©.
Dommage que le service soit long. En m√™me temps il y a tellement de monde que les serveuses font ce qu'elles peuvent.
Les tarifs sont corrects.

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere
title: Fondue for quite a bit of money
content: Be prepared to spend a lot of money for not the greatest food. the town and train ride to the town are beautiful. Not just the destination but getting here is best part. I would want to spend more than a day here as it is very quiet

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere
title: Standard Swiss Fondue Place
content: All restaurants in Gruyere seem similar offering typical regional offerings of fondue, raclette and strawberries with double cream. Nothing special here and not much other choice or concession to a healthy or well rounded meal.

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere
title: Overpriced
content:
I went here with friends after visiting Chateaux du Gruyere. The food is good but overpriced. I think it's because this place cater mostly to tourists as the place also houses a Museum with cheesemaking demos.

The place has outdoor seating that gives a good view and fresh air. There is a playground for kids too.

One challenge: this place has only 1 guy who can speak English and as it is a busy place, he couldn't attend to every English speaking guest. We were attended by a lady who doesn't speak English and we had to figure out the menu through context clues! Luckily, the food was fine when it got to our table.

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere
title: Moyen
content:
Le restaurant se trouve dans la fromagerie, la salle est grande et bien √©clair√©e mais fait assez caf√©t√©riat.
La serveuse √©tait plut√¥t maussade, impossible de lui faire d√©crocher un sourire...
La quiche au fromage √©tait tr√®s bonne, le risotton bon sans plus et les raviolis frits au gruy√®re durs et sans go√ªt (par contre les petites salades qui les accompagnaient √©taient tr√®s bonnes).
La note est plut√¥t sal√©e par contre, 3.90 CHF le caf√© quand m√™me!

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere
title: Belle progression
content: Apr√®s un souvenir mitig√© en 2011 (exposition tr√®s sympa mais restaurant un peu cantine) heureuse surprise en 2013. Niveau de qualit√© nettement sup√©rieur avec produits du terroir

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere
title: Pour une fondue au fromage copieuse
content:
Le restaurant est situ√© dans le b√¢timent m√™me de la maison du gruy√®re, donc c'est TRES touristique, voire un peu industriel. L'ambiance est assez bof. Cela dit le service est efficace et plut√¥t sympathique( sachant qu'il y avait tr√®s peu de monde).
La fondue est bonne et tr√®s copieuse. J'ai trouv√© le reste un peu gras (!). Le Roesti est d√©cevant.
Rapport√© √† la qualit√© de la fondue, le prix est tr√®s raisonnable.

Remarque pour TripAdvisor : Pringy-Gruyeres n'est pas en France mais en Suisse !

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere
title: Quick eats and kids play area
content:
This is a museum restaurant and thus, serves tourists. They have a large selection of foods. The restaurant specials are a good buy. They have a kids menu. We all found something we could eat (spaghetti, rosti, cheese sandwich, etc). The staff was very nice to us. We asked for a pitcher of tap water which was free and delicious.

We had our toddler with us. The restaurant had high chairs available, small play area inside, and a play structure outside.

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere
title: NOT ACCEPTABLE
content:
Just went back from there.
Overall, very very nice places in the area and very nice getaway from Milan.
Food very mediocre, but... Worst experience ever: paying 9CHF a bottle of water at La Maison du Gruyere.
This makes it the highest price I ever paid a botlle of water in the entire world (from India to Arizona, all the way to the sand desert in UAE).

On top of that, it was actualy pretty difficult (in a pretty empty restaurant) to get a decent service: had to ask 3 times before actually receiving the bill.

After such "world record" no more words are reall necessary: just avoid it.

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere
title: Restaurant tr√®s moyen / visite de l'exposition bien faite
content:
Nous avons visit√© la maison du gruy√®re: exposition tr√®s int√©ressante, visite int√©ractive avec possibilit√© de voir la confection du fromage en direct. Vue sur les caves et la machine automatique qui retourne/brosse les meules de gruy√®re. Incluse dans la visite la d√©gustation de gruy√®re √† diff√©rents stades de maturation.
Nous avons √©galement poursuivi notre visite par un passage au restaurant du mus√©e et l√†: d√©ception! La cuisine est beaucoup trop sal√©e. Quel dommage!

restoName: Restaurant de La Maison du Gruyere
title: Tipicamente svizzero, frequentato dai turisti ma ancora genuino
content: Ristorante annesso alla fabbrica - museo del tipico formaggio svizzero che prende il nome dal paesino di Gruy√®res, incastonato in un paesaggio da cartolina, offre ottime fondute e specialit√† del posto a prezzi accettabili, annaffiate da grandi birre. Ampio parcheggio esterno, mantiene un'atmosfera genuina nonostante sia molto frequentato anche dai turisti.

title: Tr√®s d√©√ßus
content: L‚Äôattente pour nos plats a √©t√© de plus de une heure et certaines personnes ont eu le temps de finir leur plat pendant que d‚Äôautres n‚Äôavaient rien re√ßu. Quand nous recevons enfin nos plats, tout √©tait tr√®s fade‚Ä¶ le tartare de saumon au avocat sans go√ªt, les entrec√¥tes au go√ªt du cong√©lateur qui quand on les coupe, on aurait dit de l‚Äôeau qui en sort. Les portions n‚Äô√©taient pas tr√®s g√©n√©reuse et nous n‚Äôavons pas assez mang√©. Certes, il √©tait possible de demander plus mais comme les plats n‚Äô√©taient pas √† notre go√ªt, nous n‚Äôallions pas nous resservir. Les l√©gumes n‚Äô√©taient pas cuit et certains avaient une couleur douteuse‚Ä¶ en bref, nous avons √©t√© tr√®s d√©√ßus

title: Repas de midi un jour de travail
content:
Tr√®s bonne cuisine, simple et tr√®s bonne pr√©sentation, le prix est tout √† fait correct.
Le personnel est tr√®s sympathique. Bravo

title: Repas du jour parfait
content: Bon restaurant bien plac√©, service rapide, efficace, sympa, prix corrects, parfait pour se restaurer sans chichi.

title: Belle d√©couverte
content: Cuisine excellente, bon accueil et personnel souriant. Nous nous sommes arr√™t√©s par hasard et nous avons fait une belle d√©couverte.

title: Good For a Quick Bite
content: Nice restaurant located in the train station in Gruyeres. Located directly across the street from the Gruyere Cheese Expo/Tour. Service was fine, daily specials looked interesting, and fairly priced. I had a tomato soup with a schnitzel and side salad. It was good.,

title: Du d√©gel√© et commercial
content: Nous avons mang√© un m√©lange de l√©gumes congel√©s du commerce - de la viande qui n‚Äô√©tait pas √† la cuisson demand√©e. Une sauce √† salade au go√ªt commercial aussi et un dessert pas maison non plus. Bref tout ce que je ne fait pas √† la maison. Et ceci deux fois de suite

title: Une fondue au calme...
content:
Excellente fondue moiti√©-moiti√© servie avec pain, pommes de terre, cornichons et un bon Fendant pour l'accompagner.
La carte d'hiver est assez restreinte par rapport √† celle d'√©t√©.
Dommage que la cuisine soit ouverte sur la salle : cheveux et v√™tements prennent les odeurs de frites et de fromage.

title: Repas de midi
content: Un excellent restaurant. L‚Äôaccueil est parfait, chaleureux et familial ! Le service est rapide et tr√®s bien ex√©cut√© ! La nourriture est excellente et cuissons parfaites ! A recommander !

title: Fondue bacchus
content:
Je ne suis pas hyper fan du cadre , un peu vieillot √† mon go√ªt .

En revanche , les plats du jours sont tr√®s bons , ainsi que la fondue bacchus. Je vous la conseille . Viande excellente , bouillon parfaitement assaisonn√© avec du go√ªt et frites allumettes vraiment tr√®s bonnes . √áa change des frites beaucoup trop cuites qu on nous sert habituellement dans d‚Äôautres √©tablissements.

Franchement tr√®s bien.

title: Nice food, pleasant service, reasonable prices.
content:
We went here after a day cycling on the Gruyere trail. We'd planned to go to the neighbouring restaurant at La Masion du Gruy√®re but we were coldly told to go away because we turned up 'too late' (even though we were were well before the time for last orders they had previously stated.

Turned out to be fortuitous as Brasserie du Relais is a really nice little place right next door which seems to be well known by locals and not so much by tourists. The burgers, fondue and pommes de terre Fribourgeois were all excellent choices and the waitress was friendly and helpful.

It seems the steak tartare is quite a speciality - it's prepared at your table and made with fillet steak - quite a few of the locals were ordering this and it looked great.

title: Nice salads
content: Perfectly good cafe with a typical range of dishes. We went for salads - ended up swapping as I preferred my father‚Äôs to mine. Service a bit hit and miss but all up perfectly good...

title: D√Æner d apr√®s randonn√©e
content:
Accueil et service plut√¥t triste, peu de sourire !
La cuisine est simple mais suffisante.
La traditionnelle pomme de terre gratinee, ne tient pas ses promesses, trop lourde √† la digestion.

title: Nous voulions d√©guster la chasse
content: Nous avions r√©serv√© une table, nous avons d√ª attendre 10 minutes, avant que l'on vienne vous demander ce que l'on voulait...et nous √©tions pr√™ts √† repartir...mais voil√† que la serveuse arrive et nous dit qu'elle nous a pas vu entrer alors que la patronne nous a re√ßu et nous a indiqu√©e notre table r√©serv√©e...Suite √† la commande, nous avons √©t√© servi assez rapidement....mais endroit froid, plein de courant d'air. Les m√©daillons de chevreuils √©taient bons...mais sans plus...et l'accompagnement moyen.

title: Just a normal place.
content: We've got just coffees there but the service was nice and relaxing. It's the classic train-station-cafe

title: Salade de ch√®vre chaud
content:
Mang√© √† 2 pers Salade de ch√®vre chaud sur 6 tartines de ch√®vre 2 tr√®s bonnes et 4 dont le fromage √©tait bien trop vieux et extr√™mement fort et un go√ªt de vieillerie.
Les patrons n‚Äôen ont pas fait cas... pour 25.- p.p. Bof un attrape touriste de plus.

title: Didn‚Äôt even get the chance to try the so longed burger with Swiss beef
content:
It was a rainy day which didn‚Äôt allow us to actually go to Gruy√®res. It was time for lunch so we sat at the train station restaurant. I was longing some burger with Swiss meet and local Gruy√®res cheese.
We sat outside under a covered area cause inside was too loud and the smell wasn‚Äôt so pleasant. It was rainy so the view, the sound and the smell of the Swiss green Alps was stunning! The waiter came and started pulling back the cover with some excuse that it was only for sunshade. He was extremely rude, unpleasant and unprofessional when it came to working with us. After 10 min of me trying to explain that I would like to stay outside and him shaking his head and shoulders we left. Ooo, did I mention we were with a sleeping baby in a stroller...
We left in a pouring rain. Thank God we had umbrellas and there was another restaurant across the street, which at least has a good customer service!

title: Good point out of tourist place BBB
content: Very kind place, nothing special but good service and nice staff. We tasted a good bouef hamburguer recomendable. In additon short price to bet switzerland.

title: Petite soir√©e en famille
content:
Magnifique moment pass√© dans ce restaurant.
Qualit√©. .quantit√©. ..accueil super sympa.
Vraiment enchant√©s de notre soir√©e dans cet endroit que nous frequentions dans notre jeunesse.
Un bon moment de rire avec le choix des chansons dans le juke box, un objet que l'on ne voit plus nulle part...
Merci

title: Simple mais accueillant
content:
Bonne cuisine concoct√©e par le patron.
Personnel toujours souriant et accueillant.
Des prix raisonnables pour l'endroit.
Un moment convivial

title: Plats excellent!
content: Plats toujours aussi bons, rapport qualit√©- prix excellent , de bonnes quantit√© pour des prix plus que raisonnable, toujours du plaisir √† ce rendre sur cette terrasse que ce soit pour ces bons plats ou pour ces bons desserts, √©quipe agr√©able souriante et discr√®te √† la fois. Facile d acc√®s places de parcs √† disposition , √† bientot ! Jennie

title: Sch√∂ne Terrasse
content:
Die Garten-Terrasse hat uns animiert, dort Mittag essen zu wollen.
Es gibt g√ºnstige Tagesmenues und wir haben davon profitiert. Der Service war freundlich und speditiv.
Leider gab es ein paar Touristen, die sich l√§rmend, ohne zu konsumieren dort aufhalten wollten mit Bier und Eis aus dem Shop nebenan. Erst nach energischem Eingreifen der Wirtin haben sie die Terrasse verlassen

title: ÈßÖ‰∏≠„ÅÆ„É¨„Çπ„Éà„É©„É≥
content: „Ç∞„É™„É•„Ç§„Ç®„Éº„É´ÈßÖ„Å´„ÅÇ„Çã„Çπ„Ç§„ÇπÊñôÁêÜ„ÇíÈ£ü„Åπ„Çâ„Çå„Çã„É¨„Çπ„Éà„É©„É≥„ÄÇÈõªËªä„ÇíÂæÖ„Å§Èñì„Å´„Éì„Éº„É´„ÇíÈ£≤„Çì„Åß„Åè„Å§„Çç„Åê„Åì„Å®„ÇÇ„Åß„Åç„Çã„ÄÇ

title: Bom local
content: Bom local para desfrutar de uma refei√ß√£o! A funcion√°ria portuguesa √© muito simp√°tica e a comida muito boa! Localizado mesmo em frente ao museu do queijo gruyere ! Aconselho!

title: J'adore
content:
J'y suis all√©e 4-5 fois et je ne suis jamais d√©√ßue. Le service est efficace et discret (je pr√©f√®re cela aux personnes aux grands sourires qui sont faux). L'endroit a √©t√© refait. L'ambiance de brasserie y demeure et est chaleureuse. On s'y sent bien. Les prix sont super corrects pour de grandes quantit√©s. Le rapport qualit√©-quantit√©-prix et les clients sont les grands gagnants. On y ressort rassasi√©. La salade (en formule entr√©e pour quelques plats de viandes ou autres) est d√©licieuse. Si mon palais ne me trompe pas, la sauce italienne est maison. Cela change de la sauce fran√ßaise industrielle. Ma famille adore la nourriture propos√©e. Il y en a pour tout les go√ªts m√™me pour mon beau-p√®re qui est p√©nible pour la nourriture. Seul mon copain -cuistot de m√©tier- a une fois fait une remarque: viande de filet mignon de porc coup√© trop √©paisse, mais c'est un √©ternel insatisfait concernant la cuisine des restaurants. La mousse au chocolat maison est d√©licieuse.
Je conseille vivement.

Really amazing place. It was renovated a few years ago. It's next to the platform of the railway station. The prices are cheap for Switzerland and the dishes are abundant.
I ate there 4-5 times and I was always happy and full. The staff are incredible, efficient and discreet - which I appreciate because I cannot stand fake smiles.
I suppose the Italian salad dressing is homemade because it tastes so good. The chocolate mousse is amazing and homemade.
Try it :-)

title: Bon restaurant √† prix correct + sp√©cialit√©
content: Un bon restaurant accessible √† tout le monde face √† la maison du gruy√®re, nous avons pris le plat du jour cela nous a plu. L‚Äôaccueil en revanche n'est pas tr√®s convivial.

title: le menu du jour en famille
content:
Nous avons mang√© le menu du jour en famille. l'√©tablissement au d√©cor lyonnais et raffinn√©. Il y a un bon rapport qualit√©/prix et le service est pro et souriant. En 45 minute nous avons manger une entr√©e-plat-dessert.
Je vus recommande cet √©tablissement

title: Bon rapide pas cher
content: Nous avons pris l'hamburger et le croque monsieur. Tr√®s bon et pour la Suisse pas trop cher ! Bien si vous voulez manger vite et bien ! Facile √† trouver c'est en face de la maison du gruy√®re.

title: An act of kindness
content:
I have a nice story for you. My family and I, from Costa Rica, went to Gruy√®res for the first time and we chose the Brasserie du Relais as the place to have dinner. The cuisine of the place is wonderful, I tell it trying to be objective and with the background of having eaten in nice restaurants of Barcelona and France the last week. Mr. Luis really knows how to cook.
But my comment goes beyond the cooking. We weren't aware of the fact that the last train/bus leaves Gruy√®res at 8 pm and we finished our dinner at 10 pm (yes we took our time).
With no trains/buses until the next day we had no other option than to walk 12 Km in the middle of the night to get to our B&B, but when I went to ask if it was safe to walk at night in the surroundings Mr. Luis left the restaurant in someone else's hands, took his car and drove 30 minutes to drop us at the door of our B&B.
I was so amazed by how this man went the extra mile to give us a wonderful touristic experience in Gruy√®res. If you want to be served by kind and selfless peojple do not hesitate on paying a visit to this place. Besides the good deed I told here, the food is outstanding, we ate grilled beef, chicken and pork, as well as sandwiches, fries and salad. Everything was just delicious.

title: Excelente comida...
content: A comida estava deliciosa. O card√°pio tem variadas op√ß√µes. O ambiente √© fant√°stico, t√≠pico de Gruyeres. Voltarei...

title: Excellent cheeseburger and friendly service
content:
Situated just in front of the "Maison du fromage". We actually went there in the afternoon but were able to have lunch. We had a fondue moitie-moitie (25 CHF) and a cheeseburger (14 CHF). The fondue was good and the cheeseburger (beef and gruyere + vacherin cheese) was just excellent! and very reasonably priced.

Service was fast (we were the only ones eating) and friendly.

title: Welcoming brasserie at the train station...
content: We came here by default because the restaurant in the Maison du Gruyere said that they would not be able to provide us anything to eat in the 45 mins we had before our train left (even though the restaurant was empty). So we crossed over the road and tried the Brasserie. We were the only customers, but got a friendly welcome. We had exactly what we wanted - a croute de Gruyere ie Ham and (lots of) cheese on toast, and a bier pression. Not challenging cuisine, but very well done. Expensive for a brasserie (20 CHF), but probably similar prices to the restaurants in Gruyere Ville. Given that the brasserie is literally on the station platform, we had plenty of time to catch our train.

title: Solid place in Gruyere
content: Reasonable place in gruyere serving local specialties, including meats, fondue, salads and other swiss fare. Fine for a meal in town.

title: Only coffee do not take food
content:
The place is perphaps acceptable for a coffee but do not take fondue or salade de Ch√®vre. The fondue was not good and the salad well actually there was one leaf for 22 CHF !! I live in Suisse and I know the prices but this really cheating.

title: Just ok
content: Visited this restaurant since it was right opposite the gruyere cheese factory. They have seating outside but there was only one waitress on a Saturday afternoon. Decided to have their cheese fondue, which comes with bread pieces and potatoes. My sis had their shrimp dish, which was good. The fondue itself was ok, nothing spectacular. A bottle of spring water is 7 chf, which I guess is comparable to other places. Service wasn't bad though, even with only one waitress serving about 4 tables.

content: Hamburger and steak, fries excellent. Staff were very helpful. Some of the food on the menu was too rich including artichoke with two sauces was too rich. title: We are waiting impatiently ...
content:
... for this top notch restaurant to reopen after the virus lockdown. We became regulars. For us this is one of the best eating places in the entire Gstaad-Saanenland-Pays d'Enhaut area. Underrated by the popular guides, compared to the German-Austrian Chefs dominance in Gstaad and environs.
Outstanding stuffed saddle of hare was the last sampling of game we had before lockdown. Their herb based steak sauce is one of the best, also the only place in the area we know of, where one gets the 'real' small french fries. title: Tr√®s bon moment !
content:

title: Best quality/price of the region with impeccable service !
content:
My experience at the Valrose started really well, we were very late (9.30 pm which is late for a mountain restaurant off-season) and the staff was super friendly assuring me it was absolutely ok.
Staff is respectful, polite, well dressed and very smiling and friendly.
We ordered a bottle of Laurent Perrier Brut, perfectly chilled.
Starters : Mini malakoffs with a fris√©e and nut salad, Simmental veal carpaccio with a hint of truffled oil. Both delicious.
Then a tartare de boeuf for me & a Simmental entrecote for my friend.
All came with delicious pommes allumettes and salads.
I tasted the entrecote, it was melting in my mouth. exceptional !
I can only recommend the Restaurant Valrose, it is refined yet friendly with great prices for the region.

title: Excellent food, good quality service, nice ambiance
content: It‚Äôs a great address to sleep but also to eat. The quality of the dishes are very good. Based on local or Swiss products. The service was fast. Good recommandation on wines. The meat was fantastic. No mistake. Take your dinner there.

title: Restaurant du Cerf

title: Authentic Swiss Gem in Rougement
content: Right in the center of town lies a quintessentially Swiss restaurant, over 100-years old. We come here monthly for the cozy atmosphere and equally soul-filling cuisine - fresh Swiss salads, delectable fondues, and their Chalet Soup, one of the best in the area. Several nights a week there are accordion players that add to the charming vibe and nice staff. The local wine - Ch√¢teauneuf-du-Pape, cheeses and ice cream shouldn't be missed.

title: Traditional authentic Swiss fare
content:
This restaurant is located in one of the most authentic intimate alpine villages along with its ancient ornate chalets Romanesque church and remains of Cluny monastery
surrounded by towering mountains
Before you even enter the restaurant there is the anticipation and expectation as you leave behind such aesthetic surroundings
It is a typical chalet type atmospheric restaurant serving genuine authentic local produce of the highest quality as confirmed by the cold meat platter.
The raclette with all the accompaniments gherkins baby potatoes and viand seiche - the taste was savoured
We will be back - the red thing

content: Right in the center of town lies a quintessentially Swiss restaurant, over 100-years old. We come here monthly for the cozy atmosphere and equally soul-filling cuisine - fresh Swiss salads, delectable fondues, and their Chalet Soup, one of the best in the area. Several nights a week there are accordion players that add to the charming vibe and nice staff. The local wine - Ch√¢teauneuf-du-Pape, cheeses and ice cream shouldn't be missed.

title: Traditional authentic Swiss fare
content:
This restaurant is located in one of the most authentic intimate alpine villages along with its ancient ornate chalets Romanesque church and remains of Cluny monastery
surrounded by towering mountains
Before you even enter the restaurant there is the anticipation and expectation as you leave behind such aesthetic surroundings
It is a typical chalet type atmospheric restaurant serving genuine authentic local produce of the highest quality as confirmed by the cold meat platter.
The raclette with all the accompaniments gherkins baby potatoes and viand seiche - the taste was savoured
We will be back - the red thing

title: Leider nicht empfehlenswert
content:
Wir waren mit unseren Kids hier und wurden leider sehr entt√§uscht.
Der Ruf und die Karte sind gut, leider konnte das Essen dies nicht best√§tigen. Und der Service erst recht nicht
Wir wussten, dass wir der Tisch sp√§ter noch einmal reserviert war, aber man beachtete uns aber auch kaum. Leere Teller stehen lange da, Wein haben wir uns selbst eingeschenkt, Dessertkarte nur auf Nachfrage. Statt dessen ein Kommentar, dass wir froh sein k√∂nnten, noch Zeit zu haben, da man intern umdisponiert habe. Wir haben dann auf das Dessert verzichtet, was auch kommentarlos zur Kenntnis genommen wurde.

Insgesamt hat man uns leider das Gef√ºhl gegeben, nicht der Wunschklientel zu entsprechen, obwohl die Rechnung trotz allem recht ordentlich war....

title: Eine grosse Entt√§uschung!

Die Kellnerinnen- bis auf die junge mit der Brille- waren alle genervt bis tendenziell unfreundlich zu uns. Sie gaben einem das Gef√ºhl l√§stig zu sein. Sie k√ºmmerten sich lieber um die offensichtlichere schickeria Klientel. Essen war solide, aber nich Gault millaut w√ºrdig. Suppe etwas das, Fisch war durchschnitt: nichts kreatives ider besonderes. K√§sefondue- Klassiker des Kantons- war gut.

title: Schlechter Witz
content: Wir waren nach Rougemont gewandert und leider hatte unser anvisiertes Restaurant geschlossen und somit mussten wir auf das Restaurant du Cerf ausweichen. Grosser Fehler. Wer nicht Kaese essen will kommt sofort an seine Grenzen. Ich entschied mich fuer einen GROSSEN gruenen Salat und fuer 15 FRANKEN erwartet man alles andere als einen knapp bedeckten Teller mit etwas, was wie trauriger Supermarkt-Salat aus dem Beutel aussah (orginal mit braunen Schnittstellen) und einem Supermarkt French Dressing. Ich koche selber viel und frisch und kenne diesen Unterschied sehr genau. So dreist bin ich noch nie abkassiert worden. Das gibt es in keinem In-Lokal in einer Grossstadt, sogar da muss mehr geboten werden. Ausserdem hatte der Nachbartisch Raclette und da ging die Chefin" lueften" und hat die Terrassentuere in unserer unmittelbaren Naehe aufgemacht (Januar!) und es hat sie nicht gestoert, wie ich mir bei meinem ueberteuerten Salat die Jacke angezogen habe. Ja geht's noch.

title: Ambiance tr√®s agr√©able
content: Das Restaurant ist sehr authentisch und die Bedienung effizient und freundlich. Das Fondue war korrekt; wir h√§tten es zwar gerne etwas w√ºrziger gehabt. Ein Restaurant das auf K√§se spezialisiert ist sollte eigentlich mindestens zwei traditionelle Fondues anbieten: eines mild das andere w√ºrzig. Ein Besuch lohnt sich auf alle F√§lle. Rougemont ist zudem eines der sch√∂nsten D√∂rfer.

title: Super restaurants typique
content: Je recommande vivement ce restaurant au c≈ìur de Rougemont . Typiquement suisse , croute aux fromages , fondues , raclettes ,,,, un r√©gal

title: Poor fondue and price quality low
content: Not really the best fondue I ever had... And I am Swiss The service was ok The raclette is far too expensive for What you get Not RECOMMENDED

title: Raclette in a traditional alpine restaurant
content: I've been at this restaurant a few other times and have always enjoyed it. It's our go-to place for Raclette. The restaurant is outside of Gstaad in a small and beautiful village called Rougemont. The name of the restaurant is "du Cerf". What could be better!? Our party of 4 adults and 2 girls under age 14 began our meal by ordering an appetizer of a plate of dried meats (with cornichons and pearl onions). We were surprised how generous the plate or large platter was - much too much for us. We were then served 2 very large pieces of delicious, fragrant raclette cheese - each chunk in its' own heater. (We ordered only 5 servings instead of 6 since portions have proven large in the past). Well, there was enough cheese to feed 7 or 8 people easily. And it was so delicious with the little, perfectly steamed potatoes. I've previously given it a 5 star review and the raclette during this visit still gets 5 stars. However, when we got the bill, we were charged for 2 platters of dried meats ($56 instead of $28). The waitress shouldn't have assumed a party our size wanted 2 plates/platter. Therefore 1 less star. We still had a lovely celebration, but be clear on what you don't want.... I will still go back but will order 4 portions for 6 people of the raclette. Bon Appetit!

title: Sympa, typique, tr√®s bon
content: Bon accueil, service au petit soin, patronne aimable. Les plats sont simples mais typiques et de bon go√ªt. Ce soir l√†, les desserts du jour √©taient excellents. Addition raisonnable pour la r√©gion. Je recommande !

title: Une raclette originale
content:
D√©sirant d√©guster une raclette, nous avons r√©serv√© une table car c'est fortement conseill√©, vu le succ√®s du restaurant.
L'originalit√© consiste √† avoir un four √† raclette sur la table, un morceau de fromage qui chauffe plus ou moins rapidement suivant la hauteur r√©gl√©e par nos soins. Un panier avec des patates, des cornichons, petits oignons et c'est parti.
Une fois le fromage fondu, racler et hop dans l'assiette. D√©guster avec un verre de vin rouge tandis qu'un accord√©on diffuse une musique authentique de la montagne.

title: Tr√®s sympa!
content:
Super service gentil et rapide, musique typique (accord√©on et scie), plats d√©licieux (raclette, fondue, cro√ªte au fromage)
N'h√©sitez pas !

title: Un tr√®s bon restaurant typique pour la fondue. Prix raisonnables .
content: Tr√®s bon endroit pour aller d√Æner entre amis ou en couple. Ambiance tr√®s feutr√©. Je vous y conseille vivement !

title: Tipico ristorantino svizzero
content:
Tipico e storico ristorante svizzero in legno, con musica dal vivo, specializzato in tre piatti al formaggio: fondue, raclette e croute au fromage.

Sul men√π ci sono altri piatti, ma li potete mangiare ovunque.

Consiglio il vino della casa, sia rosso che bianco.

title: √Ä d√©couvrir absolument

√Ä recommander.

title: Family dinner
content: Fantastic place to have Fondue or Raclette. Really autentic with accordeon music. It is always packed full. You have to reserve plenty ahead of time.

title: perfect restaurant for traditional roestis
content: very pleasant atmosphere and service, excellent food and scenery, different types of traditional Swiss roestis

title: viel zu teuer!
content: Mit einigen Freunden war ich da und wie soll es anders sein, wir haben alle Raclette bestellt. Das Essen war auch fix da, wirklich eine Empfehlung, auch ein paar andere Sachen gibt es noch auf der Karte, alles in allem ok. Was nicht get ist f√ºr einen winzigen Beilagensalat 15 ‚Ç¨, f√ºr Bier was nicht schmeckt 5 ‚Ç¨ alles in allem mit 4 Personen waren wir nach einer Stunde mit dem Essen fertig, hm haten wohl alle Hunger, satt waren wir jedoch danach nicht. Ok wir sind zuvor ein paar Kilometer Rad gefahren ........aber zur√ºck zum Lokal, gem√ºtlich ist es auch, einziges wirkliches problem der Preis, Schweiz hin oder her, 250 ‚Ç¨ f√ºr das gebotenen sind 125‚Ç¨ zuviel.Das hat es uns allen etwas verleidet , also wirklich!

title: Cheese Fondue in the right setting
content:
I live in the same street, so I know what I am talking about and have frequented this place for more than 20 years.
Still the same original mountain style, still the same friendly service and above all still the most excellent cheese fondue I know of.
It is kind of a secret hide-away for many celebrities from nearby Gstaad
and I fully understand why the love this place

title: Gem√ºtliches traditionelles Fondue-Restaurant im Herzen von Rougemont
content: Sehr gem√ºtliches Restaurant mit Spezialit√§t Fondue und Raclette. Wir hatten ein K√§sefondue und dieses schmeckte ausgezeichnet. Nettes und aufmerksames Personal. Sehr zu empfehlen!

title: Per fonduta o raclette
content: Se non commettete l'errore di ordinare qualcosa di diverso da fonduta o raclette, √® una buona soluzione per cenare nella zona di Rougemont, Gstaad. Il servizio √® a dir poco senza fronzoli, con una signora preoccupata di sparecchiare il prima possibile, senza accertarsi che abbiate finito. Nota dolente il conto: esagerato per il livello del servizio e per l'ambiente.

title: Bonne fondue dans un cadre typique
content: Situ√© au centre du village de Rougemont, ce restaurant a un cadre typique de la r√©gion. Nous y avons mang√© une excellente fondue, une bonne assiette de viande s√©ch√©e, ainsi qu'une bonne soupe, attention la salade m√™l√©e n'a rien de sp√©cial. Le service est efficace, sans chichis.. Les prix sont assez √©lev√©s, mais normaux pour la r√©gion. Je n'√©tais pas forc√©ment emball√©e

title: Between average and good...Wasn't blown away...
content:
Having read the previous reviews I thought it was going to be amazing.
Ofcourse the restaurant is beautiful.Service efficient and owner very polite.
Dried meat platter for CHFs 27.-is not cheap and honestly pretty standard for Switzerland.
Salads were o.k. but again good have been more inventive.
As for the fondue...Yes it was good but in this region you can't really go wrong. Better than average and not quite very good.

title: De retour de Zweisimmen
content:
Ce n'est pas la 1√®re fois que nous faisons halte au caf√© du cerf !
C'est toujours un vrai plaisir de manger en terrasse ! L'accueil est toujours fort sympathique et courtois !

Sans oublier la double cr√®me et ses meringues !!
Le cade est tr√®s plaisant, dans son jus !

title: tr√®s sympathique et typique restaurant avec des sp√©cialit√©s au fromage
content: le Cerf est une vraie institution o√π sont servies depuis deux g√©n√©rations des sp√©cialit√©s au fromage surtout. Accueil chaleureux, ambiance tr√®s sympathique, bonne cuisine. Tr√®s jolie terrasse l¬¥√©t√©. Vaut le d√©tour.

title: Fondue
content: Tr√®s bonne fondue dans un cafe typique de la r√©gion. Le soir en saison musique locale. La meilleure fondue de la r√©gion. Aujourd'hui pluie dommage car la terrasse a une superbe vue

title: K√§sespezialit√§ten auf h√∂chstem Niveau
content:
Alles vom Feinsten und das seit Jahrzehnten !

Die Karte klein aber oho ! Sehr liebensw√ºrdiger Service und wundersch√∂ne Einrichtung mit kleiner Terrasse auf der S√ºdseite .

title: Great Ambiance & Swiss Country Dishes in this Charming Old Alpine Restaurant
content: First visit in 1970 at the beginning of ski season, and local ski instructors were yodeling and singing during their dinner, for their enjoyment and ours. Wonderful! Excellent fondues and raclette (have an order of B√ºndnerfleisch [local air-dried beef] with the raclette), as well as other well prepared Swiss meals. All in a beautiful, very early Chalet, served in two very old carved wood panel rooms, with original antique tables, chairs, etc..

title: Raclette ou fondue
content: Un endroit typique charmant o√π on est re√ßu aimablement. Choisissez la raclette ou la fondue au fromage et vous ne serez pas d√©√ßu . La viande des Grisons en entr√©e est savoureuse et le Fandant (vin blanc suisse) gouleyant. Un homme du pays joue pour les convives des airs connus...avec une scie. Tr√®s r√©ussi !

title: Super Recomendable
content: Restaurante con much√≠simo encanto, donde poder comer producto t√≠pico de la zona. Bonita decoraci√≥n ambientada por un acorde√≥n. Recomendable 100%.

title: Consistently good
content: Been going for over 40 years, consistently good (with a different chef I have to assume...). Small selection, famed for raclette and fondue. Those are very good, quick and attentive service. Typical mountain restaurant, good atmosphere. During peak season, reservation is required.

title: K√§sespezialit√§ten
content: Wer gerne Raclette und Fondue hat ist hier richtig. Das Restaurant ist urchig und heimelig, das Essen w√§hrschaft, der Service freundlich. Ein Besuch wert.

title: Best Raclette
content: I simply love this restaurant and enjoy it so luch everytime I go there. Their raclette is just delicious and the service is so good!

title: Fondue und Raclette bis zum Umfallen
content: Wie jedes Jahr haben wir auch dieses Jahr wieder im Cerf ein Fondue und Raclette genossen. Das Essen war wie immer spitze. Im Cerf steht die Zeit still, Einrichtung, Service und Preise wie fr√ºher: Sehr gut! Eine echte Oase inmitten der Gourmet-Tempel des Saanenlandes! Wir freuen uns schon auf das n√§chste Mal!

title: Magnifique
content:
La Raclette ou la fondue au cerf, que c'est bon ! Cher sans doute, mais c'est la r√©gion. Mon conseil : allez-y le 1er janvier au soir, petite surprise bien sympathique en cours de d√Æner....
C'est top, point barre.

title: Typique
content:
Restaurant typique proposant des sp√©cialit√©s montagnardes suisses.
Excellente fondue et raclette, le tout arros√© d'un bon vin blanc.
J'adore cet endroit

title: cher certes mais bon.
content:
Gentiment re√ßus √° 15 heures 30, nous avons pu partager fondue au fromage et raclette de grande qualit√©. Les salades, saucisses, salade de pomme de terre ainsi que la viande de grison √©taient toutes d√©licieuses.
L'addition est certes sal√©e pour une cuisine de bistrot mais on sort de l'endroit repus et ravis. Que demander de plus dans une r√©gion o√π la pr√©tention voire l'arrogance est la "qualit√© premi√®re ".

title: Greyerzer Fondue im Pays d'Enhaut besser als in Gruy√®re!
content: Das erste Mal waren wir im Januar 1978 im Cerf, als wir ferienhalber in Rougemont weilten. In den Folgejahren kamen wir zur√ºck nach Rougemont. Zu dieser Zeit gab der Senior-Chef Bach freitags noch ein Konzert auf der "singenden Geige" - ein Highlight! Das geh√∂rt der Vergangenheit an! Geblieben ist aber das Greyerzer Fondue, wie man es eben in Gruy√®re nicht, sondern nur im Pays d'Enhaut bekommt! Da wird ja schliesslich auch der beste Gruy√®re fabriziert !!!

title: very tipical place in beautiful village
content: excellent fondue as always. made of two cheese from Gruy√®re / Etivaz. luckily also open between the seasons and though visited by locals as well.

title: Great Fondue!
content: Great place with a great atmosphere. One of the best fondues we have ever tried. Efficient service ruled by a charming family.

title: Swiss Raclette
content:
In a small village between Gruyere/Gstaad in the French area of Switzerland, is a traditional Suisse restaurant that is small, wooden, and cozy, with an outdoor sitting area.
If you haven't had raclette before, and even if you have, this place is a wonderful must-do. 1st, you get a nice slab of cheese that you heat in a raclette grill so it gets bubbly and even crispy, if you like. You eat it w/steamed potatoes that are served in a covered basket. Better than fondue! I think.... The local wine we had with it was wonderful. Lovely service as well. It is not cheap as is everything in Switzerland, but so worth it.

title: Cuckoo Clock Charm
content: If you are looking for a typical Swiss tavern, this is it! Raclette and Fondue is their speciality in a cosy old chalet.

title: Pleasant simple meal
content:
Went to the Restaurant du Cerf last week with a friend who has been visiting Rougemont for the last 30 years and recommended it. We stopped by earlier to book a table and they were not sure if they had a table as they had a big event from 3pm onwards and although they thought it should be okay the didn't want to guarantee a table but said to leave our details and they would call us to confirm later. All very helpful and accommodating.
The menu was very restricted, this is out of season so could be different at other times of the year. If you din't want a fondu or racket there was not a lot, not being a big melted cheese fan I ordered their spaghetti of the day and paired it with a large glass of red wine and it was delicious. Sometimes it is better to get a menu that make you order something you might not ordinarily take in a restaurant.
The decor though is lovely, all rustic chalet interior and big comfortable cushions, can imagine how inviting it is when it is snowing outside. Will definitely visit again if in the area.

title: Excellente croute au fromage dans un resto typiquement suisse - authentique √† souhait
content: Personnel gentil et courtois, chose rare, ils servent en plein milieu de l‚Äôapr√®s midi donc parfait pour touristes affam√©s, portion g√©n√©reuse. beaucoup de fromage, excellente bi√®re locale, d√©cor authentique, meubles en bois, boiseries, troph√©es de chasse. ambiance familiale, Super !

title: Restaurant sympathique
content: Une des meilleures fondues de la r√©gion et ... le petit + tr√®s agr√©able, le pain est servi d√©j√† coup√© en cubes

title: Trop cher !
content: Accueil gentil. Restaurant style bistrot. title: Traditional and charming
content:
If you want a real Suisse experience in a small charming restaurant that has not changed in decades then visit this restaurant!

It is the best fondue in the area great fun but also has other choices but limited.

The restaurant is simple and very traditional but there is also a very nice small terrace for when the weather allows.

A must do for anyone visiting the area!

title: La valeur des bonnes traditions suisses

Nous y retournerons.

title: Smashing spot
content: Family run ,friendly and nothing too much trouble . Lovely atmosphere . We just had salads and local cheese for supper and a bottle of wine ,good value 1

title: Lively place, very friendly service, good food!
content: If local fare is what you're after, you won't go wrong at this village restaurant. During the day, winter or summer, if the sun is shining and it's hot outside, you can eat on the terrace and enjoy the gorgeous scenery.

title: Gem√ºtlichkeit pur

title: Family nest
content: Nice tasty simple food in the heart of Rougemont. Clean and quickly service. Fondu was very good. Local wine is worth to taste.

title: a night to remember....
content:
if you love cheese, fondue or raclette, and like some Swiss traditional music, they play on a tree saw!!, this is a must. be sure you make a booking as this is truly an insider tip!
we will make the journey again to Rougemont and Le Cerf is the reason!

title: Fonduta tutto l'anno

Tutto molto buono anche il vino alla spina. Prezzi abbastanza contenuti.

Un tr√®s vieux chalet, la d√©cor est donc authentique (c'est du pur jus), le personnel est charmant, l'ambiance est tr√®s chaleureuse et musicale car un accord√©oniste vous accompagne (ainsi que parfois uns scie musical m'a-t-on dit). Cuisine 100% chalet sans originalit√© particuli√®re mais avec de tr√®s bons produits. Pas bon march√©, mais si c'est le prix de la pr√©servation des monuments historiques, √ßa va.

ambiance sympa, bonne fondue.

title: Very traditional and typical swiss
content: A really good little restaurant with a charming interior and nice terrace serving traditional swiss food . Anyone visiting this area will enjoy their experience here as well the staff are all charming . A traditional must do in the Gstaad valley

title: Das FONDUE war genial
content:
Bin sicher kein schlechter Koch und weiss auch wie man Fondue frisch zubereitet. Deshalb sind meine Anspr√ºche an ein Fondue nicht gerade als gering zu bezeichnen. Aufgrund der guten Kritiken haben wir beschlossen - auch wegen dem schlechten Wetter - uns etwas gutes zu g√∂nnen und hier ein Fondue zu essen. Unsere Erwartungen wurden voll erf√ºllt und sogar √ºbertroffen, denn das was wir hier geniessen durften war wirklich etwas vom feinsten was wir je in Sachen Fondue serviert bekamen. Die Aufmerksame und sehr nette Bedienung durch die Mutter und Tochter lassen keine W√ºnsche offen. Zwar haben sie keinen Internetauftritt, aber das hat das Cerf auch nicht n√∂tig - geht doch die Prominenz von Gstaad hier ein uns aus!
Alles in allem, eine feine Adresse f√ºr ein feines Essen mit guter und zuvorkommender Bedienung in einem kleinem, heimeligen Lokal => Reservieren ist sehr emofehlenswert!

title: arteries just recovering
content:
traditional Swiss restaurant serving cheese raclette.
Forget the fondue - go straight for the cheese raclette which is much more theatrical...a massive lump of cheese grilled under an electric grill right on your table. Served with a basket of boiled small new potatoes... be warned, you will need to run the calorie intake off next day!

Great tradional restaurant run by the Hahlen-Bach family. Immediately opposite the Hotel de Commune in Rougemont

content:

Repas correct et robotatif , serveuses sympas mais chaleur √©prouvante , sans clim et fen√™tres en partie non ouvrables . L'hiver cela doit valoir le d√©tour!!!.

Le dessert : meringues et cr√®me double : on aime ‚Ä¶‚Ä¶..ou pas !!!!

title: Ein wenig mehr Bem√ºhung und es w√§re gleich viel besser
content:
Unaufmerksames Servicepersonal; obwohl wir das Restaurant am Nachmittag besuchten, als es schwach frequentiert war, erhielten wir die Karte erst nach 10 Min. als wir durch rufen auf uns aufmerksam machten. Die Aufnahme der Bestellung erfolgte 15 Min. sp√§ter, als wir erneut die Kellnerinnen riefen. Wie man mit G√§sten umgeht, wussten sie auch nicht. Sie warfen uns die Karten quasi auf den Tisch und ein forsches ‚ÄûOui?‚Äú war die Aufforderung, unsere Bestellung aufzunehmen. Am Schluss hatte ich ein Haar im Salat und meine Begleitung eine Wimper/Augenbraue auf dem K√§se. Ich gab meinen Salat ab, die Dame wusste nichts anderes dazu zu sagen als ein plumpes ‚Äûou!‚Äú - keine Entschuldigung, kein Angebot, mir einen neuen Salat zu bringen - nichts. Am Schluss, nachdem wir wieder durch rufen die Rechnung bestellten, fragte sie, ob ich (nur ich) einen Kaffee oder ein Dessert aufs Haus m√∂chte - nein danke!
Wirklich schade, dass man sich so wenig bem√ºht, wo die Lage doch so sch√∂n und die Auswahl eigentlich auch ok ist. Aber in Gruy√®res fehlt es wohl nicht an G√§sten/Laufkundschaft - wof√ºr sich also die M√ºhe machen und freundlich und professionell sein?!

title: Muy rico!
content: La fondue a volont√© deliciosa, y puedes repartir, y compartir, todo lo que quieras. Igual que la raclette.

title: Tourist rip off
content: Turn around if you don't want to get ripped off!! Average food for a very steep price. We had raclette and R√∂sti which tasted ok, although not the most exciting food. We paid like a 5 star restaurant for 2 star food. For example a small plate of meat (less than 100g) for the Raclette was 26CHF!

title: bonne fondue
content:
manger a gruy√®res?
quoi la raclette? t'es pas fou non !!
ici c'est fondue moiti√© moiti√© avec double cr√®me de la gruy√®re sur meringues comme dessert.

title: Ils chargent pour une garrafa d‚Äôeau
content: Les serveurs ne sont pas du tout sympathique. C‚Äôest un resto fait par le local touristique, ce n‚Äôest pas le contraire, le resto fait le tourisme du local.

Et bien... nous aurions vraiment manqu√© une excellente soir√©e, m√™me une soir√©e parfaite!!! Nous avons √©t√© accueillis chaleureusement et comme des rois! La serveuse, Claudia, √©tait aux petits soins pour nous, mieux √ßa n‚Äôaurait pas √©t√© possible! Souriante, attentive et professionnelle, elle a pu satisfaire avec une immense gentillesse et une grande efficacit√© toutes nos demandes. Nous nous sommes vraiment fait la r√©flexion que le service √©tait aussi important que le repas! En parlant de repas, la fondue √©tait succulente. Le cadre tr√®s agr√©able. L‚Äôaddition plus que correcte, rapport qualit√©-prix excellent. Bref, honn√™tement, m√™me en cherchant l‚Äôerreur, c‚Äô√©tait une soir√©e sans fausse note, un vrai sans-faute. Nous reviendrons avec grand plaisir!

title: A good lunch venue
content: The Hotel de Ville didn't look to be open from the outside, but we found it busy once we went inside. The service was excellent and the food pretty good

title: Belle d√©couverte
content:
Un service rapide avec un sourire en route circonstance.

C'est donc un tr√®s bon endroit pour un lunch entre deux balades ou visites √† Gruy√®res

title: Bonita experiencia
content: Nos fue un poco dif√≠cil encontrar mesa libres para comer estaban todos los restaurantes s√∫per llenos entonces pillamos plazas libres en el restaurante del H√¥tel de Ville nos atendi√≥ una se√±ora que se ve√≠a un poco cansada si muestra un poco m√°s de sonrisa estar√≠a mejor pero sino aparte de todo la comida estuvo muy buenas comimos un poco de todo la fondue tradicional suiza Ami gust√≥ se sent√≠a mucho el alcohol pero estaba muy buena luego pedimos la fondue chinoise que estaba muy buena que nos comimos asta el caldo en realidad es recomendable para relajarse con amigos y familia disfrutando de una buena comida

title: Un w end au march√© de noel
content: D√©j√† la r√©servation via courriel et t√©l√©phone fut laborieuse. Nous avons d√ª ret√©l√©phoner car la confirmation avait √©t√© omise. Arriv√©s √† 12.00 nous n avons pas pu manger car n avions pas pens√© √† r√©server. M√™me un caf√© ne fut pas possible √† 14.30, nous avons donc demand√© un caf√© en chambre..... √† 16.00 nous avons crois√© une personne alors que nous sortions.... lorsque nous avons dit que nous quittions l h√¥tel ho miracle on nous a trouv√© une table et m√™me offert le caf√©. Du coup nous en avons command√© un second.... heu sommes retourn√©s en chambre √† 17.00 sans l avoir eu...du coup nous avons remarqu√© que le march√© de noel de gruy√®re n est pas √† la hauteur .... les commer√ßants restaurants et autres profitent plus largement de cet afflux de touristes, mais la qualit√© est loin d √™tre pr√©sente et un jour, non seulement les touristes ne vont plus revenir, mais les autochtones n accepteront plus d √™tre pris pour des pigeons.

title: Hot drink for a cold day
content: It was nice to go inside this lovely village as the weather outside was quite chilly. We got ourselves (4 of us) four hot drinks and it was a nice and peaceful time ...for 20CHF, yes, this is pricey...but this is a touristic spot.

title: Tasty but rip off
content: Food and service was excellent. Just the 22chf/20‚Ç¨ bill for two bottles of sparkling water (2x0.75l) is a complete rip off, especially being a swiss water and not Voss or Fiji. I think no 3* michelin nor any high end restaurant globally has yet charged me such prices. As food was at regular prices it seemed a not very honest way to inflate the bill.

title: Sehr gutes Fondue Moiti√©-Moiti√©
content: Gruy√®res ist immer mal ein Abstecher von der Autobahn wert. An einem Freitagabend gibt es da ein sch√∂ne Altstadtlichtstimmung (Sp√§tseptember). Bedienung war sehr freundlich und das Fondue wirklich sehr fein.

title: Service rapide et avec le sourire

La r√©putation du restaurant de l'H√¥tel de Ville n'est plus √† faire et leur fondue est une des meilleures du village. Die uns bedienenden Damen waren sehr freundlich, beim Fr√ºhst√ºck aber sehr unter Druck. (Eine Person musste die Hotelg√§ste beim Fr√ºhst√ºck betreuen, das Check-Out der Hotelg√§ste machen und gleichzeitig die G√§ste auf der gut besetzten Terrasse bedienen)

title: Accueil chaleureux
content: Apr√®s une visite nous sommes all√©s dans ce restaurant.La serveuse tr√®s sympathique un service impeccable et un tr√®s bon repas .

title: Boa Escolha
content:
Procuravamos um local para comer fondue e achamos esse restaurante uma boa opcao. Meu marido queria experimentar a raclete tambem.

Nao nos arrependemos, tinhamos ouvido falar bem do Le chalet, mas achamos que esse valeu bastante a pena, estava muito bom!

Our waitress then tried to explain she had a lot of tables as if that was our problem and as if waiting 30 minutes was excusable. Avoid this place. There are many other choices.

title: Tr√®s correct

content:
Service 4/5

title: A vontade

Divino

title: Simplement l‚Äôexcellence Suisse

Je suis d√©j√† venu, revenu et re-revenu dans cette √©tablissement et √† chaque fois l‚Äôexcellence, l‚Äôaccueil, la disponibilit√© et l qualit√© est pr√©sente.

Mets fait avec envie, saveurs intenses, et qualit√© des ingr√©dients sont la r√®gle constante dans cette √©tablissement. Le personnel et chaleureux et accueillants, toujours √† l‚Äô√©coute de vos demandes.

L‚Äôenvie de revenir se fait naturellement. Que ce soit pour une fondue, une raclette ou une meringue double cr√®me c‚Äôest l‚Äô√©tablissement a choisir √† Gruy√®re.

title: Excellent service, good food, great location

Location is top notch right on the big central square, the terrasse is under awnings which was great with the high temperature.

title: Un vrai scandale

J‚Äôallais dans cette maison qui fait de bonnes fondues depuis plus de 10ans. Quel changement et quelle d√©ception √† la fois sur la politique des prix et sur le peu de consid√©ration des anciens clients
Aujourd‚Äôhui la fondue est pratiquement factur√©e au gramme !!! Et quelle facture !!!

La cerise sur le g√¢teau allait arriver lors du paiement ! Et oui dans cette maison l‚Äôeuro √©gale le franc suisse.
On vous annonce 70 francs suisse pour 2 ridicules fondues et 2 caf√©s et au lieu, comme le font TOUS les √©tablissements en suisse de pratiquer le change. Soit 62‚Ç¨ et ben non !!!! √áa fera 70‚Ç¨ et cela sans aucune r√©ponse d‚Äôexplication lorsque j‚Äôai fait remarquer le VOL car pour moi c‚Äôest comme cela que √ßa s‚Äôappelle
S√ªr que je n‚Äôy remettrai plus les pieds

title: Fondue.....

Altehrw√ºrdiges Restaurant mit entsprechendem Charme. Leider in der kalten Jahreszeit kalte Zugluft im ganzen Lokal.

title: Muy mala experiencia
content: Pasamos 1 noche en familia y desde el momento en el que llegamos todo muy mal organizado. Habitaciones CAR√çSIMAS por lo que son ( refugios de esquiador), restaurante muy mediocre y de precios alt√≠simos. Realmente ha sido un timo, muy maleducados y salimos todos muy decepcionados.

title: Get 1 point just for location
content:
Sat in the middle of the medieval town of Gruyeres you cannot get a much more pleasant setting.
Menu obviously dominated by cheese dishes but also some Rosti, Salad & meat choices (not extensive)
My family had a mixed bag from the menu and were happy.
Service was excellent & as a bonus we had the pleasure of having an Alphorn group(6)) play right opposite our table.

title: Tr√®s bonne table et personnel accueillant
content:
Belle soir√©e de juillet sur la terrasse en plein centre de la place de Gruy√®res.
Assiette de jambon et viandes s√©ch√©es, r√∂stis et Malakoff en salade.
En ap√©ro j‚Äôai eu le plaisir de boire une bi√®re artisanale gruy√©rienne. En dessert framboises avec cr√®me de Gruy√®re. Le tout √©tait excellent, la serveuse tr√®s accueillante et disponible.
Les prix des mets √©taient raisonnables, par contre les boissons min√©rales un peu excessifs.

title: Dans l'enfer du tourisme...
content:
Coucher √† l'int√©rieur du mini-village de Gruy√®res - v√©ritable enfer du tourisme en √©t√© - n√©cessite toute une organisation car les voitures restent sur un parking ext√©rieur au bourg. On nous avait promis une aide pour faire passer la voiture le temps de d√©charger les valises...nous l'attendons encore. Par contre le matin, vous pouvez passer votre auto jusqu'√† votre h√¥tel jusqu'√† 10h.
En col√®re, nous n'avons pas d√Æn√© dans cet h√¥tel qui empeste le fromage chaud, oui, m√™me avec 32¬∞, presque tout le monde mange des fondues, incroyable mais vrai!
L'ascenseur qui m√®ne aux √©tages est microscopique, il faut jongler.
La chambre, de grande dimension et de r√©am√©nagement r√©cent, sous les toits, √©tait simple mais confortable. Bien s√ªr, pas question de climatisation ici, la chaleur a √©t√© difficile √† supporter, de plus avec les fen√™tres ouvertes toute la nuit, le bruit de la fontaine juste devant l'h√¥tel a contribu√© √† l'ambiance.
245,50 Francs suisses pour la chambre, m√™me au coeur du village, nous ont paru tr√®s sinc√®rement exag√©r√©s, nous attendions d'autres prestations de meilleure qualit√©.
Donc moralit√©, visitez Gruy√®res mais surtout n'y couchez pas, surtout en plein √©t√©!

title: Pas de dessert √† 13:45
content:
Voulant manger un dessert sur la terrasse o√π il y avait plusieurs places de libre, on nous a r√©pondu qu‚Äôil fallait manger un repas. Il √©tait 13:45 donc nous mangeons un d√©sert juste en face √† la Fleur de Lys o√π nous avons √©t√© bien accueilli.
Les prix ne suffisent plus √† faire fuir les clients. En y ajoutant d‚Äôautres chicanes, vous augmentez leur h√©morragie. Un probl√®me de riche, je l‚Äôavoue oui, mais arr√™tons de distribuer des subsides aux organisations touristiques et obligeons des cours professionnels √† leurs acteurs. Bel √©t√© √† tous.

title: D√©licieux
content: Tr√®s bonne soir√©e pass√©e dans ce restaurant. Service agr√©able et attentif. Fondue, rostis et plat enfant (p√¢tes) un d√©lice ! Et sacr√© quantit√©. A essayer

title: Le village m√©di√©val de Gruy√®re
content:
Le village m√©di√©val de Gruy√®res m√©rite vraiment le d√©tour, c'est un village splendide.
Par contre, le restaurant l'h√¥tel de ville de Gruy√®res m√©rite vraiment le d√©tour afin de l'√©viter. Patron pas sympathique, service lent, nourriture de faible qualit√© pour un prix tr√®s √©lev√©. Choisissez vraiment une autre adresse pour rendre votre s√©jour √† Gruy√®res encore plus agr√©able. De plus, si vous vous arr√™tez pour boire un verre sur la terrasse au environ de midi sans encore √™tre d√©cid√© pour manger...vous √™tes vraiment mal re√ßu et quasiment √©jecter de la terrasse......sympa l'accueil.

title: Food OK, Service Great, Very Busy with Tours
content: We were on our own, not with a Tour Group; this restaurant was packed with tour groups. While we were attended to by our server, it was often apologies as their kitchen was dealing with the large groups. Food was just ok. Wouldn't return.

title: Le Gruyerien
content: We stopped here after a three hour hike at Rochers de Naye (which is about 30-40 min drive away). We were starving and had to have fondue since we were in Gruy√®res. The patio was shady, the people watching was plentiful especially with so many in costume for the medieval festival. The service was sometimes slow but always pleasant. The Gruyerien includes bresaola, cheese fondue and a decadent raspberries and double cr√®me. 43 CHF and worth it after a long hard day.

title: Beautiful Surroundings, Great Raclette and a Fine Bottle of Fendant
content: Toured Gruyere after an absence of many years and was pleased to see that while a few things have changed, the underlying ambiance and feel of the old city is still enchanting. Toured the castle and museums and then had a wonderful lunch of Raclette at the Hotel de Ville. There were 5 of us and a large table was made available for us. The smell of raclette and fondue filled the room and the taste of a fine Fendant white wine brought back many fine memories of years past. Service was timely and 2 small raclette ovens were set up for us with healthy portions of cheese. Bread, potatoes, and cornichons were provided and I added a portion of viand sechee' (dried meat) to accent the mix of molten cheese that we scraped onto our waiting plates. Raclette is a social communal meal and both the conversation and process of calculating who was up next for another portion of cheese was very entertaining. We finished the meal with excellent coffee (with Gruyere cream, of course) and a schnapps. A very satisfying lunch indeed. The Hotel de Ville is located perfectly in the center of town and it's cafe' offers an excellent vantage point from which to view the comings and goings of tourists and inhabitants alike.

title: Kafka
content: Very scattered service. We had to ask for water 4 times, which we were finally given except that we only got our glasses at the end of the meal... the meal wasn‚Äôt what we had ordered either but we went along with it as we didn‚Äôt want to wait another hour for the correct order... once we finished eating we asked to have our coffees inside but the waiters inside didn‚Äôt allow us because ‚Äúthe area is reserved for customers who are having lunch‚Äù which we explained we just did but somehow it doesn‚Äôt work that way so we skipped the coffee and went to the lovely restaurant in front instead. Never again!

title: Great spot for lunch
content: Some bad reviews below however we recently had a really good lunch here. I ordered an omelette with gruyere and ham, and my husband the macaroni de chalet. The omelette was amazing and the mac and cheese really tasty. Staff were also lovely and easy to speak with in English.

title: La terrasse, la fondue, l'accueil
content:
Terrasse bond√©e, mais service excellent et attentif, et tout √©tait parfait.
La carte est superbe, et les prix abordables, √©tonnant vu l'√©tablissement et la ville.
Reste qu' un dimanche midi avec 25¬∞C et plein soleil, la fondue de rigueur fait vite lourd .. !!
On est partis enchant√©s en se disant que la prochaine fois, ce sera le soir, et en en profitant vraiment !
En tous cas, l'essayer c'est l'adopter.

title: Fondue excellente
content:
Nous y sommes all√©s entre amis un lundi midi.
Il n'y avait pas grand monde... tant mieux pour nous.
La fondue √©tait tout simplement excellente... mais vraiment.
On avait pris "√† volont√©" et rien √† redire.
Personnel ultra gentil et pr√©venant.
Cadre tr√®s tr√®s propre;
Nourriture tr√®s bonne... vraiment je vous recommande l'adresse.
Nous on en garde un excellent souvenir.

title: Good value for money
content: We have been there with a family friends of us, a total party of 8. The fondue was very tasty, the local wine fruty and honest. Food value for money. The service, speaking Spanish as well, was correct.

title: A refaire
content: Chambre tr√®s sympa avec vue sur la campagne gruy√®rienne. Tr√®s bonne literie. Excellente fondue en soir√©e, service impeccable. A refaire, avons bien appr√©ci√©.

title: Une bonne fondue au fromage
content: Nous avons eu beaucoup de plaisir √† partager une excellente fondue au fromage avec un couple d'amis dans une ambiance conviviale et agr√©able.

title: Tambi√©n hay algo a parte del queso
content: Restaurante muy acogedor, dejan entrar con perro, como muchos sitios de Suiza y tienen gran variedad de platos con gruyere, en mi caso no me apetec√≠a y eleg√≠ el poulet supr√™me estilo Thai, delicioso, otro amigo eligi√≥ la quiche de gruyere, deliciosa y nada empalagosa.

title: Une belle rencontre
content: Accueil chaleureux, menu complet avec viande s√©ch√©e des grisons, fondue moiti√©-moiti√©, dessert framboise et double-cr√®me. Bouteille de vin blanc Betrisey superbe ! Les prix correspondent √† cette r√©gion touristique ! Service parfait ! Merci beaucoup pour ces bons moments !

title: Povero stomaco
content: Abbiamo pranzato in questo ristorante per puro caso essendo uno dei pochi aperti in un giorno di festa. Volevamo assaggiare delle specialit√† locali e dalla cameriera ci √® stato consigliato il croute di formaggio. Ci √® stato presentato un piatto con 3 fette di pane ammollato nel vino bianco e annegato nel formaggio con sopra 3 sottaceti. Un pastone che abbiamo digerito dopo due giorni. Pure caro: 21.- chf a testa solo per questo piatto. Se ci√≤ √® la loro specialit√†... mamma mia! Chiss√† allora il piatto che gli viene peggio. Per il resto il locale √® carino e centrale.

title: Tr√®s bonne surprise
content:
Nous sommes rentr√©s dans ce restaurant par hasard et le hasard fait bien les choses.
Salade Malakoff, raclette. C'√©tait d√©licieux et le service tr√®s sympathique et rapide. On recommande pour les familles avec enfants.

title: Boa comida
content: Bom fondue, boa raclete e um bom rosti. O atendimento foi bom. Tudo isto acompanhado de um bom vinho Pinot noir. Vale a pena a visita.

title: Muy gustoso
content:
Un sitio ideal para degustar una buena fondue y una buena raclette, ya que se pueden pedir por dio es individuales.La fondue dan ganas de continuar comiendo sin parar, ya que es super gustosa.
La tableta es menos gustosa, pero con la patata y una buena cantidad de pimienta todo se arregla.
Acompa√±ado con un buen vino blanco suizo queda uno satifecho para toda la tarde...
Para el postre no queda mucho sitio, pero no olviden un caf√© con la deliciosa crema de La Gruyere.

title: Convenable
content:
Au moins un restaurant qui n'a pas 1 h d'attente !! Dans l'ensemble nous avons √©t√© satisfait. Service souriant et rapide, fondu bonne et √† discr√©tion. Un peu bruyant et prix √©quivalent dans le quartier.
Gruy√®re reste une destination incontournable et ce restaurant un bon rep√®re

title: Okay food, poor service
content: We were in Gruyeres on the Chocolate Train, and picked this restaurant out of a half-dozen others on the village main street that all looked the same. It was packed with tourists but we were seated pretty quickly--but that was the last time anything happened quickly. We had to wait awhile for someone to take our order, much longer before our food was brought, and after waiting a very long time for someone to bring our check we finally left our table and loitered around the servers' station until someone took our payment. We got the impression that there was some kind of staffing problem, because we kept getting different servers who didn't seem to know what was going on. Although the food was pretty good--my rosti with cheese was very tasty and the portion size was generous--that was offset by the high prices (but perhaps to be expected in a tourist town). The takeaway: do a little homework before picking a place here, even when all of the choices seem identical.

title: Beaucoup trop d'attente et service d√©plorable
content: Nous sommes venus √† 4 et avons attendu 45min pour une salade en entr√©e et 1h10 au total pour les plats. Service d√©plorable et aucune anticipation. √Ä √©viter.

Desserts obligatoirement meringues et cr√®me double de Gruy√®res (tr√®s bien). Service sympa et agr√©able. Prix un peu √©lev√©s (CHF 20.- pour une omelette)

title: Tour Bus Eats
content:
We came in with a large tour group. We picked this place because we could find seating quickly.

Once the waitress took our order we didn‚Äôt see our food for 32 minutes. I‚Äôm not sure if this is an average wait time for this place, but it‚Äôs important to know if you are on a limited schedule while in this town.

The food was good. It tasted authentic and served its purpose.

The service was lacking in my opinion.

title: Guten Fondue
content: An einem sonnigen Tag im Oktober haben wir auf der Terrasse ein Fondue gegessen, und es war super, hat einfach alles gepasst.

title: Terrible place do not stop !!!
content: Wait 1 hour to get a fondue , not even warm ! When we asked for some more as it it all you can eat , than There was no more bred !! No bred in a restaurant selling fondue ??!! So we had fondue in front of us and couldn't eat it . She said they have to cook more bread !! Horrible experience !

title: Terrible place
content: Avoid this place. Terrible service low quality food. You need a lasso to catch a waiter, but it is does not matter, they forget your order anyway . One of the worst place I have been in Switzerland.

Lorsqu'on arrive en haut juste √† l'entr√©e du village, on est carr√©ment s√©duit par la carte postale, l'architecture est int√©ressante, le sol pav√© √† du charme et les d√©cor est plant√©.

Un choix de R√∂stis est propos√© : tout simplement immangeable, on vous apporter une grossi√®re galette de type frisbee dans une assiette et basta ! sans gout mais avec de la graisse. Le prix est bien trop √©lev√© pour l'assiette. Le service reste rapide et plut√¥t agr√©able.

title: Great place to have cheese fondue
content:
This restaurant actually servers "Cheese fondue at discretion". The fondue was very good, typical for the Gruyeres area.

In the weekend the terrace is usually full, but you can manage to get a table even without a reservation.

The prices are a little high, but this should be expected.

title: Fondue
content: Comincio con il dire che sono un amante della fondue e ne mangio in gran quantit√†. In questa occasione posso dire che non mi √® piaciuta perch√© aveva un retrogusto acidulo troppo forte. Non ho avuto problemi di stomaco quindi deve essere proprio la qualit√†. Non ci torner√≤ a mangiare. title: Fondue
content: Buen sitio para probar una fondue, aunque apuesto que en el pueblo de Gruyere todos son igual de buenos. El pueblo huele a queso por donde quiera que vayas. Bonito sitio para disfrutar de un momento de relax.

title: Really enjoyable lunch but expensive
content: Nice location half way up the main street and we got a good table overlooking the village. We had lunch which was nice, the service was really good and the only negative is that it's quite expensive (although this goes for all of the restaurants in Gruyeres)

title: Bad food, lots of flies around
content: We were really disappointed. The food was bad, especially the chicken and the fries. Everything was very salty. As if this was not bad enough, there were gazillions of flies all over the food with no attempt by the restaurant to get rid of them. Bad food and annoying ambiance!

title: Cozy
